    1     //HERC013  JOB CLASS=A,MSGCLASS=A,MSGLEVEL=(1,1)   ,RESTART=U06.S00A    JOB 6613
          ***                                                                     00020000
          ***   JCL TO UPDATE CLE DISTRO V3 TO V4 - UPDATE EXISTING MEMBERS       00030000
          ***                                                                     00040000
          **********************************************************************  00050000
    2     //U00 EXEC SLMUPDT,QUAL='HERC01.CLE.DISTRO',LANG=ASM,   DIFF=2,         00060000
          //    LIB1='SOURCE',LIB2='SOURCEX',CHAIN=TS,NAME=TCMD,VER='1',          00070000
          //    OLD='HERC01.CLE.DISTRO.SOURCE(TCMD)',                             00080000
          //    NEW='HERC01.MAP3270.MACLIB(TCMD)',                                00090000
          //    APPLLIB='HERC01.TEST.LOADLIB'                                     00100000
          **********************************************************************  00110000
    3     XXSLMUPDT  PROC OUT='*',   DEFAULT SYSOUT CLASS                         00040000
          XX             OLD=,       OLD "BEFORE" SOURCE                          00050000
          XX             NEW=,       NEW "AFTER" SOURCE                           00060000
          XX             QUAL=,      HIGH LEVEL QUALIFIER FOR DATASETS            00070000
          XX             LIB1=,      MASTER LIB
          XX             LIB2=,      CHAINED LIB
          XX             NAME=,      MEMBER NAME
          XX             CHAIN=,     CHAIN CODE (2 CHAR)
          XX             LANG=,      3 CHARACTER CODE FOR LANG TYPE               00080000
          XX             DIFF=6,     NUMBER OF LINES                              00090000
          XX             RETAIN='N', RETAIN FILES                                 00100000
          XX             VER='N',    ADJUST VERSION IF NOT N
          XX             APPLLIB='USER1.LOADLIB'                                  00110000
          **********************************************************************  00120000
          ***                                                                     00130000
          ***  SET THE RET CODE FOR LANG AND LINE DIFF COUNT                      00140000
          ***                                                                     00150000
          **********************************************************************  00160000
          ***                                                                     00170000
    4     XXS00A    EXEC PGM=SETRC,PARM=('3&LANG.PASPL1COBASMFORDATRPG')          00180000
    5     XXSTEPLIB DD   DSN=USER1.LOADLIB,DISP=SHR                               00190000
    6     XXSYSOUT  DD   SYSOUT=&OUT                                              00200000
    7     XXAS00A   EXEC PGM=JOBABEND,COND=(0,NE,S00A)                            00210000
    8     XXSTEPLIB DD  DSN=HERC01.TEST.LOADLIB,DISP=SHR                          00220000
          ***                                                                     00230000
    9     XXS00B    EXEC PGM=SETRC,PARM=('1&DIFF.23456789')                       00240000
   10     XXSTEPLIB DD   DSN=USER1.LOADLIB,DISP=SHR                               00250000
   11     XXSYSOUT  DD   SYSOUT=&OUT                                              00260000
   12     XXAS00B   EXEC PGM=JOBABEND,COND=(0,NE,S00B)                            00270000
   13     XXSTEPLIB DD  DSN=HERC01.TEST.LOADLIB,DISP=SHR                          00280000
          **********************************************************************  00290000
          ***                                                                     00300000
          ***  GENERATE THE CONTROL CARD FOR COMPARE                              00310000
          ***                                                                     00320000
          **********************************************************************  00330000
          ***                                                                     00340000
   14     XXS01     EXEC PGM=MAKESTMT,PARM='&LANG&DIFF'                           00350000
   15     XXSTEPLIB DD   DSN=USER1.LOADLIB,DISP=SHR                               00360000
   16     XXSYSOUT  DD   SYSOUT=&OUT                                              00370000

          XX             UNIT=SYSDA,SPACE=(TRK,(1,1),RLSE),                       00390000
          XX             DCB=BLKSIZE=3120                                         00400000
          **********************************************************************  00410000
          ***                                                                     00420000
          ***  GENERATE THE IDCAMS CARDS TO DELETE WORK DATASET                   00430000
          ***                                                                     00440000
          **********************************************************************  00450000
          ***                                                                     00460000
   18     XXS02     EXEC PGM=MAKESTMT,PARM=('@PDEL\&QUAL..\',                     00470000
          XX          'COMPARE.DATA\DELTA.DATA\DELTAX.DATA\@NEWSRC.DATA')         00480000
   19     XXSTEPLIB DD   DSN=USER1.LOADLIB,DISP=SHR                               00490000
   20     XXSYSOUT  DD   SYSOUT=&OUT                                              00500000
   21     XXSTMTS   DD   DSN=&&DSTMT,DISP=(NEW,PASS),                             00510000
          XX             UNIT=SYSDA,SPACE=(TRK,(1,1),RLSE),                       00520000
          XX             DCB=BLKSIZE=3120                                         00530000
          **********************************************************************  00540000
          ***                                                                     00550000
          ***  DELETE THE WORKING DATASETS.                                       00560000
          ***                                                                     00570000
          **********************************************************************  00580000
          ***                                                                     00590000
   22     XXS03     EXEC PGM=IDCAMS                                               00600000
   23     XXSYSPRINT DD  SYSOUT=*                                                 00610000
   24     XXSYSIN    DD   DSN=&&DSTMT,DISP=(OLD,PASS)                             00620000
          **********************************************************************  00630000
          ***                                                                     00640000
          ***  EXECUTE THE COMPARE PROGRAM                                        00650000
          ***                                                                     00660000
          **********************************************************************  00670000
          ***                                                                     00680000
   25     XXS04     EXEC PGM=SCOMPARE                                             00690000
   26     XXSTEPLIB  DD  DSN=&APPLLIB,DISP=SHR                                    00700000
   27     XXFT06F001 DD  SYSOUT=&OUT                                              00710000
   28     XXOUTPUT   DD  DSN=&QUAL..COMPARE.DATA,DISP=(NEW,CATLG),                00720000
          XX             UNIT=SYSDA,SPACE=(CYL,(2,2),RLSE),VOL=SER=PUB002,        00730000
          XX             DCB=(RECFM=FBA,LRECL=121,BLKSIZE=2420)                   00740000
   29     XXFILEA    DD  DSN=&OLD,DISP=SHR,DCB=BUFNO=1                            00750000
   30     XXFILEB    DD  DSN=&NEW,DISP=SHR                                        00760000
   31     XXFILEC    DD  DSN=&&CNTL,DISP=(OLD,PASS)                               00770000

          XX             UNIT=SYSDA,SPACE=(TRK,(10,10),RLSE),                     00790000
          XX             DCB=(RECFM=FB,LRECL=80,BLKSIZE=3200)                     00800000
   33     XXFILEE    DD  DSN=&QUAL..DELTAX.DATA,DISP=(NEW,CATLG,DELETE),          00810000
          XX             UNIT=SYSDA,SPACE=(TRK,(10,10),RLSE),                     00820000
          XX             DCB=(RECFM=FB,LRECL=80,BLKSIZE=3200)                     00830000

          ***  EXECUTE THE SCOMPARU PROGRAM TO UPDATE THE OLD PROGRAM TO NEW      00860000
          ***                                                                     00870000
          **********************************************************************  00880000
          ***                                                                     00890000
   34     XXS05     EXEC PGM=SCOMPARU                                             00900000
   35     XXSTEPLIB  DD  DSN=&APPLLIB,DISP=SHR                                    00910000
   36     XXORIG     DD  DSN=&OLD,DISP=SHR                                        00920000
   37     XXDELTA    DD  DSN=&QUAL..DELTA.DATA,DISP=SHR                           00930000
   38     XXSYSPRINT DD  SYSOUT=*,DCB=BLKSIZE=121                                 00940000
   39     XXNEWSRC   DD  DSN=&QUAL..NEWSRC.DATA,DISP=(NEW,CATLG,DELETE),          00950000
          XX             UNIT=SYSDA,SPACE=(TRK,(10,10),RLSE),VOL=SER=PUB002,      00960000
          XX             DCB=BLKSIZE=3200                                         00970000
          **********************************************************************  00980000
          ***                                                                     00990000
          ***  EXECUTE THE COMPARE PROGRAM TO COMPARE THE UPDATED AND THE NEW     01000000
          ***  THIS COMPARE SHOULD SHOW ZERO DIFFERENCES.  ABORT IF ANY           01010000
          ***  DIFFERENCE FOUND                                                   01020000
          ***                                                                     01020000
          **********************************************************************  01030000
          ***                                                                     01040000
   40     XXS06     EXEC PGM=SCOMPARE                                             01050000
   41     XXSTEPLIB  DD  DSN=&APPLLIB,DISP=SHR                                    01060000
   42     XXFT06F001 DD  SYSOUT=&OUT                                              01070000
   43     XXOUTPUT   DD  SYSOUT=&OUT,DCB=BLKSIZE=1210                             01080000
   44     XXFILEA    DD  DSN=&NEW,DISP=SHR                                        01090000
   45     XXFILEB    DD  DSN=&QUAL..NEWSRC.DATA,DISP=SHR                          01100000
   46     XXFILEC    DD  DSN=&&CNTL,DISP=(OLD,DELETE)                             01110000
   47     XXFILED    DD  SYSOUT=*,DCB=(RECFM=F,LRECL=80,BLKSIZE=80)               01120000
   48     XXFILEE    DD  SYSOUT=*,DCB=(RECFM=F,LRECL=80,BLKSIZE=80)               01130000
   49     XXAS06    EXEC PGM=JOBABEND,COND=(0,NE,S00A)                            01140000
   50     XXSTEPLIB DD  DSN=HERC01.TEST.LOADLIB,DISP=SHR                          01150000
          **********************************************************************  00980000
          ***                                                                     00990000
          ***  GENERATE THE STATEMENTS TO LOAD THE DELTA STMTS INTO LIB2          01000000
          ***                                                                     01020000
          **********************************************************************  01030000
          ***
   51     XXS07    EXEC  PGM=MAKESTMT,                                            00110000
          XX          PARM=('./ LOAD\./ CHANGE NAME=&NAME,VERSION=NEXT')          00210000
   52     XXSTEPLIB DD DSN=USER1.LOADLIB,DISP=SHR                                 00140000
   53     XXSYSOUT  DD SYSOUT=&OUT                                                00150000
   54     XXSTMTS   DD DSN=&&STMTG1,DISP=(NEW,PASS),                              00160000
          XX           UNIT=SYSDA,SPACE=(TRK,(1,1),RLSE),                         00170000
          XX           DCB=BLKSIZE=3200                                           00180000
          **********************************************************************
   55     XXS08    EXEC  PGM=MAKESTMT,                                            00200000
          XX          PARM=('./ ENDUP')                                           00210000
   56     XXSTEPLIB DD DSN=USER1.LOADLIB,DISP=SHR                                 00220000
   57     XXSYSOUT  DD SYSOUT=&OUT                                                00230000
   58     XXSTMTS   DD DSN=&&STMTG2,DISP=(NEW,PASS),                              00240000
          XX           UNIT=SYSDA,SPACE=(TRK,(1,1),RLSE),                         00250000
          XX           DCB=BLKSIZE=3200                                           00260000
          **********************************************************************  00980000
          ***                                                                     00990000
          ***  LOAD THE DELTA STMTS INTO LIB2                                     01000000
          ***                                                                     01020000
          **********************************************************************  01030000
          ***
   59     XXS09   EXEC PGM=IEBUPDTX,REGION=128K,                                  00320000
          XX           PARM='CHAINUPD,CHAIN=&CHAIN,NOIMPLSEQ,LISTDEL'             00330000
   60     XXSYSUT1   DD DUMMY                                                     00340000
   61     XXSYSUT2   DD DSN=&QUAL..&LIB2,DISP=OLD                                 00350000
   62     XXSYSPRINT DD SYSOUT=&OUT                                               00390000
   63     XXSYSPUNCH DD SYSOUT=Z                                                  00400000
   64     XXSYSLIB   DD DUMMY                                                     00410000
   65     XXLIB1     DD DUMMY                                                     00420000
   66     XXLIB2     DD DUMMY                                                     00430000
   67     XXSYSIN  DD DSN=&&STMTG1,DISP=(OLD,DELETE)                              00440000
   68     XX       DD DSN=&QUAL..DELTAX.DATA,DISP=SHR                             00450000
   69     XX       DD DSN=&&STMTG2,DISP=(OLD,PASS)                                00460000
   70     XXDD     DD DSN=&QUAL..&LIB1,DISP=OLD
          **********************************************************************
   71     XXS10    EXEC  PGM=MAKESTMT,
          XX          PARM=('./ CHANGE NAME=&NAME,LIST=ALL,VERSION=NEXT\',
          XX             './ INSERT SEQ1=0')
   72     XXSTEPLIB DD DSN=USER1.LOADLIB,DISP=SHR
   73     XXSYSOUT  DD SYSOUT=&OUT
   74     XXSTMTS   DD DSN=&&STMTG1,DISP=(NEW,PASS),
          XX           UNIT=SYSDA,SPACE=(TRK,(1,1),RLSE),

          ***************************************************************

          XX          PARM='CHAINUPD,CHAIN=&CHAIN,NOIMPLSEQ,LISTDEL'
   76     XXSYSUT1   DD DSN=&QUAL..&LIB1,DISP=OLD
   77     XXSYSUT2   DD DSN=&QUAL..&LIB1,DISP=OLD
   78     XXSYSPRINT DD SYSOUT=&OUT
   79     XXSYSPUNCH DD SYSOUT=Z
   80     XXSYSLIB   DD DUMMY
   81     XXLIB1     DD DSN=&QUAL..&LIB2,DISP=OLD
   82     XXLIB2     DD DUMMY
   83     XXSYSIN  DD DSN=&&STMTG1,DISP=(OLD,DELETE)
   84     XX       DD DSN=&&STMTG2,DISP=(OLD,PASS)
          **********************************************************************  01160000
          ***                                                                     01170000

          **********************************************************************  01400000
          **********************************************************************  01460000
  110     //U01 EXEC SLMUPDT,QUAL='HERC01.CLE.DISTRO',LANG=ASM,   DIFF=2,         00120000
          //    LIB1='SOURCE',LIB2='SOURCEX',CHAIN=TS,NAME=TRT3270,VER='1',       00130000
          //    OLD='HERC01.CLE.DISTRO.SOURCE(TRT3270)',                          00140000
          //    NEW='HERC01.MAP3270.MACLIB(TRT3270)',                             00150000
          //    APPLLIB='HERC01.TEST.LOADLIB'                                     00160000
          **********************************************************************  00170000
  111     XXSLMUPDT  PROC OUT='*',   DEFAULT SYSOUT CLASS                         00040000
          XX             OLD=,       OLD "BEFORE" SOURCE                          00050000
          XX             NEW=,       NEW "AFTER" SOURCE                           00060000
          XX             QUAL=,      HIGH LEVEL QUALIFIER FOR DATASETS            00070000
          XX             LIB1=,      MASTER LIB
          XX             LIB2=,      CHAINED LIB
          XX             NAME=,      MEMBER NAME
          XX             CHAIN=,     CHAIN CODE (2 CHAR)
          XX             LANG=,      3 CHARACTER CODE FOR LANG TYPE               00080000
          XX             DIFF=6,     NUMBER OF LINES                              00090000
          XX             RETAIN='N', RETAIN FILES                                 00100000
          XX             VER='N',    ADJUST VERSION IF NOT N
          XX             APPLLIB='USER1.LOADLIB'                                  00110000
          **********************************************************************  00120000
          ***                                                                     00130000
          ***  SET THE RET CODE FOR LANG AND LINE DIFF COUNT                      00140000
          ***                                                                     00150000
          **********************************************************************  00160000
          ***                                                                     00170000
  112     XXS00A    EXEC PGM=SETRC,PARM=('3&LANG.PASPL1COBASMFORDATRPG')          00180000
  113     XXSTEPLIB DD   DSN=USER1.LOADLIB,DISP=SHR                               00190000
  114     XXSYSOUT  DD   SYSOUT=&OUT                                              00200000
  115     XXAS00A   EXEC PGM=JOBABEND,COND=(0,NE,S00A)                            00210000
  116     XXSTEPLIB DD  DSN=HERC01.TEST.LOADLIB,DISP=SHR                          00220000
          ***                                                                     00230000

          **********************************************************************  01320000
          ***                                                                     01330000
  213     XXS99     EXEC PGM=IDCAMS,COND=(0,EQ,S98)                               01340000
  214     XXSYSPRINT DD  SYSOUT=*                                                 01350000
  215     XXSYSIN    DD  DSN=&&DSTMT,DISP=(OLD,PASS)                              01360000
          ***  DELETE THE TEMP STMT                                               01370000
  216     XXS99B    EXEC PGM=IEFBR14                                              01380000
  217     XXSYSIN    DD  DSN=&&DSTMT,DISP=(OLD,DELETE)                            01390000
          **********************************************************************  01400000
          **********************************************************************  01460000
  218     //U02 EXEC SLMUPDT,QUAL='HERC01.CLE.DISTRO',LANG=ASM,   DIFF=2,         00180000
          //    LIB1='SOURCE',LIB2='SOURCEX',CHAIN=TS,NAME=TSTPAN,VER='1',        00190000
          //    OLD='HERC01.CLE.DISTRO.SOURCE(TSTPAN)',                           00200000
          //    NEW='HERC01.MAP3270.MACLIB(TSTPAN)',                              00210000
          //    APPLLIB='HERC01.TEST.LOADLIB'                                     00220000
          **********************************************************************  00230000
  219     XXSLMUPDT  PROC OUT='*',   DEFAULT SYSOUT CLASS                         00040000
          XX             OLD=,       OLD "BEFORE" SOURCE                          00050000
          XX             NEW=,       NEW "AFTER" SOURCE                           00060000
          XX             QUAL=,      HIGH LEVEL QUALIFIER FOR DATASETS            00070000
          XX             LIB1=,      MASTER LIB
          XX             LIB2=,      CHAINED LIB
          XX             NAME=,      MEMBER NAME
          XX             CHAIN=,     CHAIN CODE (2 CHAR)
          XX             LANG=,      3 CHARACTER CODE FOR LANG TYPE               00080000
          XX             DIFF=6,     NUMBER OF LINES                              00090000
          XX             RETAIN='N', RETAIN FILES                                 00100000
          XX             VER='N',    ADJUST VERSION IF NOT N
          XX             APPLLIB='USER1.LOADLIB'                                  00110000
          **********************************************************************  00120000
          ***                                                                     00130000
          ***  SET THE RET CODE FOR LANG AND LINE DIFF COUNT                      00140000
          ***                                                                     00150000
          **********************************************************************  00160000
          ***                                                                     00170000
  220     XXS00A    EXEC PGM=SETRC,PARM=('3&LANG.PASPL1COBASMFORDATRPG')          00180000
  221     XXSTEPLIB DD   DSN=USER1.LOADLIB,DISP=SHR                               00190000
  222     XXSYSOUT  DD   SYSOUT=&OUT                                              00200000
  223     XXAS00A   EXEC PGM=JOBABEND,COND=(0,NE,S00A)                            00210000
  224     XXSTEPLIB DD  DSN=HERC01.TEST.LOADLIB,DISP=SHR                          00220000
          ***                                                                     00230000
  225     XXS00B    EXEC PGM=SETRC,PARM=('1&DIFF.23456789')                       00240000
  226     XXSTEPLIB DD   DSN=USER1.LOADLIB,DISP=SHR                               00250000
  227     XXSYSOUT  DD   SYSOUT=&OUT                                              00260000
  228     XXAS00B   EXEC PGM=JOBABEND,COND=(0,NE,S00B)                            00270000
  229     XXSTEPLIB DD  DSN=HERC01.TEST.LOADLIB,DISP=SHR                          00280000
          **********************************************************************  00290000
          ***                                                                     00300000
          ***  GENERATE THE CONTROL CARD FOR COMPARE                              00310000
          ***                                                                     00320000
          **********************************************************************  00330000
          ***                                                                     00340000
  230     XXS01     EXEC PGM=MAKESTMT,PARM='&LANG&DIFF'                           00350000
  231     XXSTEPLIB DD   DSN=USER1.LOADLIB,DISP=SHR                               00360000
  232     XXSYSOUT  DD   SYSOUT=&OUT                                              00370000
  233     XXSTMTS   DD   DSN=&&CNTL,DISP=(NEW,PASS),                              00380000
          XX             UNIT=SYSDA,SPACE=(TRK,(1,1),RLSE),                       00390000
          XX             DCB=BLKSIZE=3120                                         00400000
          **********************************************************************  00410000
          ***                                                                     00420000
          ***  GENERATE THE IDCAMS CARDS TO DELETE WORK DATASET                   00430000
          ***                                                                     00440000
          **********************************************************************  00450000
          ***                                                                     00460000
  234     XXS02     EXEC PGM=MAKESTMT,PARM=('@PDEL\&QUAL..\',                     00470000
          XX          'COMPARE.DATA\DELTA.DATA\DELTAX.DATA\@NEWSRC.DATA')         00480000
  235     XXSTEPLIB DD   DSN=USER1.LOADLIB,DISP=SHR                               00490000
  236     XXSYSOUT  DD   SYSOUT=&OUT                                              00500000
  237     XXSTMTS   DD   DSN=&&DSTMT,DISP=(NEW,PASS),                             00510000
          XX             UNIT=SYSDA,SPACE=(TRK,(1,1),RLSE),                       00520000
          XX             DCB=BLKSIZE=3120                                         00530000
          **********************************************************************  00540000
          ***                                                                     00550000
          ***  DELETE THE WORKING DATASETS.                                       00560000
          ***                                                                     00570000
          **********************************************************************  00580000
          ***                                                                     00590000
  238     XXS03     EXEC PGM=IDCAMS                                               00600000
  239     XXSYSPRINT DD  SYSOUT=*                                                 00610000
  240     XXSYSIN    DD   DSN=&&DSTMT,DISP=(OLD,PASS)                             00620000
          **********************************************************************  00630000
          ***                                                                     00640000
          ***  EXECUTE THE COMPARE PROGRAM                                        00650000
          ***                                                                     00660000
          **********************************************************************  00670000
          ***                                                                     00680000
  241     XXS04     EXEC PGM=SCOMPARE                                             00690000
  242     XXSTEPLIB  DD  DSN=&APPLLIB,DISP=SHR                                    00700000
  243     XXFT06F001 DD  SYSOUT=&OUT                                              00710000
  244     XXOUTPUT   DD  DSN=&QUAL..COMPARE.DATA,DISP=(NEW,CATLG),                00720000
          XX             UNIT=SYSDA,SPACE=(CYL,(2,2),RLSE),VOL=SER=PUB002,        00730000
          XX             DCB=(RECFM=FBA,LRECL=121,BLKSIZE=2420)                   00740000
  245     XXFILEA    DD  DSN=&OLD,DISP=SHR,DCB=BUFNO=1                            00750000
  246     XXFILEB    DD  DSN=&NEW,DISP=SHR                                        00760000
  247     XXFILEC    DD  DSN=&&CNTL,DISP=(OLD,PASS)                               00770000
  248     XXFILED    DD  DSN=&QUAL..DELTA.DATA,DISP=(NEW,CATLG,DELETE),           00780000
          XX             UNIT=SYSDA,SPACE=(TRK,(10,10),RLSE),                     00790000
          XX             DCB=(RECFM=FB,LRECL=80,BLKSIZE=3200)                     00800000
  249     XXFILEE    DD  DSN=&QUAL..DELTAX.DATA,DISP=(NEW,CATLG,DELETE),          00810000
          XX             UNIT=SYSDA,SPACE=(TRK,(10,10),RLSE),                     00820000
          XX             DCB=(RECFM=FB,LRECL=80,BLKSIZE=3200)                     00830000
          **********************************************************************  00840000
          ***                                                                     00850000
          ***  EXECUTE THE SCOMPARU PROGRAM TO UPDATE THE OLD PROGRAM TO NEW      00860000
          ***                                                                     00870000
          **********************************************************************  00880000
          ***                                                                     00890000
  250     XXS05     EXEC PGM=SCOMPARU                                             00900000
  251     XXSTEPLIB  DD  DSN=&APPLLIB,DISP=SHR                                    00910000
  252     XXORIG     DD  DSN=&OLD,DISP=SHR                                        00920000
  253     XXDELTA    DD  DSN=&QUAL..DELTA.DATA,DISP=SHR                           00930000
  254     XXSYSPRINT DD  SYSOUT=*,DCB=BLKSIZE=121                                 00940000
  255     XXNEWSRC   DD  DSN=&QUAL..NEWSRC.DATA,DISP=(NEW,CATLG,DELETE),          00950000
          XX             UNIT=SYSDA,SPACE=(TRK,(10,10),RLSE),VOL=SER=PUB002,      00960000
          XX             DCB=BLKSIZE=3200                                         00970000
          **********************************************************************  00980000
          ***                                                                     00990000
          ***  EXECUTE THE COMPARE PROGRAM TO COMPARE THE UPDATED AND THE NEW     01000000
          ***  THIS COMPARE SHOULD SHOW ZERO DIFFERENCES.  ABORT IF ANY           01010000
          ***  DIFFERENCE FOUND                                                   01020000
          ***                                                                     01020000
          **********************************************************************  01030000
          ***                                                                     01040000
  256     XXS06     EXEC PGM=SCOMPARE                                             01050000
  257     XXSTEPLIB  DD  DSN=&APPLLIB,DISP=SHR                                    01060000
  258     XXFT06F001 DD  SYSOUT=&OUT                                              01070000
  259     XXOUTPUT   DD  SYSOUT=&OUT,DCB=BLKSIZE=1210                             01080000
  260     XXFILEA    DD  DSN=&NEW,DISP=SHR                                        01090000
  261     XXFILEB    DD  DSN=&QUAL..NEWSRC.DATA,DISP=SHR                          01100000
  262     XXFILEC    DD  DSN=&&CNTL,DISP=(OLD,DELETE)                             01110000
  263     XXFILED    DD  SYSOUT=*,DCB=(RECFM=F,LRECL=80,BLKSIZE=80)               01120000
  264     XXFILEE    DD  SYSOUT=*,DCB=(RECFM=F,LRECL=80,BLKSIZE=80)               01130000
  265     XXAS06    EXEC PGM=JOBABEND,COND=(0,NE,S00A)                            01140000
  266     XXSTEPLIB DD  DSN=HERC01.TEST.LOADLIB,DISP=SHR                          01150000
          **********************************************************************  00980000
          ***                                                                     00990000
          ***  GENERATE THE STATEMENTS TO LOAD THE DELTA STMTS INTO LIB2          01000000
          ***                                                                     01020000
          **********************************************************************  01030000
          ***
  267     XXS07    EXEC  PGM=MAKESTMT,                                            00110000
          XX          PARM=('./ LOAD\./ CHANGE NAME=&NAME,VERSION=NEXT')          00210000
  268     XXSTEPLIB DD DSN=USER1.LOADLIB,DISP=SHR                                 00140000
  269     XXSYSOUT  DD SYSOUT=&OUT                                                00150000
  270     XXSTMTS   DD DSN=&&STMTG1,DISP=(NEW,PASS),                              00160000
          XX           UNIT=SYSDA,SPACE=(TRK,(1,1),RLSE),                         00170000
          XX           DCB=BLKSIZE=3200                                           00180000
          **********************************************************************
  271     XXS08    EXEC  PGM=MAKESTMT,                                            00200000
          XX          PARM=('./ ENDUP')                                           00210000
  272     XXSTEPLIB DD DSN=USER1.LOADLIB,DISP=SHR                                 00220000
  273     XXSYSOUT  DD SYSOUT=&OUT                                                00230000
  274     XXSTMTS   DD DSN=&&STMTG2,DISP=(NEW,PASS),                              00240000
          XX           UNIT=SYSDA,SPACE=(TRK,(1,1),RLSE),                         00250000
          XX           DCB=BLKSIZE=3200                                           00260000
          **********************************************************************  00980000
          ***                                                                     00990000
          ***  LOAD THE DELTA STMTS INTO LIB2                                     01000000
          ***                                                                     01020000
          **********************************************************************  01030000
          ***
  275     XXS09   EXEC PGM=IEBUPDTX,REGION=128K,                                  00320000
          XX           PARM='CHAINUPD,CHAIN=&CHAIN,NOIMPLSEQ,LISTDEL'             00330000
  276     XXSYSUT1   DD DUMMY                                                     00340000
  277     XXSYSUT2   DD DSN=&QUAL..&LIB2,DISP=OLD                                 00350000
  278     XXSYSPRINT DD SYSOUT=&OUT                                               00390000
  279     XXSYSPUNCH DD SYSOUT=Z                                                  00400000
  280     XXSYSLIB   DD DUMMY                                                     00410000
  281     XXLIB1     DD DUMMY                                                     00420000
  282     XXLIB2     DD DUMMY                                                     00430000
  283     XXSYSIN  DD DSN=&&STMTG1,DISP=(OLD,DELETE)                              00440000
  284     XX       DD DSN=&QUAL..DELTAX.DATA,DISP=SHR                             00450000
  285     XX       DD DSN=&&STMTG2,DISP=(OLD,PASS)                                00460000
  286     XXDD     DD DSN=&QUAL..&LIB1,DISP=OLD
          **********************************************************************
  287     XXS10    EXEC  PGM=MAKESTMT,
          XX          PARM=('./ CHANGE NAME=&NAME,LIST=ALL,VERSION=NEXT\',
          XX             './ INSERT SEQ1=0')
  288     XXSTEPLIB DD DSN=USER1.LOADLIB,DISP=SHR
  289     XXSYSOUT  DD SYSOUT=&OUT
  290     XXSTMTS   DD DSN=&&STMTG1,DISP=(NEW,PASS),
          XX           UNIT=SYSDA,SPACE=(TRK,(1,1),RLSE),
          XX           DCB=BLKSIZE=3200
          ***************************************************************

          XX          PARM='CHAINUPD,CHAIN=&CHAIN,NOIMPLSEQ,LISTDEL'
  292     XXSYSUT1   DD DSN=&QUAL..&LIB1,DISP=OLD
  293     XXSYSUT2   DD DSN=&QUAL..&LIB1,DISP=OLD

  295     XXSYSPUNCH DD SYSOUT=Z
  296     XXSYSLIB   DD DUMMY

  298     XXLIB2     DD DUMMY
  299     XXSYSIN  DD DSN=&&STMTG1,DISP=(OLD,DELETE)
  300     XX       DD DSN=&&STMTG2,DISP=(OLD,PASS)
          **********************************************************************  01160000

  385     XXSYSUT2   DD DSN=&QUAL..&LIB2,DISP=OLD                                 00350000
  386     XXSYSPRINT DD SYSOUT=&OUT                                               00390000
  387     XXSYSPUNCH DD SYSOUT=Z                                                  00400000
  388     XXSYSLIB   DD DUMMY                                                     00410000
  389     XXLIB1     DD DUMMY                                                     00420000
  390     XXLIB2     DD DUMMY                                                     00430000
  391     XXSYSIN  DD DSN=&&STMTG1,DISP=(OLD,DELETE)                              00440000
  392     XX       DD DSN=&QUAL..DELTAX.DATA,DISP=SHR                             00450000
  393     XX       DD DSN=&&STMTG2,DISP=(OLD,PASS)                                00460000
  394     XXDD     DD DSN=&QUAL..&LIB1,DISP=OLD
          **********************************************************************
  395     XXS10    EXEC  PGM=MAKESTMT,
          XX          PARM=('./ CHANGE NAME=&NAME,LIST=ALL,VERSION=NEXT\',
          XX             './ INSERT SEQ1=0')
  396     XXSTEPLIB DD DSN=USER1.LOADLIB,DISP=SHR
  397     XXSYSOUT  DD SYSOUT=&OUT
  398     XXSTMTS   DD DSN=&&STMTG1,DISP=(NEW,PASS),
          XX           UNIT=SYSDA,SPACE=(TRK,(1,1),RLSE),
          XX           DCB=BLKSIZE=3200
          ***************************************************************

          XX          PARM='CHAINUPD,CHAIN=&CHAIN,NOIMPLSEQ,LISTDEL'

  406     XXLIB2     DD DUMMY
  407     XXSYSIN  DD DSN=&&STMTG1,DISP=(OLD,DELETE)
  408     XX       DD DSN=&&STMTG2,DISP=(OLD,PASS)
          **********************************************************************  01160000
          ***                                                                     01170000
          ***  SET THE RET CODE FOR VERSION                                       01180000
          ***                                                                     01190000

          ***                                                                     01210000

          XX          PARM='CHAINUPD,CHAIN=&CHAIN,NOIMPLSEQ,LISTDEL'

  418     XXSYSUT2   DD DSN=&QUAL..&LIB1,DISP=OLD
  419     XXSYSPRINT DD SYSOUT=&OUT

  423     XXLIB2     DD DUMMY
  424     XXSYSIN  DD DSN=&&STMTG1,DISP=(OLD,DELETE)
  425     XX       DD DSN=&&STMTG2,DISP=(OLD,DELETE)
          **********************************************************************  01160000
          ***                                                                     01170000
          ***  SET THE RET CODE FOR RETAIN                                        01180000
          ***                                                                     01190000
          **********************************************************************  01200000
          ***                                                                     01210000
  426     XXS98     EXEC PGM=SETRC,PARM=('1&RETAIN.N')                            01220000
  427     XXSTEPLIB DD   DSN=USER1.LOADLIB,DISP=SHR                               01230000
  428     XXSYSOUT  DD   SYSOUT=&OUT                                              01240000
          ***                                                                     01270000
          **********************************************************************  01280000
          ***                                                                     01290000
          ***  DELETE THE WORKING DATASETS.                                       01300000
          ***                                                                     01310000
          **********************************************************************  01320000
          ***                                                                     01330000
  429     XXS99     EXEC PGM=IDCAMS,COND=(0,EQ,S98)                               01340000
  430     XXSYSPRINT DD  SYSOUT=*                                                 01350000
  431     XXSYSIN    DD  DSN=&&DSTMT,DISP=(OLD,PASS)                              01360000
          ***  DELETE THE TEMP STMT                                               01370000
  432     XXS99B    EXEC PGM=IEFBR14                                              01380000
  433     XXSYSIN    DD  DSN=&&DSTMT,DISP=(OLD,DELETE)                            01390000
          **********************************************************************  01400000
          **********************************************************************  01460000
  434     //U04 EXEC SLMUPDT,QUAL='HERC01.CLE.DISTRO',LANG=PL1,   DIFF=2,         00300000
          //    LIB1='SOURCE',LIB2='SOURCEX',CHAIN=TS,NAME=MAP3270,VER='1',       00310000
          //    OLD='HERC01.CLE.DISTRO.SOURCE(MAP3270)',                          00320000
          //    NEW='HERC01.MYPLI.PLI(MAP3270)',                                  00330000
          //    APPLLIB='HERC01.TEST.LOADLIB'                                     00340000
          **********************************************************************  00350000
  435     XXSLMUPDT  PROC OUT='*',   DEFAULT SYSOUT CLASS                         00040000
          XX             OLD=,       OLD "BEFORE" SOURCE                          00050000
          XX             NEW=,       NEW "AFTER" SOURCE                           00060000
          XX             QUAL=,      HIGH LEVEL QUALIFIER FOR DATASETS            00070000
          XX             LIB1=,      MASTER LIB
          XX             LIB2=,      CHAINED LIB
          XX             NAME=,      MEMBER NAME
          XX             CHAIN=,     CHAIN CODE (2 CHAR)
          XX             LANG=,      3 CHARACTER CODE FOR LANG TYPE               00080000
          XX             DIFF=6,     NUMBER OF LINES                              00090000
          XX             RETAIN='N', RETAIN FILES                                 00100000
          XX             VER='N',    ADJUST VERSION IF NOT N
          XX             APPLLIB='USER1.LOADLIB'                                  00110000
          **********************************************************************  00120000
          ***                                                                     00130000
          ***  SET THE RET CODE FOR LANG AND LINE DIFF COUNT                      00140000
          ***                                                                     00150000
          **********************************************************************  00160000
          ***                                                                     00170000
  436     XXS00A    EXEC PGM=SETRC,PARM=('3&LANG.PASPL1COBASMFORDATRPG')          00180000
  437     XXSTEPLIB DD   DSN=USER1.LOADLIB,DISP=SHR                               00190000
  438     XXSYSOUT  DD   SYSOUT=&OUT                                              00200000
  439     XXAS00A   EXEC PGM=JOBABEND,COND=(0,NE,S00A)                            00210000
  440     XXSTEPLIB DD  DSN=HERC01.TEST.LOADLIB,DISP=SHR                          00220000
          ***                                                                     00230000
  441     XXS00B    EXEC PGM=SETRC,PARM=('1&DIFF.23456789')                       00240000
  442     XXSTEPLIB DD   DSN=USER1.LOADLIB,DISP=SHR                               00250000
  443     XXSYSOUT  DD   SYSOUT=&OUT                                              00260000
  444     XXAS00B   EXEC PGM=JOBABEND,COND=(0,NE,S00B)                            00270000
  445     XXSTEPLIB DD  DSN=HERC01.TEST.LOADLIB,DISP=SHR                          00280000
          **********************************************************************  00290000
          ***                                                                     00300000
          ***  GENERATE THE CONTROL CARD FOR COMPARE                              00310000
          ***                                                                     00320000
          **********************************************************************  00330000
          ***                                                                     00340000
  446     XXS01     EXEC PGM=MAKESTMT,PARM='&LANG&DIFF'                           00350000
  447     XXSTEPLIB DD   DSN=USER1.LOADLIB,DISP=SHR                               00360000
  448     XXSYSOUT  DD   SYSOUT=&OUT                                              00370000
  449     XXSTMTS   DD   DSN=&&CNTL,DISP=(NEW,PASS),                              00380000
          XX             UNIT=SYSDA,SPACE=(TRK,(1,1),RLSE),                       00390000
          XX             DCB=BLKSIZE=3120                                         00400000
          **********************************************************************  00410000
          ***                                                                     00420000
          ***  GENERATE THE IDCAMS CARDS TO DELETE WORK DATASET                   00430000
          ***                                                                     00440000
          **********************************************************************  00450000
          ***                                                                     00460000
  450     XXS02     EXEC PGM=MAKESTMT,PARM=('@PDEL\&QUAL..\',                     00470000
          XX          'COMPARE.DATA\DELTA.DATA\DELTAX.DATA\@NEWSRC.DATA')         00480000
  451     XXSTEPLIB DD   DSN=USER1.LOADLIB,DISP=SHR                               00490000
  452     XXSYSOUT  DD   SYSOUT=&OUT                                              00500000
  453     XXSTMTS   DD   DSN=&&DSTMT,DISP=(NEW,PASS),                             00510000
          XX             UNIT=SYSDA,SPACE=(TRK,(1,1),RLSE),                       00520000
          XX             DCB=BLKSIZE=3120                                         00530000
          **********************************************************************  00540000
          ***                                                                     00550000
          ***  DELETE THE WORKING DATASETS.                                       00560000
          ***                                                                     00570000
          **********************************************************************  00580000
          ***                                                                     00590000
  454     XXS03     EXEC PGM=IDCAMS                                               00600000
  455     XXSYSPRINT DD  SYSOUT=*                                                 00610000
  456     XXSYSIN    DD   DSN=&&DSTMT,DISP=(OLD,PASS)                             00620000
          **********************************************************************  00630000
          ***                                                                     00640000
          ***  EXECUTE THE COMPARE PROGRAM                                        00650000
          ***                                                                     00660000
          **********************************************************************  00670000
          ***                                                                     00680000
  457     XXS04     EXEC PGM=SCOMPARE                                             00690000
  458     XXSTEPLIB  DD  DSN=&APPLLIB,DISP=SHR                                    00700000
  459     XXFT06F001 DD  SYSOUT=&OUT                                              00710000
  460     XXOUTPUT   DD  DSN=&QUAL..COMPARE.DATA,DISP=(NEW,CATLG),                00720000
          XX             UNIT=SYSDA,SPACE=(CYL,(2,2),RLSE),VOL=SER=PUB002,        00730000
          XX             DCB=(RECFM=FBA,LRECL=121,BLKSIZE=2420)                   00740000
  461     XXFILEA    DD  DSN=&OLD,DISP=SHR,DCB=BUFNO=1                            00750000
  462     XXFILEB    DD  DSN=&NEW,DISP=SHR                                        00760000
  463     XXFILEC    DD  DSN=&&CNTL,DISP=(OLD,PASS)                               00770000
  464     XXFILED    DD  DSN=&QUAL..DELTA.DATA,DISP=(NEW,CATLG,DELETE),           00780000
          XX             UNIT=SYSDA,SPACE=(TRK,(10,10),RLSE),                     00790000
          XX             DCB=(RECFM=FB,LRECL=80,BLKSIZE=3200)                     00800000
  465     XXFILEE    DD  DSN=&QUAL..DELTAX.DATA,DISP=(NEW,CATLG,DELETE),          00810000
          XX             UNIT=SYSDA,SPACE=(TRK,(10,10),RLSE),                     00820000
          XX             DCB=(RECFM=FB,LRECL=80,BLKSIZE=3200)                     00830000
          **********************************************************************  00840000
          ***                                                                     00850000
          ***  EXECUTE THE SCOMPARU PROGRAM TO UPDATE THE OLD PROGRAM TO NEW      00860000
          ***                                                                     00870000
          **********************************************************************  00880000
          ***                                                                     00890000
  466     XXS05     EXEC PGM=SCOMPARU                                             00900000
  467     XXSTEPLIB  DD  DSN=&APPLLIB,DISP=SHR                                    00910000
  468     XXORIG     DD  DSN=&OLD,DISP=SHR                                        00920000
  469     XXDELTA    DD  DSN=&QUAL..DELTA.DATA,DISP=SHR                           00930000
  470     XXSYSPRINT DD  SYSOUT=*,DCB=BLKSIZE=121                                 00940000
  471     XXNEWSRC   DD  DSN=&QUAL..NEWSRC.DATA,DISP=(NEW,CATLG,DELETE),          00950000
          XX             UNIT=SYSDA,SPACE=(TRK,(10,10),RLSE),VOL=SER=PUB002,      00960000
          XX             DCB=BLKSIZE=3200                                         00970000
          **********************************************************************  00980000
          ***                                                                     00990000
          ***  EXECUTE THE COMPARE PROGRAM TO COMPARE THE UPDATED AND THE NEW     01000000
          ***  THIS COMPARE SHOULD SHOW ZERO DIFFERENCES.  ABORT IF ANY           01010000
          ***  DIFFERENCE FOUND                                                   01020000
          ***                                                                     01020000
          **********************************************************************  01030000
          ***                                                                     01040000
  472     XXS06     EXEC PGM=SCOMPARE                                             01050000
  473     XXSTEPLIB  DD  DSN=&APPLLIB,DISP=SHR                                    01060000
  474     XXFT06F001 DD  SYSOUT=&OUT                                              01070000
  475     XXOUTPUT   DD  SYSOUT=&OUT,DCB=BLKSIZE=1210                             01080000
  476     XXFILEA    DD  DSN=&NEW,DISP=SHR                                        01090000
  477     XXFILEB    DD  DSN=&QUAL..NEWSRC.DATA,DISP=SHR                          01100000
  478     XXFILEC    DD  DSN=&&CNTL,DISP=(OLD,DELETE)                             01110000
  479     XXFILED    DD  SYSOUT=*,DCB=(RECFM=F,LRECL=80,BLKSIZE=80)               01120000
  480     XXFILEE    DD  SYSOUT=*,DCB=(RECFM=F,LRECL=80,BLKSIZE=80)               01130000
  481     XXAS06    EXEC PGM=JOBABEND,COND=(0,NE,S00A)                            01140000
  482     XXSTEPLIB DD  DSN=HERC01.TEST.LOADLIB,DISP=SHR                          01150000
          **********************************************************************  00980000
          ***                                                                     00990000
          ***  GENERATE THE STATEMENTS TO LOAD THE DELTA STMTS INTO LIB2          01000000
          ***                                                                     01020000
          **********************************************************************  01030000
          ***
  483     XXS07    EXEC  PGM=MAKESTMT,                                            00110000
          XX          PARM=('./ LOAD\./ CHANGE NAME=&NAME,VERSION=NEXT')          00210000

          XX          PARM=('./ ENDUP')                                           00210000
  488     XXSTEPLIB DD DSN=USER1.LOADLIB,DISP=SHR                                 00220000

          **********************************************************************  01400000
          **********************************************************************  01460000
  542     //U05A EXEC SLMREPL,QUAL='HERC01.CLE.DISTRO',                           00360000
          //        LIB1='SOURCE',NAME=$$INDEX,CHAIN=TS,                          00370000
          //    INPUT='HERC01.JCL.CNTL($$INDEXS)'                                 00380000
          **********************************************************************  00390000
  543     XXSLMREPL PROC OUT='*',                   SYSOUT CLASS
          XX        QUAL=,                          LIB HIGH LEVEL QUAL.
          XX        LIB1=,                            MASTER LIB
          *****     LIB2=,                            CHAINED LIB
          XX        NAME=,CHAIN=,                   MEMBER NAME/CHAIN ID
          XX        LANG=,                        3 CHARACTER CODE FOR LANG TYPE
          XX        INPUT=,                         SOURCE CODE TO ADD
          XX        NUM=Y                           SEQUENCE NUMBERS?
          **********************************************************************
  544     XXG1  EXEC PGM=SETRC,PARM='1&NUM.YN'
  545     XXSTEPLIB DD DSN=USER1.LOADLIB,DISP=SHR                                 00140000
  546     XXG1A EXEC  PGM=MAKESTMT,COND=(1,NE,G1),                                00110000
          XX          PARM=('./ ADD NAME=&NAME,VERSION=NEXT\',                    00120000
          XX          './ NUMBER NEW1=1,INCR=1')                                  00130000
  547     XXSTEPLIB DD DSN=USER1.LOADLIB,DISP=SHR                                 00140000
  548     XXSYSOUT  DD SYSOUT=&OUT                                                00150000
  549     XXSTMTS   DD DSN=&&STMTG1,DISP=(NEW,PASS),                              00160000
          XX           UNIT=SYSDA,SPACE=(TRK,(1,1),RLSE),                         00170000
          XX           DCB=BLKSIZE=3200                                           00180000
  550     XXG1B EXEC  PGM=MAKESTMT,COND=(2,NE,G1),                                00110000
          XX          PARM=('./ ADD NAME=&NAME,VERSION=0')                        00120000
  551     XXSTEPLIB DD DSN=USER1.LOADLIB,DISP=SHR                                 00140000
  552     XXSYSOUT  DD SYSOUT=&OUT                                                00150000
  553     XXSTMTS   DD DSN=&&STMTG1,DISP=(NEW,PASS),                              00160000
          XX           UNIT=SYSDA,SPACE=(TRK,(1,1),RLSE),                         00170000
          XX           DCB=BLKSIZE=3200                                           00180000
          **********************************************************************

          XX          PARM=('./ ENDUP')                                           00210000
  555     XXSTEPLIB DD DSN=USER1.LOADLIB,DISP=SHR                                 00140000
  556     XXSYSOUT  DD SYSOUT=&OUT                                                00230000
  557     XXSTMTS   DD DSN=&&STMTG2,DISP=(NEW,PASS),                              00240000
          XX           UNIT=SYSDA,SPACE=(TRK,(1,1),RLSE),                         00250000
          XX           DCB=BLKSIZE=3200                                           00260000
          **********************************************************************

          ***  SET THE RET CODE FOR LANG

          **********************************************************************

  564     XXSYSPRINT DD SYSOUT=&OUT                                               00390000

  567     XXLIB1     DD DUMMY                                                     00420000

  570     XX       DD DSN=&INPUT,DISP=SHR                                         00450000
  571     XX       DD DSN=&&STMTG2,DISP=(OLD,DELETE)                              00460000
          *******************************************************************

          XX     PARM='CHAINUPD,CHAIN=&CHAIN,NOIMPLSEQ,LISTDEL,USER=CBLGLBLX'     00330000
  573     XXSTEPLIB DD DSN=USER1.LOADLIB,DISP=SHR    CBLGLBLX LIVES HERE          00140000
  574     XXSYSUT1   DD DUMMY                                                     00340000
  575     XXSYSUT2   DD DSN=&QUAL..&LIB1,DISP=OLD                                 00350000
  576     XXSYSPRINT DD SYSOUT=&OUT                                               00390000
  577     XXSYSPUNCH DD SYSOUT=Z                                                  00400000
  578     XXSYSLIB   DD DUMMY                                                     00410000
  579     XXLIB1     DD DUMMY                                                     00420000
  580     XXLIB2     DD DUMMY                                                     00430000
