  582     XX       DD DSN=&INPUT,DISP=SHR                                         00450000
  583     XX       DD DSN=&&STMTG2,DISP=(OLD,DELETE)                              00460000
          *******************************************************************
          *******************************************************************
  584     //U05B EXEC SLMSVER,QUAL='HERC01.CLE.DISTRO',NAME=$$INDEX,CHAIN=TS,     00400000
          //    LIB1='SOURCE',VER=3                                               00410000
          **********************************************************************  00420000
  585     XXSLMSVER PROC OUT='*',                   SYSOUT CLASS
          XX        QUAL=,                          LIB HIGH LEVEL QUAL.
          XX        LIB1=,                            MASTER LIB
          *****     LIB2=,                            CHAINED LIB
          XX        VER=,                           VERSION NUMBER
          XX        NAME=,CHAIN=                    MEMBER NAME/CHAIN ID
          **********************************************************************
  586     XXG1  EXEC  PGM=MAKESTMT,                                               00110000
          XX          PARM='./ CURRENT NAME=&NAME,VERSION=&VER'                   00210000
  587     XXSTEPLIB DD DSN=USER1.LOADLIB,DISP=SHR                                 00140000
  588     XXSYSOUT  DD SYSOUT=&OUT                                                00150000
  589     XXSTMTS   DD DSN=&&STMTG1,DISP=(NEW,PASS),                              00160000
          XX           UNIT=SYSDA,SPACE=(TRK,(1,1),RLSE),                         00170000
          XX           DCB=BLKSIZE=3200                                           00180000
          **********************************************************************
  590     XXG2  EXEC  PGM=MAKESTMT,                                               00200000
          XX          PARM=('./ ENDUP')                                           00210000
  591     XXSTEPLIB DD DSN=USER1.LOADLIB,DISP=SHR                                 00140000
  592     XXSYSOUT  DD SYSOUT=&OUT                                                00230000
  593     XXSTMTS   DD DSN=&&STMTG2,DISP=(NEW,PASS),                              00240000
          XX           UNIT=SYSDA,SPACE=(TRK,(1,1),RLSE),                         00250000
          XX           DCB=BLKSIZE=3200                                           00260000
          ***************************************************************         00310000
  594     XXS1   EXEC PGM=IEBUPDTX,REGION=128K,                                   00320000
          XX          PARM='CHAINUPD,CHAIN=&CHAIN,NOIMPLSEQ,LISTDEL'              00330000
  595     XXSYSUT1   DD DSN=&QUAL..&LIB1,DISP=OLD                                 00340000
  596     XXSYSUT2   DD DSN=&QUAL..&LIB1,DISP=OLD                                 00340000
  597     XXSYSPRINT DD SYSOUT=&OUT                                               00390000
  598     XXSYSPUNCH DD SYSOUT=Z                                                  00400000
  599     XXSYSLIB   DD DUMMY                                                     00410000
  600     XXLIB1     DD DUMMY                                                     00420000
  601     XXLIB2     DD DUMMY                                                     00430000
  602     XXSYSIN  DD DSN=&&STMTG1,DISP=(OLD,DELETE)                              00440000
  603     XX       DD DSN=&&STMTG2,DISP=(OLD,DELETE)                              00460000
          *******************************************************************
          *******************************************************************
  604     //U06 EXEC SLMUPDT,QUAL='HERC01.CLE.DISTRO',LANG=ASM,   DIFF=2,         00430000
          //    LIB1='CNTL',LIB2='CNTLX',CHAIN=TS,NAME=MAP32700,VER='1',          00440000
          //    OLD='HERC01.CLE.DISTRO.CNTL(MAP32700)',                           00450000
          //    NEW='HERC01.JCL.CNTL(MAP32700)',                                  00460000
          //    APPLLIB='HERC01.TEST.LOADLIB'                                     00470000
          **********************************************************************  00480000
  605     XXSLMUPDT  PROC OUT='*',   DEFAULT SYSOUT CLASS                         00040000
          XX             OLD=,       OLD "BEFORE" SOURCE                          00050000
          XX             NEW=,       NEW "AFTER" SOURCE                           00060000
          XX             QUAL=,      HIGH LEVEL QUALIFIER FOR DATASETS            00070000
          XX             LIB1=,      MASTER LIB
          XX             LIB2=,      CHAINED LIB
          XX             NAME=,      MEMBER NAME
          XX             CHAIN=,     CHAIN CODE (2 CHAR)
          XX             LANG=,      3 CHARACTER CODE FOR LANG TYPE               00080000
          XX             DIFF=6,     NUMBER OF LINES                              00090000
          XX             RETAIN='N', RETAIN FILES                                 00100000
          XX             VER='N',    ADJUST VERSION IF NOT N
          XX             APPLLIB='USER1.LOADLIB'                                  00110000
          **********************************************************************  00120000
          ***                                                                     00130000
          ***  SET THE RET CODE FOR LANG AND LINE DIFF COUNT                      00140000
          ***                                                                     00150000
          **********************************************************************  00160000
          ***                                                                     00170000
  606     XXS00A    EXEC PGM=SETRC,PARM=('3&LANG.PASPL1COBASMFORDATRPG')          00180000
  607     XXSTEPLIB DD   DSN=USER1.LOADLIB,DISP=SHR                               00190000
  608     XXSYSOUT  DD   SYSOUT=&OUT                                              00200000
  609     XXAS00A   EXEC PGM=JOBABEND,COND=(0,NE,S00A)                            00210000
  610     XXSTEPLIB DD  DSN=HERC01.TEST.LOADLIB,DISP=SHR                          00220000
          ***                                                                     00230000
  611     XXS00B    EXEC PGM=SETRC,PARM=('1&DIFF.23456789')                       00240000
  612     XXSTEPLIB DD   DSN=USER1.LOADLIB,DISP=SHR                               00250000
  613     XXSYSOUT  DD   SYSOUT=&OUT                                              00260000
  614     XXAS00B   EXEC PGM=JOBABEND,COND=(0,NE,S00B)                            00270000
  615     XXSTEPLIB DD  DSN=HERC01.TEST.LOADLIB,DISP=SHR                          00280000
          **********************************************************************  00290000
          ***                                                                     00300000
          ***  GENERATE THE CONTROL CARD FOR COMPARE                              00310000
          ***                                                                     00320000
          **********************************************************************  00330000
          ***                                                                     00340000
  616     XXS01     EXEC PGM=MAKESTMT,PARM='&LANG&DIFF'                           00350000
  617     XXSTEPLIB DD   DSN=USER1.LOADLIB,DISP=SHR                               00360000
  618     XXSYSOUT  DD   SYSOUT=&OUT                                              00370000
  619     XXSTMTS   DD   DSN=&&CNTL,DISP=(NEW,PASS),                              00380000
          XX             UNIT=SYSDA,SPACE=(TRK,(1,1),RLSE),                       00390000
          XX             DCB=BLKSIZE=3120                                         00400000
          **********************************************************************  00410000
          ***                                                                     00420000
          ***  GENERATE THE IDCAMS CARDS TO DELETE WORK DATASET                   00430000
          ***                                                                     00440000
          **********************************************************************  00450000
          ***                                                                     00460000
  620     XXS02     EXEC PGM=MAKESTMT,PARM=('@PDEL\&QUAL..\',                     00470000
          XX          'COMPARE.DATA\DELTA.DATA\DELTAX.DATA\@NEWSRC.DATA')         00480000
  621     XXSTEPLIB DD   DSN=USER1.LOADLIB,DISP=SHR                               00490000
  622     XXSYSOUT  DD   SYSOUT=&OUT                                              00500000
  623     XXSTMTS   DD   DSN=&&DSTMT,DISP=(NEW,PASS),                             00510000
          XX             UNIT=SYSDA,SPACE=(TRK,(1,1),RLSE),                       00520000
          XX             DCB=BLKSIZE=3120                                         00530000
          **********************************************************************  00540000
          ***                                                                     00550000
          ***  DELETE THE WORKING DATASETS.                                       00560000
          ***                                                                     00570000
          **********************************************************************  00580000
          ***                                                                     00590000
  624     XXS03     EXEC PGM=IDCAMS                                               00600000
  625     XXSYSPRINT DD  SYSOUT=*                                                 00610000
  626     XXSYSIN    DD   DSN=&&DSTMT,DISP=(OLD,PASS)                             00620000
          **********************************************************************  00630000
          ***                                                                     00640000
          ***  EXECUTE THE COMPARE PROGRAM                                        00650000
          ***                                                                     00660000
          **********************************************************************  00670000
          ***                                                                     00680000
  627     XXS04     EXEC PGM=SCOMPARE                                             00690000
  628     XXSTEPLIB  DD  DSN=&APPLLIB,DISP=SHR                                    00700000
  629     XXFT06F001 DD  SYSOUT=&OUT                                              00710000
  630     XXOUTPUT   DD  DSN=&QUAL..COMPARE.DATA,DISP=(NEW,CATLG),                00720000
          XX             UNIT=SYSDA,SPACE=(CYL,(2,2),RLSE),VOL=SER=PUB002,        00730000
          XX             DCB=(RECFM=FBA,LRECL=121,BLKSIZE=2420)                   00740000
  631     XXFILEA    DD  DSN=&OLD,DISP=SHR,DCB=BUFNO=1                            00750000
  632     XXFILEB    DD  DSN=&NEW,DISP=SHR                                        00760000
  633     XXFILEC    DD  DSN=&&CNTL,DISP=(OLD,PASS)                               00770000
  634     XXFILED    DD  DSN=&QUAL..DELTA.DATA,DISP=(NEW,CATLG,DELETE),           00780000
          XX             UNIT=SYSDA,SPACE=(TRK,(10,10),RLSE),                     00790000
          XX             DCB=(RECFM=FB,LRECL=80,BLKSIZE=3200)                     00800000
  635     XXFILEE    DD  DSN=&QUAL..DELTAX.DATA,DISP=(NEW,CATLG,DELETE),          00810000
          XX             UNIT=SYSDA,SPACE=(TRK,(10,10),RLSE),                     00820000
          XX             DCB=(RECFM=FB,LRECL=80,BLKSIZE=3200)                     00830000
          **********************************************************************  00840000
          ***                                                                     00850000
          ***  EXECUTE THE SCOMPARU PROGRAM TO UPDATE THE OLD PROGRAM TO NEW      00860000
          ***                                                                     00870000
          **********************************************************************  00880000
          ***                                                                     00890000
  636     XXS05     EXEC PGM=SCOMPARU                                             00900000
  637     XXSTEPLIB  DD  DSN=&APPLLIB,DISP=SHR                                    00910000
  638     XXORIG     DD  DSN=&OLD,DISP=SHR                                        00920000
  639     XXDELTA    DD  DSN=&QUAL..DELTA.DATA,DISP=SHR                           00930000
  640     XXSYSPRINT DD  SYSOUT=*,DCB=BLKSIZE=121                                 00940000
  641     XXNEWSRC   DD  DSN=&QUAL..NEWSRC.DATA,DISP=(NEW,CATLG,DELETE),          00950000
          XX             UNIT=SYSDA,SPACE=(TRK,(10,10),RLSE),VOL=SER=PUB002,      00960000
          XX             DCB=BLKSIZE=3200                                         00970000
          **********************************************************************  00980000
          ***                                                                     00990000
          ***  EXECUTE THE COMPARE PROGRAM TO COMPARE THE UPDATED AND THE NEW     01000000
          ***  THIS COMPARE SHOULD SHOW ZERO DIFFERENCES.  ABORT IF ANY           01010000
          ***  DIFFERENCE FOUND                                                   01020000
          ***                                                                     01020000
          **********************************************************************  01030000
          ***                                                                     01040000
  642     XXS06     EXEC PGM=SCOMPARE                                             01050000
  643     XXSTEPLIB  DD  DSN=&APPLLIB,DISP=SHR                                    01060000
  644     XXFT06F001 DD  SYSOUT=&OUT                                              01070000
  645     XXOUTPUT   DD  SYSOUT=&OUT,DCB=BLKSIZE=1210                             01080000
  646     XXFILEA    DD  DSN=&NEW,DISP=SHR                                        01090000
  647     XXFILEB    DD  DSN=&QUAL..NEWSRC.DATA,DISP=SHR                          01100000
  648     XXFILEC    DD  DSN=&&CNTL,DISP=(OLD,DELETE)                             01110000
  649     XXFILED    DD  SYSOUT=*,DCB=(RECFM=F,LRECL=80,BLKSIZE=80)               01120000
  650     XXFILEE    DD  SYSOUT=*,DCB=(RECFM=F,LRECL=80,BLKSIZE=80)               01130000
  651     XXAS06    EXEC PGM=JOBABEND,COND=(0,NE,S00A)                            01140000
  652     XXSTEPLIB DD  DSN=HERC01.TEST.LOADLIB,DISP=SHR                          01150000
          **********************************************************************  00980000
          ***                                                                     00990000
          ***  GENERATE THE STATEMENTS TO LOAD THE DELTA STMTS INTO LIB2          01000000
          ***                                                                     01020000
          **********************************************************************  01030000
          ***
  653     XXS07    EXEC  PGM=MAKESTMT,                                            00110000
          XX          PARM=('./ LOAD\./ CHANGE NAME=&NAME,VERSION=NEXT')          00210000
  654     XXSTEPLIB DD DSN=USER1.LOADLIB,DISP=SHR                                 00140000
  655     XXSYSOUT  DD SYSOUT=&OUT                                                00150000
  656     XXSTMTS   DD DSN=&&STMTG1,DISP=(NEW,PASS),                              00160000
          XX           UNIT=SYSDA,SPACE=(TRK,(1,1),RLSE),                         00170000
          XX           DCB=BLKSIZE=3200                                           00180000
          **********************************************************************
  657     XXS08    EXEC  PGM=MAKESTMT,                                            00200000
          XX          PARM=('./ ENDUP')                                           00210000
  658     XXSTEPLIB DD DSN=USER1.LOADLIB,DISP=SHR                                 00220000
  659     XXSYSOUT  DD SYSOUT=&OUT                                                00230000
  660     XXSTMTS   DD DSN=&&STMTG2,DISP=(NEW,PASS),                              00240000
          XX           UNIT=SYSDA,SPACE=(TRK,(1,1),RLSE),                         00250000
          XX           DCB=BLKSIZE=3200                                           00260000
          **********************************************************************  00980000
          ***                                                                     00990000
          ***  LOAD THE DELTA STMTS INTO LIB2                                     01000000
          ***                                                                     01020000
          **********************************************************************  01030000
          ***
  661     XXS09   EXEC PGM=IEBUPDTX,REGION=128K,                                  00320000
          XX           PARM='CHAINUPD,CHAIN=&CHAIN,NOIMPLSEQ,LISTDEL'             00330000
  662     XXSYSUT1   DD DUMMY                                                     00340000
  663     XXSYSUT2   DD DSN=&QUAL..&LIB2,DISP=OLD                                 00350000
  664     XXSYSPRINT DD SYSOUT=&OUT                                               00390000
  665     XXSYSPUNCH DD SYSOUT=Z                                                  00400000
  666     XXSYSLIB   DD DUMMY                                                     00410000
  667     XXLIB1     DD DUMMY                                                     00420000
  668     XXLIB2     DD DUMMY                                                     00430000
  669     XXSYSIN  DD DSN=&&STMTG1,DISP=(OLD,DELETE)                              00440000
  670     XX       DD DSN=&QUAL..DELTAX.DATA,DISP=SHR                             00450000
  671     XX       DD DSN=&&STMTG2,DISP=(OLD,PASS)                                00460000
  672     XXDD     DD DSN=&QUAL..&LIB1,DISP=OLD
          **********************************************************************
  673     XXS10    EXEC  PGM=MAKESTMT,
          XX          PARM=('./ CHANGE NAME=&NAME,LIST=ALL,VERSION=NEXT\',
          XX             './ INSERT SEQ1=0')
  674     XXSTEPLIB DD DSN=USER1.LOADLIB,DISP=SHR
  675     XXSYSOUT  DD SYSOUT=&OUT
  676     XXSTMTS   DD DSN=&&STMTG1,DISP=(NEW,PASS),
          XX           UNIT=SYSDA,SPACE=(TRK,(1,1),RLSE),
          XX           DCB=BLKSIZE=3200
          ***************************************************************
  677     XXS11     EXEC PGM=IEBUPDTX,REGION=128K,
          XX          PARM='CHAINUPD,CHAIN=&CHAIN,NOIMPLSEQ,LISTDEL'
  678     XXSYSUT1   DD DSN=&QUAL..&LIB1,DISP=OLD
  679     XXSYSUT2   DD DSN=&QUAL..&LIB1,DISP=OLD
  680     XXSYSPRINT DD SYSOUT=&OUT
  681     XXSYSPUNCH DD SYSOUT=Z
  682     XXSYSLIB   DD DUMMY
  683     XXLIB1     DD DSN=&QUAL..&LIB2,DISP=OLD
  684     XXLIB2     DD DUMMY
  685     XXSYSIN  DD DSN=&&STMTG1,DISP=(OLD,DELETE)
  686     XX       DD DSN=&&STMTG2,DISP=(OLD,PASS)
          **********************************************************************  01160000
          ***                                                                     01170000
          ***  SET THE RET CODE FOR VERSION                                       01180000
          ***                                                                     01190000
          **********************************************************************  01200000
          ***                                                                     01210000
  687     XXS12     EXEC PGM=SETRC,PARM=('1N&VER')                                01220000
  688     XXSTEPLIB DD   DSN=USER1.LOADLIB,DISP=SHR                               01230000
  689     XXSYSOUT  DD   SYSOUT=&OUT                                              01240000
          ***                                                                     01270000
          **********************************************************************
  690     XXS13    EXEC  PGM=MAKESTMT,COND=(0,NE,S12),
          XX          PARM='./ CURRENT NAME=&NAME,VERSION=&VER'
  691     XXSTEPLIB DD DSN=USER1.LOADLIB,DISP=SHR
  692     XXSYSOUT  DD SYSOUT=&OUT
  693     XXSTMTS   DD DSN=&&STMTG1,DISP=(NEW,PASS),
          XX           UNIT=SYSDA,SPACE=(TRK,(1,1),RLSE),
          XX           DCB=BLKSIZE=3200
          ***************************************************************
  694     XXS14    EXEC PGM=IEBUPDTX,REGION=128K,COND=(0,NE,S12),
          XX          PARM='CHAINUPD,CHAIN=&CHAIN,NOIMPLSEQ,LISTDEL'
  695     XXSYSUT1   DD DSN=&QUAL..&LIB1,DISP=OLD
  696     XXSYSUT2   DD DSN=&QUAL..&LIB1,DISP=OLD
  697     XXSYSPRINT DD SYSOUT=&OUT
  698     XXSYSPUNCH DD SYSOUT=Z
  699     XXSYSLIB   DD DUMMY
  700     XXLIB1     DD DUMMY
  701     XXLIB2     DD DUMMY
  702     XXSYSIN  DD DSN=&&STMTG1,DISP=(OLD,DELETE)
  703     XX       DD DSN=&&STMTG2,DISP=(OLD,DELETE)
          **********************************************************************  01160000
          ***                                                                     01170000
          ***  SET THE RET CODE FOR RETAIN                                        01180000
          ***                                                                     01190000
          **********************************************************************  01200000
          ***                                                                     01210000
  704     XXS98     EXEC PGM=SETRC,PARM=('1&RETAIN.N')                            01220000
  705     XXSTEPLIB DD   DSN=USER1.LOADLIB,DISP=SHR                               01230000
  706     XXSYSOUT  DD   SYSOUT=&OUT                                              01240000
          ***                                                                     01270000
          **********************************************************************  01280000
          ***                                                                     01290000
          ***  DELETE THE WORKING DATASETS.                                       01300000
          ***                                                                     01310000
          **********************************************************************  01320000
          ***                                                                     01330000
  707     XXS99     EXEC PGM=IDCAMS,COND=(0,EQ,S98)                               01340000
  708     XXSYSPRINT DD  SYSOUT=*                                                 01350000
  709     XXSYSIN    DD  DSN=&&DSTMT,DISP=(OLD,PASS)                              01360000
          ***  DELETE THE TEMP STMT                                               01370000
  710     XXS99B    EXEC PGM=IEFBR14                                              01380000
  711     XXSYSIN    DD  DSN=&&DSTMT,DISP=(OLD,DELETE)                            01390000
          **********************************************************************  01400000
          **********************************************************************  01460000

  761     XXS07    EXEC  PGM=MAKESTMT,                                            00110000
          XX          PARM=('./ LOAD\./ CHANGE NAME=&NAME,VERSION=NEXT')          00210000
  762     XXSTEPLIB DD DSN=USER1.LOADLIB,DISP=SHR                                 00140000
  763     XXSYSOUT  DD SYSOUT=&OUT                                                00150000
  764     XXSTMTS   DD DSN=&&STMTG1,DISP=(NEW,PASS),                              00160000
          XX           UNIT=SYSDA,SPACE=(TRK,(1,1),RLSE),                         00170000
          XX           DCB=BLKSIZE=3200                                           00180000
          **********************************************************************
  765     XXS08    EXEC  PGM=MAKESTMT,                                            00200000
          XX          PARM=('./ ENDUP')                                           00210000
  766     XXSTEPLIB DD DSN=USER1.LOADLIB,DISP=SHR                                 00220000
  767     XXSYSOUT  DD SYSOUT=&OUT                                                00230000
  768     XXSTMTS   DD DSN=&&STMTG2,DISP=(NEW,PASS),                              00240000
          XX           UNIT=SYSDA,SPACE=(TRK,(1,1),RLSE),                         00250000
          XX           DCB=BLKSIZE=3200                                           00260000
          **********************************************************************  00980000
          ***                                                                     00990000
          ***  LOAD THE DELTA STMTS INTO LIB2                                     01000000
          ***                                                                     01020000
          **********************************************************************  01030000
          ***
  769     XXS09   EXEC PGM=IEBUPDTX,REGION=128K,                                  00320000
          XX           PARM='CHAINUPD,CHAIN=&CHAIN,NOIMPLSEQ,LISTDEL'             00330000
  770     XXSYSUT1   DD DUMMY                                                     00340000
  771     XXSYSUT2   DD DSN=&QUAL..&LIB2,DISP=OLD                                 00350000
  772     XXSYSPRINT DD SYSOUT=&OUT                                               00390000
  773     XXSYSPUNCH DD SYSOUT=Z                                                  00400000
  774     XXSYSLIB   DD DUMMY                                                     00410000
  775     XXLIB1     DD DUMMY                                                     00420000
  776     XXLIB2     DD DUMMY                                                     00430000
  777     XXSYSIN  DD DSN=&&STMTG1,DISP=(OLD,DELETE)                              00440000
  778     XX       DD DSN=&QUAL..DELTAX.DATA,DISP=SHR                             00450000
  779     XX       DD DSN=&&STMTG2,DISP=(OLD,PASS)                                00460000
  780     XXDD     DD DSN=&QUAL..&LIB1,DISP=OLD
          **********************************************************************
  781     XXS10    EXEC  PGM=MAKESTMT,
          XX          PARM=('./ CHANGE NAME=&NAME,LIST=ALL,VERSION=NEXT\',
          XX             './ INSERT SEQ1=0')
  782     XXSTEPLIB DD DSN=USER1.LOADLIB,DISP=SHR
  783     XXSYSOUT  DD SYSOUT=&OUT

          XX           UNIT=SYSDA,SPACE=(TRK,(1,1),RLSE),

  792     XXLIB2     DD DUMMY
  793     XXSYSIN  DD DSN=&&STMTG1,DISP=(OLD,DELETE)
  794     XX       DD DSN=&&STMTG2,DISP=(OLD,PASS)
          **********************************************************************  01160000
          ***                                                                     01170000
          ***  SET THE RET CODE FOR VERSION                                       01180000
          ***                                                                     01190000
          **********************************************************************  01200000
          ***                                                                     01210000

  797     XXSYSOUT  DD   SYSOUT=&OUT                                              01240000
          ***                                                                     01270000

          XX          PARM='./ CURRENT NAME=&NAME,VERSION=&VER'

  800     XXSYSOUT  DD SYSOUT=&OUT

          XX           UNIT=SYSDA,SPACE=(TRK,(1,1),RLSE),

          ***************************************************************

          XX          PARM='CHAINUPD,CHAIN=&CHAIN,NOIMPLSEQ,LISTDEL'
  803     XXSYSUT1   DD DSN=&QUAL..&LIB1,DISP=OLD
  804     XXSYSUT2   DD DSN=&QUAL..&LIB1,DISP=OLD
  805     XXSYSPRINT DD SYSOUT=&OUT
  806     XXSYSPUNCH DD SYSOUT=Z

  809     XXLIB2     DD DUMMY
  810     XXSYSIN  DD DSN=&&STMTG1,DISP=(OLD,DELETE)
  811     XX       DD DSN=&&STMTG2,DISP=(OLD,DELETE)
          **********************************************************************  01160000
          ***                                                                     01170000
          ***  SET THE RET CODE FOR RETAIN                                        01180000
          ***                                                                     01190000
          **********************************************************************  01200000
          ***                                                                     01210000
  812     XXS98     EXEC PGM=SETRC,PARM=('1&RETAIN.N')                            01220000
  813     XXSTEPLIB DD   DSN=USER1.LOADLIB,DISP=SHR                               01230000
  814     XXSYSOUT  DD   SYSOUT=&OUT                                              01240000
          ***                                                                     01270000
          **********************************************************************  01280000
          ***                                                                     01290000
          ***  DELETE THE WORKING DATASETS.                                       01300000
          ***                                                                     01310000
          **********************************************************************  01320000
          ***                                                                     01330000
  815     XXS99     EXEC PGM=IDCAMS,COND=(0,EQ,S98)                               01340000
  816     XXSYSPRINT DD  SYSOUT=*                                                 01350000
  817     XXSYSIN    DD  DSN=&&DSTMT,DISP=(OLD,PASS)                              01360000
          ***  DELETE THE TEMP STMT                                               01370000
  818     XXS99B    EXEC PGM=IEFBR14                                              01380000
  819     XXSYSIN    DD  DSN=&&DSTMT,DISP=(OLD,DELETE)                            01390000
          **********************************************************************  01400000
          **********************************************************************  01460000
  820     //U08 EXEC SLMUPDT,QUAL='HERC01.CLE.DISTRO',LANG=ASM,   DIFF=2,         00550000
          //    LIB1='CNTL',LIB2='CNTLX',CHAIN=TS,NAME=MAP32702,VER='1',          00560000
          //    OLD='HERC01.CLE.DISTRO.CNTL(MAP32702)',                           00570000
          //    NEW='HERC01.JCL.CNTL(MAP32702)',                                  00580000
          //    APPLLIB='HERC01.TEST.LOADLIB'                                     00590000
          **********************************************************************  00600000
  821     XXSLMUPDT  PROC OUT='*',   DEFAULT SYSOUT CLASS                         00040000
          XX             OLD=,       OLD "BEFORE" SOURCE                          00050000
          XX             NEW=,       NEW "AFTER" SOURCE                           00060000
          XX             QUAL=,      HIGH LEVEL QUALIFIER FOR DATASETS            00070000
          XX             LIB1=,      MASTER LIB
          XX             LIB2=,      CHAINED LIB
          XX             NAME=,      MEMBER NAME
          XX             CHAIN=,     CHAIN CODE (2 CHAR)
          XX             LANG=,      3 CHARACTER CODE FOR LANG TYPE               00080000
          XX             DIFF=6,     NUMBER OF LINES                              00090000
          XX             RETAIN='N', RETAIN FILES                                 00100000
          XX             VER='N',    ADJUST VERSION IF NOT N
          XX             APPLLIB='USER1.LOADLIB'                                  00110000
          **********************************************************************  00120000
          ***                                                                     00130000
          ***  SET THE RET CODE FOR LANG AND LINE DIFF COUNT                      00140000
          ***                                                                     00150000
          **********************************************************************  00160000
          ***                                                                     00170000
  822     XXS00A    EXEC PGM=SETRC,PARM=('3&LANG.PASPL1COBASMFORDATRPG')          00180000
  823     XXSTEPLIB DD   DSN=USER1.LOADLIB,DISP=SHR                               00190000
  824     XXSYSOUT  DD   SYSOUT=&OUT                                              00200000
  825     XXAS00A   EXEC PGM=JOBABEND,COND=(0,NE,S00A)                            00210000
  826     XXSTEPLIB DD  DSN=HERC01.TEST.LOADLIB,DISP=SHR                          00220000
          ***                                                                     00230000
  827     XXS00B    EXEC PGM=SETRC,PARM=('1&DIFF.23456789')                       00240000
  828     XXSTEPLIB DD   DSN=USER1.LOADLIB,DISP=SHR                               00250000
  829     XXSYSOUT  DD   SYSOUT=&OUT                                              00260000
  830     XXAS00B   EXEC PGM=JOBABEND,COND=(0,NE,S00B)                            00270000
  831     XXSTEPLIB DD  DSN=HERC01.TEST.LOADLIB,DISP=SHR                          00280000
          **********************************************************************  00290000
          ***                                                                     00300000
          ***  GENERATE THE CONTROL CARD FOR COMPARE                              00310000
          ***                                                                     00320000
          **********************************************************************  00330000
          ***                                                                     00340000
  832     XXS01     EXEC PGM=MAKESTMT,PARM='&LANG&DIFF'                           00350000
  833     XXSTEPLIB DD   DSN=USER1.LOADLIB,DISP=SHR                               00360000
  834     XXSYSOUT  DD   SYSOUT=&OUT                                              00370000
  835     XXSTMTS   DD   DSN=&&CNTL,DISP=(NEW,PASS),                              00380000
          XX             UNIT=SYSDA,SPACE=(TRK,(1,1),RLSE),                       00390000
          XX             DCB=BLKSIZE=3120                                         00400000
          **********************************************************************  00410000
          ***                                                                     00420000
          ***  GENERATE THE IDCAMS CARDS TO DELETE WORK DATASET                   00430000
          ***                                                                     00440000
          **********************************************************************  00450000
          ***                                                                     00460000
  836     XXS02     EXEC PGM=MAKESTMT,PARM=('@PDEL\&QUAL..\',                     00470000
          XX          'COMPARE.DATA\DELTA.DATA\DELTAX.DATA\@NEWSRC.DATA')         00480000
  837     XXSTEPLIB DD   DSN=USER1.LOADLIB,DISP=SHR                               00490000
  838     XXSYSOUT  DD   SYSOUT=&OUT                                              00500000
  839     XXSTMTS   DD   DSN=&&DSTMT,DISP=(NEW,PASS),                             00510000
          XX             UNIT=SYSDA,SPACE=(TRK,(1,1),RLSE),                       00520000
          XX             DCB=BLKSIZE=3120                                         00530000
          **********************************************************************  00540000
          ***                                                                     00550000
          ***  DELETE THE WORKING DATASETS.                                       00560000
          ***                                                                     00570000
          **********************************************************************  00580000
          ***                                                                     00590000
  840     XXS03     EXEC PGM=IDCAMS                                               00600000
  841     XXSYSPRINT DD  SYSOUT=*                                                 00610000
  842     XXSYSIN    DD   DSN=&&DSTMT,DISP=(OLD,PASS)                             00620000
          **********************************************************************  00630000
          ***                                                                     00640000
          ***  EXECUTE THE COMPARE PROGRAM                                        00650000
          ***                                                                     00660000
          **********************************************************************  00670000
          ***                                                                     00680000
  843     XXS04     EXEC PGM=SCOMPARE                                             00690000
  844     XXSTEPLIB  DD  DSN=&APPLLIB,DISP=SHR                                    00700000
  845     XXFT06F001 DD  SYSOUT=&OUT                                              00710000
  846     XXOUTPUT   DD  DSN=&QUAL..COMPARE.DATA,DISP=(NEW,CATLG),                00720000
          XX             UNIT=SYSDA,SPACE=(CYL,(2,2),RLSE),VOL=SER=PUB002,        00730000
          XX             DCB=(RECFM=FBA,LRECL=121,BLKSIZE=2420)                   00740000
  847     XXFILEA    DD  DSN=&OLD,DISP=SHR,DCB=BUFNO=1                            00750000
  848     XXFILEB    DD  DSN=&NEW,DISP=SHR                                        00760000
  849     XXFILEC    DD  DSN=&&CNTL,DISP=(OLD,PASS)                               00770000
  850     XXFILED    DD  DSN=&QUAL..DELTA.DATA,DISP=(NEW,CATLG,DELETE),           00780000
          XX             UNIT=SYSDA,SPACE=(TRK,(10,10),RLSE),                     00790000
          XX             DCB=(RECFM=FB,LRECL=80,BLKSIZE=3200)                     00800000
  851     XXFILEE    DD  DSN=&QUAL..DELTAX.DATA,DISP=(NEW,CATLG,DELETE),          00810000
          XX             UNIT=SYSDA,SPACE=(TRK,(10,10),RLSE),                     00820000
          XX             DCB=(RECFM=FB,LRECL=80,BLKSIZE=3200)                     00830000
          **********************************************************************  00840000
          ***                                                                     00850000
          ***  EXECUTE THE SCOMPARU PROGRAM TO UPDATE THE OLD PROGRAM TO NEW      00860000
          ***                                                                     00870000
          **********************************************************************  00880000
          ***                                                                     00890000
  852     XXS05     EXEC PGM=SCOMPARU                                             00900000
  853     XXSTEPLIB  DD  DSN=&APPLLIB,DISP=SHR                                    00910000
  854     XXORIG     DD  DSN=&OLD,DISP=SHR                                        00920000
  855     XXDELTA    DD  DSN=&QUAL..DELTA.DATA,DISP=SHR                           00930000
  856     XXSYSPRINT DD  SYSOUT=*,DCB=BLKSIZE=121                                 00940000
  857     XXNEWSRC   DD  DSN=&QUAL..NEWSRC.DATA,DISP=(NEW,CATLG,DELETE),          00950000
          XX             UNIT=SYSDA,SPACE=(TRK,(10,10),RLSE),VOL=SER=PUB002,      00960000
          XX             DCB=BLKSIZE=3200                                         00970000
          **********************************************************************  00980000
          ***                                                                     00990000
          ***  EXECUTE THE COMPARE PROGRAM TO COMPARE THE UPDATED AND THE NEW     01000000
          ***  THIS COMPARE SHOULD SHOW ZERO DIFFERENCES.  ABORT IF ANY           01010000
          ***  DIFFERENCE FOUND                                                   01020000
          ***                                                                     01020000
          **********************************************************************  01030000
          ***                                                                     01040000
  858     XXS06     EXEC PGM=SCOMPARE                                             01050000
  859     XXSTEPLIB  DD  DSN=&APPLLIB,DISP=SHR                                    01060000
  860     XXFT06F001 DD  SYSOUT=&OUT                                              01070000
  861     XXOUTPUT   DD  SYSOUT=&OUT,DCB=BLKSIZE=1210                             01080000
  862     XXFILEA    DD  DSN=&NEW,DISP=SHR                                        01090000
  863     XXFILEB    DD  DSN=&QUAL..NEWSRC.DATA,DISP=SHR                          01100000
  864     XXFILEC    DD  DSN=&&CNTL,DISP=(OLD,DELETE)                             01110000
  865     XXFILED    DD  SYSOUT=*,DCB=(RECFM=F,LRECL=80,BLKSIZE=80)               01120000
  866     XXFILEE    DD  SYSOUT=*,DCB=(RECFM=F,LRECL=80,BLKSIZE=80)               01130000
  867     XXAS06    EXEC PGM=JOBABEND,COND=(0,NE,S00A)                            01140000
  868     XXSTEPLIB DD  DSN=HERC01.TEST.LOADLIB,DISP=SHR                          01150000
          **********************************************************************  00980000
          ***                                                                     00990000
          ***  GENERATE THE STATEMENTS TO LOAD THE DELTA STMTS INTO LIB2          01000000

          **********************************************************************  01030000

          XX          PARM=('./ LOAD\./ CHANGE NAME=&NAME,VERSION=NEXT')          00210000

          **********************************************************************  01400000

  928     //U09A EXEC SLMREPL,QUAL='HERC01.CLE.DISTRO',                           00610000
          //        LIB1='CNTL',NAME=$$INDEX,CHAIN=TS,                            00620000
          //    INPUT='HERC01.JCL.CNTL($$INDEXC)'                                 00630000
          **********************************************************************  00640000
  929     XXSLMREPL PROC OUT='*',                   SYSOUT CLASS
          XX        QUAL=,                          LIB HIGH LEVEL QUAL.
          XX        LIB1=,                            MASTER LIB
          *****     LIB2=,                            CHAINED LIB
          XX        NAME=,CHAIN=,                   MEMBER NAME/CHAIN ID
          XX        LANG=,                        3 CHARACTER CODE FOR LANG TYPE
          XX        INPUT=,                         SOURCE CODE TO ADD
          XX        NUM=Y                           SEQUENCE NUMBERS?
          **********************************************************************
  930     XXG1  EXEC PGM=SETRC,PARM='1&NUM.YN'
  931     XXSTEPLIB DD DSN=USER1.LOADLIB,DISP=SHR                                 00140000
  932     XXG1A EXEC  PGM=MAKESTMT,COND=(1,NE,G1),                                00110000
          XX          PARM=('./ ADD NAME=&NAME,VERSION=NEXT\',                    00120000
          XX          './ NUMBER NEW1=1,INCR=1')                                  00130000
  933     XXSTEPLIB DD DSN=USER1.LOADLIB,DISP=SHR                                 00140000
  934     XXSYSOUT  DD SYSOUT=&OUT                                                00150000
  935     XXSTMTS   DD DSN=&&STMTG1,DISP=(NEW,PASS),                              00160000
          XX           UNIT=SYSDA,SPACE=(TRK,(1,1),RLSE),                         00170000
          XX           DCB=BLKSIZE=3200                                           00180000
  936     XXG1B EXEC  PGM=MAKESTMT,COND=(2,NE,G1),                                00110000
          XX          PARM=('./ ADD NAME=&NAME,VERSION=0')                        00120000
  937     XXSTEPLIB DD DSN=USER1.LOADLIB,DISP=SHR                                 00140000
  938     XXSYSOUT  DD SYSOUT=&OUT                                                00150000
  939     XXSTMTS   DD DSN=&&STMTG1,DISP=(NEW,PASS),                              00160000
          XX           UNIT=SYSDA,SPACE=(TRK,(1,1),RLSE),                         00170000
          XX           DCB=BLKSIZE=3200                                           00180000
          **********************************************************************
  940     XXG2  EXEC  PGM=MAKESTMT,                                               00200000
          XX          PARM=('./ ENDUP')                                           00210000

          XX           UNIT=SYSDA,SPACE=(TRK,(1,1),RLSE),                         00250000

  950     XXSYSPRINT DD SYSOUT=&OUT                                               00390000

  956     XX       DD DSN=&INPUT,DISP=SHR                                         00450000
  957     XX       DD DSN=&&STMTG2,DISP=(OLD,DELETE)                              00460000
          *******************************************************************
  958     XXS1B  EXEC PGM=IEBUPDTX,REGION=128K,COND=(3,NE,G3),                    00320000
          XX     PARM='CHAINUPD,CHAIN=&CHAIN,NOIMPLSEQ,LISTDEL,USER=CBLGLBLX'     00330000
  959     XXSTEPLIB DD DSN=USER1.LOADLIB,DISP=SHR    CBLGLBLX LIVES HERE          00140000
  960     XXSYSUT1   DD DUMMY                                                     00340000
  961     XXSYSUT2   DD DSN=&QUAL..&LIB1,DISP=OLD                                 00350000
  962     XXSYSPRINT DD SYSOUT=&OUT                                               00390000
  963     XXSYSPUNCH DD SYSOUT=Z                                                  00400000
  964     XXSYSLIB   DD DUMMY                                                     00410000
  965     XXLIB1     DD DUMMY                                                     00420000
  966     XXLIB2     DD DUMMY                                                     00430000
  967     XXSYSIN  DD DSN=&&STMTG1,DISP=(OLD,DELETE)                              00440000
  968     XX       DD DSN=&INPUT,DISP=SHR                                         00450000
  969     XX       DD DSN=&&STMTG2,DISP=(OLD,DELETE)                              00460000
          *******************************************************************
          *******************************************************************
  970     //U09B EXEC SLMSVER,QUAL='HERC01.CLE.DISTRO',NAME=$$INDEX,CHAIN=TS,     00650000
          //    LIB1='CNTL',VER=4                                                 00660000
          **********************************************************************  00670000
  971     XXSLMSVER PROC OUT='*',                   SYSOUT CLASS
          XX        QUAL=,                          LIB HIGH LEVEL QUAL.
          XX        LIB1=,                            MASTER LIB
          *****     LIB2=,                            CHAINED LIB
          XX        VER=,                           VERSION NUMBER
          XX        NAME=,CHAIN=                    MEMBER NAME/CHAIN ID
          **********************************************************************
  972     XXG1  EXEC  PGM=MAKESTMT,                                               00110000
          XX          PARM='./ CURRENT NAME=&NAME,VERSION=&VER'                   00210000
  973     XXSTEPLIB DD DSN=USER1.LOADLIB,DISP=SHR                                 00140000
  974     XXSYSOUT  DD SYSOUT=&OUT                                                00150000
  975     XXSTMTS   DD DSN=&&STMTG1,DISP=(NEW,PASS),                              00160000
          XX           UNIT=SYSDA,SPACE=(TRK,(1,1),RLSE),                         00170000
          XX           DCB=BLKSIZE=3200                                           00180000
          **********************************************************************
  976     XXG2  EXEC  PGM=MAKESTMT,                                               00200000
          XX          PARM=('./ ENDUP')                                           00210000
  977     XXSTEPLIB DD DSN=USER1.LOADLIB,DISP=SHR                                 00140000
  978     XXSYSOUT  DD SYSOUT=&OUT                                                00230000
  979     XXSTMTS   DD DSN=&&STMTG2,DISP=(NEW,PASS),                              00240000
          XX           UNIT=SYSDA,SPACE=(TRK,(1,1),RLSE),                         00250000
          XX           DCB=BLKSIZE=3200                                           00260000
          ***************************************************************         00310000
  980     XXS1   EXEC PGM=IEBUPDTX,REGION=128K,                                   00320000

  981     XXSYSUT1   DD DSN=&QUAL..&LIB1,DISP=OLD                                 00340000

  00001          MACRO                                                          00000001
  00002 &NAME    TCMD  &CMD=,&ROW=,&COL=,&CHAR=,&STOP=NO,                      *00000002
  00003                &PROT=,&NUM=,&BRIGHT=,&PEN=NO,&MDT=,&LN=,&DATA=,        *00000003
  00004                &HILITE=,&COLOR=                                         00000004
  00005 .*********************************************************************  00000005
  00006 .*                                                                      00000006
  00007 .*   TCMD - GENERATE THE 3270 COMMAND CODES STRINGS.  MANY OF THE       00000007
  00008 .*          KEYWORDS ARE REQUIED ONLY FOR CERTAIN CMDS.                 00000008
  00009 .*          CMD    DESCRIPTION   REQUIRED                 OPTIONAL      00000009
  00010 .*          SF     SET FIELD     PROT,NUM,BRIGHT,PEN,MDT  LN,DATA,STOP  00000010
  00011 .*                                                        HILITE,COLOR  00000011
  00012 .*          SBA    SET BUFFER AD ROW,COL                                00000012
  00013 .*          IC     INSERT CURSOR                                        00000013
  00014 .*          PT     PROGRAM TAB                                          00000014
  00015 .*          RA     REPEAT TO AD  ROW,COL,CHAR                           00000015
  00016 .*          EUA    ERASE TO AD   ROW,COL                                00000016
  00017 .*                                                                      00000017
  00018 .* - - - - - - - - - - - - - - - - - - - - - - - - - - - - - - - - -    00000018
  00019 .*                                                                      00000019
++C           20
D 00020 .*  (C) COPYRIGHT 2009  CEDAR LAKE EMPORIUM LLC   ALL RIGHTS RESERVED   00000020
I 00020 .*  (C) COPYRIGHT 2010  CEDAR LAKE EMPORIUM LLC   ALL RIGHTS RESERVED
  00021 .*                                                                      00000021
  00022 .*  THIS SOURCE CODE AS WELL AS ANY OBJECT CODE RESULTING FROM THIS     00000022
  00023 .*  SOURCE CODE MAY BE DISTRIBUTED FREELY PROVIDED NO FEE IS CHARGED    00000023
  00024 .*  AND FOR NON-COMERCIAL PURPOSES.                                     00000024
  00025 .*                                                                      00000025
  00026 .*  FOR COMMERCIAL DISTRIBUTION RIGHTS, CONTACT THE COPYRIGHT OWNER.    00000026
  00027 .*                                                                      00000027
++C           28
D 00028 .*********************************************************************  00000028
I 00028 .*         REVISED     DESCRIPTION
I 00028 .*         ----------  -----------------------------------------------
I 00028 .*  1.0.0              INITIAL RELEASE
I 00028 .*  1.1.0  01/06/2011  ADDED SUPPORT FOR COLOR EXTENDED ATTRIBUTES.
I 00028 .*
I 00028 .*********************************************************************
I 00028          GBLC  &ZOSVER
  00029          AIF   (T'CMD NE 'O').CMDVAL                                    00000029
  00030          MNOTE 12,'**** CMD MUST BE GIVEN ON TCMD MACRO ****'           00000030
  00031          MEXIT                                                          00000031
  00032 .CMDVAL  ANOP                                                           00000032
  00033          AIF   ('&CMD' NE 'SF').NOTSF                                   00000033
  00034 .*                                                                      00000034
  00035 .*  PROCESS CMD=SF                                                      00000035
  00036 .*                                                                      00000036
++C           37,          41
D 00037          AIF   (T'&HILITE EQ 'O' AND T'&COLOR EQ 'O').GENSF             00000037
D 00038          DC    X'2903C0'                                                00000038
D 00039          AGO   .GENSF2                                                  00000039
D 00040 .GENSF   DC    X'1D'   3270 SET FIELD CMD                               00000040
D 00041 .GENSF2  ANOP                                                           00000041
I 00041          AIF   ('&ZOSVER' EQ 'B').GENSF    SKIP THE SET EXTENDED
I 00041          AIF   (T'&HILITE EQ 'O' AND T'&COLOR EQ 'O').GENSF
I 00041          DC    X'29C3C0'
I 00041          AGO   .GENSF2
I 00041 .GENSF   DC    X'1D'   3270 SET FIELD CMD
I 00041 .GENSF2  ANOP
I 00041          GBLA  &ADR
  00042          GBLA  &WCC                                                     00000042
  00043 &WCC     SETA  0                                                        00000043
  00044          TFVERI B'00100000',&PROT,'PROT'                                00000044
  00045          TFVERI B'00010000',&NUM,'NUM'                                  00000045
  00046          TFVERI B'00001000',&BRIGHT,'BRIGHT'                            00000046
  00047          TFVERI B'00000100',&PEN,'PEN'                                  00000047
  00048          TFVERI B'00000001',&MDT,'MDT'                                  00000048
++C           49,          53
D 00049          DC    AL1(&WCC)  3270 SF                                       00000049
D 00050          AIF   (T'&HILITE EQ 'O' AND T'&COLOR EQ 'O').NOXSF             00000050
D 00051          AIF   (T'&HILITE EQ 'O').DEFHI                                 00000051

D 00053 .DEFHI   DC    X'4100'                DEFAULT HILITE                    00000053

I 00053          DC    AL1(&ADR)  3270 SF

  00098 &NAME    DC    C&DATA                                                   00000098
  00099 .CHKSB   AIF   (T'&STOP EQ 'O').EXIT                                    00000099
  00100          AIF   ('&STOP' EQ 'NO').EXIT                                   00000100
  00101          AIF   ('&STOP' EQ 'YES').GENSB                                 00000101
  00102          MNOTE 12,'**** STOP  IS INVALID ****'                          00000102
  00103          MEXIT                                                          00000103
  00104 .GENSB   ANOP                                                           00000104
  00105          AIF   (T'&HILITE EQ 'O' AND T'&COLOR EQ 'O').STBYT             00000105
++C          106
D 00106          DC    X'2903C02041004200'   EXTENDED STOP BYTE                 00000106
I 00106          DC    X'2903C02041404240'   EXTENDED STOP BYTE
  00107          AGO   .EXIT                                                    00000107
  00108 .STBYT   DC    X'1D20'               STANDARD STOP BYTE                 00000108
  00109 .EXIT    MEXIT                                                          00000109
  00110 .*                                                                      00000110
  00111 .*  PROCESS CMD=SBA                                                     00000111
  00112 .*                                                                      00000112
  00113 .NOTSF   AIF   ('&CMD' NE 'SBA').NOTSBA                                 00000113
  00114          DC    X'11'   3270 SET BUFFER ADDRESS                          00000114
  00115 &NAME    TSBA  ROW=&ROW,COL=&COL                                        00000115
  00116          MEXIT                                                          00000116
  00117 .NOTSBA  ANOP                                                           00000117
  00118          AIF   ('&CMD' NE 'IC').NOTIC                                   00000118
  00119 .*                                                                      00000119
  00120 .*  PROCESS CMD=IC                                                      00000120
  00121 .*                                                                      00000121
  00122          DC   X'13'   3270 INSERT CURSOR COMMAND                        00000122
  00123          MEXIT                                                          00000123
  00124 .NOTIC   ANOP                                                           00000124
  00125          AIF   ('&CMD' NE 'PT').NOTPT                                   00000125
  00126 .*                                                                      00000126
  00127 .*  PROCESS CMD=PT                                                      00000127
  00128 .*                                                                      00000128
  00129          DC   X'05'   3270 PROGRAM TAB COMMAND                          00000129
  00130          MEXIT                                                          00000130
  00131 .NOTPT   ANOP                                                           00000131
  00132          AIF   ('&CMD' NE 'RA').NOTRA                                   00000132
  00133 .*                                                                      00000133
  00134 .*  PROCESS CMD=RA                                                      00000134
  00135 .*                                                                      00000135
  00136          DC    X'3C'   3270 REPEAT TO ADDRESS COMMAND                   00000136
  00137          TSBA  ROW=&ROW,COL=&COL                                        00000137
  00138          DC    CL1&CHAR            CHARACTER TO REPEAT                  00000138
  00139          MEXIT                                                          00000139
  00140 .NOTRA   ANOP                                                           00000140
  00141          AIF   ('&CMD' NE 'EUA').NOTEUA                                 00000141
  00142 .*                                                                      00000142
  00143 .*  PROCESS CMD=EUA                                                     00000143
  00144 .*                                                                      00000144
  00145          DC    X'12'   3270 ERASE TO ADDRESS COMMAND                    00000145
  00146          TSBA  ROW=&ROW,COL=&COL                                        00000146
  00147          MEXIT                                                          00000147
  00148 .NOTEUA  ANOP                                                           00000148
  00149          MNOTE 12,'**** CMD IS NOT VALID ****'                          00000149
  00150          MEND                                                           00000150


    SCOMPARE.  VERSION 2.0  (2009/04/15)

PROCESSING CNTL FILE
==>ASM6                                                                            <==
END OF CNTL FILE

MATCH CRITERION = 6 LINES.
NO DIFFERENCES.
**END OF JOB***

++E


./ ENDUP

*** DDNAME=SYSUT2          OPEN FOR OUTPUT, DSORG=PO, DSNAME=HERC01.CLE.DISTRO.SOURCEX ON PUB002
      *** CHAIN ID TS DOES NOT MATCH LIBRARY ID PR ***
*** CHAIN LIBRARY ID = 'PR', ALLOCATION NUMBER = 001
*** DDNAME=SYSUT1          OPEN FOR  INPUT, DSORG=PS, DSNAME=NULLFILE

TCMD      IEBUPDTX -- CORNELL EXTENDED UPDATE PROGRAM.  VERSION 1.12 (SLAC V.12/17/04)            DAY=010  03:09  01/10/11    PAGE 2


          <02>  ./ CHANGE NAME=TCMD,VERSION=NEXT

          ./ REPLACE SEQ1=20
          .*  (C) COPYRIGHT 2010  CEDAR LAKE EMPORIUM LLC   ALL RIGHTS RESERVED
          ./ REPLACE SEQ1=28
          .*         REVISED     DESCRIPTION
          .*         ----------  -----------------------------------------------
          .*  1.0.0              INITIAL RELEASE
          .*  1.1.0  01/06/2011  ADDED SUPPORT FOR COLOR EXTENDED ATTRIBUTES.
          .*
          .*********************************************************************
                   GBLC  &ZOSVER
          ./ REPLACE SEQ1=37,SEQ2=41
                   AIF   ('&ZOSVER' EQ 'B').GENSF    SKIP THE SET EXTENDED
                   AIF   (T'&HILITE EQ 'O' AND T'&COLOR EQ 'O').GENSF
                   DC    X'29C3C0'
                   AGO   .GENSF2
          .GENSF   DC    X'1D'   3270 SET FIELD CMD
          .GENSF2  ANOP
                   GBLA  &ADR
          ./ REPLACE SEQ1=49,SEQ2=53
                   TRT3270 &WCC
                   DC    AL1(&ADR)  3270 SF
                   AIF   (T'&HILITE EQ 'O' AND T'&COLOR EQ 'O').NOXSF
                   AIF   ('&ZOSVER' NE 'B').NO281    SKIP THE SET EXTENDED
                   DC    X'28'                  SET EXTENDED
          .NO281   ANOP
                   AIF   (T'&HILITE EQ 'O').DEFHI
                   AIF   ('&HILITE' NE 'DEF').NOTDEF
          .DEFHI   DC    X'4140'                DEFAULT HILITE
          ./ REPLACE SEQ1=66,SEQ2=68
          .GENCLR  ANOP
                   AIF   ('&ZOSVER' NE 'B').NO282    SKIP THE SET EXTENDED
                   DC    X'28'                  SET EXTENDED
          .NO282   ANOP
                   AIF   (T'&COLOR EQ 'O').DEFCOL
                   AIF   ('&COLOR' NE 'DEF').NOTDEFC
          .DEFCOL  DC    X'4240'                DEFAULT COLOR
          ./ REPLACE SEQ1=91
          .NOTWHI  AIF   ('&COLOR' NE 'BLK').NOTBLK
                   DC    X'42F8'                BLACK
                   AGO   .NOXSF
          .NOTBLK  AIF   ('&COLOR' NE 'DBL').NOTDBL
                   DC    X'42F9'                DARK BLUE
                   AGO   .NOXSF
          .NOTDBL  AIF   ('&COLOR' NE 'ORA').NOTORA
                   DC    X'42FA'                ORANGE
                   AGO   .NOXSF
          .NOTORA  AIF   ('&COLOR' NE 'PUR').NOTPUR
                   DC    X'42FB'                PURPLE
                   AGO   .NOXSF
          .NOTPUR  AIF   ('&COLOR' NE 'PGR').NOTPGR
                   DC    X'42FC'                PALE GREEN
                   AGO   .NOXSF
          .NOTPGR  AIF   ('&COLOR' NE 'PTQ').NOTPTQ
                   DC    X'42FD'                PALE TURQUOISE
                   AGO   .NOXSF

TCMD      IEBUPDTX -- CORNELL EXTENDED UPDATE PROGRAM.  VERSION 1.12 (SLAC V.12/17/04)            DAY=010  03:09  01/10/11    PAGE 3


          .NOTPTQ  AIF   ('&COLOR' NE 'GRY').NOTGRY
                   DC    X'42FE'                GREY
                   AGO   .NOXSF
          .NOTGRY  AIF   ('&COLOR' NE 'NEU').NOTNEU
                   DC    X'42FF'                WHITE
                   AGO   .NOXSF
          .NOTNEU  MNOTE 12,'**** INVALID COLOR VALUE ****'
          ./ REPLACE SEQ1=106
                   DC    X'2903C02041404240'   EXTENDED STOP BYTE

       NEW TCMD     ENTRY: TTR=00001A INDC=00

++C           18,          50
D 00018 .*********************************************************************  00000018
D 00019          GBLA  &ADR                                                     00000019
D 00020          AIF   (&B GT 0).GT00                                           00000020
D 00021 &ADR     SETA  X'40'             X'00'       => X'40'                   00000021
D 00022          AGO   .DONE                                                    00000022
D 00023 .GT00    AIF   (&B GT X'09').GT09                                       00000023
D 00024 &ADR     SETA  X'C0'+&B          X'01'-X'09' -> X'C1'-X'C9'             00000024
D 00025          AGO   .DONE                                                    00000025
D 00026 .GT09    AIF   (&B GT X'0F').GT15                                       00000026
D 00027 &ADR     SETA  X'40'+&B          X'0A'-X'0F' -> X'4A'-X'4F'             00000027
D 00028          AGO   .DONE                                                    00000028
D 00029 .GT15    AIF   (&B GT X'10').GT16                                       00000029
D 00030 &ADR     SETA  X'50'             X'10'       -> X'50'                   00000030
D 00031          AGO   .DONE                                                    00000031
D 00032 .GT16    AIF   (&B GT X'19').GT25                                       00000032
D 00033 &ADR     SETA  X'C0'+&B          X'11'-X'19' -> X'D1'-X'D9'             00000033
D 00034          AGO   .DONE                                                    00000034
D 00035 .GT25    AIF   (&B GT X'1F').GT31                                       00000035
D 00036 &ADR     SETA  X'40'+&B          X'1A'-X'1F' -> X'5A'-X'5F'             00000036
D 00037          AGO   .DONE                                                    00000037
D 00038 .GT31    AIF   (&B GT X'21').GT33                                       00000038
D 00039 &ADR     SETA  X'40'+&B          X'20'-X'21' -> X'60'-X'61'             00000039
D 00040          AGO   .DONE                                                    00000040
D 00041 .GT33    AIF   (&B GT X'29').GT41                                       00000041
D 00042 &ADR     SETA  X'C0'+&B          X'22'-X'29' -> X'E2'-X'E9'             00000042
D 00043          AGO   .DONE                                                    00000043
D 00044 .GT41    AIF   (&B GT X'2F').GT47                                       00000044
D 00045 &ADR     SETA  X'40'+&B          X'2A'-X'2F' -> X'6A'-X'6F'             00000045
D 00046          AGO   .DONE                                                    00000046
D 00047 .GT47    AIF   (&B GT X'39').GT57                                       00000047
D 00048 &ADR     SETA  X'C0'+&B          X'30'-X'39' -> X'F0'-X'F9'             00000048
D 00049          AGO   .DONE                                                    00000049
D 00050 .GT57    AIF   (&B GT X'3F').GT63                                       00000050
I 00050 .*         REVISED     DESCRIPTION
I 00050 .*         ----------  -----------------------------------------------
I 00050 .*  1.0.0              INITIAL RELEASE
I 00050 .*  1.1.0  01/06/2011  ADDED SUPPORT FOR COLOR EXTENDED ATTRIBUTES.
I 00050 .*
I 00050 .*********************************************************************
I 00050          GBLA  &ADR
I 00050          AIF   (&B EQ 0).R00
I 00050          AIF   (&B GE 1 AND &B LE 9).R0109
I 00050          AIF   (&B GE 10 AND &B LE 15).R1015
I 00050          AIF   (&B EQ 16).R16
I 00050          AIF   (&B GE 17 AND &B LE 25).R1725
I 00050          AIF   (&B GE 26 AND &B LE 31).R2631
I 00050          AIF   (&B EQ 32 OR &B EQ 33).R3233
I 00050          AIF   (&B GE 34 AND &B LE 41).R3441
I 00050          AIF   (&B GE 42 AND &B LE 47).R4247
I 00050          AIF   (&B EQ 48).R48
I 00050          AIF   (&B GE 49 AND &B LE 57).R4957
I 00050          AIF   (&B GE 58 AND &B LE 63).R5863
I 00050          AGO   .GT63
I 00050 .R00     ANOP
I 00050 &ADR     SETA  X'40'             X'00'       => X'40'
I 00050          AGO   .DONE
I 00050 .R0109   ANOP
I 00050 &ADR     SETA  X'C0'+&B          X'01'-X'09' -> X'C1'-X'C9'
I 00050          AGO   .DONE
I 00050 .R1015   ANOP
I 00050 &ADR     SETA  X'40'+&B          X'0A'-X'0F' -> X'4A'-X'4F'
I 00050          AGO   .DONE
I 00050 .R16     ANOP
I 00050 &ADR     SETA  X'50'             X'10'       -> X'50'
I 00050          AGO   .DONE
I 00050 .R1725   ANOP
I 00050 &ADR     SETA  X'C0'+&B          X'11'-X'19' -> X'D1'-X'D9'
I 00050          AGO   .DONE
I 00050 .R2631   ANOP
I 00050 &ADR     SETA  X'40'+&B          X'1A'-X'1F' -> X'5A'-X'5F'
I 00050          AGO   .DONE
I 00050 .R3233   ANOP
I 00050 &ADR     SETA  X'40'+&B          X'20'-X'21' -> X'60'-X'61'
I 00050          AGO   .DONE
I 00050 .R3441   ANOP

I 00050          AGO   .DONE
I 00050 .R4247   ANOP

I 00050          AGO   .DONE

I 00050          AGO   .DONE

  00051 &ADR     SETA  X'40'+&B          X'3A'-X'3F' -> X'7A'-X'7F'             00000051
  00052          AGO   .DONE                                                    00000052
  00053 .GT63    MNOTE 12,'**** INVALID BUFFER ADDRESS DETECTED ****'           00000053
  00054 &ADR     SETA  0                                                        00000054

  00001          MACRO                                                          00000001
++C            2,           9
D 00002 &NAME    TSTPAN                                                         00000002
D 00003 .*********************************************************************  00000003
D 00004 .*                                                                      00000004
D 00005 .*   TSTPAN - START THE DEFINITION OF A 3270 PANEL.                     00000005
D 00006 .*                                                                      00000006
D 00007 .* - - - - - - - - - - - - - - - - - - - - - - - - - - - - - - - - -    00000007
D 00008 .*                                                                      00000008
D 00009 .*  (C) COPYRIGHT 2009  CEDAR LAKE EMPORIUM LLC   ALL RIGHTS RESERVED   00000009
I 00009 &NAME    TSTPAN &OSVER=B
I 00009 .*********************************************************************
I 00009 .*
I 00009 .*   TSTPAN - START THE DEFINITION OF A 3270 PANEL.  GLOBAL OPTIONS
I 00009 .*   ARE SPECIFIED HERE AS WELL.
I 00009 .*   CURRENT GLOBAL OPTIONS:
I 00009 .*      &ZOSVER  THIS CONTAINS THE VERSION MVS THE MAP SHOULD BE
I 00009 .*               GENERATED FOR.  SOME VERSIONS OF MVS DO NOT SUPPORT
I 00009 .*               THE EXTENDED ATTRIBUTES CORRECTLY.
I 00009 .*               THIS VALUE IS CODED
I 00009 .*               A = STANDARD VERSION PER 3270 MANUALS.
I 00009 .*               B = MVS 3.8J EXTENDED ATTRIBUTES ARE NOT SUPPORTED
I 00009 .*                   PER 3270 MANUALS.
I 00009 .*
I 00009 .* - - - - - - - - - - - - - - - - - - - - - - - - - - - - - - - - -
I 00009 .*
I 00009 .*  (C) COPYRIGHT 2010  CEDAR LAKE EMPORIUM LLC   ALL RIGHTS RESERVED
  00010 .*                                                                      00000010
  00011 .*  THIS SOURCE CODE AS WELL AS ANY OBJECT CODE RESULTING FROM THIS     00000011
  00012 .*  SOURCE CODE MAY BE DISTRIBUTED FREELY PROVIDED NO FEE IS CHARGED    00000012
  00013 .*  AND FOR NON-COMERCIAL PURPOSES.                                     00000013
  00014 .*                                                                      00000014
  00015 .*  FOR COMMERCIAL DISTRIBUTION RIGHTS, CONTACT THE COPYRIGHT OWNER.    00000015
  00016 .*                                                                      00000016
++C           17,          20
D 00017 .*********************************************************************  00000017
D 00018          GBLC &ZLEN                                                     00000018
D 00019          GBLC &ZADR                                                     00000019
D 00020          GBLC &ZNAM                                                     00000020
I 00020 .*         REVISED     DESCRIPTION
I 00020 .*         ----------  -----------------------------------------------
I 00020 .*  1.0.0              INITIAL RELEASE
I 00020 .*  1.1.0  01/06/2011  ADDED SUPPORT FOR COLOR EXTENDED ATTRIBUTES.
I 00020 .*
I 00020 .*********************************************************************
I 00020          GBLC &ZLEN
I 00020          GBLC &ZADR
I 00020          GBLC &ZNAM
I 00020          GBLC &ZOSVER
I 00020          AIF   (T'&OSVER NE 'O').VERFND
I 00020          MNOTE 12,'**** OSVER MUST BE SPECIFIED ****'
I 00020          MEXIT
I 00020 .VERFND  ANOP
I 00020          AIF   ('&OSVER' NE 'A').VNOTA
I 00020 &ZOSVER  SETC  'A'
I 00020          MNOTE 0,'**** GENERATING STANDARD 3270 EXTENDED ATTRS ****'
I 00020          AGO   .VDONE
I 00020 .VNOTA   ANOP
I 00020          AIF   ('&OSVER' NE 'B').VNOTB
I 00020          MNOTE 0,'**** GENERATING MVS 3.8J 3270 EXTENDED ATTRS ****'
I 00020 &ZOSVER  SETC  'B'
I 00020          AGO   .VDONE
I 00020 .VNOTB   ANOP
I 00020          MNOTE 12,'*** INVALID VALUE FOR OSVER ***'
I 00020          MEXIT
I 00020 .VDONE   ANOP
  00021 &ZLEN    SETC '0'                                                       00000021
  00022 &ZADR    SETC '0'                                                       00000022
  00023 &ZNAM    SETC '&NAME'                                                   00000023
  00024 &NAME.P  DC   AL2(&ZNAM.L)                                              00000024
  00025          MEND                                                           00000025

          <02>  ./ CHANGE NAME=TSTPAN,VERSION=NEXT

          ./ REPLACE SEQ1=2,SEQ2=9
          &NAME    TSTPAN &OSVER=B
          .*********************************************************************
          .*
          .*   TSTPAN - START THE DEFINITION OF A 3270 PANEL.  GLOBAL OPTIONS
          .*   ARE SPECIFIED HERE AS WELL.
          .*   CURRENT GLOBAL OPTIONS:
          .*      &ZOSVER  THIS CONTAINS THE VERSION MVS THE MAP SHOULD BE
          .*               GENERATED FOR.  SOME VERSIONS OF MVS DO NOT SUPPORT
          .*               THE EXTENDED ATTRIBUTES CORRECTLY.
          .*               THIS VALUE IS CODED
          .*               A = STANDARD VERSION PER 3270 MANUALS.
          .*               B = MVS 3.8J EXTENDED ATTRIBUTES ARE NOT SUPPORTED
          .*                   PER 3270 MANUALS.
          .*
          .* - - - - - - - - - - - - - - - - - - - - - - - - - - - - - - - - -
          .*
          .*  (C) COPYRIGHT 2010  CEDAR LAKE EMPORIUM LLC   ALL RIGHTS RESERVED
          ./ REPLACE SEQ1=17,SEQ2=20
          .*         REVISED     DESCRIPTION
          .*         ----------  -----------------------------------------------
          .*  1.0.0              INITIAL RELEASE
          .*  1.1.0  01/06/2011  ADDED SUPPORT FOR COLOR EXTENDED ATTRIBUTES.
          .*
          .*********************************************************************
                   GBLC &ZLEN
                   GBLC &ZADR
                   GBLC &ZNAM
                   GBLC &ZOSVER
                   AIF   (T'&OSVER NE 'O').VERFND
                   MNOTE 12,'**** OSVER MUST BE SPECIFIED ****'
                   MEXIT
          .VERFND  ANOP
                   AIF   ('&OSVER' NE 'A').VNOTA
          &ZOSVER  SETC  'A'
                   MNOTE 0,'**** GENERATING STANDARD 3270 EXTENDED ATTRS ****'
                   AGO   .VDONE
          .VNOTA   ANOP
                   AIF   ('&OSVER' NE 'B').VNOTB
                   MNOTE 0,'**** GENERATING MVS 3.8J 3270 EXTENDED ATTRS ****'
          &ZOSVER  SETC  'B'
                   AGO   .VDONE
          .VNOTB   ANOP
                   MNOTE 12,'*** INVALID VALUE FOR OSVER ***'
                   MEXIT
          .VDONE   ANOP

       NEW TSTPAN   ENTRY: TTR=000020 INDC=00
