  00034 .*                                                                      00000034
  00035          AIF   ('&MODE' NE 'NORMAL').NOTNOR1                            00000035
  00036          AIF   ('&LANG' NE 'F').SKPPL1F                                 00000036
  00037 .* GENERATE PLI(F) LINKAGE                                              00000037
  00038 **NAME   ESTART TYPE=START,VER='2.0.0',REGS=YES,BASE=R12,               00000038
  00039 **             DESC='3270 FULLSCREEN IO FOR PL/I(F) BUFLEN=&BUFLEN'     00000039
  00040 &NAME    ESTART TYPE=START,VER='2.0.0',REGS=YES,BASE=R12,              *00000040
  00041                DESC='3270 FULLSCREEN IO FOR PL/I(F) BUFLEN=&BUFLEN'     00000041
  00042 *                                                                       00000042
  00043 *  GET ADDRESS OF PLI(F) PARM LIST. EACH ADDRESS POINTS TO A DATA       00000043
  00044 *      CONTROL BLOCK.  OFFSET +0 OF EACH BLOCK HAS THE ACTUAL           00000044
  00045 *      DATA                                                             00000045
  00046 *                                                                       00000046
  00047          MVC   USERPARM,4(R1)          SAVE INTERFACE AREA              00000047
  00048          NI    USERPARM,X'7F'          TURN OF HIGH ORDER BIT           00000048
  00049          L     R7,USERPARM                                              00000049
  00050          L     R7,0(0,7)                                                00000050
  00051          ST    R7,USERPARM                                              00000051
  00052          L     R7,0(0,R1)              GET IOCB BLK ADDRESS             00000052
  00053          L     R7,0(0,R7)              GET ACTUAL ADDRESS               00000053
  00054          AGO   .PLIDONE                                                 00000054
  00055 .SKPPL1F ANOP                                                           00000055
  00056 **NAME   ESTART TYPE=START,DESC='3270 FULLSCREEN IO BUFLEN=&BUFLEN',    00000056
  00057 **             VER='2.0.0',REGS=YES,BASE=R12                            00000057
  00058 &NAME    ESTART TYPE=START,DESC='3270 FULLSCREEN IO BUFLEN=&BUFLEN',   *00000058
  00059                VER='2.0.0',REGS=YES,BASE=R12                            00000059
  00060 *                                                                       00000060
  00061 *  GET ADDRESS OF PARM LIST.  PARM1 IS THE IOCB, PARM2 IS               00000061
  00062 *      PANEL INTERFACE.                                                 00000062
  00063 *                                                                       00000063
  00064          L     R7,0(0,R1)              GET IOCB ADDRESS                 00000064
  00065          MVC   USERPARM,4(R1)          SAVE INTERFACE AREA              00000065
  00066          NI    USERPARM,X'7F'          TURN OF HIGH ORDER BIT           00000066
  00067 .PLIDONE ANOP                                                           00000067
  00068          USING IOCB,R7                 ESTABLISH BR FOR IOCB            00000068
  00069          CLC   IOCBFUNC,=C'STRT'       IS IT A STRT?                    00000069
  00070          BNE   NOTSTRT                                                  00000070
  00071          L     R2,IOCBADR             IOCBADR MUST BE ZEROS FOR STRT    00000071
  00072          LTR   R2,R2                                                    00000072
  00073          BZ    STRTOK                                                   00000073
  00074 **       WTO   'MAP3270-&NAME INVALID STRT',ROUTCDE=11                  00000074
  00075          WTO   'MAP3270-&NAME INVALID STRT',ROUTCDE=11                  00000075
  00076 **       ABEND &UCODE,,,USER                                            00000076
  00077          ABEND &UCODE,,,USER                                            00000077
  00078 STRTOK   EQU   *                                                        00000078
  00079 **       STFSMODE ON,INITIAL=YES                                        00000079
  00080          STFSMODE ON,INITIAL=YES                                        00000080
++C           81,          82
D 00081 **       STTMPMD ON                                                     00000081
D 00082          STTMPMD ON                                                     00000082
I 00082 **       STTMPMD ON,KEYS=ALL
I 00082          STTMPMD ON,KEYS=ALL
  00083          LA    R2,INBUF                COPY ADDRESS OF                  00000083
  00084          ST    R2,IOCBADR                INBUF TO                       00000084
  00085          LA    R2,INBUFLN                   CONTROL                     00000085
  00086          STH   R2,IOCBLEN                     BLOCK                     00000086
  00087          B     LEAVE                                                    00000087
  00088 NOTSTRT  EQU   *                                                        00000088
  00089          CLC   IOCBFUNC,=C'END '                                        00000089
  00090          BNE   NOTEND                                                   00000090
  00091          L     R2,IOCBADR             IOCBADR MUST BE NON ZERO FOR END  00000091
  00092          LTR   R2,R2                                                    00000092
  00093          BNZ   ENDOK                                                    00000093
  00094 **       WTO   'MAP3270-&NAME INVALID END',ROUTCDE=11                   00000094
  00095          WTO   'MAP3270-&NAME INVALID END',ROUTCDE=11                   00000095
  00096 **       ABEND &UCODE,,,USER                                            00000096
  00097          ABEND &UCODE,,,USER                                            00000097
  00098 ENDOK    EQU   *                                                        00000098
  00099          MVI   IOCB,X'00'                                               00000099
  00100          MVC   IOCB+1(IOCBLN-2),IOCB                                    00000100
  00101          B     EXIT                                                     00000101
  00102 NOTEND   EQU   *                                                        00000102
  00103 *                                                                       00000103
  00104 .NOTNOR1 ANOP                                                           00000104
  00105          AIF   ('&MODE' NE 'STANDALONE').NOTSA1                         00000105
  00106 **       STFSMODE ON,INITIAL=YES                                        00000106
  00107          STFSMODE ON,INITIAL=YES                                        00000107
  00108 **       STTMPMD ON                                                     00000108
++C          109
D 00109          STTMPMD ON                                                     00000109
I 00109          STTMPMD ON,KEYS=ON
  00110          LA    R11,TPARM           GET ADDR OF FAKE USER AREA           00000110
  00111          ST    R11,USERPARM                                             00000111
  00112 LOOP     EQU   *                                                        00000112
  00113 .NOTSA1  ANOP                                                           00000113
  00114 *                                                                       00000114
  00115 *   GET THE ADDRESSES OF THE USERPARM, THE PANEL AND THE MAPPING TBL    00000115
  00116 *                                                                       00000116
  00117          L     R11,USERPARM        GET ADDR OF USER PARM AREA           00000117
  00118          USING USRPARM,R11                                              00000118
  00119 *                                                                       00000119
  00120          LOAD  EPLOC=USRPNAM                                            00000120
  00121          ST    R0,USRPADR                                               00000121
  00122 *                                                                       00000122
  00123          LA    R2,USRTBL           GET ADDR OF USER TABLE               00000123
  00124          USING USRMAP,R2                                                00000124
  00125 *                                                                       00000125
  00126          L     R10,USRPADR         GET PANEL LOAD MODULE ADDRESS        00000126
  00127          L     R1,0(0,R10)         GET PANEL ADDRESS                    00000127
  00128          ST    R1,PANLADDR                                              00000128
  00129          L     R1,8(0,R10)         GET ADDR OF CURSOR                   00000129
  00130          MVC   0(2,R1),=X'4040'    RESET BUFFER ADDR                    00000130
  00131          CLC   UCUR,=X'0000'       IF THE CURSOR IS NULL                00000131
  00132          BE    DEFLTSBA              DON'T MOVE IT                      00000132
  00133          MVC   0(2,R1),UCUR        MOVE THE PASSED BUFF ADDR            00000133
  00134 DEFLTSBA EQU   *                                                        00000134
  00135          L     R3,4(0,R10)         GET ADDR OF OUTPUT MAPPING           00000135
  00136          ST    R3,MAPADDR                                               00000136
++I          137
                 USING TINPMAP,R3                                               00000137
I 00137          CLC   TISBA,=X'0000'      IS THE END OF TABLE FIRST ITEM?
I 00137          BZ    DONEOUT             YES, BRANCH
  00138 LOOPOUT  EQU *                                                          00000138
  00139          CLC   USRLEN,TILEN        COMPARE OUTLN:MAPLN                  00000139
  00140          BNE   NOMATCH             BRANCH IF MISMATCH                   00000140
  00141          LH    R4,TILEN            GEN LENGTH                           00000141
  00142          LTR   R4,R4               ZERO?                                00000142
  00143          BZ    DONEOUT             YES, BRANCH                          00000143
  00144          BCTR  R4,R0                                                    00000144
  00145          L     R5,TIFLD                                                 00000145
  00146          EX    R4,MVCOUT                                                00000146
  00147          CLI   USRCUR,X'40'        IS CURSOR FLAG SET?                  00000147
  00148          BNH   NEXTFLD             NO, BRANCH                           00000148
  00149          MVC   0(2,R1),TISBA       MOVE THE PASSED BUFF ADDR            00000149
  00150          MVI   USRCUR,X'40'        RESET USER CURSOR FLAG               00000150
  00151 NEXTFLD  EQU   *                                                        00000151
  00152          LA    R2,4(R4,R2)                                              00000152
  00153          LA    R3,TINPMAPL(0,R3)                                        00000153
  00154          B     LOOPOUT                                                  00000154
  00155 MVCOUT   MVC 0(0,R5),USRFLD                                             00000155
  00156 NOMATCH  EQU *                                                          00000156
  00157 **       WTO   'MAP3270-&NAME MAP MATCH ERROR',ROUTCDE=11               00000157
  00158          WTO   'MAP3270-&NAME MAP MATCH ERROR',ROUTCDE=11               00000158
  00159 **       ABEND &UCODE,,,USER                                            00000159
  00160          ABEND &UCODE,,,USER                                            00000160
  00161 DONEOUT  EQU *                                                          00000161
  00162          L     R10,PANLADDR                                             00000162
  00163          LH    R3,0(0,R10)                                              00000163
  00164          SH    R3,=H'2'                                                 00000164
  00165 **       TPUT  2(R10),(R3),FULLSCR                                      00000165
  00166          TPUT  2(R10),(R3),FULLSCR                                      00000166
++C          167,         170
D 00167          CLC   IOCBFUNC,=C'PUT '       IF PUT ONLY,                     00000167
D 00168          BNE   NOTPUT                    CLEAR UAID AND CURSOR          00000168
D 00169          MVC   UAID(3),=3X'00'             AND RETURN                   00000169
D 00170          B     LEAVE                                                    00000170
I 00170          LTR   R15,R15                 CHECK FOR FAILURE
I 00170          BNZ   TPUTERR                 YES, BRANCH
I 00170          CLC   IOCBFUNC,=C'PUT '       IF PUT ONLY,
I 00170          BNE   NOTPUT                    CLEAR UAID AND CURSOR
I 00170          MVC   UAID(3),=3X'00'             AND RETURN
I 00170          B     LEAVE
I 00170 TPUTERR  EQU   *
I 00170 **       WTO   'MAP3270-&NAME TPUT RC XX (DEC)',ROUTCDE=11
I 00170 TPUTWTO1 WTO   'MAP3270-&NAME TPUT RC XX (DEC)',ROUTCDE=11
I 00170 **       ABEND &UCODE,,,USER
I 00170          ABEND &UCODE,,,USER
  00171 NOTPUT   EQU   *                                                        00000171
  00172          CLC   IOCBFUNC,=C'PG  '       IF PG OR IO                      00000172
  00173          BE    DOGET                      CONTINUE TO TGET              00000173
  00174          CLC   IOCBFUNC,=C'IO  '       OTHERWISE                        00000174
  00175          BE    DOGET                      ABORT                         00000175
  00176 **       WTO   'MAP3270-&NAME INVALID FUNCTION',ROUTCDE=11              00000176
  00177          WTO   'MAP3270-&NAME INVALID FUNCTION',ROUTCDE=11              00000177
  00178 **       ABEND &UCODE,,,USER                                            00000178
  00179          ABEND &UCODE,,,USER                                            00000179
  00180 DOGET    EQU   *                                                        00000180
++C          181,         183
D 00181 *                                                                       00000181
D 00182 **       TGET  INBUF,INBUFLN,ASIS                                       00000182
D 00183          TGET  INBUF,INBUFLN,ASIS                                       00000183
I 00183          MVI   INBUF,X'00'
I 00183          MVC   INBUF+1(255),INBUF
I 00183 *
I 00183 **       TGET  INBUF,INBUFLN,ASIS
I 00183          TGET  INBUF,INBUFLN,ASIS
I 00183          LTR   R15,R15            CHECK FOR FAILURE
I 00183          BZ    TGETOK             NO, BRANCH
I 00183 **       WTO   'MAP3270-&NAME TGET RC XX (DEC)',ROUTCDE=11
I 00183 TGETWTO1 WTO   'MAP3270-&NAME TGET RC XX (DEC)',ROUTCDE=11
I 00183 **       ABEND &UCODE,,,USER
I 00183          ABEND &UCODE,,,USER
I 00183 TGETOK   EQU   *
  00184          MVC   UAID(3),INBUF       MOVE THE AID AND CUR                 00000184
  00185          AIF   ('&MODE' NE 'STANDALONE').SKPSA1                         00000185
  00186          CLI   UAID,X'F3'                                               00000186
  00187          BE    EXIT                                                     00000187
  00188          MVC   R21C01D(79),INBUF                                        00000188
  00189          MVC   R22C01D(79),INBUF                                        00000189
  00190          MVC   R23C01D(79),INBUF                                        00000190
  00191          TR    R21C01D(79),CHRTBL                                       00000191
  00192          TR    R22C01D(79),HITBL                                        00000192
  00193          TR    R23C01D(79),LOTBL                                        00000193
  00194 ****                                                                    00000194
  00195          UNPK  WORK3,TAID(2)                                            00000195
  00196          TR    WORK3(2),TRTAB-C'0'                                      00000196
  00197          MVC   R12C46D,WORK3                                            00000197
  00198          MVC   CNVWRK(2),TSBA                                           00000198
  00199          LH    R2,CNVWRK                                                00000199
  00200          CVD   R2,DWORD                                                 00000200
  00201          UNPK  R12C49D(5),DWORD+5(3)                                    00000201
  00202          OI    R12C49D+4,X'F0'                                          00000202
  00203 .SKPSA1  ANOP                                                           00000203
  00204 **********************************************************************  00000204
  00205 *                                                                    *  00000205
  00206 *  THE BUFFER RETURNED BY TGET HAS EACH FIELD RETURNED WITH A 3      *  00000206
  00207 *  BYTE PREFIX - X'11' PLUS BUFFER ADDRESS.                          *  00000207
  00208 *                                                                    *  00000208
  00209 *  TO MAP BACK TO THE USER AREA, THERE IS A XREF MAP GENERATED AS    *  00000209
  00210 *  PART OF THE PANEL.  THIS XREF HAS THE BUFFER ADDR, THE ADDR OF    *  00000210
  00211 *  THE USER FIELD AND THE MAX LENGTH OF THE FIELD.  NOTE THAT THIS   *  00000211
  00212 *  ROUTINE DOES NOT MAP BACK TO THE PANEL BUT TO THE USER AREA.      *  00000212
  00213 *                                                                    *  00000213
  00214 **********************************************************************  00000214
  00215          LA    R2,USRTBL           GET TO THE USER TABLE                00000215
  00216          LA    R6,INBUF+3                                               00000216
  00217          LA    R9,MAXFLDS          LIMIT INPUT FIELDS TO MAX POSSIBLE   00000217
++I          218
        **                                 TO PREVENT RUNAWAY LOOPS             00000218
I 00218          L     R3,MAPADDR
I 00218          CLC   TISBA,=X'0000'      SEE IF 1ST DATA FIELD IS END OF TAB.
I 00218          BE    ALLDONE             IF SO, BRANCH TO EXIT.
  00219 LOOPIN   EQU *                                                          00000219
  00220          L     R3,MAPADDR                                               00000220
  00221 *                                                                       00000221
  00222 *  FIND THE BUFFER ADDRESS IN THE XREF TABLE.                           00000222
  00223 *                                                                       00000223
  00224          CLI   0(R6),X'11'         CHECK FOR SBA                        00000224
  00225          BE    FNDSBA              IF SO, CONTINUE                      00000225
  00226          CLI   0(R6),X'00'         END OF MESSAGE FROM 3270?            00000226
  00227          BE    DONEIN                                                   00000227
  00228 **       WTO   'MAP3270-&NAME INVALID INPUT MSG',ROUTCDE=11             00000228
  00229          WTO   'MAP3270-&NAME INVALID INPUT MSG',ROUTCDE=11             00000229
  00230 **       ABEND &UCODE,,,USER                                            00000230
  00231          ABEND &UCODE,,,USER                                            00000231
  00232 FNDSBA   EQU   *                                                        00000232
  00233          CLC   TISBA,1(R6)         COMPARE THE SBA.                     00000233
  00234          BE    FNDTSBA             IF SO, BRANCH                        00000234
  00235          LA    R3,TINPMAPL(,R3)    TRY NEXT ENTRY                       00000235
  00236          CLC   TISBA,=X'0000'      TEST FOR END OF TABLE                00000236
  00237          BNE   FNDSBA              IF NOT END,  TRY NEXT THIS ENTRY     00000237
  00238 **       WTO   'MAP3270-&NAME INPUT MAPPING ERROR',ROUTCDE=11           00000238
  00239          WTO   'MAP3270-&NAME INPUT MAPPING ERROR',ROUTCDE=11           00000239
++C          240,         241
D 00240 **       ABEND &UCODE,,,USER                                            00000240
D 00241          ABEND &UCODE,,,USER                                            00000241
I 00241 **       ABEND &UCODE,DUMP,,USER
I 00241          ABEND &UCODE,DUMP,,USER
  00242 FNDTSBA  EQU   *                                                        00000242
  00243 *                                                                       00000243
  00244 *   CALCULATE THE LENGTH OF THE DATAFIELD                               00000244
  00245 *                                                                       00000245
  00246          LA    R8,3(,R6)              GET ADDR OF 1ST BYTE              00000246
  00247 NXTSBA   CLI   0(R8),X'11'            IF THIS AN SBA?                   00000247
  00248          BE    GOTLEN                 YES, BRANCH                       00000248
  00249          CLI   0(R8),X'00'            IF END OF MSG?                    00000249
  00250          BE    GOTLEN                                                   00000250
  00251          LA    R8,1(,R8)              BUMP UP THE CHARACTER             00000251
  00252          B     NXTSBA                                                   00000252
  00253 GOTLEN   EQU   *                                                        00000253
  00254          SR    R8,R6                  CALCULATE FLD LEN                 00000254
  00255          S     R8,=F'3'                                                 00000255
  00256 *                                                                       00000256
  00257          LH    R4,TILEN               GEN LENGTH                        00000257
  00258          LTR   R4,R4                  ZERO?                             00000258
  00259          BZ    DONEIN                 YES, BRANCH                       00000259
  00260          BCTR  R4,0                                                     00000260
  00261          L     R5,TIFLD                                                 00000261
  00262          EX    R4,MVCSP                                                 00000262
  00263          LH    R4,TILEN               GEN LENGTH                        00000263
  00264          CR    R8,R4                                                    00000264
  00265          BE    LENOK                                                    00000265
  00266          BH    LENOK                                                    00000266
  00267          LR    R4,R8                                                    00000267
  00268 LENOK    EQU   *                                                        00000268
  00269          BCTR  R4,R0                                                    00000269
  00270          EX    R4,MVCIN                                                 00000270
  00271          LA    R6,3(R8,R6)                                              00000271
  00272          BCT   R9,LOOPIN                                                00000272
  00273          B     DONEIN                 ONLY PROCESS LIMITED FIELDS       00000273
  00274 MVCIN    MVC   0(0,R5),3(R6)                                            00000274
  00275 MVCSP    MVC   0(0,R5),SPACES                                           00000275
  00276 NOMATCHI EQU *                                                          00000276
  00277 **       WTO   'MAP3270-&NAME MAPPING ERROR',ROUTCDE=11                 00000277
  00278          WTO   'MAP3270-&NAME MAPPING ERROR',ROUTCDE=11                 00000278
++C          279,         280
D 00279 **       ABEND &UCODE,,,USER                                            00000279
D 00280          ABEND &UCODE,,,USER                                            00000280
I 00280 **       ABEND &UCODE,DUMP,,USER
I 00280          ABEND &UCODE,DUMP,,USER
  00281 DONEIN   EQU *                                                          00000281
  00282 ****     B     ALLDONE                                                  00000282
  00283 *                                                                       00000283
  00284 *  MAP DATA BACK TO USER AREA                                           00000284
  00285 *                                                                       00000285
  00286          LA    R9,MAXFLDS     LIMIT INPUT FIELDS                        00000286
  00287          L     R10,PANLADDR                                             00000287
  00288          LA    R2,USRTBL           GET ADDR OF USER TABLE               00000288
  00289          L     R3,MAPADDR                                               00000289
  00290          USING TINPMAP,R3                                               00000290
  00291 LOOPRET  EQU *                                                          00000291
  00292          CLC   USRLEN,TILEN        COMPARE OUTLN:MAPLN                  00000292
  00293          BNE   NOMATCHR            BRANCH IF MISMATCH                   00000293
  00294          LH    R4,TILEN            GEN LENGTH                           00000294
  00295          LTR   R4,R4               ZERO?                                00000295
  00296          BZ    ALLDONE             YES, BRANCH                          00000296
  00297          BCTR  R4,R0                                                    00000297
  00298          L     R5,TIFLD                                                 00000298
  00299          EX    R4,MVCRET                                                00000299
  00300          LA    R2,4(R4,R2)                                              00000300
  00301          LA    R3,TINPMAPL(0,R3)                                        00000301
  00302          BCT   R9,LOOPRET                                               00000302
  00303          B     ALLDONE                                                  00000303
  00304 MVCRET   MVC   USRFLD(0),0(R5)                                          00000304
  00305 NOMATCHR EQU *                                                          00000305
  00306 **       WTO   'MAP3270-&NAME MAP BACK ERROR',ROUTCDE=11                00000306
  00307          WTO   'MAP3270-&NAME MAP BACK ERROR',ROUTCDE=11                00000307
  00308 **       ABEND &UCODE,,,USER                                            00000308
  00309          ABEND &UCODE,,,USER                                            00000309
  00310 ****                                                                    00000310
  00311 ALLDONE  EQU   *                                                        00000311
  00312          AIF   ('&MODE' NE 'STANDALONE').ENDSTD1                        00000312
  00313          B     LOOP                                                     00000313
  00314          AGO   .EXIT                                                    00000314
  00315 *                                                                       00000315
  00316 .ENDSTD1 ANOP                                                           00000316
  00317          B     LEAVE                                                    00000317
  00318 .EXIT    ANOP                                                           00000318
  00319 **IT     STLINENO LINE=1                                                00000319
  00320 EXIT     STLINENO LINE=1                                                00000320
  00321 **       STFSMODE OFF                                                   00000321
  00322          STFSMODE OFF                                                   00000322
  00323 **       STTMPMD OFF                                                    00000323
  00324          STTMPMD OFF                                                    00000324
  00325 **AVE    ERETURN RC=0                                                   00000325
  00326 LEAVE    ERETURN RC=0                                                   00000326
  00327 *                                                                       00000327
  00328 SPACES   DC    CL80' '                                                  00000328
  00329          AIF   ('&MODE' NE 'STANDALONE').SKPTRTS                        00000329
  00330 CNVWRK   DS    F                                                        00000330
  00331 DWORD    DS    D                                                        00000331
  00332 WORK3    DC    XL3'00'                                                  00000332
  00333          DS    CL240                                                    00000333
  00334 TRTAB    DC    C'0123456789ABCDEF'                                      00000334
  00335 *                                                                       00000335
  00336 MEMDISP  DS    0H                                                       00000336
  00337 CHRTBL   DC    8CL16'................'                                  00000337
  00338 *                     A B C D E F G H I                                 00000338
  00339          DC    XL16'4B8182838485868788894B4B4B4B4B4B' X'8X'             00000339
  00340 *                     J K L M N O P Q R                                 00000340
  00341          DC    XL16'4B9192939495969798994B4B4B4B4B4B' X'9X'             00000341

  00350          DC    16C'1'                                                   00000350

  00360          DC    16C'B'                                                   00000360

  00363          DC    16C'E'                                                   00000363
  00364          DC    16C'F'                                                   00000364
  00365 LOTBL    DC    16CL16'0123456789ABCDEF'                                 00000365
  00366 .SKPTRTS ANOP                                                           00000366
  00367 USERPARM DS    F                                                        00000367
  00368 PANLADDR DS    F                                                        00000368
  00369 MAPADDR  DS    F                                                        00000369
  00370 RCODE    DC    H'0'                                                     00000370
  00371 ONE      DC    H'1'                                                     00000371
++C          372,         375
D 00372 INBUF    DS    CL&BUFLEN                                                00000372
D 00373 INBUFLN  EQU   &BUFLEN                                                  00000373
D 00374 MAXFLDS  EQU   960                                                      00000374
D 00375          LTORG                                                          00000375
I 00375          LTORG
I 00375          DC    CL16'**START INBUF**'
I 00375 INBUF    DS    CL&BUFLEN
I 00375 INBUFLN  EQU   &BUFLEN
I 00375 MAXFLDS  EQU   960
  00376          AIF   ('&MODE' NE 'NORMAL').MEXIT                              00000376
  00377 *        T3270D                                                         00000377
  00378          T3270D                                                         00000378
  00379 .MEXIT   ANOP                                                           00000379
  00380          MEND                                                           00000380

PROCESSING CNTL FILE

++E

*** DDNAME=SYSUT2          OPEN FOR OUTPUT, DSORG=PO, DSNAME=HERC01.CLE.DISTRO.SOURCEX ON PUB002
      *** CHAIN ID TS DOES NOT MATCH LIBRARY ID PR ***
*** CHAIN LIBRARY ID = 'PR', ALLOCATION NUMBER = 001
*** DDNAME=SYSUT1          OPEN FOR  INPUT, DSORG=PS, DSNAME=NULLFILE
*** DDNAME=DD         <01> OPEN FOR  INPUT, DSORG=PO, DSNAME=HERC01.CLE.DISTRO.SOURCE ON PUB002

T3270     IEBUPDTX -- CORNELL EXTENDED UPDATE PROGRAM.  VERSION 1.12 (SLAC V.12/17/04)            DAY=010  03:09  01/10/11    PAGE 2


          <02>  ./ CHANGE NAME=T3270,VERSION=NEXT

          ./ REPLACE SEQ1=2
          &NAME    T3270 &MODE=,&BUFLEN=2048,&PLI=,&UCODE=3270,&DEBUG=NO
          ./ REPLACE SEQ1=13
          .*         REVISED     DESCRIPTION
          .*         ----------  -----------------------------------------------
          .*  1.0.0              RERELASED AND TEST USING HERCULES
          .*  1.1.0  01/06/2011  ADDED SUPPORT FOR COLOR EXTENDED ATTRIBUTES.
          .*
          ./ INSERT SEQ1=29
                   AIF   (T'&DEBUG EQ 'O').DBUGBAD
                   AIF   ('&DEBUG' EQ 'NO').DBUGOK
                   AIF   ('&DEBUG' EQ 'BOTH').DBUGOK
                   AIF   ('&DEBUG' EQ 'TPUT').DBUGOK
                   AIF   ('&DEBUG' EQ 'TGET').DBUGOK
          .DBUGBAD ANOP
                   MNOTE 12,'*** DEBUG INVALID VALUE ***'
                   MEXIT
          .DBUGOK  ANOP
          ./ REPLACE SEQ1=81,SEQ2=82
          **       STTMPMD ON,KEYS=ALL
                   STTMPMD ON,KEYS=ALL
          ./ REPLACE SEQ1=109
                   STTMPMD ON,KEYS=ON
          ./ INSERT SEQ1=137
                   CLC   TISBA,=X'0000'      IS THE END OF TABLE FIRST ITEM?
                   BZ    DONEOUT             YES, BRANCH
          ./ REPLACE SEQ1=167,SEQ2=170
                   LTR   R15,R15                 CHECK FOR FAILURE
                   BNZ   TPUTERR                 YES, BRANCH
                   CLC   IOCBFUNC,=C'PUT '       IF PUT ONLY,
                   BNE   NOTPUT                    CLEAR UAID AND CURSOR
                   MVC   UAID(3),=3X'00'             AND RETURN
                   B     LEAVE
          TPUTERR  EQU   *
          **       WTO   'MAP3270-&NAME TPUT RC XX (DEC)',ROUTCDE=11
          TPUTWTO1 WTO   'MAP3270-&NAME TPUT RC XX (DEC)',ROUTCDE=11
          **       ABEND &UCODE,,,USER
                   ABEND &UCODE,,,USER
          ./ REPLACE SEQ1=181,SEQ2=183
                   MVI   INBUF,X'00'
                   MVC   INBUF+1(255),INBUF
          *
          **       TGET  INBUF,INBUFLN,ASIS
                   TGET  INBUF,INBUFLN,ASIS
                   LTR   R15,R15            CHECK FOR FAILURE
                   BZ    TGETOK             NO, BRANCH
          **       WTO   'MAP3270-&NAME TGET RC XX (DEC)',ROUTCDE=11
          TGETWTO1 WTO   'MAP3270-&NAME TGET RC XX (DEC)',ROUTCDE=11
          **       ABEND &UCODE,,,USER
                   ABEND &UCODE,,,USER
          TGETOK   EQU   *
          ./ INSERT SEQ1=218
                   L     R3,MAPADDR
                   CLC   TISBA,=X'0000'      SEE IF 1ST DATA FIELD IS END OF TAB.
                   BE    ALLDONE             IF SO, BRANCH TO EXIT.

T3270     IEBUPDTX -- CORNELL EXTENDED UPDATE PROGRAM.  VERSION 1.12 (SLAC V.12/17/04)            DAY=010  03:09  01/10/11    PAGE 3


          ./ REPLACE SEQ1=240,SEQ2=241
          **       ABEND &UCODE,DUMP,,USER
                   ABEND &UCODE,DUMP,,USER
          ./ REPLACE SEQ1=279,SEQ2=280
          **       ABEND &UCODE,DUMP,,USER
                   ABEND &UCODE,DUMP,,USER
          ./ REPLACE SEQ1=372,SEQ2=375
                   LTORG
                   DC    CL16'**START INBUF**'
          INBUF    DS    CL&BUFLEN
          INBUFLN  EQU   &BUFLEN
          MAXFLDS  EQU   960

       NEW T3270    ENTRY: TTR=000101 INDC=00

                                          .* GENERATE PLI(F) LINKAGE                                              00000050  00000037
                                          **NAME   ESTART TYPE=START,VER='2.0.0',REGS=YES,BASE=R12,               00000051  00000038
                                          **             DESC='3270 FULLSCREEN IO FOR PL/I(F) BUFLEN=&BUFLEN'     00000052  00000039
                                          &NAME    ESTART TYPE=START,VER='2.0.0',REGS=YES,BASE=R12,              *00000053  00000040
                                                         DESC='3270 FULLSCREEN IO FOR PL/I(F) BUFLEN=&BUFLEN'     00000054  00000041
                                          *                                                                       00000055  00000042
                                          *  GET ADDRESS OF PLI(F) PARM LIST. EACH ADDRESS POINTS TO A DATA       00000056  00000043
                                          *      CONTROL BLOCK.  OFFSET +0 OF EACH BLOCK HAS THE ACTUAL           00000057  00000044
                                          *      DATA                                                             00000058  00000045
                                          *                                                                       00000059  00000046
                                                   MVC   USERPARM,4(R1)          SAVE INTERFACE AREA              00000060  00000047
                                                   NI    USERPARM,X'7F'          TURN OF HIGH ORDER BIT           00000061  00000048

                                                   L     R7,0(0,7)                                                00000063  00000050

                                                   L     R7,0(0,R1)              GET IOCB BLK ADDRESS             00000065  00000052
                                                   L     R7,0(0,R7)              GET ACTUAL ADDRESS               00000066  00000053

                                          .SKPPL1F ANOP                                                           00000068  00000055
                                          **NAME   ESTART TYPE=START,DESC='3270 FULLSCREEN IO BUFLEN=&BUFLEN',    00000069  00000056
                                          **             VER='2.0.0',REGS=YES,BASE=R12                            00000070  00000057
                                          &NAME    ESTART TYPE=START,DESC='3270 FULLSCREEN IO BUFLEN=&BUFLEN',   *00000071  00000058
                                                         VER='2.0.0',REGS=YES,BASE=R12                            00000072  00000059
                                          *                                                                       00000073  00000060
                                          *  GET ADDRESS OF PARM LIST.  PARM1 IS THE IOCB, PARM2 IS               00000074  00000061
                                          *      PANEL INTERFACE.                                                 00000075  00000062
                                          *                                                                       00000076  00000063
                                                   L     R7,0(0,R1)              GET IOCB ADDRESS                 00000077  00000064
                                                   MVC   USERPARM,4(R1)          SAVE INTERFACE AREA              00000078  00000065
                                                   NI    USERPARM,X'7F'          TURN OF HIGH ORDER BIT           00000079  00000066
                                          .PLIDONE ANOP                                                           00000080  00000067
                                                   USING IOCB,R7                 ESTABLISH BR FOR IOCB            00000081  00000068
                                                   CLC   IOCBFUNC,=C'STRT'       IS IT A STRT?                    00000082  00000069
                                                   BNE   NOTSTRT                                                  00000083  00000070
                                                   L     R2,IOCBADR             IOCBADR MUST BE ZEROS FOR STRT    00000084  00000071
                                                   LTR   R2,R2                                                    00000085  00000072
                                                   BZ    STRTOK                                                   00000086  00000073
                                          **       WTO   'MAP3270-&NAME INVALID STRT',ROUTCDE=11                  00000087  00000074
                                                   WTO   'MAP3270-&NAME INVALID STRT',ROUTCDE=11                  00000088  00000075

                                          **       STFSMODE ON,INITIAL=YES                                        00000092  00000079

                                    <01>           STTMPMD ON,KEYS=ALL                                            00000095  00000082

                                          NOTSTRT  EQU   *                                                        00000101  00000088
                                                   CLC   IOCBFUNC,=C'END '                                        00000102  00000089
                                                   BNE   NOTEND                                                   00000103  00000090

T3270     IEBUPDTX -- CORNELL EXTENDED UPDATE PROGRAM.  VERSION 1.12 (SLAC V.12/17/04)            DAY=010  03:09  01/10/11    PAGE 4


                                                   L     R2,IOCBADR             IOCBADR MUST BE NON ZERO FOR END  00000104  00000091
                                                   LTR   R2,R2                                                    00000105  00000092

                                          **       ABEND &UCODE,,,USER                                            00000109  00000096

                                          ENDOK    EQU   *                                                        00000111  00000098
                                                   MVI   IOCB,X'00'                                               00000112  00000099
                                                   MVC   IOCB+1(IOCBLN-2),IOCB                                    00000113  00000100
                                                   B     EXIT                                                     00000114  00000101
                                          NOTEND   EQU   *                                                        00000115  00000102
                                          *                                                                       00000116  00000103
                                          .NOTNOR1 ANOP                                                           00000117  00000104
                                                   AIF   ('&MODE' NE 'STANDALONE').NOTSA1                         00000118  00000105
                                          **       STFSMODE ON,INITIAL=YES                                        00000119  00000106
                                                   STFSMODE ON,INITIAL=YES                                        00000120  00000107
                                          **       STTMPMD ON                                                     00000121  00000108
                                    <01>           STTMPMD ON,KEYS=ON                                             00000122  00000109
                                                   LA    R11,TPARM           GET ADDR OF FAKE USER AREA           00000123  00000110
                                                   ST    R11,USERPARM                                             00000124  00000111
                                          LOOP     EQU   *                                                        00000125  00000112
                                          .NOTSA1  ANOP                                                           00000126  00000113
                                          *                                                                       00000127  00000114
                                          *   GET THE ADDRESSES OF THE USERPARM, THE PANEL AND THE MAPPING TBL    00000128  00000115
                                          *                                                                       00000129  00000116
                                                   L     R11,USERPARM        GET ADDR OF USER PARM AREA           00000130  00000117
                                                   USING USRPARM,R11                                              00000131  00000118
                                          *                                                                       00000132  00000119
                                                   LOAD  EPLOC=USRPNAM                                            00000133  00000120
                                                   ST    R0,USRPADR                                               00000134  00000121
                                          *                                                                       00000135  00000122
                                                   LA    R2,USRTBL           GET ADDR OF USER TABLE               00000136  00000123
                                                   USING USRMAP,R2                                                00000137  00000124
                                          *                                                                       00000138  00000125
                                                   L     R10,USRPADR         GET PANEL LOAD MODULE ADDRESS        00000139  00000126
                                                   L     R1,0(0,R10)         GET PANEL ADDRESS                    00000140  00000127
                                                   ST    R1,PANLADDR                                              00000141  00000128
                                                   L     R1,8(0,R10)         GET ADDR OF CURSOR                   00000142  00000129
                                                   MVC   0(2,R1),=X'4040'    RESET BUFFER ADDR                    00000143  00000130
                                                   CLC   UCUR,=X'0000'       IF THE CURSOR IS NULL                00000144  00000131
                                                   BE    DEFLTSBA              DON'T MOVE IT                      00000145  00000132
                                                   MVC   0(2,R1),UCUR        MOVE THE PASSED BUFF ADDR            00000146  00000133
                                          DEFLTSBA EQU   *                                                        00000147  00000134
                                                   L     R3,4(0,R10)         GET ADDR OF OUTPUT MAPPING           00000148  00000135
                                                   ST    R3,MAPADDR                                               00000149  00000136
                                                   USING TINPMAP,R3                                               00000150  00000137
                                    <01>           CLC   TISBA,=X'0000'      IS THE END OF TABLE FIRST ITEM?      00000151  00000138
                                    <01>           BZ    DONEOUT             YES, BRANCH                          00000152  00000139
                                          LOOPOUT  EQU *                                                          00000153  00000138
                                                   CLC   USRLEN,TILEN        COMPARE OUTLN:MAPLN                  00000154  00000139
                                                   BNE   NOMATCH             BRANCH IF MISMATCH                   00000155  00000140
                                                   LH    R4,TILEN            GEN LENGTH                           00000156  00000141
                                                   LTR   R4,R4               ZERO?                                00000157  00000142
                                                   BZ    DONEOUT             YES, BRANCH                          00000158  00000143
                                                   BCTR  R4,R0                                                    00000159  00000144
                                                   L     R5,TIFLD                                                 00000160  00000145

T3270     IEBUPDTX -- CORNELL EXTENDED UPDATE PROGRAM.  VERSION 1.12 (SLAC V.12/17/04)            DAY=010  03:09  01/10/11    PAGE 5


                                                   EX    R4,MVCOUT                                                00000161  00000146
                                                   CLI   USRCUR,X'40'        IS CURSOR FLAG SET?                  00000162  00000147
                                                   BNH   NEXTFLD             NO, BRANCH                           00000163  00000148
                                                   MVC   0(2,R1),TISBA       MOVE THE PASSED BUFF ADDR            00000164  00000149
                                                   MVI   USRCUR,X'40'        RESET USER CURSOR FLAG               00000165  00000150
                                          NEXTFLD  EQU   *                                                        00000166  00000151
                                                   LA    R2,4(R4,R2)                                              00000167  00000152
                                                   LA    R3,TINPMAPL(0,R3)                                        00000168  00000153
                                                   B     LOOPOUT                                                  00000169  00000154
                                          MVCOUT   MVC 0(0,R5),USRFLD                                             00000170  00000155
                                          NOMATCH  EQU *                                                          00000171  00000156
                                          **       WTO   'MAP3270-&NAME MAP MATCH ERROR',ROUTCDE=11               00000172  00000157
                                                   WTO   'MAP3270-&NAME MAP MATCH ERROR',ROUTCDE=11               00000173  00000158
                                          **       ABEND &UCODE,,,USER                                            00000174  00000159
                                                   ABEND &UCODE,,,USER                                            00000175  00000160
                                          DONEOUT  EQU *                                                          00000176  00000161
                                                   L     R10,PANLADDR                                             00000177  00000162
                                                   LH    R3,0(0,R10)                                              00000178  00000163
                                                   SH    R3,=H'2'                                                 00000179  00000164
                                          **       TPUT  2(R10),(R3),FULLSCR                                      00000180  00000165
                                                   TPUT  2(R10),(R3),FULLSCR                                      00000181  00000166
                                    <01>           LTR   R15,R15                 CHECK FOR FAILURE                00000182  00000167
                                    <01>           BNZ   TPUTERR                 YES, BRANCH                      00000183  00000168
                                    <01>           CLC   IOCBFUNC,=C'PUT '       IF PUT ONLY,                     00000184  00000169
                                    <01>           BNE   NOTPUT                    CLEAR UAID AND CURSOR          00000185  00000170
                                    <01>           MVC   UAID(3),=3X'00'             AND RETURN                   00000186  00000171
                                    <01>           B     LEAVE                                                    00000187  00000172
                                    <01>  TPUTERR  EQU   *                                                        00000188  00000173
                                    <01>  **       WTO   'MAP3270-&NAME TPUT RC XX (DEC)',ROUTCDE=11              00000189  00000174
                                    <01>  TPUTWTO1 WTO   'MAP3270-&NAME TPUT RC XX (DEC)',ROUTCDE=11              00000190  00000175
                                    <01>  **       ABEND &UCODE,,,USER                                            00000191  00000176
                                    <01>           ABEND &UCODE,,,USER                                            00000192  00000177
                                          NOTPUT   EQU   *                                                        00000193  00000171
                                                   CLC   IOCBFUNC,=C'PG  '       IF PG OR IO                      00000194  00000172
                                                   BE    DOGET                      CONTINUE TO TGET              00000195  00000173
                                                   CLC   IOCBFUNC,=C'IO  '       OTHERWISE                        00000196  00000174
                                                   BE    DOGET                      ABORT                         00000197  00000175
                                          **       WTO   'MAP3270-&NAME INVALID FUNCTION',ROUTCDE=11              00000198  00000176
                                                   WTO   'MAP3270-&NAME INVALID FUNCTION',ROUTCDE=11              00000199  00000177
                                          **       ABEND &UCODE,,,USER                                            00000200  00000178
                                                   ABEND &UCODE,,,USER                                            00000201  00000179
                                          DOGET    EQU   *                                                        00000202  00000180
                                    <01>           MVI   INBUF,X'00'                                              00000203  00000181
                                    <01>           MVC   INBUF+1(255),INBUF                                       00000204  00000182
                                    <01>  *                                                                       00000205  00000183
                                    <01>  **       TGET  INBUF,INBUFLN,ASIS                                       00000206  00000184
                                    <01>           TGET  INBUF,INBUFLN,ASIS                                       00000207  00000185
                                    <01>           LTR   R15,R15            CHECK FOR FAILURE                     00000208  00000186
                                    <01>           BZ    TGETOK             NO, BRANCH                            00000209  00000187
                                    <01>  **       WTO   'MAP3270-&NAME TGET RC XX (DEC)',ROUTCDE=11              00000210  00000188
                                    <01>  TGETWTO1 WTO   'MAP3270-&NAME TGET RC XX (DEC)',ROUTCDE=11              00000211  00000189
                                    <01>  **       ABEND &UCODE,,,USER                                            00000212  00000190
                                    <01>           ABEND &UCODE,,,USER                                            00000213  00000191
                                    <01>  TGETOK   EQU   *                                                        00000214  00000192
                                                   MVC   UAID(3),INBUF       MOVE THE AID AND CUR                 00000215  00000184
                                                   AIF   ('&MODE' NE 'STANDALONE').SKPSA1                         00000216  00000185
                                                   CLI   UAID,X'F3'                                               00000217  00000186

T3270     IEBUPDTX -- CORNELL EXTENDED UPDATE PROGRAM.  VERSION 1.12 (SLAC V.12/17/04)            DAY=010  03:09  01/10/11    PAGE 6


                                                   BE    EXIT                                                     00000218  00000187
                                                   MVC   R21C01D(79),INBUF                                        00000219  00000188
                                                   MVC   R22C01D(79),INBUF                                        00000220  00000189
                                                   MVC   R23C01D(79),INBUF                                        00000221  00000190
                                                   TR    R21C01D(79),CHRTBL                                       00000222  00000191
                                                   TR    R22C01D(79),HITBL                                        00000223  00000192
                                                   TR    R23C01D(79),LOTBL                                        00000224  00000193
                                          ****                                                                    00000225  00000194
                                                   UNPK  WORK3,TAID(2)                                            00000226  00000195
                                                   TR    WORK3(2),TRTAB-C'0'                                      00000227  00000196
                                                   MVC   R12C46D,WORK3                                            00000228  00000197
                                                   MVC   CNVWRK(2),TSBA                                           00000229  00000198
                                                   LH    R2,CNVWRK                                                00000230  00000199
                                                   CVD   R2,DWORD                                                 00000231  00000200
                                                   UNPK  R12C49D(5),DWORD+5(3)                                    00000232  00000201
                                                   OI    R12C49D+4,X'F0'                                          00000233  00000202
                                          .SKPSA1  ANOP                                                           00000234  00000203
                                          **********************************************************************  00000235  00000204
                                          *                                                                    *  00000236  00000205
                                          *  THE BUFFER RETURNED BY TGET HAS EACH FIELD RETURNED WITH A 3      *  00000237  00000206
                                          *  BYTE PREFIX - X'11' PLUS BUFFER ADDRESS.                          *  00000238  00000207
                                          *                                                                    *  00000239  00000208
                                          *  TO MAP BACK TO THE USER AREA, THERE IS A XREF MAP GENERATED AS    *  00000240  00000209
                                          *  PART OF THE PANEL.  THIS XREF HAS THE BUFFER ADDR, THE ADDR OF    *  00000241  00000210
                                          *  THE USER FIELD AND THE MAX LENGTH OF THE FIELD.  NOTE THAT THIS   *  00000242  00000211
                                          *  ROUTINE DOES NOT MAP BACK TO THE PANEL BUT TO THE USER AREA.      *  00000243  00000212
                                          *                                                                    *  00000244  00000213
                                          **********************************************************************  00000245  00000214
                                                   LA    R2,USRTBL           GET TO THE USER TABLE                00000246  00000215
                                                   LA    R6,INBUF+3                                               00000247  00000216
                                                   LA    R9,MAXFLDS          LIMIT INPUT FIELDS TO MAX POSSIBLE   00000248  00000217
                                          **                                 TO PREVENT RUNAWAY LOOPS             00000249  00000218
                                    <01>           L     R3,MAPADDR                                               00000250  00000219
                                    <01>           CLC   TISBA,=X'0000'      SEE IF 1ST DATA FIELD IS END OF TAB. 00000251  00000220
                                    <01>           BE    ALLDONE             IF SO, BRANCH TO EXIT.               00000252  00000221
                                          LOOPIN   EQU *                                                          00000253  00000219
                                                   L     R3,MAPADDR                                               00000254  00000220
                                          *                                                                       00000255  00000221
                                          *  FIND THE BUFFER ADDRESS IN THE XREF TABLE.                           00000256  00000222
                                          *                                                                       00000257  00000223
                                                   CLI   0(R6),X'11'         CHECK FOR SBA                        00000258  00000224
                                                   BE    FNDSBA              IF SO, CONTINUE                      00000259  00000225
                                                   CLI   0(R6),X'00'         END OF MESSAGE FROM 3270?            00000260  00000226
                                                   BE    DONEIN                                                   00000261  00000227
                                          **       WTO   'MAP3270-&NAME INVALID INPUT MSG',ROUTCDE=11             00000262  00000228
                                                   WTO   'MAP3270-&NAME INVALID INPUT MSG',ROUTCDE=11             00000263  00000229
                                          **       ABEND &UCODE,,,USER                                            00000264  00000230
                                                   ABEND &UCODE,,,USER                                            00000265  00000231
                                          FNDSBA   EQU   *                                                        00000266  00000232
                                                   CLC   TISBA,1(R6)         COMPARE THE SBA.                     00000267  00000233
                                                   BE    FNDTSBA             IF SO, BRANCH                        00000268  00000234
                                                   LA    R3,TINPMAPL(,R3)    TRY NEXT ENTRY                       00000269  00000235
                                                   CLC   TISBA,=X'0000'      TEST FOR END OF TABLE                00000270  00000236
                                                   BNE   FNDSBA              IF NOT END,  TRY NEXT THIS ENTRY     00000271  00000237
                                          **       WTO   'MAP3270-&NAME INPUT MAPPING ERROR',ROUTCDE=11           00000272  00000238
                                                   WTO   'MAP3270-&NAME INPUT MAPPING ERROR',ROUTCDE=11           00000273  00000239
                                    <01>  **       ABEND &UCODE,DUMP,,USER                                        00000274  00000240

T3270     IEBUPDTX -- CORNELL EXTENDED UPDATE PROGRAM.  VERSION 1.12 (SLAC V.12/17/04)            DAY=010  03:09  01/10/11    PAGE 7


                                    <01>           ABEND &UCODE,DUMP,,USER                                        00000275  00000241
                                          FNDTSBA  EQU   *                                                        00000276  00000242
                                          *                                                                       00000277  00000243
                                          *   CALCULATE THE LENGTH OF THE DATAFIELD                               00000278  00000244
                                          *                                                                       00000279  00000245
                                                   LA    R8,3(,R6)              GET ADDR OF 1ST BYTE              00000280  00000246
                                          NXTSBA   CLI   0(R8),X'11'            IF THIS AN SBA?                   00000281  00000247
                                                   BE    GOTLEN                 YES, BRANCH                       00000282  00000248
                                                   CLI   0(R8),X'00'            IF END OF MSG?                    00000283  00000249
                                                   BE    GOTLEN                                                   00000284  00000250
                                                   LA    R8,1(,R8)              BUMP UP THE CHARACTER             00000285  00000251
                                                   B     NXTSBA                                                   00000286  00000252
                                          GOTLEN   EQU   *                                                        00000287  00000253
                                                   SR    R8,R6                  CALCULATE FLD LEN                 00000288  00000254
                                                   S     R8,=F'3'                                                 00000289  00000255
                                          *                                                                       00000290  00000256
                                                   LH    R4,TILEN               GEN LENGTH                        00000291  00000257
                                                   LTR   R4,R4                  ZERO?                             00000292  00000258
                                                   BZ    DONEIN                 YES, BRANCH                       00000293  00000259
                                                   BCTR  R4,0                                                     00000294  00000260
                                                   L     R5,TIFLD                                                 00000295  00000261
                                                   EX    R4,MVCSP                                                 00000296  00000262
                                                   LH    R4,TILEN               GEN LENGTH                        00000297  00000263
                                                   CR    R8,R4                                                    00000298  00000264
                                                   BE    LENOK                                                    00000299  00000265
                                                   BH    LENOK                                                    00000300  00000266
                                                   LR    R4,R8                                                    00000301  00000267
                                          LENOK    EQU   *                                                        00000302  00000268
                                                   BCTR  R4,R0                                                    00000303  00000269
                                                   EX    R4,MVCIN                                                 00000304  00000270
                                                   LA    R6,3(R8,R6)                                              00000305  00000271
                                                   BCT   R9,LOOPIN                                                00000306  00000272
                                                   B     DONEIN                 ONLY PROCESS LIMITED FIELDS       00000307  00000273
                                          MVCIN    MVC   0(0,R5),3(R6)                                            00000308  00000274
                                          MVCSP    MVC   0(0,R5),SPACES                                           00000309  00000275
                                          NOMATCHI EQU *                                                          00000310  00000276
                                          **       WTO   'MAP3270-&NAME MAPPING ERROR',ROUTCDE=11                 00000311  00000277
                                                   WTO   'MAP3270-&NAME MAPPING ERROR',ROUTCDE=11                 00000312  00000278
                                    <01>  **       ABEND &UCODE,DUMP,,USER                                        00000313  00000279
                                    <01>           ABEND &UCODE,DUMP,,USER                                        00000314  00000280
                                          DONEIN   EQU *                                                          00000315  00000281
                                          ****     B     ALLDONE                                                  00000316  00000282
                                          *                                                                       00000317  00000283
                                          *  MAP DATA BACK TO USER AREA                                           00000318  00000284
                                          *                                                                       00000319  00000285
                                                   LA    R9,MAXFLDS     LIMIT INPUT FIELDS                        00000320  00000286
                                                   L     R10,PANLADDR                                             00000321  00000287
                                                   LA    R2,USRTBL           GET ADDR OF USER TABLE               00000322  00000288
                                                   L     R3,MAPADDR                                               00000323  00000289
                                                   USING TINPMAP,R3                                               00000324  00000290
                                          LOOPRET  EQU *                                                          00000325  00000291
                                                   CLC   USRLEN,TILEN        COMPARE OUTLN:MAPLN                  00000326  00000292
                                                   BNE   NOMATCHR            BRANCH IF MISMATCH                   00000327  00000293
                                                   LH    R4,TILEN            GEN LENGTH                           00000328  00000294
                                                   LTR   R4,R4               ZERO?                                00000329  00000295
                                                   BZ    ALLDONE             YES, BRANCH                          00000330  00000296
                                                   BCTR  R4,R0                                                    00000331  00000297

T3270     IEBUPDTX -- CORNELL EXTENDED UPDATE PROGRAM.  VERSION 1.12 (SLAC V.12/17/04)            DAY=010  03:09  01/10/11    PAGE 8


                                                   L     R5,TIFLD                                                 00000332  00000298
                                                   EX    R4,MVCRET                                                00000333  00000299
                                                   LA    R2,4(R4,R2)                                              00000334  00000300
                                                   LA    R3,TINPMAPL(0,R3)                                        00000335  00000301
                                                   BCT   R9,LOOPRET                                               00000336  00000302
                                                   B     ALLDONE                                                  00000337  00000303
                                          MVCRET   MVC   USRFLD(0),0(R5)                                          00000338  00000304
                                          NOMATCHR EQU *                                                          00000339  00000305
                                          **       WTO   'MAP3270-&NAME MAP BACK ERROR',ROUTCDE=11                00000340  00000306
                                                   WTO   'MAP3270-&NAME MAP BACK ERROR',ROUTCDE=11                00000341  00000307
                                          **       ABEND &UCODE,,,USER                                            00000342  00000308

                                          ****                                                                    00000344  00000310

I 00008  /*  (C) COPYRIGHT 2010  CEDAR LAKE EMPORIUM LLC   ALL RIGHTS RESERVED*/
  00009  /*                                                                   */00000009
  00010  /*  THIS SOURCE CODE AS WELL AS ANY OBJECT CODE RESULTING FROM THIS  */00000010
  00011  /*  SOURCE CODE MAY BE DISTRIBUTED FREELY PROVIDED NO FEE IS CHARGED */00000011
  00012  /*  AND FOR NON-COMERCIAL PURPOSES.                                  */00000012
  00013  /*                                                                   */00000013
  00014  /*  FOR COMMERCIAL DISTRIBUTION RIGHTS, CONTACT THE COPYRIGHT OWNER. */00000014
  00015  /*                                                                   */00000015
  00016  /*********************************************************************/00000016
  00017  /*                                                                   */00000017
  00018  /* THIS IS A PROGRAM TO PROCESS A SCREEN DEFINITION FILE AND CREATES */00000018
  00019  /* A PANEL FOR THE MAP3270 SYSTEM.                                   */00000019
  00020  /*                                                                   */00000020
  00021  /* A PANEL FOR THE MAP3270 SYSTEM CONSISTS OF 2 COMPONENTS - A       */00000021
  00022  /* PHYSICAL MAP AND A USER MAP.  CONCEPTUALLY THESE ARE LIKE CICS    */00000022
  00023  /* PHYSICAL AND SYMBOLIC MAPS.  HOWEVER, THERE IS NO COMPATABILITY.  */00000023
  00024  /*                                                                   */00000024
  00025  /* THE PHYSICAL MAP IS CONSISTS OF AN INDEX, THE ACTUAL 3270 MAP     */00000025
  00026  /* AND THE CROSS REFERENCE FROM THE PHYSICAL MAP TO A USER MAP.      */00000026
  00027  /* THE USER MAP IS THE AREA THAT USER'S APPLICATION SENDS AND        */00000027
  00028  /* RECEIVES DATA FROM MAP3270 RUNTIME MODULES.                       */00000028
  00029  /*                                                                   */00000029
  00030  /* USER MAPS ARE GENERATED FOR ASSEMBLER, COBOL, AND PL/I (F).       */00000030
  00031  /* THE PHYSICAL MAP IS GENERATED AND MUST BE ASSEMLED AND LINKED.    */00000031
  00032  /*                                                                   */00000032
  00033  /* REVISION HISTORY                                                  */00000033
  00034  /* ------  --------------------------------------------------------  */00000034
  00035  /* V2.0.0  "DOWNGRADED" FROM PL/1 OPTIMIZING COMPILER TO PL/1 (F)    */00000035
  00036  /*         SEPT 2008                                                 */00000036
++C           37,          38
D 00037  /*                                                                   */00000037
D 00038  /*********************************************************************/00000038
I 00038  /* V2.1.0  ADDED SUPPORT FOR THE EXTENTED ATTRIBUTES HIGHLITE AND    */
I 00038  /*         COLOR.                                                    */
I 00038  /*         REWORKED CODE TO USE THE SELECT...WHEN  MACRO, WHICH      */
I 00038  /*         SIMULATES THE SELECT STATEMENT.                           */
I 00038  /*         AUGUST 2010                                               */
I 00038  /*                                                                   */
I 00038  /*********************************************************************/
I 00038  %INCLUDE SELECT;
  00039 1MAPGEN:PROC OPTIONS(MAIN);                                             00000039
  00040     DECLARE (PANEL,ASM,COB,PL1)                                         00000040
  00041              STREAM OUTPUT FILE;                                        00000041
  00042     DECLARE  PANEL_SEQ              FIXED DEC(9,2) INIT(1);             00000042
  00043     DECLARE  NOT_E_O_F              BIT(1) ALIGNED;                     00000043
  00044     DECLARE  NO_ATTRIB              BIT(1) ALIGNED;                     00000044
  00045     DECLARE  PANEL_NAME             CHAR(7) VARYING INIT('PANELNM');    00000045
  00046     DECLARE  MY_REC                 CHAR(80);                           00000046
  00047     DECLARE  PROCESS_STATUS         CHAR(7);                            00000047
  00048     DECLARE  SCR_IMG(26)            CHAR(82);                           00000048
  00049     DECLARE  ERROR_FOUND            BIT(1) ALIGNED INIT('0'B),          00000049
  00050              IHESARC                ENTRY(FIXED BIN(31,0)),             00000050
  00051              RETURN_CODE            FIXED BIN(31,0) ALIGNED INIT(0);    00000051
  00052 -/*********************************************************************/00000052
  00053  /*                                                                   */00000053
  00054  /* ATTR_TBL HOLDS ALL ATTRIBUTES FOR THE ATTR_CHR PARSED FROM .ATTR  */00000054
  00055  /*                                                                   */00000055
  00056  /*********************************************************************/00000056
++C           57
D 00057     DECLARE  1 ATTR_TBL(9),                                             00000057
I 00057     DECLARE  1 ATTR_REC,
  00058                2 ATTR_CHR           CHAR(1),                            00000058
  00059                2 ATTR_A             CHAR(80) VARYING,                   00000059
  00060                2 PROT               BIT(1) ALIGNED,                     00000060
  00061                2 BRIGHT             BIT(1) ALIGNED,                     00000061
  00062                2 NUM                BIT(1) ALIGNED,                     00000062
  00063                2 TITLE              BIT(1) ALIGNED,                     00000063
  00064                2 STOP_BIT           BIT(1) ALIGNED,                     00000064
++C           65,          68
D 00065                2 CUR                BIT(1) ALIGNED;                     00000065
D 00066 -/*********************************************************************/00000066
D 00067  /*                                                                   */00000067
D 00068  /* FLDS HOLDS ALL THE FIELD INFORMATION PARSED FROM THE .SCREEN      */00000068
I 00068                2 CUR                BIT(1) ALIGNED,
I 00068                2 HI_LIGHT           CHAR(1),
I 00068                2 COLOR              CHAR(3);
I 00068     DECLARE  1 ATTR_TBL(9) LIKE ATTR_REC;
I 00068 -/*********************************************************************/
