I 00068  /*                                                                   */
I 00068  /* FLDS HOLDS ALL THE FIELD INFORMATION PARSED FROM THE .SCREEN      */
I 00068  /* THE ATTRS ARE REPEATED SO THE ATTRIBUTES FOR FIELDS CAN BE        */
I 00068  /* OVERRIDEN IN THE .VARS SECTION.                                   */
  00069  /*                                                                   */00000069
  00070  /*********************************************************************/00000070
  00071     DECLARE  1 FLD(500),                                                00000071
  00072                2 FLD_ROW            FIXED BINARY(15),                   00000072
  00073                2 FLD_COL            FIXED BINARY(15),                   00000073
  00074                2 FLD_ATTR           FIXED BINARY(15),                   00000074
++C           75
D 00075                2 FLD_DATA           CHAR(80) VARYING,                   00000075
I 00075                2 FLD_REC  LIKE ATTR_REC,
I 00075                2 FLD_DATA           CHAR(80) VARYING,
I 00075                2 FLD_INT_NAME       CHAR(6),
  00076                2 FLD_NAME           CHAR(8)  VARYING;                   00000076
  00077 1/*********************************************************************/00000077
  00078  /*                                                                   */00000078
  00079  /* VARS HOLDS ALL THE FIELD INFORMATION PARSED FROM THE .VARS        */00000079
  00080  /*                                                                   */00000080
  00081  /*********************************************************************/00000081
  00082     DECLARE  1 VAR(500),                                                00000082
  00083                2 VAR_NAME           CHAR(6),                            00000083
  00084                2 VAR_FLD            CHAR(6) VARYING;                    00000084
  00085 -/*********************************************************************/00000085
  00086  /*                                                                   */00000086
  00087  /*   STATIC FIELDS DEFINED HERE                                      */00000087
  00088  /*                                                                   */00000088
  00089  /*********************************************************************/00000089
  00090     DECLARE PAGE_TITLE              CHAR(45) STATIC INIT(               00000090
  00091          'M A P 3 2 7 0   S C R E E N   C O M P I L E R'),              00000091
++C           92
D 00092             PGM_VER                 CHAR(8) STATIC INIT('V2.0.0  ');    00000092
I 00092             PGM_VER                 CHAR(8) STATIC INIT('V2.1.0  ');
  00093     DECLARE (TRUE    INITIAL('1'B),                                     00000093
  00094              FALSE   INITIAL('0'B)) BIT(1) ALIGNED STATIC,              00000094
  00095              ONE     INITIAL(1)     FIXED BIN(15)  STATIC;              00000095
  00096 1/*********************************************************************/00000096
  00097  /*                                                                   */00000097
  00098  /*   GLOBAL VARIABLES DEFINED HERE                                   */00000098
  00099  /*                                                                   */00000099
  00100  /*********************************************************************/00000100
  00101 -   DECLARE  FLD_DEF                CHAR(80) VARYING;                   00000101
  00102     DECLARE (B,ROW,COL,A,REC_CTR)   FIXED BINARY(15);                   00000102
  00103     DECLARE (FLD_CTR,M,FLD_A      ) FIXED BINARY(15);                   00000103
  00104     DECLARE VAR_CTR                 FIXED BINARY(15);                   00000104
  00105     DECLARE LBL                     CHAR(7) VARYING,                    00000105
  00106             PAGE_NO                 FIXED DEC(3,0) INIT(0),             00000106
++C          107
D 00107             DT_TIME_STAMP           CHAR(60) VARYING;                   00000107
I 00107             DT_TIME_STAMP           CHAR(60) VARYING,
I 00107             TITLE_STAMP             CHAR(50) VARYING;
  00108 1/*********************************************************************/00000108
  00109  /*                                                                   */00000109
  00110  /* READ AND LIST THE INPUT STATEMENTS.  SET UP THE PAGE HEADING      */00000110
  00111  /*    SET UP THE PAGE HEADING.  THEN THE INPUT IS LISTED AND PARSED  */00000111
  00112  /*    INPUT CONSISTS OF SECTIONS AND COMMAND.  EACH SECTION STARTS   */00000112
  00113  /*    WITH '.NAME ' IN COL 1.  VALID NAMES ARE LISTED BELOW.         */00000113
  00114  /*    COMMAND START WITH '.KW=' IN COL 1.                            */00000114
  00115  /*                                                                   */00000115
  00116  /* THERE ARE 3 SECTIONS                                              */00000116
  00117  /* 1.  ATTR - THIS IS WHERE THE ATTRIBUTES ARE DEFINED. THESE MUST   */00000117
  00118  /*     BE DEFINED BEFORE USE IN THE SCREEN SECTION.                  */00000118
  00119  /* 2.  SCREEN - THIS IS WHERE THE 'DRAWING' OF THE SCREEN IS         */00000119
  00120  /*     IS DEFINED.  EACH FIELD BEGIN WITH AN ATTRIBUTED AS DEFINED   */00000120
  00121  /*     IN THE ATTR SECTION.                                          */00000121
  00122  /* 3.  VARS - THIS OPTIONAL SECTION MAPS ANY USER DEFINED FIELD      */00000122
  00123  /*     NAME TO BE DEFINED.  THESE NAME REPLACE THE DEFAULT NAME OF   */00000123
  00124  /*     R99C99.                                                       */00000124
  00125  /*                                                                   */00000125
  00126  /* THE FOLLOWING IS A LIST OF COMMAND CURRENTLY SUPPORTED:           */00000126
  00127  /*                                                                   */00000127
  00128  /* 1.  .NAME= THIS COMMAND SETS THE NAME FOR THE PANEL.  NAME CAN    */00000128
  00129  /*     BE ANY VALID NAME 1-7 CHARACTERS.  MAP3270 GENERATES SOME     */00000129
  00130  /*     INTERNAL NAMES USING 'NAME' PLUS 1 CHARACTER.                 */00000130
  00131  /*                                                                   */00000131
  00132  /*********************************************************************/00000132
  00133                                                                         00000133
++C          134,         135
D 00134     DT_TIME_STAMP = '** GENERATED BY MAP3270 V2.0.0 ON ' ||             00000134
D 00135                     DATE || ' AT ' || TIME;                             00000135
I 00135     DT_TIME_STAMP = '** GENERATED BY MAP3270 V2.1.0 ON ' ||
I 00135                     DATE || ' AT ' || TIME;
I 00135     TITLE_STAMP = ' GENERATED BY MAP3270 V2.1.0';
  00136     CALL INITIALIZE;                                                    00000136
  00137     ON ENDPAGE(SYSPRINT)                                                00000137
  00138     BEGIN;                                                              00000138
  00139        PAGE_NO = PAGE_NO + 1;                                           00000139
  00140        PUT PAGE EDIT(PAGE_TITLE,PGM_VER,'PAGE ',PAGE_NO)                00000140
  00141                     (A,COL(100),A,COL(111),A,F(3));                     00000141
  00142        PUT SKIP(2) EDIT('INPUT STATEMENTS')(A)                          00000142
  00143                        (' LINE:   STATEMENT') (SKIP(2),A)               00000143
  00144                        ('------   ---------') (SKIP,A);                 00000144
  00145     END;                                                                00000145
  00146                                                                         00000146
  00147     SIGNAL ENDPAGE(SYSPRINT);                                           00000147
  00148     PROCESS_STATUS = '.NONE';                                           00000148
  00149     ON ENDFILE(SYSIN)                                                   00000149
  00150        NOT_E_O_F = FALSE;                                               00000150
  00151     NOT_E_O_F = TRUE;                                                   00000151
  00152 1/*********************************************************************/00000152
  00153  /*                                                                   */00000153
  00154  /*  PPPP    AAA    SSS    SSS     1                                  */00000154
  00155  /*  P   P  A   A  S      S       11                                  */00000155
  00156  /*  PPPP   A   A  S      S        1                                  */00000156
  00157  /*  P      AAAAA   SSS    SSS     1                                  */00000157
  00158  /*  P      A   A      S      S    1                                  */00000158
  00159  /*  P      A   A      S      S    1                                  */00000159
  00160  /*  P      A   A   SSS    SSS   11111                                */00000160
  00161  /*                                                                   */00000161
  00162  /*  READ AND PRINT THE INPUT STATEMENTS                              */00000162
  00163  /*    DETERMINE THE SECTION AND PASS TO THE APPROPRIATE SECTION      */00000163
  00164  /*    FOR PROCESSING.                                                */00000164
  00165  /*    COMMANDS ARE PARSED AND PROCESSED IMMEDIATELY.                 */00000165
  00166  /*                                                                   */00000166
  00167  /*********************************************************************/00000167
  00168     GET EDIT(MY_REC) (A(80));                                           00000168
  00169     DO WHILE (NOT_E_O_F);                                               00000169
  00170        REC_CTR = REC_CTR + 1;                                           00000170
  00171        PUT SKIP EDIT(REC_CTR,':',MY_REC) (F(5),A(4),A);                 00000171
  00172        IF SUBSTR(MY_REC,1,5) = '.ATTR' THEN                             00000172
  00173        DO;                                                              00000173
++C          174,         203
D 00174           PROCESS_STATUS = '.ATTR  ';                                   00000174
D 00175           A = 0;                                                        00000175
D 00176           ATTRLIST='';                                                  00000176
D 00177        END;                                                             00000177
D 00178        ELSE                                                             00000178
D 00179        IF SUBSTR(MY_REC,1,7) = '.SCREEN' THEN                           00000179
D 00180        DO;                                                              00000180
D 00181           PROCESS_STATUS = '.SCREEN';                                   00000181
D 00182           B = 0;                                                        00000182
D 00183           FLD_DEF = '';                                                 00000183
D 00184           FLD_A = 0;                                                    00000184
D 00185           ROW = 0;                                                      00000185
D 00186           COL = 0;                                                      00000186
D 00187           NO_ATTRIB = TRUE;                                             00000187
D 00188        END;                                                             00000188
D 00189        ELSE                                                             00000189
D 00190        IF SUBSTR(MY_REC,1,5) = '.VARS' THEN                             00000190
D 00191        DO;                                                              00000191
D 00192           PROCESS_STATUS = '.VARS  ';                                   00000192
D 00193        END;                                                             00000193
D 00194        ELSE                                                             00000194
D 00195        IF SUBSTR(MY_REC,1,6) = '.NAME=' THEN                            00000195
D 00196        BEGIN;                                                           00000196
D 00197           DCL I FIXED BINARY(15);                                       00000197
D 00198           PANEL_NAME = SUBSTR(MY_REC,7,7);                              00000198
D 00199           I = INDEX(PANEL_NAME,' ');                                    00000199
D 00200           IF I > 0 THEN PANEL_NAME=SUBSTR(PANEL_NAME,1,I-1);            00000200
D 00201        END;                                                             00000201
D 00202        ELSE                                                             00000202
D 00203           CALL PROCESS_MYREC;                                           00000203
I 00203             PROCESS_STATUS = '.ATTR  ';
I 00203             A = 0;
I 00203             ATTRLIST='';
I 00203        END;
I 00203        ELSE
I 00203        IF SUBSTR(MY_REC,1,7) = '.SCREEN' THEN
I 00203        DO;
I 00203             PROCESS_STATUS = '.SCREEN';
I 00203             B = 0;
I 00203             FLD_DEF = '';
I 00203             FLD_A = 0;
I 00203             ROW = 0;
I 00203             COL = 0;
I 00203             NO_ATTRIB = TRUE;
I 00203        END;
I 00203        ELSE
I 00203        IF SUBSTR(MY_REC,1,5) = '.VARS' THEN
I 00203             PROCESS_STATUS = '.VARS  ';
I 00203        ELSE
I 00203        IF SUBSTR(MY_REC,1,6) = '.NAME=' THEN
I 00203        BEGIN;
I 00203             DCL I FIXED BINARY(15);
I 00203             PANEL_NAME = SUBSTR(MY_REC,7,7);
I 00203             I = INDEX(PANEL_NAME,' ');
I 00203             IF I > 0 THEN PANEL_NAME=SUBSTR(PANEL_NAME,1,I-1);
I 00203        END;
I 00203        ELSE
I 00203        IF SUBSTR(MY_REC,1,1) = '*' THEN; /* DO NOT PROCESS COMMENT */
I 00203        ELSE
I 00203             CALL PROCESS_MYREC;
  00204        GET EDIT(MY_REC) (A(80));                                        00000204
  00205     END; /* OF LOOP */                                                  00000205
  00206     IF FLD_DEF ^= '' THEN             /* IF WE STILL HAVE DATA      */  00000206
  00207     DO;                                                                 00000207
  00208        CALL SAVE_FIELD(ONE);          /* WRITE DATA FOR LAST FIELD  */  00000208
  00209        FLD_DEF = '';                                                    00000209
  00210     END;                                                                00000210
  00211 1/*********************************************************************/00000211
  00212  /*                                                                   */00000212
  00213  /*  PPPP    AAA    SSS    SSS    222                                 */00000213
  00214  /*  P   P  A   A  S      S      2   2                                */00000214
  00215  /*  PPPP   A   A  S      S          2                                */00000215
  00216  /*  P      AAAAA   SSS    SSS      2                                 */00000216
  00217  /*  P      A   A      S      S    2                                  */00000217
  00218  /*  P      A   A      S      S   2                                   */00000218
  00219  /*  P      A   A   SSS    SSS   22222                                */00000219
  00220  /*                                                                   */00000220
  00221  /*  SET UP THE PAGE HEADINGS FOR THE SECOND PASS.                    */00000221
  00222  /*    DURING THE SECOND PASS, SOME ERROR CHECKING IS PERFORMED TO    */00000222
++C          223
D 00223  /*    ENSURE THE MAP DOES NOT VIOLATE HARDARE PROTOCOL.              */00000223
I 00223  /*    ENSURE THE MAP DOES NOT VIOLATE HARDWARE PROTOCOL.             */
  00224  /*                                                                   */00000224
  00225  /*   -THE SCREEN IMAGE WILL BE PRINTED.                              */00000225
  00226  /*   -THE INPUT ATTRIBUTES AND THE GENERATED ATTRIBUTES WILL BE      */00000226
  00227  /*    PRINTED.  THIS SHOWS WHAT WAS SPECIFIED VS WHAT WILL BE        */00000227
  00228  /*    GENERATED.                                                     */00000228
  00229  /*   -ALL VARIABLE NAMES ARE CORRECT AND EXIST                       */00000229
  00230  /*   -THE MACROS TO DEFINE THE PHYSICAL MAP (NOT RELATED TO CICS)    */00000230
  00231  /*   -THE USER INTERFACE(S) FOR ASSEMBLER, COBOL AND PL1 PROGRAMS.   */00000231
  00232  /*                                                                   */00000232
  00233  /*********************************************************************/00000233
  00234                                                                         00000234
  00235     ON ENDPAGE(SYSPRINT)                                                00000235
  00236     BEGIN;                                                              00000236
  00237        PAGE_NO = PAGE_NO + 1;                                           00000237
  00238        PUT PAGE EDIT(PAGE_TITLE,'PANEL ',PANEL_NAME,                    00000238
  00239                      PGM_VER,'PAGE ',PAGE_NO)                           00000239
  00240                     (A,COL(70),A,A,COL(100),A,COL(111),A,F(3));         00000240
  00241        PUT SKIP(2);                                                     00000241
  00242     END;                                                                00000242
  00243     SIGNAL ENDPAGE(SYSPRINT);                                           00000243
  00244                                                                         00000244
  00245        /*  PRINT THE SCREEN IMAGE */                                    00000245
  00246                                                                         00000246
  00247     PUT SKIP EDIT('* ', (29)'>',                                        00000247
  00248                   ' SAMPLE SCREEN LAYOUT ',                             00000248
  00249                   (29)'<') (X(10),(4)A);                                00000249
  00250     PUT SKIP EDIT('*') (X(10),A);                                       00000250
  00251     PUT SKIP EDIT('* ----+----1----+----2----+----3',                   00000251
  00252                     '----+----4----+----5----+----6',                   00000252
  00253                     '----+----7----+----8') (X(10),(3)A);               00000253
  00254     DO I = 1 TO B;                                                      00000254
  00255        PUT SKIP EDIT(I,SCR_IMG(I)) (F(9),X(1),A);                       00000255
  00256     END;                                                                00000256
  00257     PUT SKIP EDIT('* ----+----1----+----2----+----3',                   00000257
  00258                     '----+----4----+----5----+----6',                   00000258
  00259                     '----+----7----+----8') (X(10),(3)A);               00000259
  00260                                                                         00000260
  00261        /*  PRINT THE ATTRIBUTE LIST */                                  00000261
  00262                                                                         00000262
  00263     PUT SKIP(2) EDIT('CHAR ATTR')(X(10),A);                             00000263
  00264     DO I = 1 TO A;                                                      00000264
++C          265,         285
D 00265        PUT SKIP EDIT(ATTR_TBL(I).ATTR_CHR,ATTR_A(I)) (X(12),A,X(2),A);  00000265
D 00266        PUT SKIP EDIT(' ') (X(15),A);                                    00000266
D 00267        IF ATTR_TBL(I).TITLE THEN          /* OVERRIDE SOME ATTRS  */    00000267
D 00268        DO;                                /* FOR TYPE TITLE       */    00000268
D 00269           PUT EDIT('TITLE ') (A);                                       00000269
D 00270           ATTR_TBL(I).TITLE = TRUE;                                     00000270
D 00271           ATTR_TBL(I).PROT = TRUE;                                      00000271
D 00272        /**ATTR_TBL(I).BRIGHT = FALSE;  DO NOT OVERRIDE BRIGHT   **/     00000272
D 00273           ATTR_TBL(I).NUM = FALSE;                                      00000273
D 00274           ATTR_TBL(I).STOP_BIT = FALSE;                                 00000274
D 00275           ATTR_TBL(I).CUR = FALSE;                                      00000275
D 00276        END;                                                             00000276
D 00277        IF ATTR_TBL(I).NUM THEN PUT EDIT('NUM ') (A);                    00000277
D 00278        ELSE PUT EDIT('ALPHA ') (A);                                     00000278
D 00279        IF ATTR_TBL(I).PROT THEN PUT EDIT('PROT ') (A);                  00000279
D 00280        ELSE PUT EDIT('UNPROT ') (A);                                    00000280
D 00281        IF ATTR_TBL(I).BRIGHT THEN PUT EDIT('BRIGHT ') (A);              00000281
D 00282        ELSE PUT EDIT('NORMAL ') (A);                                    00000282
D 00283        IF ATTR_TBL(I).CUR  THEN PUT EDIT('CUR ') (A);                   00000283
D 00284        IF ATTR_TBL(I).STOP_BIT THEN PUT EDIT('STOP ') (A);              00000284
D 00285     END;                                                                00000285
I 00285        PUT SKIP EDIT(ATTR_TBL(I).ATTR_CHR,
I 00285                      ATTR_TBL(I).ATTR_A) (X(12),A,X(2),A);
I 00285        PUT SKIP EDIT(' ') (X(15),A);
I 00285        CALL PRINT_ATTR(ATTR_TBL(I));
I 00285     END; /* OF LOOP */
  00286                                                                         00000286
  00287        /*  VERIFY THE FIELDS LIST  */                                   00000287
  00288                                                                         00000288
  00289     DECLARE VAR_FLD_MATCH  BIT(1) ALIGNED;                              00000289
  00290     DO I=1 TO VAR_CTR;                                                  00000290
  00291       VAR_FLD_MATCH = FALSE;                                            00000291
  00292       DO J=1 TO FLD_CTR;                                                00000292
  00293          IF VAR(I).VAR_NAME = FLD(J).FLD_NAME THEN                      00000293
  00294          DO;                                                            00000294
  00295             VAR_FLD_MATCH = TRUE;                                       00000295
++C          296
D 00296             IF ATTR_TBL(FLD(J).FLD_ATTR).TITLE THEN                     00000296
I 00296         /** IF ATTR_TBL(FLD(J).FLD_ATTR).TITLE THEN
  00297             DO;                                                         00000297
  00298                PUT SKIP EDIT('*** VAR ',VAR(I).VAR_NAME,                00000298
  00299                              ' IS LISTED IN THE .VAR SECTION. THE ',    00000299
  00300                              'FIELD IS A TITLE. NAME NOT ALLOWED.')     00000300
  00301                              (A,A,A,A);                                 00000301
  00302                ERROR_FOUND = TRUE;                                      00000302
  00303             END;                                                        00000303
  00304             ELSE                                                        00000304
++C          305
D 00305                FLD(J).FLD_NAME = VAR(I).VAR_FLD;                        00000305
I 00305         **/    FLD(J).FLD_NAME = VAR(I).VAR_FLD;
  00306          END;                                                           00000306
  00307       END;                                                              00000307
  00308       IF VAR_FLD_MATCH  THEN ;                                          00000308
  00309       ELSE                                                              00000309
  00310       DO;                                                               00000310
  00311          PUT SKIP EDIT('*** VAR ',VAR(I).VAR_NAME,' IS LISTED IN THE',  00000311
  00312                        ' .VAR SECTION BUT IS NOT DEFINED ***')          00000312
  00313                       (A,A,A,A);                                        00000313
  00314          ERROR_FOUND = TRUE;                                            00000314
  00315       END;                                                              00000315
  00316     END;                                                                00000316
  00317                                                                         00000317
  00318        /*  PRINT THE FIELDS LIST  */                                    00000318
  00319                                                                         00000319
  00320     PUT SKIP(2) EDIT('  ROW  COL NAME')(X(5),A);                        00000320
  00321     DO I=1 TO FLD_CTR;                                                  00000321
++C          322,         324
D 00322        IF ^ATTR_TBL(FLD(I).FLD_ATTR).TITLE THEN                         00000322
D 00323        PUT SKIP EDIT(FLD(I).FLD_ROW,FLD(I).FLD_COL,                     00000323
D 00324                      FLD(I).FLD_NAME) (X(5),F(5),F(5),X(1),A(8));       00000324
I 00324    /*  IF ^ATTR_TBL(FLD(I).FLD_ATTR).TITLE THEN  */
I 00324        DO;
I 00324           PUT SKIP EDIT(FLD(I).FLD_ROW,FLD(I).FLD_COL,
I 00324                         FLD(I).FLD_NAME) (X(5),F(5),F(5),X(1),A(8));
I 00324           CALL PRINT_ATTR(FLD(I).FLD_REC);
I 00324        /* PUT SKIP DATA(FLD(I)); */
I 00324        END;
  00325     END;                                                                00000325
  00326 0   CALL WRITE_PANEL;                                                   00000326
  00327     CALL WRITE_MAPPING;                                                 00000327
  00328     PUT FILE(PANEL) EDIT('END',PANEL_SEQ)                               00000328
  00329                                     (COL(10),A,COL(73),P'999999V99');   00000329
  00330     PANEL_SEQ=PANEL_SEQ+1;                                              00000330
  00331     CALL WRITE_ASM;                                                     00000331
  00332     CALL WRITE_COB;                                                     00000332
  00333     CALL WRITE_PL1;                                                     00000333
  00334     /*                                                                  00000334
  00335       END OF EXECUTION - SET RETURN CODE                                00000335
  00336     */                                                                  00000336
  00337     IF ERROR_FOUND THEN RETURN_CODE=16;                                 00000337
  00338     PUT SKIP(3) EDIT('END OF MAPGEN EXECUTION - RETURN CODE IS ',       00000338
  00339                      RETURN_CODE) (A,P'9999');                          00000339
  00340     CALL IHESARC(RETURN_CODE);                                          00000340
++C          341
D 00341 1INITIALIZE:PROC;                                                       00000341
I 00341  /***************** END OF MAINLINE ****************/
I 00341 1/*********************************************************************/
I 00341  /*                                                                   */
I 00341  /*   THIS IS THE INITIALIZATION.  ALL THE FLD (FIELD) AND ATTRS ARE  */
I 00341  /*   INITIALIZED.                                                    */
I 00341  /*                                                                   */
I 00341  /*********************************************************************/
I 00341  INITIALIZE:PROC;
  00342     FLD_CTR = 0;                                                        00000342
  00343     FLD(*).FLD_ROW = 0;                                                 00000343
  00344     FLD(*).FLD_COL = 0;                                                 00000344
  00345     FLD(*).FLD_ATTR = 0;                                                00000345
  00346     FLD(*).FLD_DATA='';                                                 00000346
++I          347
            FLD(*).FLD_NAME='';                                                 00000347
I 00347     FLD(*).FLD_INT_NAME=(6)' ';
I 00347     FLD(*).ATTR_CHR = ' ';
I 00347     FLD(*).ATTR_A = '';
I 00347     FLD(*).PROT = FALSE;
I 00347     FLD(*).NUM = FALSE;
I 00347     FLD(*).BRIGHT = FALSE;
I 00347     FLD(*).TITLE = FALSE;
I 00347     FLD(*).STOP_BIT = FALSE;
I 00347     FLD(*).CUR = FALSE;
I 00347     FLD(*).HI_LIGHT = ' ';
I 00347     FLD(*).COLOR = ' ';
  00348     VAR_CTR = 0;                                                        00000348
  00349     VAR(*).VAR_NAME=' ';                                                00000349
  00350     VAR(*).VAR_FLD='';                                                  00000350
  00351     REC_CTR = 0;                                                        00000351
  00352     ATTR_TBL(*).ATTR_CHR = ' ';                                         00000352
  00353     ATTR_TBL(*).ATTR_A = '';                                            00000353
  00354     ATTR_TBL(*).PROT = FALSE;                                           00000354
  00355     ATTR_TBL(*).NUM = FALSE;                                            00000355
  00356     ATTR_TBL(*).BRIGHT = FALSE;                                         00000356
  00357     ATTR_TBL(*).TITLE = FALSE;                                          00000357
  00358     ATTR_TBL(*).STOP_BIT = FALSE;                                       00000358
++I          359
            ATTR_TBL(*).CUR = FALSE;                                            00000359
I 00359     ATTR_TBL(*).HI_LIGHT = ' ';
I 00359     ATTR_TBL(*).COLOR = ' ';
  00360  END INITIALIZE;                                                        00000360
  00361 1/*********************************************************************/00000361
  00362  /*                                                                   */00000362
  00363  /*   THIS IS THE MAIN INPUT PROCESS CONTROL.  NOTE THAT THERE IS     */00000363
  00364  /*   NO ENFORCMENT OF THE SEQUENCE OF THE INPUT SECTIONS.            */00000364
  00365  /*   THE CORRECT SEQUENCE IS .ATTR, .SCREEN, .VARS                   */00000365
  00366  /*                                                                   */00000366
  00367  /*********************************************************************/00000367
  00368 0PROCESS_MYREC:PROC;                                                    00000368
  00369                                                                         00000369
  00370    IF PROCESS_STATUS = '.ATTR  '        THEN CALL PROCESS_ATTRIBUTE;    00000370
  00371    ELSE IF  PROCESS_STATUS = '.SCREEN'  THEN CALL PROCESS_SCREEN;       00000371
  00372    ELSE IF  PROCESS_STATUS = '.VARS  '  THEN CALL PROCESS_VARS;         00000372
  00373                                                                         00000373
  00374  END PROCESS_MYREC;                                                     00000374
  00375                                                                         00000375
  00376  PROCESS_ATTRIBUTE:PROC;                                                00000376
  00377     DECLARE ATTRIB              CHAR(1);                                00000377
  00378     DECLARE (TEMP,TEMP2)        CHAR(78) VARYING;                       00000378
  00379     DECLARE I                   FIXED BINARY(15);                       00000379
  00380     I = 3;                                                              00000380
  00381     DO WHILE (I<80 & SUBSTR(MY_REC,I,1)^=' ');                          00000381
  00382        I=I+1;                                                           00000382
  00383     END;                                                                00000383
  00384     TEMP,TEMP2 = SUBSTR(MY_REC,3,I-3);                                  00000384
  00385     A = A + 1;                                                          00000385
++C          386
D 00386     ATTR_A(A) = '('||TEMP2||')';                                        00000386
I 00386     ATTR_TBL(A).ATTR_A = '('||TEMP2||')';
  00387     ATTR_TBL(A).ATTR_CHR = SUBSTR(MY_REC,1,1);                          00000387
  00388     I=1;                                                                00000388
  00389     DO WHILE(I>0);                                                      00000389
  00390        I=INDEX(TEMP,',');                                               00000390
  00391        IF I>0 THEN                                                      00000391
  00392        DO;                                                              00000392
++C          393,         428
D 00393           CALL CHECK_ATTR(SUBSTR(TEMP,1,I-1));                          00000393
D 00394           TEMP=SUBSTR(TEMP,I+1);                                        00000394
D 00395        END;                                                             00000395
D 00396        ELSE                                                             00000396
D 00397           CALL CHECK_ATTR(TEMP);                                        00000397
D 00398     END;                                                                00000398
D 00399  CHECK_ATTR:PROC(AT);                                                   00000399
D 00400     DCL AT CHAR(*) VARYING;                                             00000400
D 00401     IF AT = 'TITLE' THEN ATTR_TBL(A).TITLE = TRUE;                      00000401
D 00402     ELSE                                                                00000402
D 00403     IF AT = 'BRIGHT' THEN ATTR_TBL(A).BRIGHT = TRUE;                    00000403
D 00404     ELSE                                                                00000404
D 00405     IF AT = 'NORMAL' THEN ATTR_TBL(A).BRIGHT = FALSE;                   00000405
D 00406     ELSE                                                                00000406
D 00407     IF AT = 'NUM' THEN ATTR_TBL(A).NUM = TRUE;                          00000407
D 00408     ELSE                                                                00000408
D 00409     IF AT = 'ALPHA' THEN ATTR_TBL(A).NUM = FALSE;                       00000409
D 00410     ELSE                                                                00000410
D 00411     IF AT = 'PROT' THEN ATTR_TBL(A).PROT = TRUE;                        00000411
D 00412     ELSE                                                                00000412
D 00413     IF AT = 'UNPROT' THEN ATTR_TBL(A).PROT = FALSE;                     00000413
D 00414     ELSE                                                                00000414
D 00415     IF AT = 'CUR' THEN ATTR_TBL(A).CUR = TRUE;                          00000415
D 00416     ELSE                                                                00000416
D 00417     IF AT = 'STOP' THEN ATTR_TBL(A).STOP_BIT = TRUE;                    00000417
D 00418     ELSE                                                                00000418
D 00419     DO;                                                                 00000419
D 00420        PUT SKIP EDIT('*** INVALID ATTRIBUTE ''',AT,''' DETECTED ***')   00000420
D 00421                     (A,A,A);                                            00000421
D 00422        ERROR_FOUND = TRUE;                                              00000422
D 00423     END;                                                                00000423
D 00424  END CHECK_ATTR;                                                        00000424
D 00425  END PROCESS_ATTRIBUTE;                                                 00000425
D 00426 1/****************************************************************/     00000426
D 00427                                                                         00000427
D 00428  PROCESS_VARS:PROC;                                                     00000428
I 00428           CALL CHECK_ATTR(SUBSTR(TEMP,1,I-1),ATTR_TBL(A));
I 00428           TEMP=SUBSTR(TEMP,I+1);
I 00428        END;
I 00428        ELSE
I 00428           CALL CHECK_ATTR(TEMP,ATTR_TBL(A));
I 00428     END;
I 00428     IF ATTR_TBL(A).TITLE THEN          /* OVERRIDE SOME ATTRS  */
I 00428     DO;                                /* FOR TYPE TITLE       */
I 00428        ATTR_TBL(A).TITLE = TRUE;
I 00428        ATTR_TBL(A).PROT = TRUE;
I 00428     /**ATTR_TBL(A).BRIGHT = FALSE;  DO NOT OVERRIDE BRIGHT   **/
I 00428        ATTR_TBL(A).NUM = FALSE;
I 00428        ATTR_TBL(A).STOP_BIT = FALSE;
I 00428        ATTR_TBL(A).CUR = FALSE;
I 00428     END;
I 00428   /*PUT SKIP DATA(A,ATTR_TBL(A));*/
I 00428  END PROCESS_ATTRIBUTE;
I 00428 0/*********************************************************************/
I 00428  /*                                                                   */
I 00428  /*   THIS ROUTINE PROCESSES ALL OF THE ATTRIBUTES.  THEY CAN BE      */
I 00428  /*   SPECIFIED IN THE .ATTR OR .VARS SECTION.  THE MAP DEFAULTS      */
I 00428  /*   CAN BE SET IN THE .ATTR AND OVERRIDEN FOR EACH FIELD IN THE     */
I 00428  /*   .VARS SECTION.                                                  */
I 00428  /*                                                                   */
I 00428  /*********************************************************************/
I 00428 0CHECK_ATTR:PROC(AT,ATTR);
I 00428     DCL AT CHAR(*) VARYING,
I 00428         ATTR LIKE ATTR_REC;
I 00428     SELECT (AT);
I 00428       WHEN ('TITLE')     ATTR.TITLE = TRUE;
I 00428       WHEN ('BRIGHT')    ATTR.BRIGHT = TRUE;
I 00428       WHEN ('NORMAL')    ATTR.BRIGHT = FALSE;
I 00428       WHEN ('NUM')       ATTR.NUM = TRUE;
I 00428       WHEN ('ALPHA')     ATTR.NUM = FALSE;
I 00428       WHEN ('PROT')      ATTR.PROT = TRUE;
I 00428       WHEN ('UNPROT')    ATTR.PROT = FALSE;
I 00428       WHEN ('CUR')       ATTR.CUR = TRUE;
I 00428       WHEN ('STOP')      ATTR.STOP_BIT = TRUE;
I 00428       WHEN ('HIDEF')     ATTR.HI_LIGHT = 'D';
I 00428       WHEN ('BLINK')     ATTR.HI_LIGHT = 'B';
I 00428       WHEN ('REVERSE')   ATTR.HI_LIGHT = 'R';
I 00428       WHEN ('ULINE')     ATTR.HI_LIGHT = 'U';
I 00428                                            /* COLOR CODE */
I 00428       WHEN ('DEFAULT')   ATTR.COLOR = 'DEF';  /* 40 */
I 00428       WHEN ('BLUE')      ATTR.COLOR = 'BLU';  /* F1 */
I 00428       WHEN ('RED')       ATTR.COLOR = 'RED';  /* F2 */
I 00428       WHEN ('PINK')      ATTR.COLOR = 'PNK';  /* F3 */
I 00428       WHEN ('GREEN')     ATTR.COLOR = 'GRN';  /* F4 */
I 00428       WHEN ('TURQ')      ATTR.COLOR = 'TUR';  /* F5 */
I 00428       WHEN ('YELLOW')    ATTR.COLOR = 'YEL';  /* F6 */
I 00428       WHEN ('WHITE')     ATTR.COLOR = 'WHI';  /* F7 */
I 00428       WHEN ('BLACK')     ATTR.COLOR = 'BLK';  /* F8 */
I 00428       WHEN ('DBLUE')     ATTR.COLOR = 'DBL';  /* F9 */
I 00428       WHEN ('ORANGE')    ATTR.COLOR = 'ORA';  /* FA */
I 00428       WHEN ('PURPLE')    ATTR.COLOR = 'PUR';  /* FB */
I 00428       WHEN ('PGREEN')    ATTR.COLOR = 'PGR';  /* FC */
I 00428       WHEN ('PTURQ')     ATTR.COLOR = 'PTQ';  /* FD */
I 00428       WHEN ('GREY')      ATTR.COLOR = 'GRY';  /* FE */
I 00428       WHEN ('NEUTRAL')   ATTR.COLOR = 'NEU';  /* FF */
I 00428     OTHERWISE
I 00428     DO;
I 00428        PUT SKIP EDIT('*** INVALID ATTRIBUTE ''',AT,''' DETECTED ***')
I 00428                     (A,A,A);
I 00428        ERROR_FOUND = TRUE;
I 00428     END;
I 00428   /*PUT SKIP LIST(ATTR.COLOR);*/
I 00428  END CHECK_ATTR;
I 00428 1/*********************************************************************/
I 00428  /*                                                                   */
I 00428  /*   THIS ROUTINE PROCESSES ALL OF THE VARS LINES.  THE GENERAL      */
I 00428  /*   FORMAT IS:                                                      */
I 00428  /*   R99C99=NAME123,ATTR,ATTR COMMENTS                               */
I 00428  /*   R99C99 IS THE NAME GENERATED BY MAP3270.                        */
I 00428  /*   NAME IS 1 TO 7 CHARACTER NAME ASSIGNED BY THE PROGRAMMER.       */
I 00428  /*   ,ATTR IS AN ADDITIONAL OR OVERRIDE ATTRIBUTE FOR THIS FIELD.    */
I 00428  /*         0 OR MORE ATTRS MAY BE SPECIFIED.  THE LIST ENDS WHEN     */
I 00428  /*         THE FIRST SPACE IS ENCOUNTERED.                           */
I 00428  /*                                                                   */
I 00428  /*********************************************************************/
I 00428
I 00428  PROCESS_VARS:PROC;
I 00428     DECLARE (MATCH_INI_NAME,MATCH_NAME) BIT(1) ALIGNED;
I 00428     DECLARE (TEMP,TEMP2)        CHAR(78) VARYING;
I 00428     DECLARE (I,COMMA,BLANK,NST,NLEN) FIXED BINARY(15) ALIGNED;
I 00428     DECLARE (FLD_NAME_PTR)           FIXED BINARY(15) ALIGNED;
  00429     IF SUBSTR(MY_REC,7,1)^='=' THEN                                     00000429
  00430     DO;                                                                 00000430
  00431        PUT SKIP EDIT('*** EXPECTED ''='' NOT FOUND ***') (A);           00000431
  00432        ERROR_FOUND = TRUE;                                              00000432
  00433        RETURN;                                                          00000433
  00434     END;                                                                00000434
++C          435
D 00435     IF SUBSTR(MY_REC,14,2)^=(2)' ' THEN                                 00000435
I 00435     COMMA=INDEX(MY_REC,',');
I 00435     BLANK=INDEX(MY_REC,' ');
I 00435     NST=8;
I 00435     SELECT (TRUE);
I 00435        WHEN (COMMA=0 & BLANK>0)  /* NO COMMA FOUND BUT A BLANK WAS */
I 00435            NLEN=BLANK-NST;
I 00435        WHEN (BLANK=0 & COMMA>0)    /* NO BLANK FOUND BUT A COMMA WAS */
I 00435            NLEN=COMMA-NST;
I 00435        WHEN (COMMA<BLANK)    /* ATTR STARTS BEFORE BLANK       */
I 00435            NLEN=COMMA-NST;
I 00435        WHEN (COMMA>BLANK)    /* BLANK APPEARS BEFORE COMMA     */
I 00435            NLEN=BLANK-NST;
I 00435        OTHERWISE
I 00435        DO;
I 00435           PUT SKIP EDIT('*** LOGIC ERROR 1 ***') (A);
I 00435           ERROR_FOUND = TRUE;
I 00435           RETURN;
I 00435        END;
I 00435     IF NLEN>7 THEN
  00436     DO;                                                                 00000436
  00437        PUT SKIP EDIT('*** INCORRECT FIELD LENGTHS ***') (A);            00000437
  00438        ERROR_FOUND = TRUE;                                              00000438
  00439        RETURN;                                                          00000439
  00440     END;                                                                00000440
  00441     DO I = 1 TO VAR_CTR;                                                00000441
++C          442,         472
D 00442         IF VAR(I).VAR_NAME = SUBSTR(MY_REC,1,6) THEN                    00000442
D 00443         DO;                                                             00000443
D 00444             PUT SKIP EDIT('*** DUPLICATE VAR NAME ',VAR(I).VAR_NAME,    00000444
D 00445                          ' ***') (A,A,A);                               00000445
D 00446             ERROR_FOUND = TRUE;                                         00000446
D 00447             RETURN;                                                     00000447
D 00448         END;                                                            00000448
D 00449         IF VAR(I).VAR_FLD = SUBSTR(MY_REC,8,6) THEN                     00000449
D 00450         DO;                                                             00000450
D 00451             PUT SKIP EDIT('*** DUPLICATE VAR FIELD ',                   00000451
D 00452                           SUBSTR(MY_REC,8,6),' ***') (A,A,A);           00000452
D 00453             ERROR_FOUND = TRUE;                                         00000453
D 00454             RETURN;                                                     00000454
D 00455         END;                                                            00000455
D 00456     END;                                                                00000456
D 00457     VAR_CTR=VAR_CTR+1;                                                  00000457
D 00458     VAR(VAR_CTR).VAR_NAME=SUBSTR(MY_REC,1,6);                           00000458
D 00459     VAR(VAR_CTR).VAR_FLD=SUBSTR(MY_REC,8,6);                            00000459
D 00460     I=INDEX(VAR(VAR_CTR).VAR_FLD,' ');                                  00000460
D 00461     IF I=0 THEN ;               /* NAME HAS NO SPACES - IT IS OK */     00000461
D 00462     ELSE                                                                00000462
D 00463     IF I=1 THEN                                                         00000463
D 00464     DO;                                                                 00000464
D 00465        PUT SKIP EDIT('*** USER DEFINES NAME IS BLANK ***') (A);         00000465
D 00466        ERROR_FOUND = TRUE;                                              00000466
D 00467        RETURN;                                                          00000467
D 00468     END;                                                                00000468
D 00469     ELSE                                                                00000469
D 00470         VAR(VAR_CTR).VAR_FLD = SUBSTR(VAR(VAR_CTR).VAR_FLD,1,I-1);      00000470
D 00471   /*PUT SKIP LIST ('INPUT=>',VAR_CTR,VAR(VAR_CTR).VAR_NAME,             00000471
D 00472                                ''''||VAR(VAR_CTR).VAR_FLD||'''');*/     00000472
I 00472        IF VAR(I).VAR_NAME = SUBSTR(MY_REC,1,6) THEN
I 00472        DO;
I 00472            PUT SKIP EDIT('*** DUPLICATE VAR NAME ',VAR(I).VAR_NAME,
I 00472                         ' ***') (A,A,A);
I 00472            ERROR_FOUND = TRUE;
I 00472            RETURN;
I 00472        END;
I 00472        IF VAR(I).VAR_FLD = SUBSTR(MY_REC,NST,NLEN) THEN
I 00472        DO;
I 00472            PUT SKIP EDIT('*** DUPLICATE VAR FIELD ',
I 00472                          SUBSTR(MY_REC,NST,NLEN),' ***') (A,A,A);
I 00472            ERROR_FOUND = TRUE;
I 00472            RETURN;
I 00472        END;
I 00472     END;
I 00472     MATCH_INI_NAME=FALSE;
I 00472     MATCH_NAME=FALSE;
I 00472     FLD_NAME_PTR=0;
I 00472     DO WHILE(FLD_NAME_PTR<FLD_CTR & ^MATCH_INI_NAME);
I 00472        FLD_NAME_PTR=FLD_NAME_PTR+1;
I 00472        MATCH_INI_NAME =
I 00472              (FLD(FLD_NAME_PTR).FLD_INT_NAME = SUBSTR(MY_REC,1,6));
I 00472     END;
I 00472     IF MATCH_INI_NAME THEN ;
I 00472     ELSE
I 00472     DO;
I 00472        PUT SKIP EDIT('*** INTERNAL NAME NOT DEFINED ',
I 00472                      SUBSTR(MY_REC,1,6),
I 00472                      ' ***') (A,A,A);
I 00472        ERROR_FOUND = TRUE;
I 00472        RETURN;
I 00472     END;
I 00472     VAR_CTR=VAR_CTR+1;
I 00472     VAR(VAR_CTR).VAR_NAME=SUBSTR(MY_REC,1,6);
I 00472     VAR(VAR_CTR).VAR_FLD=SUBSTR(MY_REC,NST,NLEN);
I 00472     I=INDEX(VAR(VAR_CTR).VAR_FLD,' ');
I 00472     IF I=0 THEN ;               /* NAME HAS NO SPACES - IT IS OK */
I 00472     ELSE
I 00472     IF I=1 THEN
I 00472     DO;
I 00472        PUT SKIP EDIT('*** USER DEFINED NAME IS BLANK ***') (A);
I 00472        ERROR_FOUND = TRUE;
I 00472        RETURN;
I 00472     END;
I 00472     IF COMMA=0 | BLANK<COMMA THEN    /* NO ATTRIBUTES */
I 00472         RETURN;
I 00472     TEMP,TEMP2 = SUBSTR(MY_REC,NST+NLEN+1);  /* GET RID OF NAME */
I 00472     BLANK=INDEX(TEMP,' ');
I 00472     IF BLANK>0 THEN TEMP,TEMP2=SUBSTR(TEMP,1,BLANK-1);
I 00472     FLD(FLD_NAME_PTR).ATTR_A=FLD(FLD_NAME_PTR).ATTR_A||'<'||TEMP2||'>';
I 00472     I=1;
I 00472     DO WHILE(I>0);
I 00472        I=INDEX(TEMP,',');
I 00472        IF I>0 THEN
I 00472        DO;
I 00472           CALL CHECK_ATTR(SUBSTR(TEMP,1,I-1),FLD(FLD_NAME_PTR).FLD_REC);
I 00472           TEMP=SUBSTR(TEMP,I+1);
I 00472        END;
I 00472        ELSE
I 00472           CALL CHECK_ATTR(TEMP,FLD(FLD_NAME_PTR).FLD_REC);
I 00472     END;
I 00472  /* PUT SKIP LIST ('INPUT=>',VAR_CTR,VAR(VAR_CTR).VAR_NAME,
I 00472                                ''''||VAR(VAR_CTR).VAR_FLD||'''');
I 00472     PUT SKIP DATA (FLD(FLD_NAME_PTR)); */
  00473  END PROCESS_VARS;                                                      00000473
  00474 1/****************************************************************/     00000474
  00475  PROCESS_SCREEN:PROC;                                                   00000475
  00476                                                                         00000476
  00477     DECLARE (C,I               ) FIXED BINARY(15),                      00000477
  00478              K                   CHAR(1);                               00000478
  00479     NO_ATTRIB = TRUE;                                                   00000479
  00480     ROW = ROW + 1;                               /* COUNT ROW WE ARE  */00000480
  00481     B = B + 1; SCR_IMG(B) = '* ' || MY_REC;                             00000481
  00482     COL = 1;                                                            00000482
  00483     FLD_A = 1;                                                          00000483
  00484     DO C = 1 TO 80;                              /* PROCESS ONE BY ONE*/00000484
  00485        K = SUBSTR(MY_REC,C,1);                   /* GET NEXT BYTE     */00000485
  00486        DO I = 1 TO A;                            /* TEST IF ATTRIBUTE */00000486
  00487           IF ATTR_TBL(I).ATTR_CHR = K THEN       /* IF WE FIND AN     */00000487
  00488           DO;                                    /*  ATTRIBUTE        */00000488
  00489              NO_ATTRIB = FALSE;                                         00000489
  00490              IF FLD_DEF  ^= '' THEN              /* AND WE ALREADY    */00000490
  00491              DO;                                                        00000491
  00492                  CALL SAVE_FIELD(FLD_A);         /*  HAVE DATA        */00000492
  00493                  FLD_DEF = '';                                          00000493
  00494              END;                                                       00000494
  00495              COL = C;                                                   00000495
  00496              FLD_A = I;                                                 00000496
  00497           END; /* IF */                                                 00000497
  00498        END; /* DO */                                                    00000498
  00499     /* IF NO_ATTRIB THEN  ;                                             00000499
  00500        ELSE                                                             00000500
  00501     */ DO;                                                              00000501
  00502           FLD_DEF = FLD_DEF  || K;                                      00000502
++C          503
D 00503          /*  IF SUBSTR(X,C,1)= "'" THEN DATA = DATA  "'"  */          00000503
I 00503          /*  IF SUBSTR(X,C,1)= '''' THEN DATA = DATA  ''''  */
  00504        END;                                                             00000504
  00505     END; /* DO */                                                       00000505
  00506     IF LENGTH(FLD_DEF)>0 THEN                                           00000506
  00507     DO;                                                                 00000507
  00508        CALL SAVE_FIELD(FLD_A);                                          00000508
  00509        FLD_DEF = '';                                                    00000509
  00510     END;                                                                00000510
  00511  END PROCESS_SCREEN;                                                    00000511
  00512 1/****************************************************************/     00000512
  00513  SAVE_FIELD:PROC(I);                                                    00000513
  00514     DECLARE I FIXED BINARY(15);                                         00000514
  00515     DECLARE (R,C) PICTURE '99';                                         00000515
  00516     FLD_CTR = FLD_CTR + 1;                                              00000516
  00517     FLD(FLD_CTR).FLD_DATA = FLD_DEF;                                    00000517
  00518     R=ROW;                                                              00000518
  00519     C=COL;                                                              00000519
++C          520,         525
D 00520     FLD(FLD_CTR).FLD_NAME = 'R'||R||'C'||C;                             00000520
D 00521     FLD(FLD_CTR).FLD_ROW  = ROW;                                        00000521
D 00522     FLD(FLD_CTR).FLD_COL  = COL;                                        00000522
D 00523     FLD(FLD_CTR).FLD_ATTR = I;                                          00000523
D 00524  /* PUT SKIP DATA(FLD(FLD_CTR)); */                                     00000524
D 00525  END SAVE_FIELD;                                                        00000525
I 00525     FLD(FLD_CTR).FLD_INT_NAME,
I 00525     FLD(FLD_CTR).FLD_NAME = 'R'||R||'C'||C;
I 00525     FLD(FLD_CTR).FLD_ROW  = ROW;
I 00525     FLD(FLD_CTR).FLD_COL  = COL;
I 00525     FLD(FLD_CTR).FLD_ATTR = I;
I 00525     FLD(FLD_CTR).FLD_REC = ATTR_TBL(I);
I 00525   /*PUT SKIP DATA(FLD(FLD_CTR));*/
I 00525  END SAVE_FIELD;
I 00525 1/*********************************************************************/
I 00525  /*                                                                   */
I 00525  /* PRINT_ATTR - PRINT ATTRIBUTES FOR A GIVEN FIELD                   */
I 00525  /*                                                                   */
I 00525  /*********************************************************************/
I 00525  PRINT_ATTR:PROC(ATTR);
I 00525     DECLARE ATTR LIKE ATTR_REC;
I 00525        IF ATTR.TITLE THEN
I 00525           PUT EDIT('TITLE ') (A);
I 00525
I 00525        IF ATTR.NUM THEN PUT EDIT('NUM ') (A);
I 00525        ELSE PUT EDIT('ALPHA ') (A);
I 00525
I 00525        IF ATTR.PROT THEN PUT EDIT('PROT ') (A);
I 00525        ELSE PUT EDIT('UNPROT ') (A);
I 00525
I 00525        IF ATTR.BRIGHT THEN PUT EDIT('BRIGHT ') (A);
I 00525        ELSE PUT EDIT('NORMAL ') (A);
I 00525
I 00525        SELECT (ATTR.HI_LIGHT)
I 00525            WHEN (' ')  ;
I 00525            WHEN ('D')  PUT EDIT('HI DEFAULT ') (A);
I 00525            WHEN ('U')  PUT EDIT('UNDERLINE ') (A);
I 00525            WHEN ('R')  PUT EDIT('REVERSE ') (A);
I 00525            WHEN ('B')  PUT EDIT('BLINK ') (A);
I 00525            OTHERWISE
I 00525            DO;
I 00525                PUT SKIP(2) EDIT('*** ERROR *** INVALID ATTRIBUTE ',
I 00525                                 'VALUE ***') (A,A);
I 00525                ERROR_FOUND = TRUE;
I 00525            END;
I 00525
I 00525        IF ATTR.CUR  THEN PUT EDIT('CUR ') (A);
I 00525
I 00525        IF ATTR.STOP_BIT THEN PUT EDIT('STOP ') (A);
I 00525        PUT EDIT(ATTR.COLOR,' ') (A,A);
I 00525  END PRINT_ATTR;
  00526 1/*********************************************************************/00000526
  00527  /*                                                                   */00000527
  00528  /* WRITE_PANEL - WRITE THE MACROS TO GENERATE THE PANEL              */00000528
  00529  /*                                                                   */00000529
  00530  /* IN THE MAP3270 SYSTEM, THE PANEL IS A LOAD MODULE GENERATED FROM  */00000530
  00531  /* ASSEMBLER CODE GENERATED BY THIS PROGRAM.  THE PANEL HAS 3        */00000531
  00532  /* SECTIONS:                                                         */00000532
  00533  /*    1) INDEX TO THE  DATA STREAM, CROSS REFERENCE AND INSERT       */00000533
  00534  /*       CURSOR AREAS.                                               */00000534
  00535  /*    2) 3270 DATA STEAM WHICH CONTAINS THE INSERT CURSOR STUFF.     */00000535
  00536  /*    3) CROSS REFERENCE WHICH MAPS THE FIELDS IN THE DATA STREAM    */00000536
  00537  /*       TO THE USER MAP.                                            */00000537
  00538  /*                                                                   */00000538
  00539  /*********************************************************************/00000539
  00540  WRITE_PANEL:PROC;                                                      00000540
  00541     DECLARE M FIXED BIN(15);                                            00000541
  00542     DECLARE IC_WRITTEN  BIT(1) ALIGNED;                                 00000542
  00543                                                                         00000543
  00544     OPEN FILE(PANEL) TITLE('MAP');                                      00000544
  00545                                                                         00000545
++C          546,         548
D 00546     PUT FILE(PANEL) EDIT(DT_TIME_STAMP)                    (COL(1),A)   00000546
D 00547                         (PANEL_SEQ)            (COL(73),P'999999V99')   00000547
D 00548                         (PANEL_NAME,'CSECT')            (A,COL(10),A)   00000548
I 00548     PUT FILE(PANEL) EDIT('TITLE ''PANEL ',PANEL_NAME,' ',
I 00548                          TITLE_STAMP,'''')     (COL(10),A,A,A,A,A)
I 00548                         (PANEL_SEQ)            (COL(73),P'999999V99');
I 00548     PANE_SEQ=PANEL_SEQ+1;
I 00548     PUT FILE(PANEL) EDIT(DT_TIME_STAMP)                    (COL(1),A)
I 00548                         (PANEL_SEQ)            (COL(73),P'999999V99')
I 00548                         (PANEL_NAME,'TSECT')            (A,COL(10),A)
  00549                         (PANEL_SEQ+1)          (COL(73),P'999999V99')   00000549
  00550                         ('DC    A(', PANEL_NAME||'P)' ) (COL(10),A,A)   00000550
  00551                         (PANEL_SEQ+2)          (COL(73),P'999999V99')   00000551
  00552                         ('DC    A(', PANEL_NAME||'M)' ) (COL(10),A,A)   00000552
  00553                         (PANEL_SEQ+3)          (COL(73),P'999999V99')   00000553
  00554                         ('DC    A(', PANEL_NAME||'C)' ) (COL(10),A,A)   00000554
  00555                         (PANEL_SEQ+4)          (COL(73),P'999999V99');  00000555
  00556     PANEL_SEQ=PANEL_SEQ+5;                                              00000556
  00557     PUT FILE(PANEL)                                                     00000557
  00558                EDIT(PANEL_NAME,'TSTPAN',PANEL_SEQ)                      00000558
  00559                                     (A,COL(10),A,COL(73),P'999999V99')  00000559
  00560                    ('TWCC  RESET=YES,RSTMDT=YES',PANEL_SEQ+1)           00000560
  00561                                       (COL(10),A,COL(73),P'999999V99'); 00000561
  00562     PANEL_SEQ=PANEL_SEQ+2;                                              00000562
  00563     IC_WRITTEN=FALSE;                                                   00000563
  00564     M = FLD_CTR;                                                        00000564
  00565     DO WHILE (M>0);                                                     00000565
  00566        IF ATTR_TBL(FLD(M).FLD_ATTR).CUR THEN                            00000566
  00567        DO;                                                              00000567
  00568           CALL WRITE_IC(FLD(M).FLD_ROW,FLD(M).FLD_COL);                 00000568
  00569           IC_WRITTEN=TRUE;                                              00000569
  00570           M = 0;                                                        00000570
  00571        END;                                                             00000571
  00572        M=M-1;                                                           00000572
  00573     END;  /* DO */                                                      00000573
  00574     IF ^IC_WRITTEN THEN                                                 00000574
  00575        CALL WRITE_IC(ONE,ONE);                                          00000575
  00576     DO M = 1 TO FLD_CTR;                                                00000576
  00577        CALL WRITE_FIELD(M);                                             00000577
  00578     END;                                                                00000578
  00579     PUT FILE(PANEL) EDIT('TENDPAN',PANEL_SEQ)                           00000579
  00580                                     (COL(10),A,COL(73),P'999999V99');   00000580
  00581     PANEL_SEQ=PANEL_SEQ+1;                                              00000581
  00582  /****************************************************************/     00000582
  00583  WRITE_IC:PROC(R,C);                                                    00000583
  00584     DECLARE (R,C)  FIXED BIN(15);                                       00000584
  00585                                                                         00000585
  00586     PUT FILE(PANEL)                                                     00000586
  00587              EDIT(PANEL_NAME||'C',                                      00000587
  00588                          'TCMD  CMD=SBA,ROW=',R,',COL=',C,PANEL_SEQ)    00000588
  00589                       (A,COL(10),A,P'99',A,P'99',COL(73),P'999999V99')  00000589
  00590                  ('         TCMD  CMD=IC',PANEL_SEQ+1)                  00000590
  00591                                              (A,COL(73),P'999999V99');  00000591
  00592     PANEL_SEQ=PANEL_SEQ+2;                                              00000592
  00593                                                                         00000593
  00594  END WRITE_IC;                                                          00000594
  00595  /****************************************************************/     00000595
  00596  WRITE_FIELD:PROC(F);                                                   00000596
  00597     DECLARE F FIXED BIN(15);                                            00000597
  00598     DECLARE A FIXED BIN(15);                                            00000598
  00599     DECLARE I FIXED BIN(15);                                            00000599
  00600     DECLARE MACRO_LN CHAR(160) VARYING;                                 00000600
  00601     DECLARE LN_PIC   PIC '99';                                          00000601
  00602     DECLARE FLD_NAME CHAR(8) VARYING;   /* FORMAT R99C99 */             00000602
  00603     A = FLD(F).FLD_ATTR;                                                00000603
  00604   /*****                                                                00000604
  00605     PUT SKIP DATA(FLD(F));                                              00000605
  00606     PUT SKIP DATA(ATTR_TBL(A));                                         00000606
  00607   *****/                                                                00000607
  00608     FLD_DEF=SUBSTR(FLD(F).FLD_DATA,2);                                  00000608
  00609     I = LENGTH(FLD_DEF);                                                00000609
  00610     DO WHILE(SUBSTR(FLD_DEF,I,1)=' ' & I>0);                            00000610
  00611        I=I-1;                                                           00000611
  00612     END;                                                                00000612
  00613     IF I=0 THEN FLD_DEF='';                                             00000613
  00614     ELSE FLD_DEF=SUBSTR(FLD_DEF,1,I);                                   00000614
  00615  /* PUT SKIP DATA(FLD_DEF); */                                          00000615
  00616     /* MAKE SURE THAT FIELDS DON'T GO PAST COL 80 */                    00000616
  00617     IF LENGTH(FLD_DEF)+FLD(F).FLD_COL   > 80 THEN                       00000617
  00618     DO;                                                                 00000618
  00619        PUT SKIP EDIT('*** ERROR PROCESSING ROW ',FLD(F).FLD_ROW,        00000619
  00620                      ' COL ',FLD(F).FLD_COL,': FIELD EXCEEDS COL 80')   00000620
  00621                      (A,F(3),A,F(3),A);                                 00000621
  00622        RETURN;                                                          00000622
  00623     END;                                                                00000623
  00624     FLD_NAME = SUBSTR(FLD(F).FLD_NAME||(6)' ',1,6);                     00000624
  00625     PUT FILE(PANEL)                                                     00000625
  00626         SKIP EDIT('TCMD  CMD=SBA,ROW=',                                 00000626
  00627                                 FLD(F).FLD_ROW,',COL=',                 00000627
  00628                                 FLD(F).FLD_COL,PANEL_SEQ)               00000628
  00629                  (COL(10),A,P'99',A,P'99',COL(73),P'999999V99');        00000629
  00630     PANEL_SEQ=PANEL_SEQ+1;                                              00000630
  00631     LN_PIC = LENGTH(FLD_DEF);                                           00000631
  00632     IF LN_PIC = '00' | ATTR_TBL(A).TITLE THEN                           00000632
  00633        MACRO_LN = '         TCMD  CMD=SF,MDT=NO';                       00000633
  00634     ELSE                                                                00000634
  00635        MACRO_LN = FLD_NAME ||'   TCMD  CMD=SF,MDT=YES,LN=' || LN_PIC;   00000635
  00636                                                                         00000636
++C          637,         653
D 00637     IF ATTR_TBL(A).PROT THEN                                            00000637
D 00638         MACRO_LN = MACRO_LN || ',PROT=YES';                             00000638
D 00639     ELSE                                                                00000639
D 00640         MACRO_LN = MACRO_LN || ',PROT=NO';                              00000640
D 00641     IF ATTR_TBL(A).BRIGHT THEN                                          00000641
D 00642         MACRO_LN = MACRO_LN || ',BRIGHT=YES';                           00000642
D 00643     ELSE                                                                00000643
D 00644         MACRO_LN = MACRO_LN || ',BRIGHT=NO';                            00000644
D 00645     IF ATTR_TBL(A).NUM THEN                                             00000645
D 00646         MACRO_LN = MACRO_LN || ',NUM=YES';                              00000646
D 00647     ELSE                                                                00000647
D 00648         MACRO_LN = MACRO_LN || ',NUM=NO';                               00000648
D 00649     IF ATTR_TBL(A).STOP_BIT &                                           00000649
D 00650        LENGTH(FLD_DEF)+FLD(F).FLD_COL < 80 THEN                         00000650
D 00651         MACRO_LN = MACRO_LN || ',STOP=YES';                             00000651
D 00652     ELSE                                                                00000652
D 00653         MACRO_LN = MACRO_LN || ',STOP=NO';                              00000653
I 00653     IF FLD(F).PROT THEN
I 00653         MACRO_LN = MACRO_LN || ',PROT=YES';
I 00653     ELSE
I 00653         MACRO_LN = MACRO_LN || ',PROT=NO';
I 00653     IF FLD(F).BRIGHT THEN
I 00653         MACRO_LN = MACRO_LN || ',BRIGHT=YES';
I 00653     ELSE
I 00653         MACRO_LN = MACRO_LN || ',BRIGHT=NO';
I 00653     IF FLD(F).NUM THEN
I 00653         MACRO_LN = MACRO_LN || ',NUM=YES';
I 00653     ELSE
I 00653         MACRO_LN = MACRO_LN || ',NUM=NO';
I 00653     IF FLD(F).STOP_BIT &
I 00653        LENGTH(FLD_DEF)+FLD(F).FLD_COL < 80 THEN
I 00653         MACRO_LN = MACRO_LN || ',STOP=YES';
I 00653     ELSE
I 00653         MACRO_LN = MACRO_LN || ',STOP=NO';
I 00653 0
I 00653     IF FLD(F).HI_LIGHT ^= ' ' | FLD(F).COLOR ^= ' ' THEN
I 00653     DO;
I 00653        MACRO_LN = MACRO_LN || ',';
I 00653        PUT FILE(PANEL)
I 00653                EDIT(MACRO_LN,'*',PANEL_SEQ) (A,COL(72),A,P'999999V99');
I 00653        PANEL_SEQ=PANEL_SEQ+1;
I 00653        MACRO_LN = (15)' ';
I 00653        IF FLD(F).HI_LIGHT = 'U' THEN
I 00653           MACRO_LN = MACRO_LN || 'HILITE=ULN';
I 00653        ELSE
I 00653        IF FLD(F).HI_LIGHT = 'R' THEN
I 00653           MACRO_LN = MACRO_LN || 'HILITE=REV';
I 00653        ELSE
I 00653        IF FLD(F).HI_LIGHT = 'B' THEN
I 00653           MACRO_LN = MACRO_LN || 'HILITE=BLN';
I 00653        ELSE
I 00653        IF FLD(F).HI_LIGHT = 'D' THEN
I 00653           MACRO_LN = MACRO_LN || 'HILITE=DEF';
I 00653        IF FLD(F).HI_LIGHT ^= ' ' & FLD(F).COLOR ^= ' ' THEN
I 00653           MACRO_LN = MACRO_LN || ',';
I 00653        IF FLD(F).COLOR ^= ' ' THEN
I 00653           MACRO_LN = MACRO_LN || 'COLOR=' || FLD(F).COLOR;
I 00653     END;
I 00653 0
  00654     IF LN_PIC = '00' THEN                                               00000654
  00655     DO;                                                                 00000655
  00656        PUT FILE(PANEL)                                                  00000656
  00657                 EDIT(MACRO_LN,PANEL_SEQ) (A,COL(73),P'999999V99');      00000657
  00658        PANEL_SEQ=PANEL_SEQ+1;                                           00000658
  00659     END;                                                                00000659
  00660     ELSE                                                                00000660
  00661     DO;                                                                 00000661
  00662        MACRO_LN = MACRO_LN || ',';                                      00000662
  00663        PUT FILE(PANEL)                                                  00000663
  00664                EDIT(MACRO_LN,'*',PANEL_SEQ) (A,COL(72),A,P'999999V99'); 00000664
  00665        PANEL_SEQ=PANEL_SEQ+1;                                           00000665
  00666        MACRO_LN = (15)' ' ||'DATA='''||FLD_DEF||'''';                   00000666
  00667        IF LENGTH(MACRO_LN)>71 THEN                                      00000667
  00668        DO;                                                              00000668
  00669           PUT FILE(PANEL)                                               00000669
  00670                    EDIT(MACRO_LN,'*',PANEL_SEQ) (A(71),A,P'999999V99')  00000670
  00671                      (SUBSTR(MACRO_LN,72),PANEL_SEQ+1)                  00000671
  00672                                           (COL(16),A(57),P'999999V99'); 00000672
  00673           PANEL_SEQ=PANEL_SEQ+2;                                        00000673
  00674        END;                                                             00000674
  00675        ELSE                                                             00000675
  00676        DO;                                                              00000676
  00677           PUT FILE(PANEL)                                               00000677
  00678                    EDIT(MACRO_LN,PANEL_SEQ) (A,COL(73),P'999999V99');   00000678
  00679        PANEL_SEQ=PANEL_SEQ+1;                                           00000679
  00680        END;                                                             00000680
  00681     END;                                                                00000681
  00682     FLD_DEF='';                                                         00000682
  00683  END WRITE_FIELD;                                                       00000683
  00684  END WRITE_PANEL;                                                       00000684
  00685 1/*********************************************************************/00000685
  00686  /*                                                                   */00000686
  00687  /* WRITE_MAPPING - WRITE THE PANEL TO USER FIELD MAPPING             */00000687
  00688  /*                                                                   */00000688
  00689  /*********************************************************************/00000689
  00690  WRITE_MAPPING:PROC;                                                    00000690
  00691     DECLARE M FIXED BIN(15);                                            00000691
  00692     PUT FILE(PANEL)                                                     00000692
  00693                EDIT(PANEL_NAME||'M','TINPST') (A,COL(10),A)             00000693
  00694                    (PANEL_SEQ) (COL(73),P'999999V99');                  00000694
  00695     PANEL_SEQ=PANEL_SEQ+1;                                              00000695
  00696     DO M = 1 TO FLD_CTR;                                                00000696
  00697        CALL WRITE_FIELD(M);                                             00000697
  00698     END;                                                                00000698
  00699     PUT FILE(PANEL)                                                     00000699
  00700             EDIT('TINPEND',PANEL_SEQ) (COL(10),A,COL(73),P'999999V99'); 00000700
++I          701
            PANEL_SEQ=PANEL_SEQ+1;                                              00000701
I 00701     PUT FILE(PANEL) EDIT(DT_TIME_STAMP)                    (COL(1),A)
I 00701                         (PANEL_SEQ)            (COL(73),P'999999V99');
I 00701     PANEL_SEQ=PANEL_SEQ+1;
  00702  /****************************************************************/     00000702
  00703  WRITE_FIELD:PROC(F);                                                   00000703
  00704     DECLARE F FIXED BIN(15);                                            00000704
  00705     DECLARE A FIXED BIN(15);                                            00000705
  00706     DECLARE MACRO_LN CHAR(160) VARYING;                                 00000706
  00707     DECLARE FLD_DEF  CHAR(160) VARYING;                                 00000707
  00708     DECLARE FLD_NAME CHAR(8)  VARYING;   /* FORMAT R99C99 */            00000708
  00709     A = FLD(F).FLD_ATTR;                                                00000709
  00710   /*****                                                                00000710
  00711     PUT SKIP DATA(FLD(F));                                              00000711
  00712     PUT SKIP DATA(ATTR_TBL(A));                                         00000712
  00713   *****/                                                                00000713
  00714     FLD_DEF=SUBSTR(FLD(F).FLD_DATA,2);                                  00000714
  00715     I = LENGTH(FLD_DEF);                                                00000715
  00716     DO WHILE(SUBSTR(FLD_DEF,I,1)=' ' & I>0);                            00000716
  00717        I=I-1;                                                           00000717
  00718     END;                                                                00000718
  00719     IF I=0 THEN FLD_DEF='';                                             00000719
  00720     ELSE FLD_DEF=SUBSTR(FLD_DEF,1,I);                                   00000720
  00721     IF ^ATTR_TBL(A).TITLE THEN                                          00000721
  00722     DO;                                                                 00000722
  00723        PUT FILE(PANEL)                                                  00000723
  00724                 EDIT(FLD(F).FLD_NAME) (A)                               00000724
  00725                     ('TINPMAP ',FLD(F).FLD_ROW,',') (COL(10),A,P'99',A) 00000725
  00726                                (FLD(F).FLD_COL,',',                     00000726
  00727                                 LENGTH(FLD_DEF)) (P'99',A,P'99')        00000727
  00728                       (PANEL_SEQ) (COL(73),P'999999V99');               00000728
  00729        PANEL_SEQ=PANEL_SEQ+1;                                           00000729
  00730     END;                                                                00000730
  00731  END WRITE_FIELD;                                                       00000731
  00732  END WRITE_MAPPING;                                                     00000732
  00733 1/*********************************************************************/00000733
  00734  /*                                                                   */00000734
  00735  /* WRITE_ASM - GENERATE THE USER COMM AREA - ASSEMBLER FORMAT        */00000735
  00736  /*                                                                   */00000736
  00737  /*********************************************************************/00000737
  00738  WRITE_ASM:PROC;                                                        00000738
  00739     DECLARE SEQ_NO            FIXED DEC(8,2) INIT(9);                   00000739
  00740     PUT FILE(ASM)  EDIT                                                 00000740
  00741         (DT_TIME_STAMP,1)               (COL(1),A,COL(73),P'999999V99') 00000741
  00742         ('TPARM    DS    0F',2)                (A,COL(73),P'999999V99') 00000742
  00743         ('TNAME    DC    CL8''',PANEL_NAME,'''',3)                      00000743
  00744                                                     (A,A,A,COL(73),     00000744
  00745                                                           P'999999V99') 00000745
  00746         ('TADDR    DC    A(0)',4)                   (A,COL(73),         00000746
  00747                                                           P'999999V99') 00000747
  00748         ('TRC      DC    H''0''',5)                 (A,COL(73),         00000748
  00749                                                           P'999999V99') 00000749
  00750         ('TAID     DC    X''0''',6)                 (A,COL(73),         00000750
  00751                                                           P'999999V99') 00000751
  00752         ('TSBA     DC    XL2''0000''',7)            (A,COL(73),         00000752
  00753                                                           P'999999V99') 00000753
  00754         ('         DC    X''0''',8)                 (A,COL(73),         00000754
  00755                                                           P'999999V99');00000755
  00756     DO M = 1 TO FLD_CTR;                                                00000756
  00757        CALL WRITE_PARM(M);                                              00000757
  00758     END;                                                                00000758
  00759     PUT FILE(ASM) EDIT                                                  00000759
  00760         ('         DC    C'' ''',SEQ_NO)       (A,COL(73),P'999999V99') 00000760
  00761         ('         DC    AL2(0)',SEQ_NO+1)     (A,COL(73),P'999999V99') 00000761
  00762         (DT_TIME_STAMP,SEQ_NO+2)        (COL(1),A,COL(73),P'999999V99');00000762
  00763     SEQ_NO=SEQ_NO+3;                                                    00000763
  00764  WRITE_PARM:PROC(F);                                                    00000764
