  00765     DECLARE F FIXED BIN(15);                                            00000765
  00766     DECLARE A FIXED BIN(15);                                            00000766
  00767     DECLARE I FIXED BIN(15);                                            00000767
  00768     DECLARE MACRO_LN CHAR(160) VARYING;                                 00000768
  00769     DECLARE LN_PIC   PIC '99';                                          00000769
  00770     DECLARE FLD_DEF  CHAR(160) VARYING;                                 00000770
  00771     DECLARE FLD_NAME CHAR(160) VARYING;                                 00000771
  00772     A = FLD(F).FLD_ATTR;                                                00000772
  00773   /*****                                                                00000773
  00774     PUT SKIP DATA(FLD(F));                                              00000774
  00775     PUT SKIP DATA(ATTR_TBL(A));                                         00000775
  00776   *****/                                                                00000776
  00777     FLD_DEF=SUBSTR(FLD(F).FLD_DATA,2);                                  00000777
  00778     I = LENGTH(FLD_DEF);                                                00000778
  00779     DO WHILE(SUBSTR(FLD_DEF,I,1)=' ' & I>0);                            00000779
  00780        I=I-1;                                                           00000780
  00781     END;                                                                00000781
  00782     IF I=0 THEN FLD_DEF='';                                             00000782
  00783     ELSE FLD_DEF=SUBSTR(FLD_DEF,1,I);                                   00000783
  00784     /* MAKE SURE THAT FIELDS DON'T GO PAST COL 80 */                    00000784
  00785     IF LENGTH(FLD_DEF)+FLD(F).FLD_COL   > 80 THEN                       00000785
  00786     DO;                                                                 00000786
  00787        PUT SKIP EDIT('*** ERROR PROCESSING ROW ',FLD(F).FLD_ROW,        00000787
  00788                      ' COL ',FLD(F).FLD_COL,': FIELD EXCEEDS COL 80')   00000788
  00789                      (A,F(3),A,F(3),A);                                 00000789
  00790        RETURN;                                                          00000790
  00791     END;                                                                00000791
  00792     FLD_NAME = FLD(F).FLD_NAME;                                         00000792
  00793     LN_PIC = LENGTH(FLD_DEF);                                           00000793
  00794     IF LN_PIC ^= '00' & ^ATTR_TBL(A).TITLE THEN                         00000794
  00795     DO;                                                                 00000795
  00796        PUT FILE(ASM) EDIT                                               00000796
  00797                (FLD_NAME||'C','DC    C'' ''',SEQ_NO)                    00000797
  00798                                  (A,COL(10),A,COL(73),P'999999V99')     00000798
  00799                (FLD_NAME||'L','DC    AL2(',LN_PIC,')',SEQ_NO+1)         00000799
  00800                                  (A,COL(10),A,A,A,COL(73),P'999999V99');00000800
  00801        SEQ_NO=SEQ_NO+2;                                                 00000801
  00802        MACRO_LN = SUBSTR(FLD_NAME||'D        ',1,9)                     00000802
  00803                           ||  'DC    CL' || LN_PIC                      00000803
  00804                                             || ''''||FLD_DEF||'''';     00000804
  00805        IF LENGTH(MACRO_LN)>71 THEN                                      00000805
  00806        DO;                                                              00000806
  00807           PUT FILE(ASM)                                                 00000807
  00808                    EDIT(MACRO_LN,'*',SEQ_NO) (A(71),A,P'999999V99')     00000808
  00809                      (SUBSTR(MACRO_LN,72),SEQ_NO+1)                     00000809
  00810                         (COL(16),A(57),P'999999V99');                   00000810
  00811           SEQ_NO=SEQ_NO+2;                                              00000811
  00812        END;                                                             00000812
  00813        ELSE                                                             00000813
  00814        DO;                                                              00000814
  00815           PUT FILE(ASM)                                                 00000815
  00816                    EDIT(MACRO_LN,SEQ_NO) (A(72),P'999999V99');          00000816
  00817           SEQ_NO=SEQ_NO+1;                                              00000817
  00818         END;                                                            00000818
  00819     END;                                                                00000819
  00820     FLD_DEF='';                                                         00000820
  00821  END WRITE_PARM;                                                        00000821
  00822  END WRITE_ASM;                                                         00000822
  00823 1/*********************************************************************/00000823
  00824  /*                                                                   */00000824
  00825  /* WRITE_COB - GENERATE THE USER COMM AREA FOR COBOL                 */00000825
  00826  /*                                                                   */00000826
  00827  /*********************************************************************/00000827
  00828  WRITE_COB:PROC;                                                        00000828
  00829     DECLARE SEQ_NO      FIXED DEC(8,2)  INIT(9);                        00000829
  00830     PUT FILE(COB)                                                       00000830
  00831                EDIT(DT_TIME_STAMP) (COL(7),A)                           00000831
  00832                    (1)                           (COL(73),P'999999V99') 00000832
  00833                    ('01  ',PANEL_NAME,'-PARM.')  (COL(8),A,A,A)         00000833
  00834                    (2)                           (COL(73),P'999999V99') 00000834
  00835                    ('05  ',PANEL_NAME,'-NAME','PIC X(8) VALUE ''',      00000835
  00836                            PANEL_NAME,'''.')                            00000836
  00837                                           (COL(12),(3)A,COL(40),(3)A)   00000837
  00838                    (3)                           (COL(73),P'999999V99') 00000838
  00839                    ('05  FILLER','PIC S9(8) COMP VALUE ZERO.')          00000839
  00840                                           (COL(12),A,COL(40),A)         00000840
  00841                    (4)                           (COL(73),P'999999V99') 00000841
  00842                    ('05  ',PANEL_NAME,'-RET','PIC S9(4) COMP.')         00000842
  00843                                           (COL(12),A,A,A,COL(40),A)     00000843
  00844                    (5)                           (COL(73),P'999999V99') 00000844
  00845                    ('05  ',PANEL_NAME,'-AID','PIC X.')                  00000845
  00846                                           (COL(12),A,A,A,COL(40),A)     00000846
  00847                    (6)                           (COL(73),P'999999V99') 00000847
  00848                    ('05  ',PANEL_NAME,'-SBA','PIC XX.')                 00000848
  00849                                           (COL(12),A,A,A,COL(40),A)     00000849
  00850                    (7)                           (COL(73),P'999999V99') 00000850
  00851                    ('05  FILLER','PIC X.')                              00000851
  00852                                           (COL(12),A,COL(40),A)         00000852
  00853                    (8)                           (COL(73),P'999999V99');00000853
  00854     DO M = 1 TO FLD_CTR;                                                00000854
  00855        CALL WRITE_PARM(M);                                              00000855
  00856     END;                                                                00000856
  00857     PUT FILE(COB)                                                       00000857
  00858                 EDIT('05','FILLER.')                                    00000858
  00859                                   (COL(12),A,COL(16),A)                 00000859
  00860                     (SEQ_NO)                   (COL(73),P'999999V99');  00000860
  00861     SEQ_NO=SEQ_NO+1;                                                    00000861
  00862     PUT FILE(COB)                                                       00000862
  00863                 EDIT('10','FILLER','PIC X(01) VALUE '' ''.')            00000863
  00864                                   (COL(16),A,COL(20),A,COL(40),A)       00000864
  00865                     (SEQ_NO)                   (COL(73),P'999999V99');  00000865
  00866     SEQ_NO=SEQ_NO+1;                                                    00000866
  00867     PUT FILE(COB)                                                       00000867
  00868                 EDIT('10','FILLER','PIC S9(4) VALUE ZERO COMP.')        00000868
  00869                                   (COL(16),A,COL(20),A,COL(40),A)       00000869
  00870                     (SEQ_NO)                   (COL(73),P'999999V99');  00000870
  00871     SEQ_NO=SEQ_NO+1;                                                    00000871
  00872  WRITE_PARM:PROC(F);                                                    00000872
  00873     DECLARE F FIXED BIN(15);                                            00000873
  00874     DECLARE A FIXED BIN(15);                                            00000874
  00875     DECLARE I FIXED BIN(15);                                            00000875
  00876     DECLARE MACRO_LN CHAR(160) VARYING;                                 00000876
  00877     DECLARE LN_PIC   PIC '99';                                          00000877
  00878     DECLARE FLD_DEF  CHAR(99) VARYING;                                  00000878
  00879     DECLARE FLD_NAME CHAR(99) VARYING;                                  00000879
  00880     A = FLD(F).FLD_ATTR;                                                00000880
  00881   /*****                                                                00000881
  00882     PUT SKIP DATA(FLD(F));                                              00000882
  00883     PUT SKIP DATA(ATTR_TBL(A));                                         00000883
  00884   *****/                                                                00000884
  00885     FLD_DEF=SUBSTR(FLD(F).FLD_DATA,2);                                  00000885
  00886     I = LENGTH(FLD_DEF);                                                00000886
  00887     DO WHILE(SUBSTR(FLD_DEF,I,1)=' ' & I>0);                            00000887
  00888        I=I-1;                                                           00000888
  00889     END;                                                                00000889
  00890     IF I=0 THEN FLD_DEF='';                                             00000890
  00891     ELSE FLD_DEF=SUBSTR(FLD_DEF,1,I);                                   00000891
  00892     /* MAKE SURE THAT FIELDS DON'T GO PAST COL 80 */                    00000892
  00893     IF LENGTH(FLD_DEF)+FLD(F).FLD_COL   > 80 THEN                       00000893
  00894     DO;                                                                 00000894
  00895        PUT SKIP EDIT('*** ERROR PROCESSING ROW ',FLD(F).FLD_ROW,        00000895
  00896                      ' COL ',FLD(F).FLD_COL,': FIELD EXCEEDS COL 80')   00000896
  00897                      (A,F(3),A,F(3),A);                                 00000897
  00898        RETURN;                                                          00000898
  00899     END;                                                                00000899
  00900     FLD_NAME = FLD(F).FLD_NAME;                                         00000900
  00901     LN_PIC = LENGTH(FLD_DEF);                                           00000901
  00902     IF LN_PIC ^= '00' & ^ATTR_TBL(A).TITLE THEN                         00000902
  00903     DO;                                                                 00000903
  00904        PUT FILE(COB)                                                    00000904
  00905                 EDIT('05',FLD_NAME,'.')                                 00000905
  00906                                   (COL(12),A,COL(16),A,A)               00000906
  00907                     (SEQ_NO)                   (COL(73),P'999999V99');  00000907
  00908        SEQ_NO=SEQ_NO+1;                                                 00000908
  00909        PUT FILE(COB)                                                    00000909
  00910                 EDIT('10',FLD_NAME||'-C','PIC X(01) VALUE '' ''.')      00000910
  00911                                   (COL(16),A,COL(20),A,COL(40),A)       00000911
  00912                     (SEQ_NO)                   (COL(73),P'999999V99');  00000912
  00913        SEQ_NO=SEQ_NO+1;                                                 00000913
  00914        PUT FILE(COB)                                                    00000914
  00915                 EDIT('10',FLD_NAME||'-L','PIC S9(4) VALUE ',            00000915
  00916                                             LENGTH(FLD_DEF),' COMP.')   00000916
  00917                              (COL(16),A,COL(20),A,COL(40),A,P'SS9',A)   00000917
  00918                     (SEQ_NO)                   (COL(73),P'999999V99');  00000918
  00919        SEQ_NO=SEQ_NO+1;                                                 00000919
  00920        PUT FILE(COB)                                                    00000920
  00921                 EDIT('10',FLD_NAME||'-D','PIC X(',LN_PIC,')')           00000921
  00922                     (COL(16),A,COL(20),A,COL(40),A,A,A);                00000922
  00923        IF LENGTH(FLD_DEF) <= 13 THEN                                    00000923
  00924        DO;                                                              00000924
  00925            PUT FILE(COB) EDIT(' VALUE ''',FLD_DEF,'''.') (A,A,A)        00000925
  00926                     (SEQ_NO)                   (COL(73),P'999999V99');  00000926
  00927            SEQ_NO=SEQ_NO+1;                                             00000927
  00928        END;                                                             00000928
  00929        ELSE                                                             00000929
  00930        DO;                                                              00000930
  00931            PUT FILE(COB) EDIT(' VALUE',SEQ_NO) (A,COL(73),P'999999V99');00000931
  00932            SEQ_NO=SEQ_NO+1;                                             00000932
  00933            MACRO_LN = '''' || FLD_DEF || '''.';                         00000933
  00934            IF LENGTH(MACRO_LN)>56 THEN                                  00000934
  00935            DO;                                                          00000935
  00936               PUT FILE(COB)                                             00000936
  00937                        EDIT(MACRO_LN) (COL(16),A(57))                   00000937
  00938                         (SEQ_NO) (P'999999V99')                         00000938
  00939                          ('-','''',SUBSTR(MACRO_LN,58))                 00000939
  00940                                   (COL(7),A,COL(16),A,A)                00000940
  00941                         (SEQ_NO+1) (COL(73),P'999999V99');              00000941
  00942               SEQ_NO=SEQ_NO+2;                                          00000942
  00943            END;                                                         00000943
  00944            ELSE                                                         00000944
  00945            DO;                                                          00000945
  00946               PUT FILE(COB)                                             00000946
  00947                   EDIT(MACRO_LN,SEQ_NO) (COL(16),A(57),P'999999V99');   00000947
  00948               SEQ_NO=SEQ_NO+1;                                          00000948
  00949            END;                                                         00000949
  00950        END;                                                             00000950
  00951     FLD_DEF='';                                                         00000951
  00952  END WRITE_PARM;                                                        00000952
  00953  END WRITE_COB;                                                         00000953
  00954 1/*********************************************************************/00000954
  00955  /*                                                                   */00000955
  00956  /* WRITE_PL1 - GENERATE THE USER COMM AREA FOR PL1                   */00000956
  00957  /*                                                                   */00000957
  00958  /*********************************************************************/00000958
  00959  WRITE_PL1:PROC;                                                        00000959
  00960     DECLARE SEQ_NO      FIXED DEC(8,2)  INIT(9);                        00000960
  00961     PUT FILE(PL1)                                                       00000961
  00962                EDIT('/* ',DT_TIME_STAMP, ' ** */') (COL(2),A,A,A)       00000962
  00963                    (1)                           (COL(73),P'999999V99') 00000963
  00964                    ('DCL 1 ',PANEL_NAME,'_PARM  UNALIGNED,')            00000964
  00965                                                    (COL(6),A,A,A)       00000965
  00966                    (2)                           (COL(73),P'999999V99') 00000966
  00967                    ('5 ',PANEL_NAME,'_NAME','CHAR(8) INIT(''',          00000967
  00968                            PANEL_NAME,'''),')                           00000968
  00969                                           (COL(12),(3)A,COL(40),(3)A)   00000969
  00970                    (3)                           (COL(73),P'999999V99') 00000970
  00971                    ('5 FILLER1','FIXED BIN(31) INIT(0),')               00000971
  00972                                           (COL(12),A,COL(40),A)         00000972
  00973                    (4)                           (COL(73),P'999999V99') 00000973
  00974                    ('5 ',PANEL_NAME,'_RET','FIXED BIN(15) INIT(0),')    00000974
  00975                                           (COL(12),A,A,A,COL(40),A)     00000975
  00976                    (5)                           (COL(73),P'999999V99') 00000976
  00977                    ('5 ',PANEL_NAME,'_AID','CHAR(1) INIT('' ''),')      00000977
  00978                                           (COL(12),A,A,A,COL(40),A)     00000978
  00979                    (6)                           (COL(73),P'999999V99') 00000979
  00980                    ('5 ',PANEL_NAME,'_SBA','FIXED BIN(15) INIT(0),')    00000980
  00981                                           (COL(12),A,A,A,COL(40),A)     00000981
  00982                    (7)                           (COL(73),P'999999V99') 00000982
  00983                    ('5 FILLER2','CHAR(1),')                             00000983
  00984                                           (COL(12),A,COL(40),A)         00000984
  00985                    (8)                           (COL(73),P'999999V99');00000985
  00986     DO M = 1 TO FLD_CTR;                                                00000986
  00987        CALL WRITE_PARM(M);                                              00000987
  00988     END;                                                                00000988
  00989     PUT FILE(PL1)                                                       00000989
  00990                 EDIT('5 E_O_T_1,')                                      00000990
  00991                                            (COL(12),A)                  00000991
  00992                     (SEQ_NO)                   (COL(73),P'999999V99');  00000992
  00993     SEQ_NO=SEQ_NO+1;                                                    00000993
  00994     PUT FILE(PL1)                                                       00000994
  00995                 EDIT('10 E_O_T_2','CHAR(1) INIT('' ''),')               00000995
  00996                                   (COL(16),A,COL(40),A)                 00000996
  00997                     (SEQ_NO)                   (COL(73),P'999999V99');  00000997
  00998     SEQ_NO=SEQ_NO+1;                                                    00000998
  00999     PUT FILE(PL1)                                                       00000999
  01000                 EDIT('10 E_O_T_3','FIXED BIN(15) INIT(0);')             00001000
  01001                                   (COL(16),A,COL(40),A)                 00001001
  01002                     (SEQ_NO)                   (COL(73),P'999999V99');  00001002
  01003     SEQ_NO=SEQ_NO+1;                                                    00001003
  01004  WRITE_PARM:PROC(F);                                                    00001004
  01005     DECLARE F FIXED BIN(15);                                            00001005
  01006     DECLARE A FIXED BIN(15);                                            00001006
  01007     DECLARE I FIXED BIN(15);                                            00001007
  01008     DECLARE MACRO_LN CHAR(160) VARYING;                                 00001008
  01009     DECLARE LN_PIC   PIC '99';                                          00001009
  01010     DECLARE FLD_DEF  CHAR(99) VARYING;                                  00001010
  01011     DECLARE FLD_NAME CHAR(99) VARYING;                                  00001011
  01012     A = FLD(F).FLD_ATTR;                                                00001012
  01013   /*****                                                                00001013
  01014     PUT SKIP DATA(FLD(F));                                              00001014
  01015     PUT SKIP DATA(ATTR_TBL(A));                                         00001015
  01016   *****/                                                                00001016
  01017     FLD_DEF=SUBSTR(FLD(F).FLD_DATA,2);                                  00001017
  01018     I = LENGTH(FLD_DEF);                                                00001018
  01019     DO WHILE(SUBSTR(FLD_DEF,I,1)=' ' & I>0);                            00001019
  01020        I=I-1;                                                           00001020
  01021     END;                                                                00001021
  01022     IF I=0 THEN FLD_DEF='';                                             00001022
  01023     ELSE FLD_DEF=SUBSTR(FLD_DEF,1,I);                                   00001023
  01024     /* MAKE SURE THAT FIELDS DON'T GO PAST COL 80 */                    00001024
  01025     IF LENGTH(FLD_DEF)+FLD(F).FLD_COL   > 80 THEN                       00001025
  01026     DO;                                                                 00001026
  01027        PUT SKIP EDIT('*** ERROR PROCESSING ROW ',FLD(F).FLD_ROW,        00001027
  01028                      ' COL ',FLD(F).FLD_COL,': FIELD EXCEEDS COL 80')   00001028
  01029                      (A,F(3),A,F(3),A);                                 00001029
  01030        RETURN;                                                          00001030
  01031     END;                                                                00001031
  01032     FLD_NAME = FLD(F).FLD_NAME;                                         00001032
  01033     LN_PIC = LENGTH(FLD_DEF);                                           00001033
  01034     IF LN_PIC ^= '00' & ^ATTR_TBL(A).TITLE THEN                         00001034
  01035     DO;                                                                 00001035
  01036        PUT FILE(PL1)                                                    00001036
  01037                 EDIT('5 ',FLD_NAME,',')                                 00001037
  01038                                   (COL(12),A,A,A)                       00001038
  01039                     (SEQ_NO)                   (COL(73),P'999999V99');  00001039
  01040        SEQ_NO=SEQ_NO+1;                                                 00001040
  01041        PUT FILE(PL1)                                                    00001041
  01042                 EDIT('10 ',FLD_NAME||'_C','CHAR(1) INIT('' ''),')       00001042
  01043                                   (COL(16),A,A,COL(40),A)               00001043
  01044                     (SEQ_NO)                   (COL(73),P'999999V99');  00001044
  01045        SEQ_NO=SEQ_NO+1;                                                 00001045
  01046        PUT FILE(PL1)                                                    00001046
  01047                 EDIT('10 ',FLD_NAME||'_L','FIXED BIN(15) INIT(',        00001047
  01048                                             LENGTH(FLD_DEF),'),')       00001048
  01049                              (COL(16),A,A,COL(40),A,P'Z9',A)            00001049
  01050                     (SEQ_NO)                   (COL(73),P'999999V99');  00001050
  01051        SEQ_NO=SEQ_NO+1;                                                 00001051
  01052        PUT FILE(PL1)                                                    00001052
  01053                 EDIT('10 ',FLD_NAME||'_D','CHAR(',LN_PIC,')')           00001053
  01054                     (COL(16),A,A,COL(40),A,A,A);                        00001054
  01055        IF LENGTH(FLD_DEF) <= 13 THEN                                    00001055
  01056        DO;                                                              00001056
  01057            PUT FILE(PL1) EDIT(' INIT(''',FLD_DEF,'''),') (A,A,A)        00001057
  01058                     (SEQ_NO)                   (COL(73),P'999999V99');  00001058
  01059            SEQ_NO=SEQ_NO+1;                                             00001059
  01060        END;                                                             00001060
  01061        ELSE                                                             00001061
  01062        DO;                                                              00001062
  01063            PUT FILE(PL1) EDIT(' INIT(',SEQ_NO) (A,COL(73),P'999999V99');00001063
  01064            SEQ_NO=SEQ_NO+1;                                             00001064
  01065            MACRO_LN = '''' || FLD_DEF || '''),';                        00001065
  01066            IF LENGTH(MACRO_LN)>56 THEN                                  00001066
  01067            DO;                                                          00001067
  01068               PUT FILE(PL1)                                             00001068
  01069                        EDIT(MACRO_LN) (COL(16),A(57))                   00001069
  01070                         (SEQ_NO) (P'999999V99')                         00001070
  01071                          (SUBSTR(MACRO_LN,58))                          00001071
  01072                                   (COL(2),A)                            00001072
  01073                         (SEQ_NO+1) (COL(73),P'999999V99');              00001073
  01074               SEQ_NO=SEQ_NO+2;                                          00001074
  01075            END;                                                         00001075
  01076            ELSE                                                         00001076
  01077            DO;                                                          00001077
  01078               PUT FILE(PL1)                                             00001078
  01079                   EDIT(MACRO_LN,SEQ_NO) (COL(16),A(57),P'999999V99');   00001079
  01080               SEQ_NO=SEQ_NO+1;                                          00001080
  01081            END;                                                         00001081
  01082        END;                                                             00001082
  01083     FLD_DEF='';                                                         00001083
  01084  END WRITE_PARM;                                                        00001084
  01085  END WRITE_PL1;                                                         00001085
  01086  END MAPGEN;                                                            00001086


    SCOMPARE.  VERSION 2.0  (2009/04/15)

PROCESSING CNTL FILE
==>PL16                                                                            <==
END OF CNTL FILE

MATCH CRITERION = 6 LINES.
NO DIFFERENCES.
**END OF JOB***


PL16
++E


./ ENDUP



*** MAKESTMT: V1.0.0 STARTING
*** PARM 001: ./ LOAD\./ CHANGE NAME=MAP3270,VERSION=NEXT
*** PARM 100:
*** MAKESTMT-./ LOAD
*** MAKESTMT-./ CHANGE NAME=MAP3270,VERSION=NEXT



*** MAKESTMT: V1.0.0 STARTING
*** PARM 001: ./ ENDUP
*** PARM 100:
*** MAKESTMT-./ ENDUP


          IEBUPDTX -- CORNELL EXTENDED UPDATE PROGRAM.  VERSION 1.12 (SLAC V.12/17/04)            DAY=010  03:09  01/10/11    PAGE 1


EXEC PARMS      CHAINUPD,CHAIN=TS,NOIMPLSEQ,LISTDEL
*** DDNAME=SYSUT2          OPEN FOR OUTPUT, DSORG=PO, DSNAME=HERC01.CLE.DISTRO.SOURCEX ON PUB002
      *** CHAIN ID TS DOES NOT MATCH LIBRARY ID PR ***
*** CHAIN LIBRARY ID = 'PR', ALLOCATION NUMBER = 001
*** DDNAME=SYSUT1          OPEN FOR  INPUT, DSORG=PS, DSNAME=NULLFILE
*** DDNAME=DD         <01> OPEN FOR  INPUT, DSORG=PO, DSNAME=HERC01.CLE.DISTRO.SOURCE ON PUB002
*** DDNAME=SYSIN      <02> OPEN FOR  INPUT, DSORG=PS, DSNAME=SYS11010.T030946.RA000.HERC013.STMTG1 ON WORK01
                                                          DSNAME=HERC01.CLE.DISTRO.DELTAX.DATA ON PUB001
                                                          DSNAME=SYS11010.T030946.RA000.HERC013.STMTG2 ON WORK00

____________________________________________________________________________________________________________________________________

          <02>  ./ LOAD

MAP3270   IEBUPDTX -- CORNELL EXTENDED UPDATE PROGRAM.  VERSION 1.12 (SLAC V.12/17/04)            DAY=010  03:09  01/10/11    PAGE 2


          <02>  ./ CHANGE NAME=MAP3270,VERSION=NEXT

          ./ REPLACE SEQ1=1
           /********************** MAP3270 V2.1.0********************************/
          ./ INSERT SEQ1=8
           /*  (C) COPYRIGHT 2010  CEDAR LAKE EMPORIUM LLC   ALL RIGHTS RESERVED*/
          ./ REPLACE SEQ1=37,SEQ2=38
           /* V2.1.0  ADDED SUPPORT FOR THE EXTENTED ATTRIBUTES HIGHLITE AND    */
           /*         COLOR.                                                    */
           /*         REWORKED CODE TO USE THE SELECT...WHEN  MACRO, WHICH      */
           /*         SIMULATES THE SELECT STATEMENT.                           */
           /*         AUGUST 2010                                               */
           /*                                                                   */
           /*********************************************************************/
           %INCLUDE SELECT;
          ./ REPLACE SEQ1=57
              DECLARE  1 ATTR_REC,
          ./ REPLACE SEQ1=65,SEQ2=68
                         2 CUR                BIT(1) ALIGNED,
                         2 HI_LIGHT           CHAR(1),
                         2 COLOR              CHAR(3);
              DECLARE  1 ATTR_TBL(9) LIKE ATTR_REC;
          -/*********************************************************************/
           /*                                                                   */
           /* FLDS HOLDS ALL THE FIELD INFORMATION PARSED FROM THE .SCREEN      */
           /* THE ATTRS ARE REPEATED SO THE ATTRIBUTES FOR FIELDS CAN BE        */
           /* OVERRIDEN IN THE .VARS SECTION.                                   */
          ./ REPLACE SEQ1=75
                         2 FLD_REC  LIKE ATTR_REC,
                         2 FLD_DATA           CHAR(80) VARYING,
                         2 FLD_INT_NAME       CHAR(6),
          ./ REPLACE SEQ1=92
                      PGM_VER                 CHAR(8) STATIC INIT('V2.1.0  ');
          ./ REPLACE SEQ1=107
                      DT_TIME_STAMP           CHAR(60) VARYING,
                      TITLE_STAMP             CHAR(50) VARYING;
          ./ REPLACE SEQ1=134,SEQ2=135
              DT_TIME_STAMP = '** GENERATED BY MAP3270 V2.1.0 ON ' ||
                              DATE || ' AT ' || TIME;
              TITLE_STAMP = ' GENERATED BY MAP3270 V2.1.0';
          ./ REPLACE SEQ1=174,SEQ2=203
                      PROCESS_STATUS = '.ATTR  ';
                      A = 0;
                      ATTRLIST='';
                 END;
                 ELSE
                 IF SUBSTR(MY_REC,1,7) = '.SCREEN' THEN
                 DO;
                      PROCESS_STATUS = '.SCREEN';
                      B = 0;
                      FLD_DEF = '';
                      FLD_A = 0;
                      ROW = 0;
                      COL = 0;
                      NO_ATTRIB = TRUE;
                 END;
                 ELSE

MAP3270   IEBUPDTX -- CORNELL EXTENDED UPDATE PROGRAM.  VERSION 1.12 (SLAC V.12/17/04)            DAY=010  03:09  01/10/11    PAGE 3


                 IF SUBSTR(MY_REC,1,5) = '.VARS' THEN
                      PROCESS_STATUS = '.VARS  ';
                 ELSE
                 IF SUBSTR(MY_REC,1,6) = '.NAME=' THEN
                 BEGIN;
                      DCL I FIXED BINARY(15);
                      PANEL_NAME = SUBSTR(MY_REC,7,7);
                      I = INDEX(PANEL_NAME,' ');
                      IF I > 0 THEN PANEL_NAME=SUBSTR(PANEL_NAME,1,I-1);
                 END;
                 ELSE
                 IF SUBSTR(MY_REC,1,1) = '*' THEN; /* DO NOT PROCESS COMMENT */
                 ELSE
                      CALL PROCESS_MYREC;
          ./ REPLACE SEQ1=223
           /*    ENSURE THE MAP DOES NOT VIOLATE HARDWARE PROTOCOL.             */
          ./ REPLACE SEQ1=265,SEQ2=285
                 PUT SKIP EDIT(ATTR_TBL(I).ATTR_CHR,
                               ATTR_TBL(I).ATTR_A) (X(12),A,X(2),A);
                 PUT SKIP EDIT(' ') (X(15),A);
                 CALL PRINT_ATTR(ATTR_TBL(I));
              END; /* OF LOOP */
          ./ REPLACE SEQ1=296
                  /** IF ATTR_TBL(FLD(J).FLD_ATTR).TITLE THEN
          ./ REPLACE SEQ1=305
                  **/    FLD(J).FLD_NAME = VAR(I).VAR_FLD;
          ./ REPLACE SEQ1=322,SEQ2=324
             /*  IF ^ATTR_TBL(FLD(I).FLD_ATTR).TITLE THEN  */
                 DO;
                    PUT SKIP EDIT(FLD(I).FLD_ROW,FLD(I).FLD_COL,
                                  FLD(I).FLD_NAME) (X(5),F(5),F(5),X(1),A(8));
                    CALL PRINT_ATTR(FLD(I).FLD_REC);
                 /* PUT SKIP DATA(FLD(I)); */
                 END;
          ./ REPLACE SEQ1=341
           /***************** END OF MAINLINE ****************/
          1/*********************************************************************/
           /*                                                                   */
           /*   THIS IS THE INITIALIZATION.  ALL THE FLD (FIELD) AND ATTRS ARE  */
           /*   INITIALIZED.                                                    */
           /*                                                                   */
           /*********************************************************************/
           INITIALIZE:PROC;
          ./ INSERT SEQ1=347
              FLD(*).FLD_INT_NAME=(6)' ';
              FLD(*).ATTR_CHR = ' ';
              FLD(*).ATTR_A = '';
              FLD(*).PROT = FALSE;
              FLD(*).NUM = FALSE;
              FLD(*).BRIGHT = FALSE;
              FLD(*).TITLE = FALSE;
              FLD(*).STOP_BIT = FALSE;
              FLD(*).CUR = FALSE;
              FLD(*).HI_LIGHT = ' ';
              FLD(*).COLOR = ' ';
          ./ INSERT SEQ1=359
              ATTR_TBL(*).HI_LIGHT = ' ';

MAP3270   IEBUPDTX -- CORNELL EXTENDED UPDATE PROGRAM.  VERSION 1.12 (SLAC V.12/17/04)            DAY=010  03:09  01/10/11    PAGE 4


              ATTR_TBL(*).COLOR = ' ';
          ./ REPLACE SEQ1=386
              ATTR_TBL(A).ATTR_A = '('||TEMP2||')';
          ./ REPLACE SEQ1=393,SEQ2=428
                    CALL CHECK_ATTR(SUBSTR(TEMP,1,I-1),ATTR_TBL(A));
                    TEMP=SUBSTR(TEMP,I+1);
                 END;
                 ELSE
                    CALL CHECK_ATTR(TEMP,ATTR_TBL(A));
              END;
              IF ATTR_TBL(A).TITLE THEN          /* OVERRIDE SOME ATTRS  */
              DO;                                /* FOR TYPE TITLE       */
                 ATTR_TBL(A).TITLE = TRUE;
                 ATTR_TBL(A).PROT = TRUE;
              /**ATTR_TBL(A).BRIGHT = FALSE;  DO NOT OVERRIDE BRIGHT   **/
                 ATTR_TBL(A).NUM = FALSE;
                 ATTR_TBL(A).STOP_BIT = FALSE;
                 ATTR_TBL(A).CUR = FALSE;
              END;
            /*PUT SKIP DATA(A,ATTR_TBL(A));*/
           END PROCESS_ATTRIBUTE;
          0/*********************************************************************/
           /*                                                                   */
           /*   THIS ROUTINE PROCESSES ALL OF THE ATTRIBUTES.  THEY CAN BE      */
           /*   SPECIFIED IN THE .ATTR OR .VARS SECTION.  THE MAP DEFAULTS      */
           /*   CAN BE SET IN THE .ATTR AND OVERRIDEN FOR EACH FIELD IN THE     */
           /*   .VARS SECTION.                                                  */
           /*                                                                   */
           /*********************************************************************/
          0CHECK_ATTR:PROC(AT,ATTR);
              DCL AT CHAR(*) VARYING,
                  ATTR LIKE ATTR_REC;
              SELECT (AT);
                WHEN ('TITLE')     ATTR.TITLE = TRUE;
                WHEN ('BRIGHT')    ATTR.BRIGHT = TRUE;
                WHEN ('NORMAL')    ATTR.BRIGHT = FALSE;
                WHEN ('NUM')       ATTR.NUM = TRUE;
                WHEN ('ALPHA')     ATTR.NUM = FALSE;
                WHEN ('PROT')      ATTR.PROT = TRUE;
                WHEN ('UNPROT')    ATTR.PROT = FALSE;
                WHEN ('CUR')       ATTR.CUR = TRUE;
                WHEN ('STOP')      ATTR.STOP_BIT = TRUE;
                WHEN ('HIDEF')     ATTR.HI_LIGHT = 'D';
                WHEN ('BLINK')     ATTR.HI_LIGHT = 'B';
                WHEN ('REVERSE')   ATTR.HI_LIGHT = 'R';
                WHEN ('ULINE')     ATTR.HI_LIGHT = 'U';
                                                     /* COLOR CODE */
                WHEN ('DEFAULT')   ATTR.COLOR = 'DEF';  /* 40 */
                WHEN ('BLUE')      ATTR.COLOR = 'BLU';  /* F1 */
                WHEN ('RED')       ATTR.COLOR = 'RED';  /* F2 */
                WHEN ('PINK')      ATTR.COLOR = 'PNK';  /* F3 */
                WHEN ('GREEN')     ATTR.COLOR = 'GRN';  /* F4 */
                WHEN ('TURQ')      ATTR.COLOR = 'TUR';  /* F5 */
                WHEN ('YELLOW')    ATTR.COLOR = 'YEL';  /* F6 */
                WHEN ('WHITE')     ATTR.COLOR = 'WHI';  /* F7 */
                WHEN ('BLACK')     ATTR.COLOR = 'BLK';  /* F8 */
                WHEN ('DBLUE')     ATTR.COLOR = 'DBL';  /* F9 */

MAP3270   IEBUPDTX -- CORNELL EXTENDED UPDATE PROGRAM.  VERSION 1.12 (SLAC V.12/17/04)            DAY=010  03:09  01/10/11    PAGE 5


                WHEN ('ORANGE')    ATTR.COLOR = 'ORA';  /* FA */
                WHEN ('PURPLE')    ATTR.COLOR = 'PUR';  /* FB */
                WHEN ('PGREEN')    ATTR.COLOR = 'PGR';  /* FC */
                WHEN ('PTURQ')     ATTR.COLOR = 'PTQ';  /* FD */
                WHEN ('GREY')      ATTR.COLOR = 'GRY';  /* FE */
                WHEN ('NEUTRAL')   ATTR.COLOR = 'NEU';  /* FF */
              OTHERWISE
              DO;
                 PUT SKIP EDIT('*** INVALID ATTRIBUTE ''',AT,''' DETECTED ***')
                              (A,A,A);
                 ERROR_FOUND = TRUE;
              END;
            /*PUT SKIP LIST(ATTR.COLOR);*/
           END CHECK_ATTR;
          1/*********************************************************************/
           /*                                                                   */
           /*   THIS ROUTINE PROCESSES ALL OF THE VARS LINES.  THE GENERAL      */
           /*   FORMAT IS:                                                      */
           /*   R99C99=NAME123,ATTR,ATTR COMMENTS                               */
           /*   R99C99 IS THE NAME GENERATED BY MAP3270.                        */
           /*   NAME IS 1 TO 7 CHARACTER NAME ASSIGNED BY THE PROGRAMMER.       */
           /*   ,ATTR IS AN ADDITIONAL OR OVERRIDE ATTRIBUTE FOR THIS FIELD.    */
           /*         0 OR MORE ATTRS MAY BE SPECIFIED.  THE LIST ENDS WHEN     */
           /*         THE FIRST SPACE IS ENCOUNTERED.                           */
           /*                                                                   */
           /*********************************************************************/

           PROCESS_VARS:PROC;
              DECLARE (MATCH_INI_NAME,MATCH_NAME) BIT(1) ALIGNED;
              DECLARE (TEMP,TEMP2)        CHAR(78) VARYING;
              DECLARE (I,COMMA,BLANK,NST,NLEN) FIXED BINARY(15) ALIGNED;
              DECLARE (FLD_NAME_PTR)           FIXED BINARY(15) ALIGNED;
          ./ REPLACE SEQ1=435
              COMMA=INDEX(MY_REC,',');
              BLANK=INDEX(MY_REC,' ');
              NST=8;
              SELECT (TRUE);
                 WHEN (COMMA=0 & BLANK>0)  /* NO COMMA FOUND BUT A BLANK WAS */
                     NLEN=BLANK-NST;
                 WHEN (BLANK=0 & COMMA>0)    /* NO BLANK FOUND BUT A COMMA WAS */
                     NLEN=COMMA-NST;
                 WHEN (COMMA<BLANK)    /* ATTR STARTS BEFORE BLANK       */
                     NLEN=COMMA-NST;
                 WHEN (COMMA>BLANK)    /* BLANK APPEARS BEFORE COMMA     */
                     NLEN=BLANK-NST;
                 OTHERWISE
                 DO;
                    PUT SKIP EDIT('*** LOGIC ERROR 1 ***') (A);
                    ERROR_FOUND = TRUE;
                    RETURN;
                 END;
              IF NLEN>7 THEN
          ./ REPLACE SEQ1=442,SEQ2=472
                 IF VAR(I).VAR_NAME = SUBSTR(MY_REC,1,6) THEN
                 DO;
                     PUT SKIP EDIT('*** DUPLICATE VAR NAME ',VAR(I).VAR_NAME,
                                  ' ***') (A,A,A);

MAP3270   IEBUPDTX -- CORNELL EXTENDED UPDATE PROGRAM.  VERSION 1.12 (SLAC V.12/17/04)            DAY=010  03:09  01/10/11    PAGE 6


                     ERROR_FOUND = TRUE;
                     RETURN;
                 END;
                 IF VAR(I).VAR_FLD = SUBSTR(MY_REC,NST,NLEN) THEN
                 DO;
                     PUT SKIP EDIT('*** DUPLICATE VAR FIELD ',
                                   SUBSTR(MY_REC,NST,NLEN),' ***') (A,A,A);
                     ERROR_FOUND = TRUE;
                     RETURN;
                 END;
              END;
              MATCH_INI_NAME=FALSE;
              MATCH_NAME=FALSE;
              FLD_NAME_PTR=0;
              DO WHILE(FLD_NAME_PTR<FLD_CTR & ^MATCH_INI_NAME);
                 FLD_NAME_PTR=FLD_NAME_PTR+1;
                 MATCH_INI_NAME =
                       (FLD(FLD_NAME_PTR).FLD_INT_NAME = SUBSTR(MY_REC,1,6));
              END;
              IF MATCH_INI_NAME THEN ;
              ELSE
              DO;
                 PUT SKIP EDIT('*** INTERNAL NAME NOT DEFINED ',
                               SUBSTR(MY_REC,1,6),
                               ' ***') (A,A,A);
                 ERROR_FOUND = TRUE;
                 RETURN;
              END;
              VAR_CTR=VAR_CTR+1;
              VAR(VAR_CTR).VAR_NAME=SUBSTR(MY_REC,1,6);
              VAR(VAR_CTR).VAR_FLD=SUBSTR(MY_REC,NST,NLEN);
              I=INDEX(VAR(VAR_CTR).VAR_FLD,' ');
              IF I=0 THEN ;               /* NAME HAS NO SPACES - IT IS OK */
              ELSE
              IF I=1 THEN
              DO;
                 PUT SKIP EDIT('*** USER DEFINED NAME IS BLANK ***') (A);
                 ERROR_FOUND = TRUE;
                 RETURN;
              END;
              IF COMMA=0 | BLANK<COMMA THEN    /* NO ATTRIBUTES */
                  RETURN;
              TEMP,TEMP2 = SUBSTR(MY_REC,NST+NLEN+1);  /* GET RID OF NAME */
              BLANK=INDEX(TEMP,' ');
              IF BLANK>0 THEN TEMP,TEMP2=SUBSTR(TEMP,1,BLANK-1);
              FLD(FLD_NAME_PTR).ATTR_A=FLD(FLD_NAME_PTR).ATTR_A||'<'||TEMP2||'>';
              I=1;
              DO WHILE(I>0);
                 I=INDEX(TEMP,',');
                 IF I>0 THEN
                 DO;
                    CALL CHECK_ATTR(SUBSTR(TEMP,1,I-1),FLD(FLD_NAME_PTR).FLD_REC);
                    TEMP=SUBSTR(TEMP,I+1);
                 END;
                 ELSE
                    CALL CHECK_ATTR(TEMP,FLD(FLD_NAME_PTR).FLD_REC);
              END;

MAP3270   IEBUPDTX -- CORNELL EXTENDED UPDATE PROGRAM.  VERSION 1.12 (SLAC V.12/17/04)            DAY=010  03:09  01/10/11    PAGE 7


           /* PUT SKIP LIST ('INPUT=>',VAR_CTR,VAR(VAR_CTR).VAR_NAME,
                                         ''''||VAR(VAR_CTR).VAR_FLD||'''');
              PUT SKIP DATA (FLD(FLD_NAME_PTR)); */
          ./ REPLACE SEQ1=503
                   /*  IF SUBSTR(X,C,1)= '''' THEN DATA = DATA  ''''  */
          ./ REPLACE SEQ1=520,SEQ2=525
              FLD(FLD_CTR).FLD_INT_NAME,
              FLD(FLD_CTR).FLD_NAME = 'R'||R||'C'||C;
              FLD(FLD_CTR).FLD_ROW  = ROW;
              FLD(FLD_CTR).FLD_COL  = COL;
              FLD(FLD_CTR).FLD_ATTR = I;
              FLD(FLD_CTR).FLD_REC = ATTR_TBL(I);
            /*PUT SKIP DATA(FLD(FLD_CTR));*/
           END SAVE_FIELD;
          1/*********************************************************************/
           /*                                                                   */
           /* PRINT_ATTR - PRINT ATTRIBUTES FOR A GIVEN FIELD                   */
           /*                                                                   */
           /*********************************************************************/
           PRINT_ATTR:PROC(ATTR);
              DECLARE ATTR LIKE ATTR_REC;
                 IF ATTR.TITLE THEN
                    PUT EDIT('TITLE ') (A);

                 IF ATTR.NUM THEN PUT EDIT('NUM ') (A);
                 ELSE PUT EDIT('ALPHA ') (A);

                 IF ATTR.PROT THEN PUT EDIT('PROT ') (A);
                 ELSE PUT EDIT('UNPROT ') (A);

                 IF ATTR.BRIGHT THEN PUT EDIT('BRIGHT ') (A);
                 ELSE PUT EDIT('NORMAL ') (A);

                 SELECT (ATTR.HI_LIGHT)
                     WHEN (' ')  ;
                     WHEN ('D')  PUT EDIT('HI DEFAULT ') (A);
                     WHEN ('U')  PUT EDIT('UNDERLINE ') (A);
                     WHEN ('R')  PUT EDIT('REVERSE ') (A);
                     WHEN ('B')  PUT EDIT('BLINK ') (A);
                     OTHERWISE
                     DO;
                         PUT SKIP(2) EDIT('*** ERROR *** INVALID ATTRIBUTE ',
                                          'VALUE ***') (A,A);
                         ERROR_FOUND = TRUE;
                     END;

                 IF ATTR.CUR  THEN PUT EDIT('CUR ') (A);

                 IF ATTR.STOP_BIT THEN PUT EDIT('STOP ') (A);
                 PUT EDIT(ATTR.COLOR,' ') (A,A);
           END PRINT_ATTR;
          ./ REPLACE SEQ1=546,SEQ2=548
              PUT FILE(PANEL) EDIT('TITLE ''PANEL ',PANEL_NAME,' ',
                                   TITLE_STAMP,'''')     (COL(10),A,A,A,A,A)
                                  (PANEL_SEQ)            (COL(73),P'999999V99');
              PANE_SEQ=PANEL_SEQ+1;
              PUT FILE(PANEL) EDIT(DT_TIME_STAMP)                    (COL(1),A)

MAP3270   IEBUPDTX -- CORNELL EXTENDED UPDATE PROGRAM.  VERSION 1.12 (SLAC V.12/17/04)            DAY=010  03:09  01/10/11    PAGE 8


                                  (PANEL_SEQ)            (COL(73),P'999999V99')
                                  (PANEL_NAME,'TSECT')            (A,COL(10),A)
          ./ REPLACE SEQ1=637,SEQ2=653
              IF FLD(F).PROT THEN
                  MACRO_LN = MACRO_LN || ',PROT=YES';
              ELSE
                  MACRO_LN = MACRO_LN || ',PROT=NO';
              IF FLD(F).BRIGHT THEN
                  MACRO_LN = MACRO_LN || ',BRIGHT=YES';
              ELSE
                  MACRO_LN = MACRO_LN || ',BRIGHT=NO';
              IF FLD(F).NUM THEN
                  MACRO_LN = MACRO_LN || ',NUM=YES';
              ELSE
                  MACRO_LN = MACRO_LN || ',NUM=NO';
              IF FLD(F).STOP_BIT &
                 LENGTH(FLD_DEF)+FLD(F).FLD_COL < 80 THEN
                  MACRO_LN = MACRO_LN || ',STOP=YES';
              ELSE
                  MACRO_LN = MACRO_LN || ',STOP=NO';
          0
              IF FLD(F).HI_LIGHT ^= ' ' | FLD(F).COLOR ^= ' ' THEN
              DO;
                 MACRO_LN = MACRO_LN || ',';
                 PUT FILE(PANEL)
                         EDIT(MACRO_LN,'*',PANEL_SEQ) (A,COL(72),A,P'999999V99');
                 PANEL_SEQ=PANEL_SEQ+1;
                 MACRO_LN = (15)' ';
                 IF FLD(F).HI_LIGHT = 'U' THEN
                    MACRO_LN = MACRO_LN || 'HILITE=ULN';
                 ELSE
                 IF FLD(F).HI_LIGHT = 'R' THEN
                    MACRO_LN = MACRO_LN || 'HILITE=REV';
                 ELSE
                 IF FLD(F).HI_LIGHT = 'B' THEN
                    MACRO_LN = MACRO_LN || 'HILITE=BLN';
                 ELSE
                 IF FLD(F).HI_LIGHT = 'D' THEN
                    MACRO_LN = MACRO_LN || 'HILITE=DEF';
                 IF FLD(F).HI_LIGHT ^= ' ' & FLD(F).COLOR ^= ' ' THEN
                    MACRO_LN = MACRO_LN || ',';
                 IF FLD(F).COLOR ^= ' ' THEN
                    MACRO_LN = MACRO_LN || 'COLOR=' || FLD(F).COLOR;
              END;
          0
          ./ INSERT SEQ1=701
              PUT FILE(PANEL) EDIT(DT_TIME_STAMP)                    (COL(1),A)
                                  (PANEL_SEQ)            (COL(73),P'999999V99');
              PANEL_SEQ=PANEL_SEQ+1;
*** MEMBER MAP3270  HAS BEEN ADDED            390 RECORDS WRITTEN
       NEW MAP3270  ENTRY: TTR=000104 INDC=00

____________________________________________________________________________________________________________________________________

          <02>  ./ ENDUP

*** END OF JOB IEBUPDTX.  STEP RETURN CODE = 04.

*** MAKESTMT-./ INSERT SEQ1=0


          IEBUPDTX -- CORNELL EXTENDED UPDATE PROGRAM.  VERSION 1.12 (SLAC V.12/17/04)            DAY=010  03:09  01/10/11    PAGE 1


EXEC PARMS      CHAINUPD,CHAIN=TS,NOIMPLSEQ,LISTDEL

*** DDNAME=SYSIN      <02> OPEN FOR  INPUT, DSORG=PS, DSNAME=SYS11010.T030946.RA000.HERC013.STMTG1 ON WORK02
                                                          DSNAME=SYS11010.T030946.RA000.HERC013.STMTG2 ON WORK00

MAP3270   IEBUPDTX -- CORNELL EXTENDED UPDATE PROGRAM.  VERSION 1.12 (SLAC V.12/17/04)            DAY=010  03:09  01/10/11    PAGE 2

*** YOU HAVE BEEN ASSIGNED VERSION NUMBER 001
*** PLEASE USE THIS VERSION FOR YOUR CURRENT WORK ON THIS MEMBER
       OLD MAP3270  ENTRY: TTR=000510 INDC=00
       NEW MAP3270  ENTRY: TTR=000510 INDC=89 SSI=FF200000 DATA=D4C1 D7F3 F2F7 F040 E3E2 007C 001F
       NEW TS007000 ENTRY: TTR=000510 INDC=89 SSI=FF200000 DATA=D4C1 D7F3 F2F7 F040 E3E2 007C 000C


          <02>  ./ INSERT SEQ1=0
<02>  *** NO RECORDS INSERTED ***
                                          ______________________________NEW_MASTER_________________________________NEWSEQ_____PREV__
                                    <01>   /********************** MAP3270 V2.1.0********************************/00000001
                                           /*********************************************************************/00000002
                                           /*                                                                   */00000003
                                           /* NAME: MAP3270 - SCREEN COMPILER                                   */00000004
                                           /*                                                                   */00000005
                                           /*********************************************************************/00000006
                                           /*                                                                   */00000007
                                           /*  (C) COPYRIGHT 2009  CEDAR LAKE EMPORIUM LLC   ALL RIGHTS RESERVED*/00000008
                                    <01>   /*  (C) COPYRIGHT 2010  CEDAR LAKE EMPORIUM LLC   ALL RIGHTS RESERVED*/00000009
                                           /*                                                                   */00000010  00000009
                                           /*  THIS SOURCE CODE AS WELL AS ANY OBJECT CODE RESULTING FROM THIS  */00000011  00000010
                                           /*  SOURCE CODE MAY BE DISTRIBUTED FREELY PROVIDED NO FEE IS CHARGED */00000012  00000011
                                           /*  AND FOR NON-COMERCIAL PURPOSES.                                  */00000013  00000012
                                           /*                                                                   */00000014  00000013
                                           /*  FOR COMMERCIAL DISTRIBUTION RIGHTS, CONTACT THE COPYRIGHT OWNER. */00000015  00000014
                                           /*                                                                   */00000016  00000015
                                           /*********************************************************************/00000017  00000016
                                           /*                                                                   */00000018  00000017
                                           /* THIS IS A PROGRAM TO PROCESS A SCREEN DEFINITION FILE AND CREATES */00000019  00000018
                                           /* A PANEL FOR THE MAP3270 SYSTEM.                                   */00000020  00000019
                                           /*                                                                   */00000021  00000020
                                           /* A PANEL FOR THE MAP3270 SYSTEM CONSISTS OF 2 COMPONENTS - A       */00000022  00000021
                                           /* PHYSICAL MAP AND A USER MAP.  CONCEPTUALLY THESE ARE LIKE CICS    */00000023  00000022
                                           /* PHYSICAL AND SYMBOLIC MAPS.  HOWEVER, THERE IS NO COMPATABILITY.  */00000024  00000023
                                           /*                                                                   */00000025  00000024
                                           /* THE PHYSICAL MAP IS CONSISTS OF AN INDEX, THE ACTUAL 3270 MAP     */00000026  00000025
                                           /* AND THE CROSS REFERENCE FROM THE PHYSICAL MAP TO A USER MAP.      */00000027  00000026
                                           /* THE USER MAP IS THE AREA THAT USER'S APPLICATION SENDS AND        */00000028  00000027
                                           /* RECEIVES DATA FROM MAP3270 RUNTIME MODULES.                       */00000029  00000028
                                           /*                                                                   */00000030  00000029
                                           /* USER MAPS ARE GENERATED FOR ASSEMBLER, COBOL, AND PL/I (F).       */00000031  00000030
                                           /* THE PHYSICAL MAP IS GENERATED AND MUST BE ASSEMLED AND LINKED.    */00000032  00000031
                                           /*                                                                   */00000033  00000032
                                           /* REVISION HISTORY                                                  */00000034  00000033
                                           /* ------  --------------------------------------------------------  */00000035  00000034
                                           /* V2.0.0  "DOWNGRADED" FROM PL/1 OPTIMIZING COMPILER TO PL/1 (F)    */00000036  00000035
                                           /*         SEPT 2008                                                 */00000037  00000036
                                    <01>   /* V2.1.0  ADDED SUPPORT FOR THE EXTENTED ATTRIBUTES HIGHLITE AND    */00000038  00000037
                                    <01>   /*         COLOR.                                                    */00000039  00000038
                                    <01>   /*         REWORKED CODE TO USE THE SELECT...WHEN  MACRO, WHICH      */00000040  00000039
                                    <01>   /*         SIMULATES THE SELECT STATEMENT.                           */00000041  00000040
                                    <01>   /*         AUGUST 2010                                               */00000042  00000041
                                    <01>   /*                                                                   */00000043  00000042
                                    <01>   /*********************************************************************/00000044  00000043
                                    <01>   %INCLUDE SELECT;                                                       00000045  00000044
                                          1MAPGEN:PROC OPTIONS(MAIN);                                             00000046  00000039

MAP3270   IEBUPDTX -- CORNELL EXTENDED UPDATE PROGRAM.  VERSION 1.12 (SLAC V.12/17/04)            DAY=010  03:09  01/10/11    PAGE 3


                                              DECLARE (PANEL,ASM,COB,PL1)                                         00000047  00000040
                                                       STREAM OUTPUT FILE;                                        00000048  00000041
                                              DECLARE  PANEL_SEQ              FIXED DEC(9,2) INIT(1);             00000049  00000042
                                              DECLARE  NOT_E_O_F              BIT(1) ALIGNED;                     00000050  00000043
                                              DECLARE  NO_ATTRIB              BIT(1) ALIGNED;                     00000051  00000044
                                              DECLARE  PANEL_NAME             CHAR(7) VARYING INIT('PANELNM');    00000052  00000045
                                              DECLARE  MY_REC                 CHAR(80);                           00000053  00000046
                                              DECLARE  PROCESS_STATUS         CHAR(7);                            00000054  00000047
                                              DECLARE  SCR_IMG(26)            CHAR(82);                           00000055  00000048
                                              DECLARE  ERROR_FOUND            BIT(1) ALIGNED INIT('0'B),          00000056  00000049
                                                       IHESARC                ENTRY(FIXED BIN(31,0)),             00000057  00000050
                                                       RETURN_CODE            FIXED BIN(31,0) ALIGNED INIT(0);    00000058  00000051
                                          -/*********************************************************************/00000059  00000052
                                           /*                                                                   */00000060  00000053
                                           /* ATTR_TBL HOLDS ALL ATTRIBUTES FOR THE ATTR_CHR PARSED FROM .ATTR  */00000061  00000054
                                           /*                                                                   */00000062  00000055
                                           /*********************************************************************/00000063  00000056
                                    <01>      DECLARE  1 ATTR_REC,                                                00000064  00000057
                                                         2 ATTR_CHR           CHAR(1),                            00000065  00000058
                                                         2 ATTR_A             CHAR(80) VARYING,                   00000066  00000059
                                                         2 PROT               BIT(1) ALIGNED,                     00000067  00000060
                                                         2 BRIGHT             BIT(1) ALIGNED,                     00000068  00000061
                                                         2 NUM                BIT(1) ALIGNED,                     00000069  00000062
                                                         2 TITLE              BIT(1) ALIGNED,                     00000070  00000063
                                                         2 STOP_BIT           BIT(1) ALIGNED,                     00000071  00000064
                                    <01>                 2 CUR                BIT(1) ALIGNED,                     00000072  00000065
                                    <01>                 2 HI_LIGHT           CHAR(1),                            00000073  00000066
                                    <01>                 2 COLOR              CHAR(3);                            00000074  00000067
                                    <01>      DECLARE  1 ATTR_TBL(9) LIKE ATTR_REC;                               00000075  00000068
                                    <01>  -/*********************************************************************/00000076  00000069
                                    <01>   /*                                                                   */00000077  00000070
                                    <01>   /* FLDS HOLDS ALL THE FIELD INFORMATION PARSED FROM THE .SCREEN      */00000078  00000071
                                    <01>   /* THE ATTRS ARE REPEATED SO THE ATTRIBUTES FOR FIELDS CAN BE        */00000079  00000072
                                    <01>   /* OVERRIDEN IN THE .VARS SECTION.                                   */00000080  00000073
                                           /*                                                                   */00000081  00000069
                                           /*********************************************************************/00000082  00000070
                                              DECLARE  1 FLD(500),                                                00000083  00000071
                                                         2 FLD_ROW            FIXED BINARY(15),                   00000084  00000072
                                                         2 FLD_COL            FIXED BINARY(15),                   00000085  00000073
                                                         2 FLD_ATTR           FIXED BINARY(15),                   00000086  00000074
                                    <01>                 2 FLD_REC  LIKE ATTR_REC,                                00000087  00000075
                                    <01>                 2 FLD_DATA           CHAR(80) VARYING,                   00000088  00000076
                                    <01>                 2 FLD_INT_NAME       CHAR(6),                            00000089  00000077
                                                         2 FLD_NAME           CHAR(8)  VARYING;                   00000090  00000076
                                          1/*********************************************************************/00000091  00000077
                                           /*                                                                   */00000092  00000078
                                           /* VARS HOLDS ALL THE FIELD INFORMATION PARSED FROM THE .VARS        */00000093  00000079
                                           /*                                                                   */00000094  00000080
                                           /*********************************************************************/00000095  00000081
                                              DECLARE  1 VAR(500),                                                00000096  00000082
                                                         2 VAR_NAME           CHAR(6),                            00000097  00000083
                                                         2 VAR_FLD            CHAR(6) VARYING;                    00000098  00000084
                                          -/*********************************************************************/00000099  00000085
                                           /*                                                                   */00000100  00000086
                                           /*   STATIC FIELDS DEFINED HERE                                      */00000101  00000087
                                           /*                                                                   */00000102  00000088
                                           /*********************************************************************/00000103  00000089

MAP3270   IEBUPDTX -- CORNELL EXTENDED UPDATE PROGRAM.  VERSION 1.12 (SLAC V.12/17/04)            DAY=010  03:09  01/10/11    PAGE 4


                                              DECLARE PAGE_TITLE              CHAR(45) STATIC INIT(               00000104  00000090
                                                   'M A P 3 2 7 0   S C R E E N   C O M P I L E R'),              00000105  00000091
                                    <01>              PGM_VER                 CHAR(8) STATIC INIT('V2.1.0  ');    00000106  00000092
                                              DECLARE (TRUE    INITIAL('1'B),                                     00000107  00000093
                                                       FALSE   INITIAL('0'B)) BIT(1) ALIGNED STATIC,              00000108  00000094
                                                       ONE     INITIAL(1)     FIXED BIN(15)  STATIC;              00000109  00000095
                                          1/*********************************************************************/00000110  00000096
                                           /*                                                                   */00000111  00000097
                                           /*   GLOBAL VARIABLES DEFINED HERE                                   */00000112  00000098
                                           /*                                                                   */00000113  00000099
                                           /*********************************************************************/00000114  00000100
                                          -   DECLARE  FLD_DEF                CHAR(80) VARYING;                   00000115  00000101
                                              DECLARE (B,ROW,COL,A,REC_CTR)   FIXED BINARY(15);                   00000116  00000102
                                              DECLARE (FLD_CTR,M,FLD_A      ) FIXED BINARY(15);                   00000117  00000103
                                              DECLARE VAR_CTR                 FIXED BINARY(15);                   00000118  00000104
                                              DECLARE LBL                     CHAR(7) VARYING,                    00000119  00000105
                                                      PAGE_NO                 FIXED DEC(3,0) INIT(0),             00000120  00000106
                                    <01>              DT_TIME_STAMP           CHAR(60) VARYING,                   00000121  00000107
                                    <01>              TITLE_STAMP             CHAR(50) VARYING;                   00000122  00000108
                                          1/*********************************************************************/00000123  00000108
                                           /*                                                                   */00000124  00000109
                                           /* READ AND LIST THE INPUT STATEMENTS.  SET UP THE PAGE HEADING      */00000125  00000110
                                           /*    SET UP THE PAGE HEADING.  THEN THE INPUT IS LISTED AND PARSED  */00000126  00000111
                                           /*    INPUT CONSISTS OF SECTIONS AND COMMAND.  EACH SECTION STARTS   */00000127  00000112
                                           /*    WITH '.NAME ' IN COL 1.  VALID NAMES ARE LISTED BELOW.         */00000128  00000113
                                           /*    COMMAND START WITH '.KW=' IN COL 1.                            */00000129  00000114
                                           /*                                                                   */00000130  00000115
                                           /* THERE ARE 3 SECTIONS                                              */00000131  00000116
                                           /* 1.  ATTR - THIS IS WHERE THE ATTRIBUTES ARE DEFINED. THESE MUST   */00000132  00000117
                                           /*     BE DEFINED BEFORE USE IN THE SCREEN SECTION.                  */00000133  00000118
                                           /* 2.  SCREEN - THIS IS WHERE THE 'DRAWING' OF THE SCREEN IS         */00000134  00000119
                                           /*     IS DEFINED.  EACH FIELD BEGIN WITH AN ATTRIBUTED AS DEFINED   */00000135  00000120
                                           /*     IN THE ATTR SECTION.                                          */00000136  00000121
                                           /* 3.  VARS - THIS OPTIONAL SECTION MAPS ANY USER DEFINED FIELD      */00000137  00000122
                                           /*     NAME TO BE DEFINED.  THESE NAME REPLACE THE DEFAULT NAME OF   */00000138  00000123
                                           /*     R99C99.                                                       */00000139  00000124
                                           /*                                                                   */00000140  00000125
                                           /* THE FOLLOWING IS A LIST OF COMMAND CURRENTLY SUPPORTED:           */00000141  00000126
                                           /*                                                                   */00000142  00000127
                                           /* 1.  .NAME= THIS COMMAND SETS THE NAME FOR THE PANEL.  NAME CAN    */00000143  00000128
                                           /*     BE ANY VALID NAME 1-7 CHARACTERS.  MAP3270 GENERATES SOME     */00000144  00000129
                                           /*     INTERNAL NAMES USING 'NAME' PLUS 1 CHARACTER.                 */00000145  00000130
                                           /*                                                                   */00000146  00000131
                                           /*********************************************************************/00000147  00000132
                                                                                                                  00000148  00000133
                                    <01>      DT_TIME_STAMP = '** GENERATED BY MAP3270 V2.1.0 ON ' ||             00000149  00000134
                                    <01>                      DATE || ' AT ' || TIME;                             00000150  00000135
                                    <01>      TITLE_STAMP = ' GENERATED BY MAP3270 V2.1.0';                       00000151  00000136
                                              CALL INITIALIZE;                                                    00000152  00000136
                                              ON ENDPAGE(SYSPRINT)                                                00000153  00000137
                                              BEGIN;                                                              00000154  00000138
                                                 PAGE_NO = PAGE_NO + 1;                                           00000155  00000139
                                                 PUT PAGE EDIT(PAGE_TITLE,PGM_VER,'PAGE ',PAGE_NO)                00000156  00000140
                                                              (A,COL(100),A,COL(111),A,F(3));                     00000157  00000141
                                                 PUT SKIP(2) EDIT('INPUT STATEMENTS')(A)                          00000158  00000142
                                                                 (' LINE:   STATEMENT') (SKIP(2),A)               00000159  00000143
                                                                 ('------   ---------') (SKIP,A);                 00000160  00000144

MAP3270   IEBUPDTX -- CORNELL EXTENDED UPDATE PROGRAM.  VERSION 1.12 (SLAC V.12/17/04)            DAY=010  03:09  01/10/11    PAGE 5


                                              END;                                                                00000161  00000145
                                                                                                                  00000162  00000146
                                              SIGNAL ENDPAGE(SYSPRINT);                                           00000163  00000147
                                              PROCESS_STATUS = '.NONE';                                           00000164  00000148
                                              ON ENDFILE(SYSIN)                                                   00000165  00000149
                                                 NOT_E_O_F = FALSE;                                               00000166  00000150
                                              NOT_E_O_F = TRUE;                                                   00000167  00000151
                                          1/*********************************************************************/00000168  00000152
                                           /*                                                                   */00000169  00000153
                                           /*  PPPP    AAA    SSS    SSS     1                                  */00000170  00000154
                                           /*  P   P  A   A  S      S       11                                  */00000171  00000155
                                           /*  PPPP   A   A  S      S        1                                  */00000172  00000156
                                           /*  P      AAAAA   SSS    SSS     1                                  */00000173  00000157
                                           /*  P      A   A      S      S    1                                  */00000174  00000158
                                           /*  P      A   A      S      S    1                                  */00000175  00000159
                                           /*  P      A   A   SSS    SSS   11111                                */00000176  00000160
                                           /*                                                                   */00000177  00000161
                                           /*  READ AND PRINT THE INPUT STATEMENTS                              */00000178  00000162
                                           /*    DETERMINE THE SECTION AND PASS TO THE APPROPRIATE SECTION      */00000179  00000163
                                           /*    FOR PROCESSING.                                                */00000180  00000164
                                           /*    COMMANDS ARE PARSED AND PROCESSED IMMEDIATELY.                 */00000181  00000165
                                           /*                                                                   */00000182  00000166
                                           /*********************************************************************/00000183  00000167
                                              GET EDIT(MY_REC) (A(80));                                           00000184  00000168
                                              DO WHILE (NOT_E_O_F);                                               00000185  00000169
                                                 REC_CTR = REC_CTR + 1;                                           00000186  00000170
                                                 PUT SKIP EDIT(REC_CTR,':',MY_REC) (F(5),A(4),A);                 00000187  00000171
                                                 IF SUBSTR(MY_REC,1,5) = '.ATTR' THEN                             00000188  00000172
                                                 DO;                                                              00000189  00000173
                                    <01>              PROCESS_STATUS = '.ATTR  ';                                 00000190  00000174
                                    <01>              A = 0;                                                      00000191  00000175
                                    <01>              ATTRLIST='';                                                00000192  00000176
                                    <01>         END;                                                             00000193  00000177
                                    <01>         ELSE                                                             00000194  00000178
                                    <01>         IF SUBSTR(MY_REC,1,7) = '.SCREEN' THEN                           00000195  00000179
                                    <01>         DO;                                                              00000196  00000180
                                    <01>              PROCESS_STATUS = '.SCREEN';                                 00000197  00000181
                                    <01>              B = 0;                                                      00000198  00000182
                                    <01>              FLD_DEF = '';                                               00000199  00000183
                                    <01>              FLD_A = 0;                                                  00000200  00000184
                                    <01>              ROW = 0;                                                    00000201  00000185
