                                    <01>              COL = 0;                                                    00000202  00000186
                                    <01>              NO_ATTRIB = TRUE;                                           00000203  00000187
                                    <01>         END;                                                             00000204  00000188
                                    <01>         ELSE                                                             00000205  00000189
                                    <01>         IF SUBSTR(MY_REC,1,5) = '.VARS' THEN                             00000206  00000190
                                    <01>              PROCESS_STATUS = '.VARS  ';                                 00000207  00000191
                                    <01>         ELSE                                                             00000208  00000192
                                    <01>         IF SUBSTR(MY_REC,1,6) = '.NAME=' THEN                            00000209  00000193
                                    <01>         BEGIN;                                                           00000210  00000194
                                    <01>              DCL I FIXED BINARY(15);                                     00000211  00000195
                                    <01>              PANEL_NAME = SUBSTR(MY_REC,7,7);                            00000212  00000196
                                    <01>              I = INDEX(PANEL_NAME,' ');                                  00000213  00000197
                                    <01>              IF I > 0 THEN PANEL_NAME=SUBSTR(PANEL_NAME,1,I-1);          00000214  00000198
                                    <01>         END;                                                             00000215  00000199
                                    <01>         ELSE                                                             00000216  00000200
                                    <01>         IF SUBSTR(MY_REC,1,1) = '*' THEN; /* DO NOT PROCESS COMMENT */   00000217  00000201

MAP3270   IEBUPDTX -- CORNELL EXTENDED UPDATE PROGRAM.  VERSION 1.12 (SLAC V.12/17/04)            DAY=010  03:09  01/10/11    PAGE 6


                                    <01>         ELSE                                                             00000218  00000202
                                    <01>              CALL PROCESS_MYREC;                                         00000219  00000203
                                                 GET EDIT(MY_REC) (A(80));                                        00000220  00000204
                                              END; /* OF LOOP */                                                  00000221  00000205
                                              IF FLD_DEF ^= '' THEN             /* IF WE STILL HAVE DATA      */  00000222  00000206
                                              DO;                                                                 00000223  00000207
                                                 CALL SAVE_FIELD(ONE);          /* WRITE DATA FOR LAST FIELD  */  00000224  00000208
                                                 FLD_DEF = '';                                                    00000225  00000209
                                              END;                                                                00000226  00000210
                                          1/*********************************************************************/00000227  00000211
                                           /*                                                                   */00000228  00000212
                                           /*  PPPP    AAA    SSS    SSS    222                                 */00000229  00000213
                                           /*  P   P  A   A  S      S      2   2                                */00000230  00000214
                                           /*  PPPP   A   A  S      S          2                                */00000231  00000215
                                           /*  P      AAAAA   SSS    SSS      2                                 */00000232  00000216
                                           /*  P      A   A      S      S    2                                  */00000233  00000217
                                           /*  P      A   A      S      S   2                                   */00000234  00000218
                                           /*  P      A   A   SSS    SSS   22222                                */00000235  00000219
                                           /*                                                                   */00000236  00000220
                                           /*  SET UP THE PAGE HEADINGS FOR THE SECOND PASS.                    */00000237  00000221
                                           /*    DURING THE SECOND PASS, SOME ERROR CHECKING IS PERFORMED TO    */00000238  00000222
                                    <01>   /*    ENSURE THE MAP DOES NOT VIOLATE HARDWARE PROTOCOL.             */00000239  00000223
                                           /*                                                                   */00000240  00000224
                                           /*   -THE SCREEN IMAGE WILL BE PRINTED.                              */00000241  00000225
                                           /*   -THE INPUT ATTRIBUTES AND THE GENERATED ATTRIBUTES WILL BE      */00000242  00000226
                                           /*    PRINTED.  THIS SHOWS WHAT WAS SPECIFIED VS WHAT WILL BE        */00000243  00000227
                                           /*    GENERATED.                                                     */00000244  00000228
                                           /*   -ALL VARIABLE NAMES ARE CORRECT AND EXIST                       */00000245  00000229
                                           /*   -THE MACROS TO DEFINE THE PHYSICAL MAP (NOT RELATED TO CICS)    */00000246  00000230
                                           /*   -THE USER INTERFACE(S) FOR ASSEMBLER, COBOL AND PL1 PROGRAMS.   */00000247  00000231
                                           /*                                                                   */00000248  00000232
                                           /*********************************************************************/00000249  00000233
                                                                                                                  00000250  00000234
                                              ON ENDPAGE(SYSPRINT)                                                00000251  00000235
                                              BEGIN;                                                              00000252  00000236
                                                 PAGE_NO = PAGE_NO + 1;                                           00000253  00000237
                                                 PUT PAGE EDIT(PAGE_TITLE,'PANEL ',PANEL_NAME,                    00000254  00000238
                                                               PGM_VER,'PAGE ',PAGE_NO)                           00000255  00000239
                                                              (A,COL(70),A,A,COL(100),A,COL(111),A,F(3));         00000256  00000240
                                                 PUT SKIP(2);                                                     00000257  00000241
                                              END;                                                                00000258  00000242
                                              SIGNAL ENDPAGE(SYSPRINT);                                           00000259  00000243
                                                                                                                  00000260  00000244
                                                 /*  PRINT THE SCREEN IMAGE */                                    00000261  00000245
                                                                                                                  00000262  00000246
                                              PUT SKIP EDIT('* ', (29)'>',                                        00000263  00000247
                                                            ' SAMPLE SCREEN LAYOUT ',                             00000264  00000248
                                                            (29)'<') (X(10),(4)A);                                00000265  00000249
                                              PUT SKIP EDIT('*') (X(10),A);                                       00000266  00000250
                                              PUT SKIP EDIT('* ----+----1----+----2----+----3',                   00000267  00000251
                                                              '----+----4----+----5----+----6',                   00000268  00000252
                                                              '----+----7----+----8') (X(10),(3)A);               00000269  00000253
                                              DO I = 1 TO B;                                                      00000270  00000254
                                                 PUT SKIP EDIT(I,SCR_IMG(I)) (F(9),X(1),A);                       00000271  00000255
                                              END;                                                                00000272  00000256
                                              PUT SKIP EDIT('* ----+----1----+----2----+----3',                   00000273  00000257
                                                              '----+----4----+----5----+----6',                   00000274  00000258

MAP3270   IEBUPDTX -- CORNELL EXTENDED UPDATE PROGRAM.  VERSION 1.12 (SLAC V.12/17/04)            DAY=010  03:09  01/10/11    PAGE 7


                                                              '----+----7----+----8') (X(10),(3)A);               00000275  00000259
                                                                                                                  00000276  00000260
                                                 /*  PRINT THE ATTRIBUTE LIST */                                  00000277  00000261
                                                                                                                  00000278  00000262
                                              PUT SKIP(2) EDIT('CHAR ATTR')(X(10),A);                             00000279  00000263
                                              DO I = 1 TO A;                                                      00000280  00000264
                                    <01>         PUT SKIP EDIT(ATTR_TBL(I).ATTR_CHR,                              00000281  00000265
                                    <01>                       ATTR_TBL(I).ATTR_A) (X(12),A,X(2),A);              00000282  00000266
                                    <01>         PUT SKIP EDIT(' ') (X(15),A);                                    00000283  00000267
                                    <01>         CALL PRINT_ATTR(ATTR_TBL(I));                                    00000284  00000268
                                    <01>      END; /* OF LOOP */                                                  00000285  00000269
                                                                                                                  00000286
                                                 /*  VERIFY THE FIELDS LIST  */                                   00000287
                                                                                                                  00000288
                                              DECLARE VAR_FLD_MATCH  BIT(1) ALIGNED;                              00000289
                                              DO I=1 TO VAR_CTR;                                                  00000290
                                                VAR_FLD_MATCH = FALSE;                                            00000291
                                                DO J=1 TO FLD_CTR;                                                00000292
                                                   IF VAR(I).VAR_NAME = FLD(J).FLD_NAME THEN                      00000293
                                                   DO;                                                            00000294
                                                      VAR_FLD_MATCH = TRUE;                                       00000295
                                    <01>          /** IF ATTR_TBL(FLD(J).FLD_ATTR).TITLE THEN                     00000296
                                                      DO;                                                         00000297
                                                         PUT SKIP EDIT('*** VAR ',VAR(I).VAR_NAME,                00000298
                                                                       ' IS LISTED IN THE .VAR SECTION. THE ',    00000299
                                                                       'FIELD IS A TITLE. NAME NOT ALLOWED.')     00000300
                                                                       (A,A,A,A);                                 00000301
                                                         ERROR_FOUND = TRUE;                                      00000302
                                                      END;                                                        00000303
                                                      ELSE                                                        00000304
                                    <01>          **/    FLD(J).FLD_NAME = VAR(I).VAR_FLD;                        00000305
                                                   END;                                                           00000306
                                                END;                                                              00000307
                                                IF VAR_FLD_MATCH  THEN ;                                          00000308
                                                ELSE                                                              00000309
                                                DO;                                                               00000310
                                                   PUT SKIP EDIT('*** VAR ',VAR(I).VAR_NAME,' IS LISTED IN THE',  00000311
                                                                 ' .VAR SECTION BUT IS NOT DEFINED ***')          00000312
                                                                (A,A,A,A);                                        00000313
                                                   ERROR_FOUND = TRUE;                                            00000314
                                                END;                                                              00000315
                                              END;                                                                00000316
                                                                                                                  00000317
                                                 /*  PRINT THE FIELDS LIST  */                                    00000318
                                                                                                                  00000319
                                              PUT SKIP(2) EDIT('  ROW  COL NAME')(X(5),A);                        00000320
                                              DO I=1 TO FLD_CTR;                                                  00000321
                                    <01>     /*  IF ^ATTR_TBL(FLD(I).FLD_ATTR).TITLE THEN  */                     00000322
                                    <01>         DO;                                                              00000323
                                    <01>            PUT SKIP EDIT(FLD(I).FLD_ROW,FLD(I).FLD_COL,                  00000324
                                    <01>                          FLD(I).FLD_NAME) (X(5),F(5),F(5),X(1),A(8));    00000325
                                    <01>            CALL PRINT_ATTR(FLD(I).FLD_REC);                              00000326
                                    <01>         /* PUT SKIP DATA(FLD(I)); */                                     00000327
                                    <01>         END;                                                             00000328
                                              END;                                                                00000329  00000325
                                          0   CALL WRITE_PANEL;                                                   00000330  00000326
                                              CALL WRITE_MAPPING;                                                 00000331  00000327

MAP3270   IEBUPDTX -- CORNELL EXTENDED UPDATE PROGRAM.  VERSION 1.12 (SLAC V.12/17/04)            DAY=010  03:09  01/10/11    PAGE 8


                                              PUT FILE(PANEL) EDIT('END',PANEL_SEQ)                               00000332  00000328
                                                                              (COL(10),A,COL(73),P'999999V99');   00000333  00000329
                                              PANEL_SEQ=PANEL_SEQ+1;                                              00000334  00000330
                                              CALL WRITE_ASM;                                                     00000335  00000331
                                              CALL WRITE_COB;                                                     00000336  00000332
                                              CALL WRITE_PL1;                                                     00000337  00000333
                                              /*                                                                  00000338  00000334
                                                END OF EXECUTION - SET RETURN CODE                                00000339  00000335
                                              */                                                                  00000340  00000336
                                              IF ERROR_FOUND THEN RETURN_CODE=16;                                 00000341  00000337
                                              PUT SKIP(3) EDIT('END OF MAPGEN EXECUTION - RETURN CODE IS ',       00000342  00000338
                                                               RETURN_CODE) (A,P'9999');                          00000343  00000339
                                              CALL IHESARC(RETURN_CODE);                                          00000344  00000340
                                    <01>   /***************** END OF MAINLINE ****************/                   00000345  00000341
                                    <01>  1/*********************************************************************/00000346  00000342
                                    <01>   /*                                                                   */00000347  00000343
                                    <01>   /*   THIS IS THE INITIALIZATION.  ALL THE FLD (FIELD) AND ATTRS ARE  */00000348  00000344
                                    <01>   /*   INITIALIZED.                                                    */00000349  00000345
                                    <01>   /*                                                                   */00000350  00000346
                                    <01>   /*********************************************************************/00000351  00000347
                                    <01>   INITIALIZE:PROC;                                                       00000352  00000348
                                              FLD_CTR = 0;                                                        00000353  00000342
                                              FLD(*).FLD_ROW = 0;                                                 00000354  00000343
                                              FLD(*).FLD_COL = 0;                                                 00000355  00000344
                                              FLD(*).FLD_ATTR = 0;                                                00000356  00000345
                                              FLD(*).FLD_DATA='';                                                 00000357  00000346
                                              FLD(*).FLD_NAME='';                                                 00000358  00000347
                                    <01>      FLD(*).FLD_INT_NAME=(6)' ';                                         00000359  00000348
                                    <01>      FLD(*).ATTR_CHR = ' ';                                              00000360  00000349
                                    <01>      FLD(*).ATTR_A = '';                                                 00000361  00000350
                                    <01>      FLD(*).PROT = FALSE;                                                00000362  00000351
                                    <01>      FLD(*).NUM = FALSE;                                                 00000363  00000352
                                    <01>      FLD(*).BRIGHT = FALSE;                                              00000364  00000353
                                    <01>      FLD(*).TITLE = FALSE;                                               00000365  00000354
                                    <01>      FLD(*).STOP_BIT = FALSE;                                            00000366  00000355
                                    <01>      FLD(*).CUR = FALSE;                                                 00000367  00000356
                                    <01>      FLD(*).HI_LIGHT = ' ';                                              00000368  00000357
                                    <01>      FLD(*).COLOR = ' ';                                                 00000369  00000358
                                              VAR_CTR = 0;                                                        00000370  00000348
                                              VAR(*).VAR_NAME=' ';                                                00000371  00000349
                                              VAR(*).VAR_FLD='';                                                  00000372  00000350
                                              REC_CTR = 0;                                                        00000373  00000351
                                              ATTR_TBL(*).ATTR_CHR = ' ';                                         00000374  00000352
                                              ATTR_TBL(*).ATTR_A = '';                                            00000375  00000353
                                              ATTR_TBL(*).PROT = FALSE;                                           00000376  00000354
                                              ATTR_TBL(*).NUM = FALSE;                                            00000377  00000355
                                              ATTR_TBL(*).BRIGHT = FALSE;                                         00000378  00000356
                                              ATTR_TBL(*).TITLE = FALSE;                                          00000379  00000357
                                              ATTR_TBL(*).STOP_BIT = FALSE;                                       00000380  00000358
                                              ATTR_TBL(*).CUR = FALSE;                                            00000381  00000359
                                    <01>      ATTR_TBL(*).HI_LIGHT = ' ';                                         00000382  00000360
                                    <01>      ATTR_TBL(*).COLOR = ' ';                                            00000383  00000361
                                           END INITIALIZE;                                                        00000384  00000360
                                          1/*********************************************************************/00000385  00000361
                                           /*                                                                   */00000386  00000362
                                           /*   THIS IS THE MAIN INPUT PROCESS CONTROL.  NOTE THAT THERE IS     */00000387  00000363
                                           /*   NO ENFORCMENT OF THE SEQUENCE OF THE INPUT SECTIONS.            */00000388  00000364

MAP3270   IEBUPDTX -- CORNELL EXTENDED UPDATE PROGRAM.  VERSION 1.12 (SLAC V.12/17/04)            DAY=010  03:09  01/10/11    PAGE 9


                                           /*   THE CORRECT SEQUENCE IS .ATTR, .SCREEN, .VARS                   */00000389  00000365
                                           /*                                                                   */00000390  00000366
                                           /*********************************************************************/00000391  00000367
                                          0PROCESS_MYREC:PROC;                                                    00000392  00000368
                                                                                                                  00000393  00000369
                                             IF PROCESS_STATUS = '.ATTR  '        THEN CALL PROCESS_ATTRIBUTE;    00000394  00000370
                                             ELSE IF  PROCESS_STATUS = '.SCREEN'  THEN CALL PROCESS_SCREEN;       00000395  00000371
                                             ELSE IF  PROCESS_STATUS = '.VARS  '  THEN CALL PROCESS_VARS;         00000396  00000372
                                                                                                                  00000397  00000373
                                           END PROCESS_MYREC;                                                     00000398  00000374
                                                                                                                  00000399  00000375
                                           PROCESS_ATTRIBUTE:PROC;                                                00000400  00000376
                                              DECLARE ATTRIB              CHAR(1);                                00000401  00000377
                                              DECLARE (TEMP,TEMP2)        CHAR(78) VARYING;                       00000402  00000378
                                              DECLARE I                   FIXED BINARY(15);                       00000403  00000379
                                              I = 3;                                                              00000404  00000380
                                              DO WHILE (I<80 & SUBSTR(MY_REC,I,1)^=' ');                          00000405  00000381
                                                 I=I+1;                                                           00000406  00000382
                                              END;                                                                00000407  00000383
                                              TEMP,TEMP2 = SUBSTR(MY_REC,3,I-3);                                  00000408  00000384
                                              A = A + 1;                                                          00000409  00000385
                                    <01>      ATTR_TBL(A).ATTR_A = '('||TEMP2||')';                               00000410  00000386
                                              ATTR_TBL(A).ATTR_CHR = SUBSTR(MY_REC,1,1);                          00000411  00000387
                                              I=1;                                                                00000412  00000388
                                              DO WHILE(I>0);                                                      00000413  00000389
                                                 I=INDEX(TEMP,',');                                               00000414  00000390
                                                 IF I>0 THEN                                                      00000415  00000391
                                                 DO;                                                              00000416  00000392
                                    <01>            CALL CHECK_ATTR(SUBSTR(TEMP,1,I-1),ATTR_TBL(A));              00000417  00000393
                                    <01>            TEMP=SUBSTR(TEMP,I+1);                                        00000418  00000394
                                    <01>         END;                                                             00000419  00000395
                                    <01>         ELSE                                                             00000420  00000396
                                    <01>            CALL CHECK_ATTR(TEMP,ATTR_TBL(A));                            00000421  00000397
                                    <01>      END;                                                                00000422  00000398
                                    <01>      IF ATTR_TBL(A).TITLE THEN          /* OVERRIDE SOME ATTRS  */       00000423  00000399
                                    <01>      DO;                                /* FOR TYPE TITLE       */       00000424  00000400
                                    <01>         ATTR_TBL(A).TITLE = TRUE;                                        00000425  00000401
                                    <01>         ATTR_TBL(A).PROT = TRUE;                                         00000426  00000402
                                    <01>      /**ATTR_TBL(A).BRIGHT = FALSE;  DO NOT OVERRIDE BRIGHT   **/        00000427  00000403
                                    <01>         ATTR_TBL(A).NUM = FALSE;                                         00000428  00000404
                                    <01>         ATTR_TBL(A).STOP_BIT = FALSE;                                    00000429  00000405
                                    <01>         ATTR_TBL(A).CUR = FALSE;                                         00000430  00000406
                                    <01>      END;                                                                00000431  00000407
                                    <01>    /*PUT SKIP DATA(A,ATTR_TBL(A));*/                                     00000432  00000408
                                    <01>   END PROCESS_ATTRIBUTE;                                                 00000433  00000409
                                    <01>  0/*********************************************************************/00000434  00000410
                                    <01>   /*                                                                   */00000435  00000411
                                    <01>   /*   THIS ROUTINE PROCESSES ALL OF THE ATTRIBUTES.  THEY CAN BE      */00000436  00000412
                                    <01>   /*   SPECIFIED IN THE .ATTR OR .VARS SECTION.  THE MAP DEFAULTS      */00000437  00000413
                                    <01>   /*   CAN BE SET IN THE .ATTR AND OVERRIDEN FOR EACH FIELD IN THE     */00000438  00000414
                                    <01>   /*   .VARS SECTION.                                                  */00000439  00000415
                                    <01>   /*                                                                   */00000440  00000416
                                    <01>   /*********************************************************************/00000441  00000417
                                    <01>  0CHECK_ATTR:PROC(AT,ATTR);                                              00000442  00000418
                                    <01>      DCL AT CHAR(*) VARYING,                                             00000443  00000419
                                    <01>          ATTR LIKE ATTR_REC;                                             00000444  00000420
                                    <01>      SELECT (AT);                                                        00000445  00000421

MAP3270   IEBUPDTX -- CORNELL EXTENDED UPDATE PROGRAM.  VERSION 1.12 (SLAC V.12/17/04)            DAY=010  03:09  01/10/11   PAGE 10


                                    <01>        WHEN ('TITLE')     ATTR.TITLE = TRUE;                             00000446  00000422
                                    <01>        WHEN ('BRIGHT')    ATTR.BRIGHT = TRUE;                            00000447  00000423
                                    <01>        WHEN ('NORMAL')    ATTR.BRIGHT = FALSE;                           00000448  00000424
                                    <01>        WHEN ('NUM')       ATTR.NUM = TRUE;                               00000449  00000425
                                    <01>        WHEN ('ALPHA')     ATTR.NUM = FALSE;                              00000450  00000426
                                    <01>        WHEN ('PROT')      ATTR.PROT = TRUE;                              00000451  00000427
                                    <01>        WHEN ('UNPROT')    ATTR.PROT = FALSE;                             00000452  00000428
                                    <01>        WHEN ('CUR')       ATTR.CUR = TRUE;                               00000453  00000429
                                    <01>        WHEN ('STOP')      ATTR.STOP_BIT = TRUE;                          00000454  00000430
                                    <01>        WHEN ('HIDEF')     ATTR.HI_LIGHT = 'D';                           00000455  00000431
                                    <01>        WHEN ('BLINK')     ATTR.HI_LIGHT = 'B';                           00000456  00000432
                                    <01>        WHEN ('REVERSE')   ATTR.HI_LIGHT = 'R';                           00000457  00000433
                                    <01>        WHEN ('ULINE')     ATTR.HI_LIGHT = 'U';                           00000458  00000434
                                    <01>                                             /* COLOR CODE */             00000459  00000435
                                    <01>        WHEN ('DEFAULT')   ATTR.COLOR = 'DEF';  /* 40 */                  00000460  00000436
                                    <01>        WHEN ('BLUE')      ATTR.COLOR = 'BLU';  /* F1 */                  00000461  00000437
                                    <01>        WHEN ('RED')       ATTR.COLOR = 'RED';  /* F2 */                  00000462  00000438
                                    <01>        WHEN ('PINK')      ATTR.COLOR = 'PNK';  /* F3 */                  00000463  00000439
                                    <01>        WHEN ('GREEN')     ATTR.COLOR = 'GRN';  /* F4 */                  00000464  00000440
                                    <01>        WHEN ('TURQ')      ATTR.COLOR = 'TUR';  /* F5 */                  00000465  00000441
                                    <01>        WHEN ('YELLOW')    ATTR.COLOR = 'YEL';  /* F6 */                  00000466  00000442
                                    <01>        WHEN ('WHITE')     ATTR.COLOR = 'WHI';  /* F7 */                  00000467  00000443
                                    <01>        WHEN ('BLACK')     ATTR.COLOR = 'BLK';  /* F8 */                  00000468  00000444
                                    <01>        WHEN ('DBLUE')     ATTR.COLOR = 'DBL';  /* F9 */                  00000469  00000445
                                    <01>        WHEN ('ORANGE')    ATTR.COLOR = 'ORA';  /* FA */                  00000470  00000446
                                    <01>        WHEN ('PURPLE')    ATTR.COLOR = 'PUR';  /* FB */                  00000471  00000447
                                    <01>        WHEN ('PGREEN')    ATTR.COLOR = 'PGR';  /* FC */                  00000472  00000448
                                    <01>        WHEN ('PTURQ')     ATTR.COLOR = 'PTQ';  /* FD */                  00000473  00000449
                                    <01>        WHEN ('GREY')      ATTR.COLOR = 'GRY';  /* FE */                  00000474  00000450
                                    <01>        WHEN ('NEUTRAL')   ATTR.COLOR = 'NEU';  /* FF */                  00000475  00000451
                                    <01>      OTHERWISE                                                           00000476  00000452
                                    <01>      DO;                                                                 00000477  00000453
                                    <01>         PUT SKIP EDIT('*** INVALID ATTRIBUTE ''',AT,''' DETECTED ***')   00000478  00000454
                                    <01>                      (A,A,A);                                            00000479  00000455
                                    <01>         ERROR_FOUND = TRUE;                                              00000480  00000456
                                    <01>      END;                                                                00000481  00000457
                                    <01>    /*PUT SKIP LIST(ATTR.COLOR);*/                                        00000482  00000458
                                    <01>   END CHECK_ATTR;                                                        00000483  00000459
                                    <01>  1/*********************************************************************/00000484  00000460
                                    <01>   /*                                                                   */00000485  00000461
                                    <01>   /*   THIS ROUTINE PROCESSES ALL OF THE VARS LINES.  THE GENERAL      */00000486  00000462
                                    <01>   /*   FORMAT IS:                                                      */00000487  00000463
                                    <01>   /*   R99C99=NAME123,ATTR,ATTR COMMENTS                               */00000488  00000464
                                    <01>   /*   R99C99 IS THE NAME GENERATED BY MAP3270.                        */00000489  00000465
                                    <01>   /*   NAME IS 1 TO 7 CHARACTER NAME ASSIGNED BY THE PROGRAMMER.       */00000490  00000466
                                    <01>   /*   ,ATTR IS AN ADDITIONAL OR OVERRIDE ATTRIBUTE FOR THIS FIELD.    */00000491  00000467
                                    <01>   /*         0 OR MORE ATTRS MAY BE SPECIFIED.  THE LIST ENDS WHEN     */00000492  00000468
                                    <01>   /*         THE FIRST SPACE IS ENCOUNTERED.                           */00000493  00000469
                                    <01>   /*                                                                   */00000494  00000470
                                    <01>   /*********************************************************************/00000495  00000471
                                    <01>                                                                          00000496  00000472
                                    <01>   PROCESS_VARS:PROC;                                                     00000497  00000473
                                    <01>      DECLARE (MATCH_INI_NAME,MATCH_NAME) BIT(1) ALIGNED;                 00000498  00000474
                                    <01>      DECLARE (TEMP,TEMP2)        CHAR(78) VARYING;                       00000499  00000475
                                    <01>      DECLARE (I,COMMA,BLANK,NST,NLEN) FIXED BINARY(15) ALIGNED;          00000500  00000476
                                    <01>      DECLARE (FLD_NAME_PTR)           FIXED BINARY(15) ALIGNED;          00000501  00000477
                                              IF SUBSTR(MY_REC,7,1)^='=' THEN                                     00000502  00000429

MAP3270   IEBUPDTX -- CORNELL EXTENDED UPDATE PROGRAM.  VERSION 1.12 (SLAC V.12/17/04)            DAY=010  03:09  01/10/11   PAGE 11


                                              DO;                                                                 00000503  00000430
                                                 PUT SKIP EDIT('*** EXPECTED ''='' NOT FOUND ***') (A);           00000504  00000431
                                                 ERROR_FOUND = TRUE;                                              00000505  00000432
                                                 RETURN;                                                          00000506  00000433
                                              END;                                                                00000507  00000434
                                    <01>      COMMA=INDEX(MY_REC,',');                                            00000508  00000435
                                    <01>      BLANK=INDEX(MY_REC,' ');                                            00000509  00000436
                                    <01>      NST=8;                                                              00000510  00000437
                                    <01>      SELECT (TRUE);                                                      00000511  00000438
                                    <01>         WHEN (COMMA=0 & BLANK>0)  /* NO COMMA FOUND BUT A BLANK WAS */   00000512  00000439
                                    <01>             NLEN=BLANK-NST;                                              00000513  00000440
                                    <01>         WHEN (BLANK=0 & COMMA>0)    /* NO BLANK FOUND BUT A COMMA WAS */ 00000514  00000441
                                    <01>             NLEN=COMMA-NST;                                              00000515  00000442
                                    <01>         WHEN (COMMA<BLANK)    /* ATTR STARTS BEFORE BLANK       */       00000516  00000443
                                    <01>             NLEN=COMMA-NST;                                              00000517  00000444
                                    <01>         WHEN (COMMA>BLANK)    /* BLANK APPEARS BEFORE COMMA     */       00000518  00000445
                                    <01>             NLEN=BLANK-NST;                                              00000519  00000446
                                    <01>         OTHERWISE                                                        00000520  00000447
                                    <01>         DO;                                                              00000521  00000448
                                    <01>            PUT SKIP EDIT('*** LOGIC ERROR 1 ***') (A);                   00000522  00000449
                                    <01>            ERROR_FOUND = TRUE;                                           00000523  00000450
                                    <01>            RETURN;                                                       00000524  00000451
                                    <01>         END;                                                             00000525  00000452
                                    <01>      IF NLEN>7 THEN                                                      00000526  00000453
                                              DO;                                                                 00000527  00000436
                                                 PUT SKIP EDIT('*** INCORRECT FIELD LENGTHS ***') (A);            00000528  00000437
                                                 ERROR_FOUND = TRUE;                                              00000529  00000438
                                                 RETURN;                                                          00000530  00000439
                                              END;                                                                00000531  00000440
                                              DO I = 1 TO VAR_CTR;                                                00000532  00000441
                                    <01>         IF VAR(I).VAR_NAME = SUBSTR(MY_REC,1,6) THEN                     00000533  00000442
                                    <01>         DO;                                                              00000534  00000443
                                    <01>             PUT SKIP EDIT('*** DUPLICATE VAR NAME ',VAR(I).VAR_NAME,     00000535  00000444
                                    <01>                          ' ***') (A,A,A);                                00000536  00000445
                                    <01>             ERROR_FOUND = TRUE;                                          00000537  00000446
                                    <01>             RETURN;                                                      00000538  00000447
                                    <01>         END;                                                             00000539  00000448
                                    <01>         IF VAR(I).VAR_FLD = SUBSTR(MY_REC,NST,NLEN) THEN                 00000540  00000449
                                    <01>         DO;                                                              00000541  00000450
                                    <01>             PUT SKIP EDIT('*** DUPLICATE VAR FIELD ',                    00000542  00000451
                                    <01>                           SUBSTR(MY_REC,NST,NLEN),' ***') (A,A,A);       00000543  00000452
                                    <01>             ERROR_FOUND = TRUE;                                          00000544  00000453
                                    <01>             RETURN;                                                      00000545  00000454
                                    <01>         END;                                                             00000546  00000455
                                    <01>      END;                                                                00000547  00000456
                                    <01>      MATCH_INI_NAME=FALSE;                                               00000548  00000457
                                    <01>      MATCH_NAME=FALSE;                                                   00000549  00000458
                                    <01>      FLD_NAME_PTR=0;                                                     00000550  00000459
                                    <01>      DO WHILE(FLD_NAME_PTR<FLD_CTR & ^MATCH_INI_NAME);                   00000551  00000460
                                    <01>         FLD_NAME_PTR=FLD_NAME_PTR+1;                                     00000552  00000461
                                    <01>         MATCH_INI_NAME =                                                 00000553  00000462
                                    <01>               (FLD(FLD_NAME_PTR).FLD_INT_NAME = SUBSTR(MY_REC,1,6));     00000554  00000463
                                    <01>      END;                                                                00000555  00000464
                                    <01>      IF MATCH_INI_NAME THEN ;                                            00000556  00000465
                                    <01>      ELSE                                                                00000557  00000466
                                    <01>      DO;                                                                 00000558  00000467
                                    <01>         PUT SKIP EDIT('*** INTERNAL NAME NOT DEFINED ',                  00000559  00000468

MAP3270   IEBUPDTX -- CORNELL EXTENDED UPDATE PROGRAM.  VERSION 1.12 (SLAC V.12/17/04)            DAY=010  03:09  01/10/11   PAGE 12


                                    <01>                       SUBSTR(MY_REC,1,6),                                00000560  00000469
                                    <01>                       ' ***') (A,A,A);                                   00000561  00000470
                                    <01>         ERROR_FOUND = TRUE;                                              00000562  00000471
                                    <01>         RETURN;                                                          00000563  00000472
                                    <01>      END;                                                                00000564  00000473
                                    <01>      VAR_CTR=VAR_CTR+1;                                                  00000565  00000474
                                    <01>      VAR(VAR_CTR).VAR_NAME=SUBSTR(MY_REC,1,6);                           00000566  00000475
                                    <01>      VAR(VAR_CTR).VAR_FLD=SUBSTR(MY_REC,NST,NLEN);                       00000567  00000476
                                    <01>      I=INDEX(VAR(VAR_CTR).VAR_FLD,' ');                                  00000568  00000477
                                    <01>      IF I=0 THEN ;               /* NAME HAS NO SPACES - IT IS OK */     00000569  00000478
                                    <01>      ELSE                                                                00000570  00000479
                                    <01>      IF I=1 THEN                                                         00000571  00000480
                                    <01>      DO;                                                                 00000572  00000481
                                    <01>         PUT SKIP EDIT('*** USER DEFINED NAME IS BLANK ***') (A);         00000573  00000482
                                    <01>         ERROR_FOUND = TRUE;                                              00000574  00000483
                                    <01>         RETURN;                                                          00000575  00000484
                                    <01>      END;                                                                00000576  00000485
                                    <01>      IF COMMA=0 | BLANK<COMMA THEN    /* NO ATTRIBUTES */                00000577  00000486
                                    <01>          RETURN;                                                         00000578  00000487
                                    <01>      TEMP,TEMP2 = SUBSTR(MY_REC,NST+NLEN+1);  /* GET RID OF NAME */      00000579  00000488
                                    <01>      BLANK=INDEX(TEMP,' ');                                              00000580  00000489
                                    <01>      IF BLANK>0 THEN TEMP,TEMP2=SUBSTR(TEMP,1,BLANK-1);                  00000581  00000490
                                    <01>      FLD(FLD_NAME_PTR).ATTR_A=FLD(FLD_NAME_PTR).ATTR_A||'<'||TEMP2||'>'; 00000582  00000491
                                    <01>      I=1;                                                                00000583  00000492
                                    <01>      DO WHILE(I>0);                                                      00000584  00000493
                                    <01>         I=INDEX(TEMP,',');                                               00000585  00000494
                                    <01>         IF I>0 THEN                                                      00000586  00000495
                                    <01>         DO;                                                              00000587  00000496
                                    <01>            CALL CHECK_ATTR(SUBSTR(TEMP,1,I-1),FLD(FLD_NAME_PTR).FLD_REC);00000588  00000497
                                    <01>            TEMP=SUBSTR(TEMP,I+1);                                        00000589  00000498
                                    <01>         END;                                                             00000590  00000499
                                    <01>         ELSE                                                             00000591  00000500
                                    <01>            CALL CHECK_ATTR(TEMP,FLD(FLD_NAME_PTR).FLD_REC);              00000592  00000501
                                    <01>      END;                                                                00000593  00000502
                                    <01>   /* PUT SKIP LIST ('INPUT=>',VAR_CTR,VAR(VAR_CTR).VAR_NAME,             00000594  00000503
                                    <01>                                 ''''||VAR(VAR_CTR).VAR_FLD||'''');       00000595  00000504
                                    <01>      PUT SKIP DATA (FLD(FLD_NAME_PTR)); */                               00000596  00000505
                                           END PROCESS_VARS;                                                      00000597  00000473
                                          1/****************************************************************/     00000598  00000474
                                           PROCESS_SCREEN:PROC;                                                   00000599  00000475
                                                                                                                  00000600  00000476
                                              DECLARE (C,I               ) FIXED BINARY(15),                      00000601  00000477
                                                       K                   CHAR(1);                               00000602  00000478
                                              NO_ATTRIB = TRUE;                                                   00000603  00000479
                                              ROW = ROW + 1;                               /* COUNT ROW WE ARE  */00000604  00000480
                                              B = B + 1; SCR_IMG(B) = '* ' || MY_REC;                             00000605  00000481
                                              COL = 1;                                                            00000606  00000482
                                              FLD_A = 1;                                                          00000607  00000483
                                              DO C = 1 TO 80;                              /* PROCESS ONE BY ONE*/00000608  00000484
                                                 K = SUBSTR(MY_REC,C,1);                   /* GET NEXT BYTE     */00000609  00000485
                                                 DO I = 1 TO A;                            /* TEST IF ATTRIBUTE */00000610  00000486
                                                    IF ATTR_TBL(I).ATTR_CHR = K THEN       /* IF WE FIND AN     */00000611  00000487
                                                    DO;                                    /*  ATTRIBUTE        */00000612  00000488
                                                       NO_ATTRIB = FALSE;                                         00000613  00000489
                                                       IF FLD_DEF  ^= '' THEN              /* AND WE ALREADY    */00000614  00000490
                                                       DO;                                                        00000615  00000491
                                                           CALL SAVE_FIELD(FLD_A);         /*  HAVE DATA        */00000616  00000492

MAP3270   IEBUPDTX -- CORNELL EXTENDED UPDATE PROGRAM.  VERSION 1.12 (SLAC V.12/17/04)            DAY=010  03:09  01/10/11   PAGE 13


                                                           FLD_DEF = '';                                          00000617  00000493
                                                       END;                                                       00000618  00000494
                                                       COL = C;                                                   00000619  00000495
                                                       FLD_A = I;                                                 00000620  00000496
                                                    END; /* IF */                                                 00000621  00000497
                                                 END; /* DO */                                                    00000622  00000498
                                              /* IF NO_ATTRIB THEN  ;                                             00000623  00000499
                                                 ELSE                                                             00000624  00000500
                                              */ DO;                                                              00000625  00000501
                                                    FLD_DEF = FLD_DEF  || K;                                      00000626  00000502
                                    <01>           /*  IF SUBSTR(X,C,1)= '''' THEN DATA = DATA  ''''  */        00000627  00000503
                                                 END;                                                             00000628  00000504
                                              END; /* DO */                                                       00000629  00000505
                                              IF LENGTH(FLD_DEF)>0 THEN                                           00000630  00000506
                                              DO;                                                                 00000631  00000507
                                                 CALL SAVE_FIELD(FLD_A);                                          00000632  00000508
                                                 FLD_DEF = '';                                                    00000633  00000509
                                              END;                                                                00000634  00000510
                                           END PROCESS_SCREEN;                                                    00000635  00000511
                                          1/****************************************************************/     00000636  00000512
                                           SAVE_FIELD:PROC(I);                                                    00000637  00000513
                                              DECLARE I FIXED BINARY(15);                                         00000638  00000514
                                              DECLARE (R,C) PICTURE '99';                                         00000639  00000515
                                              FLD_CTR = FLD_CTR + 1;                                              00000640  00000516
                                              FLD(FLD_CTR).FLD_DATA = FLD_DEF;                                    00000641  00000517
                                              R=ROW;                                                              00000642  00000518
                                              C=COL;                                                              00000643  00000519
                                    <01>      FLD(FLD_CTR).FLD_INT_NAME,                                          00000644  00000520
                                    <01>      FLD(FLD_CTR).FLD_NAME = 'R'||R||'C'||C;                             00000645  00000521
                                    <01>      FLD(FLD_CTR).FLD_ROW  = ROW;                                        00000646  00000522
                                    <01>      FLD(FLD_CTR).FLD_COL  = COL;                                        00000647  00000523
                                    <01>      FLD(FLD_CTR).FLD_ATTR = I;                                          00000648  00000524
                                    <01>      FLD(FLD_CTR).FLD_REC = ATTR_TBL(I);                                 00000649  00000525
                                    <01>    /*PUT SKIP DATA(FLD(FLD_CTR));*/                                      00000650  00000526
                                    <01>   END SAVE_FIELD;                                                        00000651  00000527
                                    <01>  1/*********************************************************************/00000652  00000528
                                    <01>   /*                                                                   */00000653  00000529
                                    <01>   /* PRINT_ATTR - PRINT ATTRIBUTES FOR A GIVEN FIELD                   */00000654  00000530
                                    <01>   /*                                                                   */00000655  00000531
                                    <01>   /*********************************************************************/00000656  00000532
                                    <01>   PRINT_ATTR:PROC(ATTR);                                                 00000657  00000533
                                    <01>      DECLARE ATTR LIKE ATTR_REC;                                         00000658  00000534
                                    <01>         IF ATTR.TITLE THEN                                               00000659  00000535
                                    <01>            PUT EDIT('TITLE ') (A);                                       00000660  00000536
                                    <01>                                                                          00000661  00000537
                                    <01>         IF ATTR.NUM THEN PUT EDIT('NUM ') (A);                           00000662  00000538
                                    <01>         ELSE PUT EDIT('ALPHA ') (A);                                     00000663  00000539
                                    <01>                                                                          00000664  00000540
                                    <01>         IF ATTR.PROT THEN PUT EDIT('PROT ') (A);                         00000665  00000541
                                    <01>         ELSE PUT EDIT('UNPROT ') (A);                                    00000666  00000542
                                    <01>                                                                          00000667  00000543
                                    <01>         IF ATTR.BRIGHT THEN PUT EDIT('BRIGHT ') (A);                     00000668  00000544
                                    <01>         ELSE PUT EDIT('NORMAL ') (A);                                    00000669  00000545
                                    <01>                                                                          00000670  00000546
                                    <01>         SELECT (ATTR.HI_LIGHT)                                           00000671  00000547
                                    <01>             WHEN (' ')  ;                                                00000672  00000548
                                    <01>             WHEN ('D')  PUT EDIT('HI DEFAULT ') (A);                     00000673  00000549

MAP3270   IEBUPDTX -- CORNELL EXTENDED UPDATE PROGRAM.  VERSION 1.12 (SLAC V.12/17/04)            DAY=010  03:09  01/10/11   PAGE 14


                                    <01>             WHEN ('U')  PUT EDIT('UNDERLINE ') (A);                      00000674  00000550
                                    <01>             WHEN ('R')  PUT EDIT('REVERSE ') (A);                        00000675  00000551
                                    <01>             WHEN ('B')  PUT EDIT('BLINK ') (A);                          00000676  00000552
                                    <01>             OTHERWISE                                                    00000677  00000553
                                    <01>             DO;                                                          00000678  00000554
                                    <01>                 PUT SKIP(2) EDIT('*** ERROR *** INVALID ATTRIBUTE ',     00000679  00000555
                                    <01>                                  'VALUE ***') (A,A);                     00000680  00000556
                                    <01>                 ERROR_FOUND = TRUE;                                      00000681  00000557
                                    <01>             END;                                                         00000682  00000558
                                    <01>                                                                          00000683  00000559
                                    <01>         IF ATTR.CUR  THEN PUT EDIT('CUR ') (A);                          00000684  00000560
                                    <01>                                                                          00000685  00000561
                                    <01>         IF ATTR.STOP_BIT THEN PUT EDIT('STOP ') (A);                     00000686  00000562
                                    <01>         PUT EDIT(ATTR.COLOR,' ') (A,A);                                  00000687  00000563
                                    <01>   END PRINT_ATTR;                                                        00000688  00000564
                                          1/*********************************************************************/00000689  00000526
                                           /*                                                                   */00000690  00000527
                                           /* WRITE_PANEL - WRITE THE MACROS TO GENERATE THE PANEL              */00000691  00000528
                                           /*                                                                   */00000692  00000529
                                           /* IN THE MAP3270 SYSTEM, THE PANEL IS A LOAD MODULE GENERATED FROM  */00000693  00000530
                                           /* ASSEMBLER CODE GENERATED BY THIS PROGRAM.  THE PANEL HAS 3        */00000694  00000531
                                           /* SECTIONS:                                                         */00000695  00000532
                                           /*    1) INDEX TO THE  DATA STREAM, CROSS REFERENCE AND INSERT       */00000696  00000533
                                           /*       CURSOR AREAS.                                               */00000697  00000534
                                           /*    2) 3270 DATA STEAM WHICH CONTAINS THE INSERT CURSOR STUFF.     */00000698  00000535
                                           /*    3) CROSS REFERENCE WHICH MAPS THE FIELDS IN THE DATA STREAM    */00000699  00000536
                                           /*       TO THE USER MAP.                                            */00000700  00000537
                                           /*                                                                   */00000701  00000538
                                           /*********************************************************************/00000702  00000539
                                           WRITE_PANEL:PROC;                                                      00000703  00000540
                                              DECLARE M FIXED BIN(15);                                            00000704  00000541
                                              DECLARE IC_WRITTEN  BIT(1) ALIGNED;                                 00000705  00000542
                                                                                                                  00000706  00000543
                                              OPEN FILE(PANEL) TITLE('MAP');                                      00000707  00000544
                                                                                                                  00000708  00000545
                                    <01>      PUT FILE(PANEL) EDIT('TITLE ''PANEL ',PANEL_NAME,' ',               00000709  00000546
                                    <01>                           TITLE_STAMP,'''')     (COL(10),A,A,A,A,A)      00000710  00000547
                                    <01>                          (PANEL_SEQ)            (COL(73),P'999999V99');  00000711  00000548
                                    <01>      PANE_SEQ=PANEL_SEQ+1;                                               00000712  00000549
                                    <01>      PUT FILE(PANEL) EDIT(DT_TIME_STAMP)                    (COL(1),A)   00000713  00000550
                                    <01>                          (PANEL_SEQ)            (COL(73),P'999999V99')   00000714  00000551
                                    <01>                          (PANEL_NAME,'TSECT')            (A,COL(10),A)   00000715  00000552
                                                                  (PANEL_SEQ+1)          (COL(73),P'999999V99')   00000716  00000549
                                                                  ('DC    A(', PANEL_NAME||'P)' ) (COL(10),A,A)   00000717  00000550
                                                                  (PANEL_SEQ+2)          (COL(73),P'999999V99')   00000718  00000551
                                                                  ('DC    A(', PANEL_NAME||'M)' ) (COL(10),A,A)   00000719  00000552
                                                                  (PANEL_SEQ+3)          (COL(73),P'999999V99')   00000720  00000553
                                                                  ('DC    A(', PANEL_NAME||'C)' ) (COL(10),A,A)   00000721  00000554
                                                                  (PANEL_SEQ+4)          (COL(73),P'999999V99');  00000722  00000555
                                              PANEL_SEQ=PANEL_SEQ+5;                                              00000723  00000556
                                              PUT FILE(PANEL)                                                     00000724  00000557
                                                         EDIT(PANEL_NAME,'TSTPAN',PANEL_SEQ)                      00000725  00000558
                                                                              (A,COL(10),A,COL(73),P'999999V99')  00000726  00000559
                                                             ('TWCC  RESET=YES,RSTMDT=YES',PANEL_SEQ+1)           00000727  00000560
                                                                                (COL(10),A,COL(73),P'999999V99'); 00000728  00000561
                                              PANEL_SEQ=PANEL_SEQ+2;                                              00000729  00000562
                                              IC_WRITTEN=FALSE;                                                   00000730  00000563

MAP3270   IEBUPDTX -- CORNELL EXTENDED UPDATE PROGRAM.  VERSION 1.12 (SLAC V.12/17/04)            DAY=010  03:09  01/10/11   PAGE 15


                                              M = FLD_CTR;                                                        00000731  00000564
                                              DO WHILE (M>0);                                                     00000732  00000565
                                                 IF ATTR_TBL(FLD(M).FLD_ATTR).CUR THEN                            00000733  00000566
                                                 DO;                                                              00000734  00000567
                                                    CALL WRITE_IC(FLD(M).FLD_ROW,FLD(M).FLD_COL);                 00000735  00000568
                                                    IC_WRITTEN=TRUE;                                              00000736  00000569
                                                    M = 0;                                                        00000737  00000570
                                                 END;                                                             00000738  00000571
                                                 M=M-1;                                                           00000739  00000572
                                              END;  /* DO */                                                      00000740  00000573
                                              IF ^IC_WRITTEN THEN                                                 00000741  00000574
                                                 CALL WRITE_IC(ONE,ONE);                                          00000742  00000575
                                              DO M = 1 TO FLD_CTR;                                                00000743  00000576
                                                 CALL WRITE_FIELD(M);                                             00000744  00000577
                                              END;                                                                00000745  00000578
                                              PUT FILE(PANEL) EDIT('TENDPAN',PANEL_SEQ)                           00000746  00000579
                                                                              (COL(10),A,COL(73),P'999999V99');   00000747  00000580
                                              PANEL_SEQ=PANEL_SEQ+1;                                              00000748  00000581
                                           /****************************************************************/     00000749  00000582
                                           WRITE_IC:PROC(R,C);                                                    00000750  00000583
                                              DECLARE (R,C)  FIXED BIN(15);                                       00000751  00000584
                                                                                                                  00000752  00000585
                                              PUT FILE(PANEL)                                                     00000753  00000586
                                                       EDIT(PANEL_NAME||'C',                                      00000754  00000587
                                                                   'TCMD  CMD=SBA,ROW=',R,',COL=',C,PANEL_SEQ)    00000755  00000588
                                                                (A,COL(10),A,P'99',A,P'99',COL(73),P'999999V99')  00000756  00000589
                                                           ('         TCMD  CMD=IC',PANEL_SEQ+1)                  00000757  00000590
                                                                                       (A,COL(73),P'999999V99');  00000758  00000591
                                              PANEL_SEQ=PANEL_SEQ+2;                                              00000759  00000592
                                                                                                                  00000760  00000593
                                           END WRITE_IC;                                                          00000761  00000594
                                           /****************************************************************/     00000762  00000595
                                           WRITE_FIELD:PROC(F);                                                   00000763  00000596
                                              DECLARE F FIXED BIN(15);                                            00000764  00000597
                                              DECLARE A FIXED BIN(15);                                            00000765  00000598
                                              DECLARE I FIXED BIN(15);                                            00000766  00000599
                                              DECLARE MACRO_LN CHAR(160) VARYING;                                 00000767  00000600
                                              DECLARE LN_PIC   PIC '99';                                          00000768  00000601
                                              DECLARE FLD_NAME CHAR(8) VARYING;   /* FORMAT R99C99 */             00000769  00000602
                                              A = FLD(F).FLD_ATTR;                                                00000770  00000603
                                            /*****                                                                00000771  00000604
                                              PUT SKIP DATA(FLD(F));                                              00000772  00000605
                                              PUT SKIP DATA(ATTR_TBL(A));                                         00000773  00000606
                                            *****/                                                                00000774  00000607
                                              FLD_DEF=SUBSTR(FLD(F).FLD_DATA,2);                                  00000775  00000608
                                              I = LENGTH(FLD_DEF);                                                00000776  00000609
                                              DO WHILE(SUBSTR(FLD_DEF,I,1)=' ' & I>0);                            00000777  00000610
                                                 I=I-1;                                                           00000778  00000611
                                              END;                                                                00000779  00000612
                                              IF I=0 THEN FLD_DEF='';                                             00000780  00000613
                                              ELSE FLD_DEF=SUBSTR(FLD_DEF,1,I);                                   00000781  00000614
                                           /* PUT SKIP DATA(FLD_DEF); */                                          00000782  00000615
                                              /* MAKE SURE THAT FIELDS DON'T GO PAST COL 80 */                    00000783  00000616
                                              IF LENGTH(FLD_DEF)+FLD(F).FLD_COL   > 80 THEN                       00000784  00000617
                                              DO;                                                                 00000785  00000618
                                                 PUT SKIP EDIT('*** ERROR PROCESSING ROW ',FLD(F).FLD_ROW,        00000786  00000619
                                                               ' COL ',FLD(F).FLD_COL,': FIELD EXCEEDS COL 80')   00000787  00000620

MAP3270   IEBUPDTX -- CORNELL EXTENDED UPDATE PROGRAM.  VERSION 1.12 (SLAC V.12/17/04)            DAY=010  03:09  01/10/11   PAGE 16


                                                               (A,F(3),A,F(3),A);                                 00000788  00000621
                                                 RETURN;                                                          00000789  00000622
