                                              END;                                                                00000790  00000623
                                              FLD_NAME = SUBSTR(FLD(F).FLD_NAME||(6)' ',1,6);                     00000791  00000624
                                              PUT FILE(PANEL)                                                     00000792  00000625
                                                  SKIP EDIT('TCMD  CMD=SBA,ROW=',                                 00000793  00000626
                                                                          FLD(F).FLD_ROW,',COL=',                 00000794  00000627
                                                                          FLD(F).FLD_COL,PANEL_SEQ)               00000795  00000628
                                                           (COL(10),A,P'99',A,P'99',COL(73),P'999999V99');        00000796  00000629
                                              PANEL_SEQ=PANEL_SEQ+1;                                              00000797  00000630
                                              LN_PIC = LENGTH(FLD_DEF);                                           00000798  00000631
                                              IF LN_PIC = '00' | ATTR_TBL(A).TITLE THEN                           00000799  00000632
                                                 MACRO_LN = '         TCMD  CMD=SF,MDT=NO';                       00000800  00000633
                                              ELSE                                                                00000801  00000634
                                                 MACRO_LN = FLD_NAME ||'   TCMD  CMD=SF,MDT=YES,LN=' || LN_PIC;   00000802  00000635
                                                                                                                  00000803  00000636
                                    <01>      IF FLD(F).PROT THEN                                                 00000804  00000637
                                    <01>          MACRO_LN = MACRO_LN || ',PROT=YES';                             00000805  00000638
                                    <01>      ELSE                                                                00000806  00000639
                                    <01>          MACRO_LN = MACRO_LN || ',PROT=NO';                              00000807  00000640
                                    <01>      IF FLD(F).BRIGHT THEN                                               00000808  00000641
                                    <01>          MACRO_LN = MACRO_LN || ',BRIGHT=YES';                           00000809  00000642
                                    <01>      ELSE                                                                00000810  00000643
                                    <01>          MACRO_LN = MACRO_LN || ',BRIGHT=NO';                            00000811  00000644
                                    <01>      IF FLD(F).NUM THEN                                                  00000812  00000645
                                    <01>          MACRO_LN = MACRO_LN || ',NUM=YES';                              00000813  00000646
                                    <01>      ELSE                                                                00000814  00000647
                                    <01>          MACRO_LN = MACRO_LN || ',NUM=NO';                               00000815  00000648
                                    <01>      IF FLD(F).STOP_BIT &                                                00000816  00000649
                                    <01>         LENGTH(FLD_DEF)+FLD(F).FLD_COL < 80 THEN                         00000817  00000650
                                    <01>          MACRO_LN = MACRO_LN || ',STOP=YES';                             00000818  00000651
                                    <01>      ELSE                                                                00000819  00000652
                                    <01>          MACRO_LN = MACRO_LN || ',STOP=NO';                              00000820  00000653
                                    <01>  0                                                                       00000821  00000654
                                    <01>      IF FLD(F).HI_LIGHT ^= ' ' | FLD(F).COLOR ^= ' ' THEN                00000822  00000655
                                    <01>      DO;                                                                 00000823  00000656
                                    <01>         MACRO_LN = MACRO_LN || ',';                                      00000824  00000657
                                    <01>         PUT FILE(PANEL)                                                  00000825  00000658
                                    <01>                 EDIT(MACRO_LN,'*',PANEL_SEQ) (A,COL(72),A,P'999999V99'); 00000826  00000659
                                    <01>         PANEL_SEQ=PANEL_SEQ+1;                                           00000827  00000660
                                    <01>         MACRO_LN = (15)' ';                                              00000828  00000661
                                    <01>         IF FLD(F).HI_LIGHT = 'U' THEN                                    00000829  00000662
                                    <01>            MACRO_LN = MACRO_LN || 'HILITE=ULN';                          00000830  00000663
                                    <01>         ELSE                                                             00000831  00000664
                                    <01>         IF FLD(F).HI_LIGHT = 'R' THEN                                    00000832  00000665
                                    <01>            MACRO_LN = MACRO_LN || 'HILITE=REV';                          00000833  00000666
                                    <01>         ELSE                                                             00000834  00000667
                                    <01>         IF FLD(F).HI_LIGHT = 'B' THEN                                    00000835  00000668
                                    <01>            MACRO_LN = MACRO_LN || 'HILITE=BLN';                          00000836  00000669
                                    <01>         ELSE                                                             00000837  00000670
                                    <01>         IF FLD(F).HI_LIGHT = 'D' THEN                                    00000838  00000671
                                    <01>            MACRO_LN = MACRO_LN || 'HILITE=DEF';                          00000839  00000672
                                    <01>         IF FLD(F).HI_LIGHT ^= ' ' & FLD(F).COLOR ^= ' ' THEN             00000840  00000673
                                    <01>            MACRO_LN = MACRO_LN || ',';                                   00000841  00000674
                                    <01>         IF FLD(F).COLOR ^= ' ' THEN                                      00000842  00000675
                                    <01>            MACRO_LN = MACRO_LN || 'COLOR=' || FLD(F).COLOR;              00000843  00000676
                                    <01>      END;                                                                00000844  00000677

MAP3270   IEBUPDTX -- CORNELL EXTENDED UPDATE PROGRAM.  VERSION 1.12 (SLAC V.12/17/04)            DAY=010  03:09  01/10/11   PAGE 17


                                    <01>  0                                                                       00000845  00000678
                                              IF LN_PIC = '00' THEN                                               00000846  00000654
                                              DO;                                                                 00000847  00000655
                                                 PUT FILE(PANEL)                                                  00000848  00000656
                                                          EDIT(MACRO_LN,PANEL_SEQ) (A,COL(73),P'999999V99');      00000849  00000657
                                                 PANEL_SEQ=PANEL_SEQ+1;                                           00000850  00000658
                                              END;                                                                00000851  00000659
                                              ELSE                                                                00000852  00000660
                                              DO;                                                                 00000853  00000661
                                                 MACRO_LN = MACRO_LN || ',';                                      00000854  00000662
                                                 PUT FILE(PANEL)                                                  00000855  00000663
                                                         EDIT(MACRO_LN,'*',PANEL_SEQ) (A,COL(72),A,P'999999V99'); 00000856  00000664
                                                 PANEL_SEQ=PANEL_SEQ+1;                                           00000857  00000665
                                                 MACRO_LN = (15)' ' ||'DATA='''||FLD_DEF||'''';                   00000858  00000666
                                                 IF LENGTH(MACRO_LN)>71 THEN                                      00000859  00000667
                                                 DO;                                                              00000860  00000668
                                                    PUT FILE(PANEL)                                               00000861  00000669
                                                             EDIT(MACRO_LN,'*',PANEL_SEQ) (A(71),A,P'999999V99')  00000862  00000670
                                                               (SUBSTR(MACRO_LN,72),PANEL_SEQ+1)                  00000863  00000671
                                                                                    (COL(16),A(57),P'999999V99'); 00000864  00000672
                                                    PANEL_SEQ=PANEL_SEQ+2;                                        00000865  00000673
                                                 END;                                                             00000866  00000674
                                                 ELSE                                                             00000867  00000675
                                                 DO;                                                              00000868  00000676
                                                    PUT FILE(PANEL)                                               00000869  00000677
                                                             EDIT(MACRO_LN,PANEL_SEQ) (A,COL(73),P'999999V99');   00000870  00000678
                                                 PANEL_SEQ=PANEL_SEQ+1;                                           00000871  00000679
                                                 END;                                                             00000872  00000680
                                              END;                                                                00000873  00000681
                                              FLD_DEF='';                                                         00000874  00000682
                                           END WRITE_FIELD;                                                       00000875  00000683
                                           END WRITE_PANEL;                                                       00000876  00000684
                                          1/*********************************************************************/00000877  00000685
                                           /*                                                                   */00000878  00000686
                                           /* WRITE_MAPPING - WRITE THE PANEL TO USER FIELD MAPPING             */00000879  00000687
                                           /*                                                                   */00000880  00000688
                                           /*********************************************************************/00000881  00000689
                                           WRITE_MAPPING:PROC;                                                    00000882  00000690
                                              DECLARE M FIXED BIN(15);                                            00000883  00000691
                                              PUT FILE(PANEL)                                                     00000884  00000692
                                                         EDIT(PANEL_NAME||'M','TINPST') (A,COL(10),A)             00000885  00000693
                                                             (PANEL_SEQ) (COL(73),P'999999V99');                  00000886  00000694
                                              PANEL_SEQ=PANEL_SEQ+1;                                              00000887  00000695
                                              DO M = 1 TO FLD_CTR;                                                00000888  00000696
                                                 CALL WRITE_FIELD(M);                                             00000889  00000697
                                              END;                                                                00000890  00000698
                                              PUT FILE(PANEL)                                                     00000891  00000699
                                                      EDIT('TINPEND',PANEL_SEQ) (COL(10),A,COL(73),P'999999V99'); 00000892  00000700
                                              PANEL_SEQ=PANEL_SEQ+1;                                              00000893  00000701
                                    <01>      PUT FILE(PANEL) EDIT(DT_TIME_STAMP)                    (COL(1),A)   00000894  00000702
                                    <01>                          (PANEL_SEQ)            (COL(73),P'999999V99');  00000895  00000703
                                    <01>      PANEL_SEQ=PANEL_SEQ+1;                                              00000896  00000704
                                           /****************************************************************/     00000897  00000702
                                           WRITE_FIELD:PROC(F);                                                   00000898  00000703
                                              DECLARE F FIXED BIN(15);                                            00000899  00000704
                                              DECLARE A FIXED BIN(15);                                            00000900  00000705
                                              DECLARE MACRO_LN CHAR(160) VARYING;                                 00000901  00000706

MAP3270   IEBUPDTX -- CORNELL EXTENDED UPDATE PROGRAM.  VERSION 1.12 (SLAC V.12/17/04)            DAY=010  03:09  01/10/11   PAGE 18


                                              DECLARE FLD_DEF  CHAR(160) VARYING;                                 00000902  00000707
                                              DECLARE FLD_NAME CHAR(8)  VARYING;   /* FORMAT R99C99 */            00000903  00000708
                                              A = FLD(F).FLD_ATTR;                                                00000904  00000709
                                            /*****                                                                00000905  00000710
                                              PUT SKIP DATA(FLD(F));                                              00000906  00000711
                                              PUT SKIP DATA(ATTR_TBL(A));                                         00000907  00000712
                                            *****/                                                                00000908  00000713
                                              FLD_DEF=SUBSTR(FLD(F).FLD_DATA,2);                                  00000909  00000714
                                              I = LENGTH(FLD_DEF);                                                00000910  00000715
                                              DO WHILE(SUBSTR(FLD_DEF,I,1)=' ' & I>0);                            00000911  00000716
                                                 I=I-1;                                                           00000912  00000717
                                              END;                                                                00000913  00000718
                                              IF I=0 THEN FLD_DEF='';                                             00000914  00000719
                                              ELSE FLD_DEF=SUBSTR(FLD_DEF,1,I);                                   00000915  00000720
                                              IF ^ATTR_TBL(A).TITLE THEN                                          00000916  00000721
                                              DO;                                                                 00000917  00000722
                                                 PUT FILE(PANEL)                                                  00000918  00000723
                                                          EDIT(FLD(F).FLD_NAME) (A)                               00000919  00000724
                                                              ('TINPMAP ',FLD(F).FLD_ROW,',') (COL(10),A,P'99',A) 00000920  00000725
                                                                         (FLD(F).FLD_COL,',',                     00000921  00000726
                                                                          LENGTH(FLD_DEF)) (P'99',A,P'99')        00000922  00000727
                                                                (PANEL_SEQ) (COL(73),P'999999V99');               00000923  00000728
                                                 PANEL_SEQ=PANEL_SEQ+1;                                           00000924  00000729
                                              END;                                                                00000925  00000730
                                           END WRITE_FIELD;                                                       00000926  00000731
                                           END WRITE_MAPPING;                                                     00000927  00000732
                                          1/*********************************************************************/00000928  00000733
                                           /*                                                                   */00000929  00000734
                                           /* WRITE_ASM - GENERATE THE USER COMM AREA - ASSEMBLER FORMAT        */00000930  00000735
                                           /*                                                                   */00000931  00000736
                                           /*********************************************************************/00000932  00000737
                                           WRITE_ASM:PROC;                                                        00000933  00000738
                                              DECLARE SEQ_NO            FIXED DEC(8,2) INIT(9);                   00000934  00000739
                                              PUT FILE(ASM)  EDIT                                                 00000935  00000740
                                                  (DT_TIME_STAMP,1)               (COL(1),A,COL(73),P'999999V99') 00000936  00000741
                                                  ('TPARM    DS    0F',2)                (A,COL(73),P'999999V99') 00000937  00000742
                                                  ('TNAME    DC    CL8''',PANEL_NAME,'''',3)                      00000938  00000743
                                                                                              (A,A,A,COL(73),     00000939  00000744
                                                                                                    P'999999V99') 00000940  00000745
                                                  ('TADDR    DC    A(0)',4)                   (A,COL(73),         00000941  00000746
                                                                                                    P'999999V99') 00000942  00000747
                                                  ('TRC      DC    H''0''',5)                 (A,COL(73),         00000943  00000748
                                                                                                    P'999999V99') 00000944  00000749
                                                  ('TAID     DC    X''0''',6)                 (A,COL(73),         00000945  00000750
                                                                                                    P'999999V99') 00000946  00000751
                                                  ('TSBA     DC    XL2''0000''',7)            (A,COL(73),         00000947  00000752
                                                                                                    P'999999V99') 00000948  00000753
                                                  ('         DC    X''0''',8)                 (A,COL(73),         00000949  00000754
                                                                                                    P'999999V99');00000950  00000755
                                              DO M = 1 TO FLD_CTR;                                                00000951  00000756
                                                 CALL WRITE_PARM(M);                                              00000952  00000757
                                              END;                                                                00000953  00000758
                                              PUT FILE(ASM) EDIT                                                  00000954  00000759
                                                  ('         DC    C'' ''',SEQ_NO)       (A,COL(73),P'999999V99') 00000955  00000760
                                                  ('         DC    AL2(0)',SEQ_NO+1)     (A,COL(73),P'999999V99') 00000956  00000761
                                                  (DT_TIME_STAMP,SEQ_NO+2)        (COL(1),A,COL(73),P'999999V99');00000957  00000762
                                              SEQ_NO=SEQ_NO+3;                                                    00000958  00000763

MAP3270   IEBUPDTX -- CORNELL EXTENDED UPDATE PROGRAM.  VERSION 1.12 (SLAC V.12/17/04)            DAY=010  03:09  01/10/11   PAGE 19


                                           WRITE_PARM:PROC(F);                                                    00000959  00000764
                                              DECLARE F FIXED BIN(15);                                            00000960  00000765
                                              DECLARE A FIXED BIN(15);                                            00000961  00000766
                                              DECLARE I FIXED BIN(15);                                            00000962  00000767
                                              DECLARE MACRO_LN CHAR(160) VARYING;                                 00000963  00000768
                                              DECLARE LN_PIC   PIC '99';                                          00000964  00000769
                                              DECLARE FLD_DEF  CHAR(160) VARYING;                                 00000965  00000770
                                              DECLARE FLD_NAME CHAR(160) VARYING;                                 00000966  00000771
                                              A = FLD(F).FLD_ATTR;                                                00000967  00000772
                                            /*****                                                                00000968  00000773
                                              PUT SKIP DATA(FLD(F));                                              00000969  00000774
                                              PUT SKIP DATA(ATTR_TBL(A));                                         00000970  00000775
                                            *****/                                                                00000971  00000776
                                              FLD_DEF=SUBSTR(FLD(F).FLD_DATA,2);                                  00000972  00000777
                                              I = LENGTH(FLD_DEF);                                                00000973  00000778
                                              DO WHILE(SUBSTR(FLD_DEF,I,1)=' ' & I>0);                            00000974  00000779
                                                 I=I-1;                                                           00000975  00000780
                                              END;                                                                00000976  00000781
                                              IF I=0 THEN FLD_DEF='';                                             00000977  00000782
                                              ELSE FLD_DEF=SUBSTR(FLD_DEF,1,I);                                   00000978  00000783
                                              /* MAKE SURE THAT FIELDS DON'T GO PAST COL 80 */                    00000979  00000784
                                              IF LENGTH(FLD_DEF)+FLD(F).FLD_COL   > 80 THEN                       00000980  00000785
                                              DO;                                                                 00000981  00000786
                                                 PUT SKIP EDIT('*** ERROR PROCESSING ROW ',FLD(F).FLD_ROW,        00000982  00000787
                                                               ' COL ',FLD(F).FLD_COL,': FIELD EXCEEDS COL 80')   00000983  00000788
                                                               (A,F(3),A,F(3),A);                                 00000984  00000789
                                                 RETURN;                                                          00000985  00000790
                                              END;                                                                00000986  00000791
                                              FLD_NAME = FLD(F).FLD_NAME;                                         00000987  00000792
                                              LN_PIC = LENGTH(FLD_DEF);                                           00000988  00000793
                                              IF LN_PIC ^= '00' & ^ATTR_TBL(A).TITLE THEN                         00000989  00000794
                                              DO;                                                                 00000990  00000795
                                                 PUT FILE(ASM) EDIT                                               00000991  00000796
                                                         (FLD_NAME||'C','DC    C'' ''',SEQ_NO)                    00000992  00000797
                                                                           (A,COL(10),A,COL(73),P'999999V99')     00000993  00000798
                                                         (FLD_NAME||'L','DC    AL2(',LN_PIC,')',SEQ_NO+1)         00000994  00000799
                                                                           (A,COL(10),A,A,A,COL(73),P'999999V99');00000995  00000800
                                                 SEQ_NO=SEQ_NO+2;                                                 00000996  00000801
                                                 MACRO_LN = SUBSTR(FLD_NAME||'D        ',1,9)                     00000997  00000802
                                                                    ||  'DC    CL' || LN_PIC                      00000998  00000803
                                                                                      || ''''||FLD_DEF||'''';     00000999  00000804
                                                 IF LENGTH(MACRO_LN)>71 THEN                                      00001000  00000805
                                                 DO;                                                              00001001  00000806
                                                    PUT FILE(ASM)                                                 00001002  00000807
                                                             EDIT(MACRO_LN,'*',SEQ_NO) (A(71),A,P'999999V99')     00001003  00000808
                                                               (SUBSTR(MACRO_LN,72),SEQ_NO+1)                     00001004  00000809
                                                                  (COL(16),A(57),P'999999V99');                   00001005  00000810
                                                    SEQ_NO=SEQ_NO+2;                                              00001006  00000811
                                                 END;                                                             00001007  00000812
                                                 ELSE                                                             00001008  00000813
                                                 DO;                                                              00001009  00000814
                                                    PUT FILE(ASM)                                                 00001010  00000815
                                                             EDIT(MACRO_LN,SEQ_NO) (A(72),P'999999V99');          00001011  00000816
                                                    SEQ_NO=SEQ_NO+1;                                              00001012  00000817
                                                  END;                                                            00001013  00000818
                                              END;                                                                00001014  00000819
                                              FLD_DEF='';                                                         00001015  00000820

MAP3270   IEBUPDTX -- CORNELL EXTENDED UPDATE PROGRAM.  VERSION 1.12 (SLAC V.12/17/04)            DAY=010  03:09  01/10/11   PAGE 20


                                           END WRITE_PARM;                                                        00001016  00000821
                                           END WRITE_ASM;                                                         00001017  00000822
                                          1/*********************************************************************/00001018  00000823
                                           /*                                                                   */00001019  00000824
                                           /* WRITE_COB - GENERATE THE USER COMM AREA FOR COBOL                 */00001020  00000825
                                           /*                                                                   */00001021  00000826
                                           /*********************************************************************/00001022  00000827
                                           WRITE_COB:PROC;                                                        00001023  00000828
                                              DECLARE SEQ_NO      FIXED DEC(8,2)  INIT(9);                        00001024  00000829
                                              PUT FILE(COB)                                                       00001025  00000830
                                                         EDIT(DT_TIME_STAMP) (COL(7),A)                           00001026  00000831
                                                             (1)                           (COL(73),P'999999V99') 00001027  00000832
                                                             ('01  ',PANEL_NAME,'-PARM.')  (COL(8),A,A,A)         00001028  00000833
                                                             (2)                           (COL(73),P'999999V99') 00001029  00000834
                                                             ('05  ',PANEL_NAME,'-NAME','PIC X(8) VALUE ''',      00001030  00000835
                                                                     PANEL_NAME,'''.')                            00001031  00000836
                                                                                    (COL(12),(3)A,COL(40),(3)A)   00001032  00000837
                                                             (3)                           (COL(73),P'999999V99') 00001033  00000838
                                                             ('05  FILLER','PIC S9(8) COMP VALUE ZERO.')          00001034  00000839
                                                                                    (COL(12),A,COL(40),A)         00001035  00000840
                                                             (4)                           (COL(73),P'999999V99') 00001036  00000841
                                                             ('05  ',PANEL_NAME,'-RET','PIC S9(4) COMP.')         00001037  00000842
                                                                                    (COL(12),A,A,A,COL(40),A)     00001038  00000843
                                                             (5)                           (COL(73),P'999999V99') 00001039  00000844
                                                             ('05  ',PANEL_NAME,'-AID','PIC X.')                  00001040  00000845
                                                                                    (COL(12),A,A,A,COL(40),A)     00001041  00000846
                                                             (6)                           (COL(73),P'999999V99') 00001042  00000847
                                                             ('05  ',PANEL_NAME,'-SBA','PIC XX.')                 00001043  00000848
                                                                                    (COL(12),A,A,A,COL(40),A)     00001044  00000849
                                                             (7)                           (COL(73),P'999999V99') 00001045  00000850
                                                             ('05  FILLER','PIC X.')                              00001046  00000851
                                                                                    (COL(12),A,COL(40),A)         00001047  00000852
                                                             (8)                           (COL(73),P'999999V99');00001048  00000853
                                              DO M = 1 TO FLD_CTR;                                                00001049  00000854
                                                 CALL WRITE_PARM(M);                                              00001050  00000855
                                              END;                                                                00001051  00000856
                                              PUT FILE(COB)                                                       00001052  00000857
                                                          EDIT('05','FILLER.')                                    00001053  00000858
                                                                            (COL(12),A,COL(16),A)                 00001054  00000859
                                                              (SEQ_NO)                   (COL(73),P'999999V99');  00001055  00000860
                                              SEQ_NO=SEQ_NO+1;                                                    00001056  00000861
                                              PUT FILE(COB)                                                       00001057  00000862
                                                          EDIT('10','FILLER','PIC X(01) VALUE '' ''.')            00001058  00000863
                                                                            (COL(16),A,COL(20),A,COL(40),A)       00001059  00000864
                                                              (SEQ_NO)                   (COL(73),P'999999V99');  00001060  00000865
                                              SEQ_NO=SEQ_NO+1;                                                    00001061  00000866
                                              PUT FILE(COB)                                                       00001062  00000867
                                                          EDIT('10','FILLER','PIC S9(4) VALUE ZERO COMP.')        00001063  00000868
                                                                            (COL(16),A,COL(20),A,COL(40),A)       00001064  00000869
                                                              (SEQ_NO)                   (COL(73),P'999999V99');  00001065  00000870
                                              SEQ_NO=SEQ_NO+1;                                                    00001066  00000871
                                           WRITE_PARM:PROC(F);                                                    00001067  00000872
                                              DECLARE F FIXED BIN(15);                                            00001068  00000873
                                              DECLARE A FIXED BIN(15);                                            00001069  00000874
                                              DECLARE I FIXED BIN(15);                                            00001070  00000875
                                              DECLARE MACRO_LN CHAR(160) VARYING;                                 00001071  00000876
                                              DECLARE LN_PIC   PIC '99';                                          00001072  00000877

MAP3270   IEBUPDTX -- CORNELL EXTENDED UPDATE PROGRAM.  VERSION 1.12 (SLAC V.12/17/04)            DAY=010  03:09  01/10/11   PAGE 21


                                              DECLARE FLD_DEF  CHAR(99) VARYING;                                  00001073  00000878
                                              DECLARE FLD_NAME CHAR(99) VARYING;                                  00001074  00000879
                                              A = FLD(F).FLD_ATTR;                                                00001075  00000880
                                            /*****                                                                00001076  00000881
                                              PUT SKIP DATA(FLD(F));                                              00001077  00000882
                                              PUT SKIP DATA(ATTR_TBL(A));                                         00001078  00000883
                                            *****/                                                                00001079  00000884
                                              FLD_DEF=SUBSTR(FLD(F).FLD_DATA,2);                                  00001080  00000885
                                              I = LENGTH(FLD_DEF);                                                00001081  00000886
                                              DO WHILE(SUBSTR(FLD_DEF,I,1)=' ' & I>0);                            00001082  00000887
                                                 I=I-1;                                                           00001083  00000888
                                              END;                                                                00001084  00000889
                                              IF I=0 THEN FLD_DEF='';                                             00001085  00000890
                                              ELSE FLD_DEF=SUBSTR(FLD_DEF,1,I);                                   00001086  00000891
                                              /* MAKE SURE THAT FIELDS DON'T GO PAST COL 80 */                    00001087  00000892
                                              IF LENGTH(FLD_DEF)+FLD(F).FLD_COL   > 80 THEN                       00001088  00000893

                                           WRITE_PARM:PROC(F);                                                    00001199  00001004
                                              DECLARE F FIXED BIN(15);                                            00001200  00001005
                                              DECLARE A FIXED BIN(15);                                            00001201  00001006
                                              DECLARE I FIXED BIN(15);                                            00001202  00001007
                                              DECLARE MACRO_LN CHAR(160) VARYING;                                 00001203  00001008
                                              DECLARE LN_PIC   PIC '99';                                          00001204  00001009
                                              DECLARE FLD_DEF  CHAR(99) VARYING;                                  00001205  00001010
                                              DECLARE FLD_NAME CHAR(99) VARYING;                                  00001206  00001011
                                              A = FLD(F).FLD_ATTR;                                                00001207  00001012
                                            /*****                                                                00001208  00001013
                                              PUT SKIP DATA(FLD(F));                                              00001209  00001014
                                              PUT SKIP DATA(ATTR_TBL(A));                                         00001210  00001015
                                            *****/                                                                00001211  00001016
                                              FLD_DEF=SUBSTR(FLD(F).FLD_DATA,2);                                  00001212  00001017
                                              I = LENGTH(FLD_DEF);                                                00001213  00001018
                                              DO WHILE(SUBSTR(FLD_DEF,I,1)=' ' & I>0);                            00001214  00001019
                                                 I=I-1;                                                           00001215  00001020
                                              END;                                                                00001216  00001021
                                              IF I=0 THEN FLD_DEF='';                                             00001217  00001022
                                              ELSE FLD_DEF=SUBSTR(FLD_DEF,1,I);                                   00001218  00001023
                                              /* MAKE SURE THAT FIELDS DON'T GO PAST COL 80 */                    00001219  00001024
                                              IF LENGTH(FLD_DEF)+FLD(F).FLD_COL   > 80 THEN                       00001220  00001025
                                              DO;                                                                 00001221  00001026
                                                 PUT SKIP EDIT('*** ERROR PROCESSING ROW ',FLD(F).FLD_ROW,        00001222  00001027
                                                               ' COL ',FLD(F).FLD_COL,': FIELD EXCEEDS COL 80')   00001223  00001028
                                                               (A,F(3),A,F(3),A);                                 00001224  00001029
                                                 RETURN;                                                          00001225  00001030
                                              END;                                                                00001226  00001031
                                              FLD_NAME = FLD(F).FLD_NAME;                                         00001227  00001032

                                              IF LN_PIC ^= '00' & ^ATTR_TBL(A).TITLE THEN                         00001229  00001034

  00003 //********************************************************************  00000003
  00004 //*                                                                     00000004
  00005 //*  THIS JOB INSTALLS THE MAP3270 CORE SOFTWARE FROM THE CLE DISTRO.   00000005
  00006 //*                                                                     00000006
  00007 //*  THE SOFTWARE RESIDES IN 7 DATASETS.  BY DEFAULT, THE DATASETS      00000007
  00008 //*  ARE PREFIXED WITH 'HERC01.MAP3270' ON VOLSER PUB002.               00000008
  00009 //*                                                                     00000009
  00010 //*    .PANEL CONTAINS THE SOURCE CODE FOR THE PANEL. EDITED MANUALLY   00000010
  00011 //*           AND USED AS INPUT TO THE PANEL COMPILER - MAP3270.        00000011
  00012 //*    .MAP   CONTAINS THE BAL CODE GENERATED BY MAP3270 FOR            00000012
  00013 //*           THE PANEL DEFINITION                                      00000013
  00014 //*    .ASM   CONTAINS BAL DATA DEFINITIONS FOR PANELS FROM MAP3270.    00000014
  00015 //*    .COB   CONTAINS COBOL DATA DEFINITIONS FOR PANELS FROM MAP3270.  00000015
  00016 //*    .PLI   CONTAINS PL/I DATA DEFINITIONS FOR PANELS FROM MAP3270.   00000016
  00017 //*    .MACLIB  CONTAINS MACROS FOR MAP3270.                            00000017
  00018 //*    .LOADLIB CONTAINS THE EXECUTABLE CODE.                           00000018
  00019 //*                                                                     00000019
  00020 //********************************************************************  00000020
  00021 //MAP3270 PROC PAN=,                                                    00000021
  00022 //             LIB='HERC01.MAP3270.LOADLIB',                            00000022
  00023 //             SOUT='*',                                                00000023
  00024 //             QUAL='HERC01.MAP3270'                                    00000024
  00025 //MAP3270 EXEC PGM=MAP3270,REGION=1024K                                 00000025
  00026 //STEPLIB  DD DSN=&LIB,DISP=SHR                                         00000026
  00027 //         DD DSN=SYS1.PL1LIB,DISP=SHR                                  00000027
  00028 //SYSPRINT DD SYSOUT=&SOUT                                              00000028
  00029 //MAP      DD DSN=&QUAL..MAP(&PAN),DISP=SHR                             00000029
  00030 //ASM      DD DSN=&QUAL..ASM(&PAN),DISP=SHR                             00000030
  00031 //COB      DD DSN=&QUAL..COB(&PAN),DISP=SHR                             00000031
  00032 //PL1      DD DSN=&QUAL..PLI(&PAN),DISP=SHR                             00000032
  00033 //SYSIN    DD DSN=&QUAL..PANEL(&PAN),DISP=SHR                           00000033
  00034 // PEND                                                                 00000034
  00035 //*                                                                     00000035
  00036 //*  DELETE BACKUPS AND RENAME CURRENT DATASETS TO BACKUP               00000036
  00037 //*                                                                     00000037
  00038 //STEP1   EXEC PGM=IDCAMS                                               00000038
  00039 //SYSPRINT DD SYSOUT=*                                                  00000039
  00040 //SYSIN    DD *                                                         00000040
  00041  DELETE 'HERC01.MAP3270.OLD.ASM'     NONVSAM PURGE                      00000041
  00042  DELETE 'HERC01.MAP3270.OLD.COB'     NONVSAM PURGE                      00000042
  00043  DELETE 'HERC01.MAP3270.OLD.MAP'     NONVSAM PURGE                      00000043
  00044  DELETE 'HERC01.MAP3270.OLD.PANEL'   NONVSAM PURGE                      00000044
  00045  DELETE 'HERC01.MAP3270.OLD.PLI'     NONVSAM PURGE                      00000045
  00046  DELETE 'HERC01.MAP3270.OLD.MACLIB'  NONVSAM PURGE                      00000046
  00047  DELETE 'HERC01.MAP3270.OLD.LOADLIB' NONVSAM PURGE                      00000047
  00048  SET LASTCC=0                                                           00000048
  00049  SET MAXCC=0                                                            00000049
  00050  ALTER HERC01.MAP3270.ASM -                                             00000050
  00051        NEWNAME(HERC01.MAP3270.OLD.ASM)                                  00000051
  00052  ALTER HERC01.MAP3270.COB -                                             00000052
  00053        NEWNAME(HERC01.MAP3270.OLD.COB)                                  00000053
  00054  ALTER HERC01.MAP3270.MAP -                                             00000054
  00055        NEWNAME(HERC01.MAP3270.OLD.MAP)                                  00000055
  00056  ALTER HERC01.MAP3270.PANEL -                                           00000056
  00057        NEWNAME(HERC01.MAP3270.OLD.PANEL)                                00000057
  00058  ALTER HERC01.MAP3270.PLI -                                             00000058
  00059        NEWNAME(HERC01.MAP3270.OLD.PLI)                                  00000059
  00060  ALTER HERC01.MAP3270.LOADLIB -                                         00000060
  00061        NEWNAME(HERC01.MAP3270.OLD.LOADLIB)                              00000061
  00062  ALTER HERC01.MAP3270.MACLIB -                                          00000062
  00063        NEWNAME(HERC01.MAP3270.OLD.MACLIB)                               00000063
  00064  SET LASTCC=0                                                           00000064
  00065  SET MAXCC=0                                                            00000065
  00066 //********************************************************************  00000066
  00067 //*                                                                     00000067
  00068 //*  ALLOC THE DATASETS                                                 00000068
  00069 //*                                                                     00000069
  00070 //********************************************************************  00000070
  00071 //STEP02  EXEC PGM=IEFBR14                                              00000071
  00072 //DD02     DD DSN=HERC01.MAP3270.ASM,DISP=(NEW,CATLG,DELETE),           00000072
  00073 //         UNIT=DISK,VOL=SER=PUB002,                                    00000073
  00074 //         SPACE=(TRK,(15,15,30)),                                      00000074
  00075 //         DCB=(RECFM=FB,LRECL=80,BLKSIZE=3120,DSORG=PO)                00000075
  00076 //DD03     DD DSN=HERC01.MAP3270.COB,DISP=(NEW,CATLG,DELETE),           00000076
  00077 //         UNIT=DISK,VOL=SER=PUB002,                                    00000077
  00078 //         SPACE=(TRK,(15,15,30)),                                      00000078
  00079 //         DCB=(RECFM=FB,LRECL=80,BLKSIZE=3120,DSORG=PO)                00000079
  00080 //DD04     DD DSN=HERC01.MAP3270.MAP,DISP=(NEW,CATLG,DELETE),           00000080
  00081 //         UNIT=DISK,VOL=SER=PUB002,                                    00000081
  00082 //         SPACE=(TRK,(15,15,30)),                                      00000082
  00083 //         DCB=(RECFM=FB,LRECL=80,BLKSIZE=3120,DSORG=PO)                00000083
  00084 //DD05     DD DSN=HERC01.MAP3270.PANEL,DISP=(NEW,CATLG,DELETE),         00000084
  00085 //         UNIT=DISK,VOL=SER=PUB002,                                    00000085
  00086 //         SPACE=(TRK,(15,15,30)),                                      00000086
  00087 //         DCB=(RECFM=FB,LRECL=80,BLKSIZE=3120,DSORG=PO)                00000087
  00088 //DD06     DD DSN=HERC01.MAP3270.PLI,DISP=(NEW,CATLG,DELETE),           00000088
  00089 //         UNIT=DISK,VOL=SER=PUB002,                                    00000089
  00090 //         SPACE=(TRK,(15,15,30)),                                      00000090
  00091 //         DCB=(RECFM=FB,LRECL=80,BLKSIZE=400,DSORG=PO)                 00000091
  00092 //DD07     DD DSN=HERC01.MAP3270.MACLIB,DISP=(NEW,CATLG,DELETE),        00000092
  00093 //         UNIT=DISK,VOL=SER=PUB002,                                    00000093
  00094 //         SPACE=(TRK,(15,15,30)),                                      00000094
  00095 //         DCB=(RECFM=FB,LRECL=80,BLKSIZE=3120,DSORG=PO)                00000095
  00096 //DDLOAD   DD DSN=HERC01.MAP3270.LOADLIB,DISP=(NEW,CATLG,DELETE),       00000096
  00097 //         UNIT=DISK,VOL=SER=PUB002,                                    00000097
  00098 //         SPACE=(TRK,(15,15,30)),                                      00000098
  00099 //         DCB=(RECFM=U,BLKSIZE=19069,DSORG=PO)                         00000099
  00100 //********************************************************************  00000100
  00101 //*                                                                     00000101
++C          102,         149
D 00102 //*  POPULATE THE DATASETS WITH MAP3270 MEMBERS                         00000102
D 00103 //*                                                                     00000103
D 00104 //********************************************************************  00000104
D 00105 //STEP03  EXEC PGM=IEBCOPY                                              00000105
D 00106 //SYSPRINT DD SYSOUT=*                                                  00000106
D 00107 //DDI      DD DSN=HERC01.CLE.DISTRO.SOURCE,DISP=SHR                     00000107
D 00108 //DDASM    DD DSN=HERC01.MAP3270.ASM,DISP=SHR                           00000108
D 00109 //DDCOB    DD DSN=HERC01.MAP3270.COB,DISP=SHR                           00000109
D 00110 //DDMAP    DD DSN=HERC01.MAP3270.MAP,DISP=SHR                           00000110
D 00111 //DDPAN    DD DSN=HERC01.MAP3270.PANEL,DISP=SHR                         00000111
D 00112 //DDPLI    DD DSN=HERC01.MAP3270.PLI,DISP=SHR                           00000112
D 00113 //DDMAC    DD DSN=HERC01.MAP3270.MACLIB,DISP=SHR                        00000113
D 00114 //SYSIN    DD *                                                         00000114
D 00115  COPY INDD=DDI,OUTDD=DDASM                                              00000115
D 00116  S M=((AIDCDASM,AIDCODES,R))                                            00000116
D 00117  COPY INDD=DDI,OUTDD=DDCOB                                              00000117
D 00118  S M=((AIDCDCOB,AIDCODES,R))                                            00000118
D 00119  COPY INDD=DDI,OUTDD=DDPAN                                              00000119
D 00120  S M=(($TTY3270,TTY3270,R))                                             00000120
D 00121  COPY INDD=DDI,OUTDD=DDPLI                                              00000121
D 00122  S M=((AIDCDPLI,AIDCODES,R))                                            00000122
D 00123  COPY INDD=DDI,OUTDD=DDMAC                                              00000123
D 00124  S M=((EREGS,,R))                                                       00000124
D 00125  S M=((ERETURN,,R))                                                     00000125
D 00126  S M=((ESTART,,R))                                                      00000126
D 00127  S M=((TCALL,,R))                                                       00000127
D 00128  S M=((TCMD,,R))                                                        00000128
D 00129  S M=((TENDPAN,,R))                                                     00000129
D 00130  S M=((TFVERI,,R))                                                      00000130
D 00131  S M=((TINPEND,,R))                                                     00000131
D 00132  S M=((TINPMAP,,R))                                                     00000132
D 00133  S M=((TINPST,,R))                                                      00000133
D 00134  S M=((TRT3270,,R))                                                     00000134
D 00135  S M=((TSBA,,R))                                                        00000135
D 00136  S M=((TTYRTN,,R))                                                      00000136
D 00137  S M=((TSTPAN,,R))                                                      00000137
D 00138  S M=((TWCC,,R))                                                        00000138
D 00139  S M=((T3270,,R))                                                       00000139
D 00140  S M=((T3270D,,R))                                                      00000140
D 00141 //********************************************************************  00000141
D 00142 //*                                                                     00000142
D 00143 //*  COMPILE THE MAP3270 PROGRAM                                        00000143
D 00144 //*                                                                     00000144
D 00145 //********************************************************************  00000145
D 00146 //STEP04 EXEC PL1LFCL,REGION.PL1L=1024K,                                00000146
D 00147 //  PARM.PL1L=('LOAD,NODECK,ATR,NEST',                                  00000147
D 00148 //             'XREF,SORMGIN=(2,72,1)')                                 00000148
D 00149 //PL1L.SYSIN DD DSN=HERC01.CLE.DISTRO.SOURCE(MAP3270),DISP=SHR          00000149
I 00149 //*  POPULATE THE DATASETS WITH MAP3270 SOURCE MEMBERS
I 00149 //*
I 00149 //********************************************************************
I 00149 //STEP03 EXEC PGM=INSTAST,PARM='MAP3270 '
I 00149 //STEPLIB  DD DSN=HERC01.CLE.DISTRO.LOADLIB,DISP=SHR
I 00149 //SYSOUT   DD SYSOUT=*
I 00149 //SYSUDUMP DD SYSOUT=*
I 00149 //INDEX    DD DSN=HERC01.CLE.DISTRO.SOURCE($$INDEX),DISP=SHR
I 00149 //COPIES   DD DSN=&&COPY,DISP=(NEW,PASS),
I 00149 //         UNIT=SYSDA,SPACE=(TRK,(1,1)),
I 00149 //         DCB=BLKSIZE=800
I 00149 //*
I 00149 //STEP04  EXEC PGM=IEBCOPY
I 00149 //SYSUT1   DD UNIT=SYSDA,SPACE=(CYL,(1,1))
I 00149 //SYSPRINT DD SYSOUT=*
I 00149 //DISTRO   DD DSN=HERC01.CLE.DISTRO.SOURCE,DISP=SHR
I 00149 //MAP3270A DD DSN=HERC01.MAP3270.ASM,DISP=SHR
I 00149 //MAP3270C DD DSN=HERC01.MAP3270.COB,DISP=SHR
I 00149 //DDMAP    DD DSN=HERC01.MAP3270.MAP,DISP=SHR
I 00149 //MAP3270S DD DSN=HERC01.MAP3270.PANEL,DISP=SHR
I 00149 //MAP3270P DD DSN=HERC01.MAP3270.PLI,DISP=SHR
I 00149 //MAP3270M DD DSN=HERC01.MAP3270.MACLIB,DISP=SHR
I 00149 //SYSIN    DD DSN=&&COPY,DISP=(OLD,DELETE)
I 00149 //********************************************************************
I 00149 //*
I 00149 //*  POPULATE THE DATASETS WITH MAP3270 EXECUTABLE MEMBERS
I 00149 //*
I 00149 //********************************************************************
I 00149 //STEP05 EXEC PGM=INSTAST,PARM='MAP3270X'
I 00149 //STEPLIB  DD DSN=HERC01.CLE.DISTRO.LOADLIB,DISP=SHR
I 00149 //SYSOUT   DD SYSOUT=*
I 00149 //SYSUDUMP DD SYSOUT=*
I 00149 //INDEX    DD DSN=HERC01.CLE.DISTRO.SOURCE($$INDEX),DISP=SHR
I 00149 //COPIES   DD DSN=&&COPY,DISP=(NEW,PASS),
I 00149 //         UNIT=SYSDA,SPACE=(TRK,(1,1)),
I 00149 //         DCB=BLKSIZE=800
I 00149 //*
I 00149 //STEP06  EXEC PGM=IEBCOPY
I 00149 //SYSUT1   DD UNIT=SYSDA,SPACE=(CYL,(1,1))
I 00149 //SYSPRINT DD SYSOUT=*
I 00149 //DISTRO   DD DSN=HERC01.CLE.DISTRO.LOADLIB,DISP=SHR
I 00149 //MAP3270X DD DSN=HERC01.MAP3270.LOADLIB,DISP=SHR
I 00149 //SYSIN    DD DSN=&&COPY,DISP=(OLD,DELETE)
I 00149 //********************************************************************
I 00149 //*
I 00149 //*  COMPILE THE MAP3270 PROGRAM
I 00149 //*
I 00149 //********************************************************************
I 00149 //STEP07 EXEC PL1LFCL,REGION.PL1L=1024K,
I 00149 //  PARM.PL1L=('LOAD,NODECK,ATR,NEST,MACRO',
I 00149 //             'XREF,SORMGIN=(2,72,1)')
I 00149 //PL1L.SYSIN DD DSN=HERC01.CLE.DISTRO.SOURCE(MAP3270),DISP=SHR
I 00149 //PL1L.SYSLIB DD DSN=HERC01.MAP3270.PLI,DISP=SHR
  00150 //LKED.SYSLMOD DD DSN=HERC01.MAP3270.LOADLIB(MAP3270),DISP=SHR          00000150
  00151 //********************************************************************  00000151
  00152 //*                                                                     00000152
  00153 //*  COMPILE THE TTYRTN PANEL TTY3270                                   00000153
  00154 //*                                                                     00000154
  00155 //********************************************************************  00000155
++C          156
D 00156 //STEP05 EXEC MAP3270,PAN=TTY3270                                       00000156
I 00156 //STEP08 EXEC MAP3270,PAN=TTY3270
  00157 //MAP3270.COB DD DUMMY,DCB=BLKSIZE=80                                   00000157
  00158 //MAP3270.PLI DD DUMMY,DCB=BLKSIZE=80                                   00000158
  00159 //********************************************************************  00000159
  00160 //*                                                                     00000160
  00161 //*  ASSEMBLE THE TTY3270 MAP                                           00000161
  00162 //*                                                                     00000162
  00163 //********************************************************************  00000163
++C          164
D 00164 //STEP06 EXEC ASMFCL,PARM.ASM='OBJ,NODECK',PARM.LKED='XREF,LET,LIST'    00000164
I 00164 //STEP09 EXEC ASMFCL,PARM.ASM='OBJ,NODECK',PARM.LKED='XREF,LET,LIST'
  00165 //ASM.SYSLIB DD DSN=HERC01.MAP3270.MACLIB,DISP=SHR,DCB=BUFSIZE=19040    00000165
  00166 //           DD DSN=HERC01.MAP3270.ASM,DISP=SHR                         00000166
  00167 //           DD DSN=SYS1.MACLIB,DISP=SHR                                00000167
  00168 //           DD DSN=SYS2.MACLIB,DISP=SHR                                00000168
  00169 //ASM.SYSIN DD DSN=HERC01.MAP3270.MAP(TTY3270),DISP=SHR                 00000169
  00170 //LKED.SYSLMOD DD DSN=HERC01.MAP3270.LOADLIB(TTY3270),DISP=SHR          00000170
  00171 //********************************************************************  00000171
  00172 //*                                                                     00000172
  00173 //*  ASSEMBLE THE MAP3270 INTERFACE                                     00000173
  00174 //*                                                                     00000174
  00175 //********************************************************************  00000175
++C          176
D 00176 //STEP07 EXEC ASMFCL,PARM.ASM='OBJ,NODECK',PARM.LKED='XREF,LET,LIST'    00000176
I 00176 //STEP10 EXEC ASMFCL,PARM.ASM='OBJ,NODECK',PARM.LKED='XREF,LET,LIST'
  00177 //ASM.SYSLIB DD DSN=HERC01.MAP3270.MACLIB,DISP=SHR,DCB=BUFSIZE=19040    00000177
  00178 //           DD DSN=HERC01.MAP3270.ASM,DISP=SHR                         00000178
  00179 //           DD DSN=SYS1.MACLIB,DISP=SHR                                00000179
  00180 //           DD DSN=SYS2.MACLIB,DISP=SHR                                00000180
  00181 //ASM.SYSIN DD *                                                        00000181
  00182 T3270IO  T3270 MODE=NORMAL                                              00000182
  00183          END                                                            00000183
  00184 //LKED.SYSLMOD DD DSN=HERC01.MAP3270.LOADLIB(T3270IO),DISP=SHR          00000184
  00185 //*                                                                     00000185
++C          186
D 00186 //STEP08 EXEC ASMFCL,PARM.ASM='OBJ,NODECK',PARM.LKED='XREF,LET,LIST'    00000186
I 00186 //STEP11 EXEC ASMFCL,PARM.ASM='OBJ,NODECK',PARM.LKED='XREF,LET,LIST'
  00187 //ASM.SYSLIB DD DSN=HERC01.MAP3270.MACLIB,DISP=SHR,DCB=BUFSIZE=19040    00000187
  00188 //           DD DSN=HERC01.MAP3270.ASM,DISP=SHR                         00000188
  00189 //           DD DSN=SYS1.MACLIB,DISP=SHR                                00000189
  00190 //           DD DSN=SYS2.MACLIB,DISP=SHR                                00000190
  00191 //ASM.SYSIN DD *                                                        00000191
  00192 TTYRTN   TTYRTN                                                         00000192
  00193          END   TTYRTN                                                   00000193
  00194 //LKED.SYSLMOD DD DSN=HERC01.MAP3270.LOADLIB(TTYRTN),DISP=SHR           00000194
  00195 //********************************************************************  00000195
  00196 //*                                                                     00000196
  00197 //*  ASSEMBLE THE MAP3270 INTERFACE FOR PL/I (F).                       00000197
++C          198,         201
D 00198 //*  YOU MAY SKIP STEP09 AND STEP10 IF YOU DO NOT PLAN ON USING PL/I    00000198
D 00199 //*                                                                     00000199
D 00200 //********************************************************************  00000200
D 00201 //STEP09 EXEC ASMFCL,PARM.ASM='OBJ,NODECK',PARM.LKED='XREF,LET,LIST'    00000201
I 00201 //*  YOU MAY SKIP STEP12 AND STEP13 IF YOU DO NOT PLAN ON USING PL/I
I 00201 //*
I 00201 //********************************************************************
I 00201 //STEP12 EXEC ASMFCL,PARM.ASM='OBJ,NODECK',PARM.LKED='XREF,LET,LIST'
  00202 //ASM.SYSLIB DD DSN=HERC01.MAP3270.MACLIB,DISP=SHR,DCB=BUFSIZE=19040    00000202
  00203 //           DD DSN=HERC01.MAP3270.ASM,DISP=SHR                         00000203
  00204 //           DD DSN=SYS1.MACLIB,DISP=SHR                                00000204
  00205 //           DD DSN=SYS2.MACLIB,DISP=SHR                                00000205
  00206 //ASM.SYSIN DD *                                                        00000206
  00207 T3270IOP T3270 MODE=NORMAL,PLI=F                                        00000207
  00208          END                                                            00000208
  00209 //LKED.SYSLMOD DD DSN=HERC01.MAP3270.LOADLIB(T3270IOP),DISP=SHR         00000209
  00210 //*                                                                     00000210
++C          211
D 00211 //STEP10 EXEC ASMFCL,PARM.ASM='OBJ,NODECK',PARM.LKED='XREF,LET,LIST'    00000211
I 00211 //STEP13 EXEC ASMFCL,PARM.ASM='OBJ,NODECK',PARM.LKED='XREF,LET,LIST'
  00212 //ASM.SYSLIB DD DSN=HERC01.MAP3270.MACLIB,DISP=SHR,DCB=BUFSIZE=19040    00000212
  00213 //           DD DSN=HERC01.MAP3270.ASM,DISP=SHR                         00000213
  00214 //           DD DSN=SYS1.MACLIB,DISP=SHR                                00000214
  00215 //           DD DSN=SYS2.MACLIB,DISP=SHR                                00000215
  00216 //ASM.SYSIN DD *                                                        00000216
  00217 TTYRTNP  TTYRTN PLI=F                                                   00000217
  00218          END   TTYRTNP                                                  00000218
  00219 //LKED.SYSLMOD DD DSN=HERC01.MAP3270.LOADLIB(TTYRTNP),DISP=SHR          00000219
  00220 //                                                                      00000220


    SCOMPARE.  VERSION 2.0  (2009/04/15)

PROCESSING CNTL FILE
==>ASM6                                                                            <==
END OF CNTL FILE

MATCH CRITERION = 6 LINES.
NO DIFFERENCES.
**END OF JOB***


ASM6
++E


./ ENDUP



*** MAKESTMT: V1.0.0 STARTING
*** PARM 001: ./ LOAD\./ CHANGE NAME=MAP32700,VERSION=NEXT
*** PARM 100:
*** MAKESTMT-./ LOAD
*** MAKESTMT-./ CHANGE NAME=MAP32700,VERSION=NEXT



*** MAKESTMT: V1.0.0 STARTING
*** PARM 001: ./ ENDUP
*** PARM 100:
*** MAKESTMT-./ ENDUP


          IEBUPDTX -- CORNELL EXTENDED UPDATE PROGRAM.  VERSION 1.12 (SLAC V.12/17/04)            DAY=010  03:10  01/10/11    PAGE 1


EXEC PARMS      CHAINUPD,CHAIN=TS,NOIMPLSEQ,LISTDEL
*** DDNAME=SYSUT2          OPEN FOR OUTPUT, DSORG=PO, DSNAME=HERC01.CLE.DISTRO.CNTLX ON PUB002
      *** CHAIN ID TS DOES NOT MATCH LIBRARY ID PR ***
*** CHAIN LIBRARY ID = 'PR', ALLOCATION NUMBER = 001
*** DDNAME=SYSUT1          OPEN FOR  INPUT, DSORG=PS, DSNAME=NULLFILE
*** DDNAME=DD         <01> OPEN FOR  INPUT, DSORG=PO, DSNAME=HERC01.CLE.DISTRO.CNTL ON PUB002
*** DDNAME=SYSIN      <02> OPEN FOR  INPUT, DSORG=PS, DSNAME=SYS11010.T030946.RA000.HERC013.STMTG1 ON WORK00
                                                          DSNAME=HERC01.CLE.DISTRO.DELTAX.DATA ON PUB001
                                                          DSNAME=SYS11010.T030946.RA000.HERC013.STMTG2 ON WORK03

____________________________________________________________________________________________________________________________________

          <02>  ./ LOAD

MAP32700  IEBUPDTX -- CORNELL EXTENDED UPDATE PROGRAM.  VERSION 1.12 (SLAC V.12/17/04)            DAY=010  03:10  01/10/11    PAGE 2


          <02>  ./ CHANGE NAME=MAP32700,VERSION=NEXT

          ./ REPLACE SEQ1=1
          //HERC01A JOB (Z904,0012),'ME',MSGLEVEL=(1,1),NOTIFY=HERC01,CLASS=S,
          ./ REPLACE SEQ1=102,SEQ2=149
          //*  POPULATE THE DATASETS WITH MAP3270 SOURCE MEMBERS
          //*
          //********************************************************************
          //STEP03 EXEC PGM=INSTAST,PARM='MAP3270 '
          //STEPLIB  DD DSN=HERC01.CLE.DISTRO.LOADLIB,DISP=SHR
          //SYSOUT   DD SYSOUT=*
          //SYSUDUMP DD SYSOUT=*
          //INDEX    DD DSN=HERC01.CLE.DISTRO.SOURCE($$INDEX),DISP=SHR
          //COPIES   DD DSN=&&COPY,DISP=(NEW,PASS),
          //         UNIT=SYSDA,SPACE=(TRK,(1,1)),
          //         DCB=BLKSIZE=800
          //*
          //STEP04  EXEC PGM=IEBCOPY
          //SYSUT1   DD UNIT=SYSDA,SPACE=(CYL,(1,1))
          //SYSPRINT DD SYSOUT=*
          //DISTRO   DD DSN=HERC01.CLE.DISTRO.SOURCE,DISP=SHR
          //MAP3270A DD DSN=HERC01.MAP3270.ASM,DISP=SHR
          //MAP3270C DD DSN=HERC01.MAP3270.COB,DISP=SHR
          //DDMAP    DD DSN=HERC01.MAP3270.MAP,DISP=SHR
          //MAP3270S DD DSN=HERC01.MAP3270.PANEL,DISP=SHR
          //MAP3270P DD DSN=HERC01.MAP3270.PLI,DISP=SHR
          //MAP3270M DD DSN=HERC01.MAP3270.MACLIB,DISP=SHR
          //SYSIN    DD DSN=&&COPY,DISP=(OLD,DELETE)
          //********************************************************************
          //*
          //*  POPULATE THE DATASETS WITH MAP3270 EXECUTABLE MEMBERS
          //*
          //********************************************************************
          //STEP05 EXEC PGM=INSTAST,PARM='MAP3270X'
          //STEPLIB  DD DSN=HERC01.CLE.DISTRO.LOADLIB,DISP=SHR
          //SYSOUT   DD SYSOUT=*
          //SYSUDUMP DD SYSOUT=*
          //INDEX    DD DSN=HERC01.CLE.DISTRO.SOURCE($$INDEX),DISP=SHR
          //COPIES   DD DSN=&&COPY,DISP=(NEW,PASS),
          //         UNIT=SYSDA,SPACE=(TRK,(1,1)),
          //         DCB=BLKSIZE=800
          //*
          //STEP06  EXEC PGM=IEBCOPY

                                    <01>  //HERC01A JOB (Z904,0012),'ME',MSGLEVEL=(1,1),NOTIFY=HERC01,CLASS=S,    00000001
                                          //            MSGCLASS=A                                                00000002
                                          //********************************************************************  00000003
                                          //*                                                                     00000004
                                          //*  THIS JOB INSTALLS THE MAP3270 CORE SOFTWARE FROM THE CLE DISTRO.   00000005
                                          //*                                                                     00000006
                                          //*  THE SOFTWARE RESIDES IN 7 DATASETS.  BY DEFAULT, THE DATASETS      00000007
                                          //*  ARE PREFIXED WITH 'HERC01.MAP3270' ON VOLSER PUB002.               00000008
                                          //*                                                                     00000009
                                          //*    .PANEL CONTAINS THE SOURCE CODE FOR THE PANEL. EDITED MANUALLY   00000010
                                          //*           AND USED AS INPUT TO THE PANEL COMPILER - MAP3270.        00000011
                                          //*    .MAP   CONTAINS THE BAL CODE GENERATED BY MAP3270 FOR            00000012
                                          //*           THE PANEL DEFINITION                                      00000013
                                          //*    .ASM   CONTAINS BAL DATA DEFINITIONS FOR PANELS FROM MAP3270.    00000014
                                          //*    .COB   CONTAINS COBOL DATA DEFINITIONS FOR PANELS FROM MAP3270.  00000015
                                          //*    .PLI   CONTAINS PL/I DATA DEFINITIONS FOR PANELS FROM MAP3270.   00000016
                                          //*    .MACLIB  CONTAINS MACROS FOR MAP3270.                            00000017
                                          //*    .LOADLIB CONTAINS THE EXECUTABLE CODE.                           00000018
                                          //*                                                                     00000019
                                          //********************************************************************  00000020
                                          //MAP3270 PROC PAN=,                                                    00000021
                                          //             LIB='HERC01.MAP3270.LOADLIB',                            00000022
                                          //             SOUT='*',                                                00000023
                                          //             QUAL='HERC01.MAP3270'                                    00000024
                                          //MAP3270 EXEC PGM=MAP3270,REGION=1024K                                 00000025
                                          //STEPLIB  DD DSN=&LIB,DISP=SHR                                         00000026
                                          //         DD DSN=SYS1.PL1LIB,DISP=SHR                                  00000027
                                          //SYSPRINT DD SYSOUT=&SOUT                                              00000028
                                          //MAP      DD DSN=&QUAL..MAP(&PAN),DISP=SHR                             00000029
                                          //ASM      DD DSN=&QUAL..ASM(&PAN),DISP=SHR                             00000030
                                          //COB      DD DSN=&QUAL..COB(&PAN),DISP=SHR                             00000031
                                          //PL1      DD DSN=&QUAL..PLI(&PAN),DISP=SHR                             00000032
                                          //SYSIN    DD DSN=&QUAL..PANEL(&PAN),DISP=SHR                           00000033
                                          // PEND                                                                 00000034
                                          //*                                                                     00000035
                                          //*  DELETE BACKUPS AND RENAME CURRENT DATASETS TO BACKUP               00000036
                                          //*                                                                     00000037
                                          //STEP1   EXEC PGM=IDCAMS                                               00000038
                                          //SYSPRINT DD SYSOUT=*                                                  00000039
                                          //SYSIN    DD *                                                         00000040
                                           DELETE 'HERC01.MAP3270.OLD.ASM'     NONVSAM PURGE                      00000041
                                           DELETE 'HERC01.MAP3270.OLD.COB'     NONVSAM PURGE                      00000042

                                           DELETE 'HERC01.MAP3270.OLD.MACLIB'  NONVSAM PURGE                      00000046

IDC0001I FUNCTION COMPLETED, HIGHEST CONDITION CODE WAS 0


 DELETE 'HERC01.CLE.DISTRO.DELTA.DATA' NONVSAM PURGE

IDC0550I ENTRY (A) HERC01.CLE.DISTRO.DELTA.DATA DELETED

IDC0001I FUNCTION COMPLETED, HIGHEST CONDITION CODE WAS 0


 DELETE 'HERC01.CLE.DISTRO.DELTAX.DATA' NONVSAM PURGE

IDC0550I ENTRY (A) HERC01.CLE.DISTRO.DELTAX.DATA DELETED

IDC0001I FUNCTION COMPLETED, HIGHEST CONDITION CODE WAS 0


 DELETE 'HERC01.CLE.DISTRO.NEWSRC.DATA' NONVSAM PURGE

IDC0550I ENTRY (A) HERC01.CLE.DISTRO.NEWSRC.DATA DELETED

IDC0001I FUNCTION COMPLETED, HIGHEST CONDITION CODE WAS 0


 SET MAXCC=0


IDC0002I IDCAMS PROCESSING COMPLETE. MAXIMUM CONDITION CODE WAS 0
