++C            1
D 00001 //HERC01I JOB (Z904,0012),'ME',MSGLEVEL=(1,1),NOTIFY=HERC01,CLASS=S,    00000001
I 00001 //HERC01B JOB (Z904,0012),'ME',MSGLEVEL=(1,1),NOTIFY=HERC01,CLASS=S,
  00002 //            MSGCLASS=A                                                00000002
  00003 //********************************************************************  00000003
  00004 //*                                                                     00000004
  00005 //*  THIS JOB INSTALLS THE MAP3270 DEMO PROGRAMS FROM THE CLE DISTRO.   00000005
  00006 //*                                                                     00000006
  00007 //*  THE SOFTWARE RESIDES IN 6 DATASETS.  BY DEFAULT, THE DATASETS      00000007
  00008 //*  ARE PREFIXED WITH 'HERC01.MAP3270' ON VOLSER PUB002.               00000008
  00009 //*                                                                     00000009
  00010 //*    .PANEL CONTAINS THE SOURCE CODE FOR THE PANEL. EDITED MANUALLY   00000010
  00011 //*           AND USED AS INPUT TO THE PANEL COMPILER - MAP3270.        00000011
  00012 //*    .MAP   CONTAINS THE BAL CODE GENERATED BY MAP3270 FOR            00000012
  00013 //*           THE PANEL DEFINITION                                      00000013
  00014 //*    .ASM   CONTAINS BAL DATA DEFINITIONS FOR PANELS FROM MAP3270.    00000014
  00015 //*    .COB   CONTAINS COBOL DATA DEFINITIONS FOR PANELS FROM MAP3270.  00000015
  00016 //*    .PLI   CONTAINS PL/I DATA DEFINITIONS FOR PANELS FROM MAP3270.   00000016
  00017 //*    .MACLIB CONTAINS MACROS USED FOR MAP3270.                        00000017
  00018 //*    .LOADLIB CONTAINS THE EXECUTABLE CODE.                           00000018
  00019 //*                                                                     00000019
  00020 //********************************************************************  00000020
  00021 //MAP3270 PROC PAN=,                                                    00000021
  00022 //             LIB='HERC01.MAP3270.LOADLIB',                            00000022
  00023 //             SOUT='*',                                                00000023
  00024 //             QUAL='HERC01.MAP3270'                                    00000024
  00025 //MAP3270 EXEC PGM=MAP3270,REGION=1024K                                 00000025
  00026 //STEPLIB  DD DSN=&LIB,DISP=SHR                                         00000026
  00027 //         DD DSN=SYS1.PL1LIB,DISP=SHR                                  00000027
  00028 //SYSPRINT DD SYSOUT=&SOUT                                              00000028
  00029 //MAP      DD DSN=&QUAL..MAP(&PAN),DISP=SHR                             00000029
  00030 //ASM      DD DSN=&QUAL..ASM(&PAN),DISP=SHR                             00000030
  00031 //COB      DD DSN=&QUAL..COB(&PAN),DISP=SHR                             00000031
  00032 //PL1      DD DSN=&QUAL..PLI(&PAN),DISP=SHR                             00000032
  00033 //SYSIN    DD DSN=&QUAL..PANEL(&PAN),DISP=SHR                           00000033
  00034 // PEND                                                                 00000034
  00035 //********************************************************************  00000035
  00036 //*                                                                     00000036
++C           37,          66
D 00037 //*  POPULATE THE PANEL DATASET WITH THE DEMO PANELS                    00000037
D 00038 //*                                                                     00000038
D 00039 //********************************************************************  00000039
D 00040 //STEP01  EXEC PGM=IEBCOPY                                              00000040
D 00041 //SYSPRINT DD SYSOUT=*                                                  00000041
D 00042 //DDI      DD DSN=HERC01.CLE.DISTRO.SOURCE,DISP=SHR                     00000042
D 00043 //DDCOB    DD DSN=HERC01.MAP3270.COB,DISP=SHR                           00000043
D 00044 //DDPAN    DD DSN=HERC01.MAP3270.PANEL,DISP=SHR                         00000044
D 00045 //DDPLI    DD DSN=HERC01.MAP3270.PLI,DISP=SHR                           00000045
D 00046 //SYSIN    DD *                                                         00000046
D 00047  COPY INDD=DDI,OUTDD=DDCOB                                              00000047
D 00048  S M=((TTYPARMC,TTYPARM,R))                                             00000048
D 00049  COPY INDD=DDI,OUTDD=DDPAN                                              00000049
D 00050  S M=(($DBG3270,DBG3270,R))                                             00000050
D 00051  S M=(($DEMOPAN,DEMOPAN,R))                                             00000051
D 00052  COPY INDD=DDI,OUTDD=DDPLI                                              00000052
D 00053  S M=((TTYPARMP,TTYPARM,R))                                             00000053
D 00054 //********************************************************************  00000054
D 00055 //*                                                                     00000055
D 00056 //*  COMPILE THE DEMO PANELS                                            00000056
D 00057 //*                                                                     00000057
D 00058 //********************************************************************  00000058
D 00059 //STEP02 EXEC MAP3270,PAN=DBG3270                                       00000059
D 00060 //STEP03 EXEC MAP3270,PAN=DEMOPAN                                       00000060
D 00061 //********************************************************************  00000061
D 00062 //*                                                                     00000062
D 00063 //*  ASSEMBLE THE DEMO MAPS                                             00000063
D 00064 //*                                                                     00000064
D 00065 //********************************************************************  00000065
D 00066 //STEP04 EXEC ASMFCL,PARM.ASM='OBJ,NODECK',PARM.LKED='XREF,LET,LIST'    00000066
I 00066 //*  POPULATE THE DATASETS WITH MAP3270 DEMO PANEL MEMBERS
I 00066 //*
I 00066 //********************************************************************
I 00066 //STEP01 EXEC PGM=INSTAST,PARM='MAP3270D'
I 00066 //STEPLIB  DD DSN=HERC01.CLE.DISTRO.LOADLIB,DISP=SHR
I 00066 //SYSOUT   DD SYSOUT=*
I 00066 //SYSUDUMP DD SYSOUT=*
I 00066 //INDEX    DD DSN=HERC01.CLE.DISTRO.SOURCE($$INDEX),DISP=SHR
I 00066 //COPIES   DD DSN=&&COPY,DISP=(NEW,PASS),
I 00066 //         UNIT=SYSDA,SPACE=(TRK,(1,1)),
I 00066 //         DCB=BLKSIZE=800
I 00066 //*
I 00066 //STEP02  EXEC PGM=IEBCOPY
I 00066 //SYSUT1   DD UNIT=SYSDA,SPACE=(CYL,(1,1))
I 00066 //SYSPRINT DD SYSOUT=*
I 00066 //DISTRO   DD DSN=HERC01.CLE.DISTRO.SOURCE,DISP=SHR
I 00066 //MAP3270S DD DSN=HERC01.MAP3270.PANEL,DISP=SHR
I 00066 //SYSIN    DD DSN=&&COPY,DISP=(OLD,DELETE)
I 00066 //********************************************************************
I 00066 //*
I 00066 //*  COMPILE THE DEMO PANELS
I 00066 //*
I 00066 //********************************************************************
I 00066 //STEP03 EXEC MAP3270,PAN=DBG3270
I 00066 //STEP04 EXEC MAP3270,PAN=DEMOPAN
I 00066 //STEP05 EXEC MAP3270,PAN=MDEMO1P
I 00066 //STEP06 EXEC MAP3270,PAN=MDEMO2P
I 00066 //STEP07 EXEC MAP3270,PAN=MDEMO3P
I 00066 //********************************************************************
I 00066 //*
I 00066 //*  ASSEMBLE THE DEMO MAPS
I 00066 //*
I 00066 //********************************************************************
I 00066 //STEP08 EXEC ASMFCL,PARM.ASM='OBJ,NODECK',PARM.LKED='XREF,LET,LIST'
  00067 //ASM.SYSLIB DD DSN=HERC01.MAP3270.MACLIB,DISP=SHR,DCB=BLKSIZE=19040    00000067
  00068 //           DD DSN=SYS1.MACLIB,DISP=SHR                                00000068
  00069 //           DD DSN=SYS2.MACLIB,DISP=SHR                                00000069
  00070 //ASM.SYSIN DD DSN=HERC01.MAP3270.MAP(DBG3270),DISP=SHR                 00000070
  00071 //LKED.SYSLMOD DD DSN=HERC01.MAP3270.LOADLIB(DBG3270),DISP=SHR          00000071
  00072 //*                                                                     00000072
++C           73,         100
D 00073 //STEP05 EXEC ASMFCL,PARM.ASM='OBJ,NODECK',PARM.LKED='XREF,LET,LIST'    00000073
D 00074 //ASM.SYSLIB DD DSN=HERC01.MAP3270.MACLIB,DISP=SHR,DCB=BLKSIZE=19040    00000074
D 00075 //           DD DSN=SYS1.MACLIB,DISP=SHR                                00000075
D 00076 //           DD DSN=SYS2.MACLIB,DISP=SHR                                00000076

    SCOMPARE.  VERSION 2.0  (2009/04/15)

*** MAKESTMT: V1.0.0 STARTING
*** PARM 001: ./ LOAD\./ CHANGE NAME=MAP32701,VERSION=NEXT
*** PARM 100:
*** MAKESTMT-./ LOAD
*** MAKESTMT-./ CHANGE NAME=MAP32701,VERSION=NEXT



*** MAKESTMT: V1.0.0 STARTING
*** PARM 001: ./ ENDUP
*** PARM 100:
*** MAKESTMT-./ ENDUP


          IEBUPDTX -- CORNELL EXTENDED UPDATE PROGRAM.  VERSION 1.12 (SLAC V.12/17/04)            DAY=010  03:10  01/10/11    PAGE 1


EXEC PARMS      CHAINUPD,CHAIN=TS,NOIMPLSEQ,LISTDEL
*** DDNAME=SYSUT2          OPEN FOR OUTPUT, DSORG=PO, DSNAME=HERC01.CLE.DISTRO.CNTLX ON PUB002
      *** CHAIN ID TS DOES NOT MATCH LIBRARY ID PR ***
*** CHAIN LIBRARY ID = 'PR', ALLOCATION NUMBER = 001
*** DDNAME=SYSUT1          OPEN FOR  INPUT, DSORG=PS, DSNAME=NULLFILE
*** DDNAME=DD         <01> OPEN FOR  INPUT, DSORG=PO, DSNAME=HERC01.CLE.DISTRO.CNTL ON PUB002

          //********************************************************************

                                    <01>  //HERC01B JOB (Z904,0012),'ME',MSGLEVEL=(1,1),NOTIFY=HERC01,CLASS=S,    00000001
                                          //            MSGCLASS=A                                                00000002
                                          //********************************************************************  00000003
                                          //*                                                                     00000004
                                          //*  THIS JOB INSTALLS THE MAP3270 DEMO PROGRAMS FROM THE CLE DISTRO.   00000005
                                          //*                                                                     00000006
                                          //*  THE SOFTWARE RESIDES IN 6 DATASETS.  BY DEFAULT, THE DATASETS      00000007
                                          //*  ARE PREFIXED WITH 'HERC01.MAP3270' ON VOLSER PUB002.               00000008
                                          //*                                                                     00000009
                                          //*    .PANEL CONTAINS THE SOURCE CODE FOR THE PANEL. EDITED MANUALLY   00000010
                                          //*           AND USED AS INPUT TO THE PANEL COMPILER - MAP3270.        00000011
                                          //*    .MAP   CONTAINS THE BAL CODE GENERATED BY MAP3270 FOR            00000012
                                          //*           THE PANEL DEFINITION                                      00000013
                                          //*    .ASM   CONTAINS BAL DATA DEFINITIONS FOR PANELS FROM MAP3270.    00000014
                                          //*    .COB   CONTAINS COBOL DATA DEFINITIONS FOR PANELS FROM MAP3270.  00000015
                                          //*    .PLI   CONTAINS PL/I DATA DEFINITIONS FOR PANELS FROM MAP3270.   00000016
                                          //*    .MACLIB CONTAINS MACROS USED FOR MAP3270.                        00000017
                                          //*    .LOADLIB CONTAINS THE EXECUTABLE CODE.                           00000018
                                          //*                                                                     00000019
                                          //********************************************************************  00000020
                                          //MAP3270 PROC PAN=,                                                    00000021
                                          //             LIB='HERC01.MAP3270.LOADLIB',                            00000022
                                          //             SOUT='*',                                                00000023
                                          //             QUAL='HERC01.MAP3270'                                    00000024
                                          //MAP3270 EXEC PGM=MAP3270,REGION=1024K                                 00000025
                                          //STEPLIB  DD DSN=&LIB,DISP=SHR                                         00000026
                                          //         DD DSN=SYS1.PL1LIB,DISP=SHR                                  00000027
                                          //SYSPRINT DD SYSOUT=&SOUT                                              00000028
                                          //MAP      DD DSN=&QUAL..MAP(&PAN),DISP=SHR                             00000029
                                          //ASM      DD DSN=&QUAL..ASM(&PAN),DISP=SHR                             00000030
                                          //COB      DD DSN=&QUAL..COB(&PAN),DISP=SHR                             00000031
                                          //PL1      DD DSN=&QUAL..PLI(&PAN),DISP=SHR                             00000032
                                          //SYSIN    DD DSN=&QUAL..PANEL(&PAN),DISP=SHR                           00000033
                                          // PEND                                                                 00000034
                                          //********************************************************************  00000035
                                          //*                                                                     00000036
                                    <01>  //*  POPULATE THE DATASETS WITH MAP3270 DEMO PANEL MEMBERS              00000037
                                    <01>  //*                                                                     00000038

++C            1,          24
D 00001 //HERC01I JOB (Z904,0012),'ME',MSGLEVEL=(1,1),NOTIFY=HERC01,CLASS=S,    00000001
D 00002 //            MSGCLASS=A                                                00000002
D 00003 //********************************************************************  00000003
D 00004 //*                                                                     00000004
D 00005 //*  THIS JOB INSTALLS THE MAP3270 DEMO PROGRAMS FROM THE CLE DISTRO.   00000005
D 00006 //*                                                                     00000006
D 00007 //*                                                                     00000007
D 00008 //********************************************************************  00000008
D 00009 //STEP01  EXEC PGM=IEBCOPY                                              00000009
D 00010 //SYSPRINT DD SYSOUT=*                                                  00000010
D 00011 //DDI      DD DSN=HERC01.CLE.DISTRO.SOURCE,DISP=SHR                     00000011
D 00012 //DDASM    DD DSN=HERC01.MAP3270.ASM,DISP=SHR                           00000012
D 00013 //DDCOB    DD DSN=HERC01.MAP3270.COB,DISP=SHR                           00000013
D 00014 //DDMAP    DD DSN=HERC01.MAP3270.MAP,DISP=SHR                           00000014
D 00015 //DDPAN    DD DSN=HERC01.MAP3270.PANEL,DISP=SHR                         00000015
D 00016 //DDPLI    DD DSN=HERC01.MAP3270.PLI,DISP=SHR                           00000016
D 00017 //SYSIN    DD *                                                         00000017
D 00018  COPY INDD=DDI,OUTDD=DDCOB                                              00000018
D 00019  S M=((TTYPARMC,TTYPARM,R))                                             00000019
D 00020  COPY INDD=DDI,OUTDD=DDPLI                                              00000020
D 00021  S M=((TTYPARMP,TTYPARM,R))                                             00000021
D 00022 //********************************************************************  00000022
D 00023 //*                                                                     00000023
D 00024 //*  COMPILE THE COBOL DEMO PROGRAM                                     00000024
I 00024 //HERC01C JOB (Z904,0012),'ME',MSGLEVEL=(1,1),NOTIFY=HERC01,CLASS=S,
I 00024 //            MSGCLASS=A
I 00024 //********************************************************************
I 00024 //*
I 00024 //*  THIS JOB INSTALLS THE TTY3270 DEMO PROGRAMS FROM THE CLE DISTRO.
I 00024 //*
I 00024 //*  THE SOFTWARE RESIDES IN 6 DATASETS.  BY DEFAULT, THE DATASETS
I 00024 //*  ARE PREFIXED WITH 'HERC01.MAP3270' ON VOLSER PUB002.
I 00024 //*
I 00024 //*    .PANEL CONTAINS THE SOURCE CODE FOR THE PANEL. EDITED MANUALLY
I 00024 //*           AND USED AS INPUT TO THE PANEL COMPILER - MAP3270.
I 00024 //*    .MAP   CONTAINS THE BAL CODE GENERATED BY MAP3270 FOR
I 00024 //*           THE PANEL DEFINITION
I 00024 //*    .ASM   CONTAINS BAL DATA DEFINITIONS FOR PANELS FROM MAP3270.
I 00024 //*    .COB   CONTAINS COBOL DATA DEFINITIONS FOR PANELS FROM MAP3270.
I 00024 //*    .PLI   CONTAINS PL/I DATA DEFINITIONS FOR PANELS FROM MAP3270.
I 00024 //*    .MACLIB CONTAINS MACROS USED FOR MAP3270.
I 00024 //*    .LOADLIB CONTAINS THE EXECUTABLE CODE.
I 00024 //*
I 00024 //********************************************************************
I 00024 //********************************************************************
I 00024 //*
I 00024 //*  ASSEMBLE THE TTY DEMO PROGRAM
I 00024 //*
I 00024 //********************************************************************
I 00024 //STEP01 EXEC ASMFCL,PARM.ASM='OBJ,NODECK',PARM.LKED='XREF,LET,LIST'
I 00024 //ASM.SYSLIB DD DSN=HERC01.MAP3270.MACLIB,DISP=SHR,DCB=BLKSIZE=19040
I 00024 //           DD DSN=HERC01.MAP3270.ASM,DISP=SHR
I 00024 //           DD DSN=SYS1.MACLIB,DISP=SHR
I 00024 //           DD DSN=SYS2.MACLIB,DISP=SHR
I 00024 //ASM.SYSIN DD DSN=HERC01.CLE.DISTRO.SOURCE(TTYASM),DISP=SHR
I 00024 //LKED.SYSLMOD DD DSN=HERC01.MAP3270.LOADLIB(TTYASM),DISP=SHR
I 00024 //*
I 00024 //********************************************************************
I 00024 //*
I 00024 //*  COMPILE THE COBOL TTY DEMO PROGRAM
  00025 //*                                                                     00000025
  00026 //********************************************************************  00000026
  00027 //STEP02 EXEC COBUCL,                                                   00000027
  00028 //  PARM.COB=('NODECK,LOAD,SUPMAP,SIZE=2048K,BUF=1024K',                00000028
  00029 //            'LIB,NOPMAP,NODMAP,NOXREF,CLIST'),                        00000029
  00030 //  PARM.LKED='LIST,XREF,LET'                                           00000030
  00031 //COB.SYSLIB DD DSN=HERC01.MAP3270.COB,DISP=SHR                         00000031
++C           32,          46
D 00032 //COB.SYSIN DD DSN=HERC01.CLE.DISTRO.SOURCE(CDEMO),DISP=SHR             00000032
D 00033 //LKED.SYSLIB  DD                                                       00000033
D 00034 //             DD DSN=HERC01.CLE.DISTRO.LOADLIB,DISP=SHR                00000034
D 00035 //LKED.SYSLMOD DD DSN=HERC01.MAP3270.LOADLIB(CDEMO),DISP=SHR            00000035
D 00036 //********************************************************************  00000036
D 00037 //*                                                                     00000037
D 00038 //*  COMPILE THE COBOL TTY DEMO PROGRAM                                 00000038
D 00039 //*                                                                     00000039
D 00040 //********************************************************************  00000040
D 00041 //STEP03 EXEC COBUCL,                                                   00000041
D 00042 //  PARM.COB=('NODECK,LOAD,SUPMAP,SIZE=2048K,BUF=1024K',                00000042
D 00043 //            'LIB,NOPMAP,NODMAP,NOXREF,CLIST'),                        00000043
D 00044 //  PARM.LKED='LIST,XREF,LET'                                           00000044
D 00045 //COB.SYSLIB DD DSN=HERC01.MAP3270.COB,DISP=SHR                         00000045
D 00046 //COB.SYSIN DD DSN=HERC01.CLE.DISTRO.SOURCE(TTYCOB),DISP=SHR            00000046
I 00046 //COB.SYSIN DD DSN=HERC01.CLE.DISTRO.SOURCE(TTYCOB),DISP=SHR
I 00046 //COB.SYSPUNCH DD DUMMY
  00047 //LKED.SYSLIB  DD                                                       00000047
  00048 //             DD DSN=HERC01.CLE.DISTRO.LOADLIB,DISP=SHR                00000048
  00049 //LKED.SYSLMOD DD DSN=HERC01.MAP3270.LOADLIB(TTYCOB),DISP=SHR           00000049
  00050 //*                                                                     00000050
  00051 //********************************************************************  00000051
  00052 //*                                                                     00000052
++C           53,          69
D 00053 //*  COMPILE THE PL/1 DEMO PROGRAM                                      00000053
D 00054 //*                                                                     00000054
D 00055 //********************************************************************  00000055
D 00056 //STEP04 EXEC PL1LFCL,REGION.PL1L=128K,                                 00000056
D 00057 //  PARM.PL1L='NODECK,LOAD,MACRO'                                       00000057
D 00058 //PL1L.SYSLIB DD DSN=HERC01.MAP3270.PLI,DISP=SHR                        00000058
D 00059 //PL1L.SYSIN DD DSN=HERC01.CLE.DISTRO.SOURCE(PDEMO),DISP=SHR            00000059
D 00060 //LKED.SYSLIB  DD                                                       00000060
D 00061 //             DD DSN=HERC01.CLE.DISTRO.LOADLIB,DISP=SHR                00000061
D 00062 //LKED.SYSLMOD DD DSN=HERC01.MAP3270.LOADLIB(PDEMO),DISP=SHR            00000062
D 00063 //*                                                                     00000063
D 00064 //********************************************************************  00000064
D 00065 //*                                                                     00000065
D 00066 //*  COMPILE THE PL/1 TTY DEMO PROGRAM                                  00000066
D 00067 //*                                                                     00000067
D 00068 //********************************************************************  00000068
D 00069 //STEP05 EXEC PL1LFCL,REGION.PL1L=128K,                                 00000069
I 00069 //*  COMPILE THE PL/1 TTY DEMO PROGRAM
I 00069 //*
I 00069 //********************************************************************
I 00069 //STEP03 EXEC PL1LFCL,REGION.PL1L=128K,
  00070 //  PARM.PL1L='NODECK,LOAD,MACRO'                                       00000070
  00071 //PL1L.SYSLIB DD DSN=HERC01.MAP3270.PLI,DISP=SHR                        00000071
  00072 //PL1L.SYSIN DD DSN=HERC01.CLE.DISTRO.SOURCE(TTYPLI),DISP=SHR           00000072
  00073 //LKED.SYSLIB  DD                                                       00000073
  00074 //             DD DSN=HERC01.CLE.DISTRO.LOADLIB,DISP=SHR                00000074
  00075 //LKED.SYSLMOD DD DSN=HERC01.MAP3270.LOADLIB(TTYPLI),DISP=SHR           00000075
  00076 //*                                                                     00000076
  00077 //                                                                      00000077

PROCESSING CNTL FILE
==>ASM6                                                                            <==

NO DIFFERENCES.

          <02>  ./ CHANGE NAME=MAP32702,VERSION=NEXT

          ./ REPLACE SEQ1=1,SEQ2=24
          //HERC01C JOB (Z904,0012),'ME',MSGLEVEL=(1,1),NOTIFY=HERC01,CLASS=S,
          //            MSGCLASS=A
          //********************************************************************
          //*
          //*  THIS JOB INSTALLS THE TTY3270 DEMO PROGRAMS FROM THE CLE DISTRO.
          //*
          //*  THE SOFTWARE RESIDES IN 6 DATASETS.  BY DEFAULT, THE DATASETS
          //*  ARE PREFIXED WITH 'HERC01.MAP3270' ON VOLSER PUB002.
          //*
          //*    .PANEL CONTAINS THE SOURCE CODE FOR THE PANEL. EDITED MANUALLY
          //*           AND USED AS INPUT TO THE PANEL COMPILER - MAP3270.
          //*    .MAP   CONTAINS THE BAL CODE GENERATED BY MAP3270 FOR
          //*           THE PANEL DEFINITION
          //*    .ASM   CONTAINS BAL DATA DEFINITIONS FOR PANELS FROM MAP3270.
          //*    .COB   CONTAINS COBOL DATA DEFINITIONS FOR PANELS FROM MAP3270.
          //*    .PLI   CONTAINS PL/I DATA DEFINITIONS FOR PANELS FROM MAP3270.
          //*    .MACLIB CONTAINS MACROS USED FOR MAP3270.
          //*    .LOADLIB CONTAINS THE EXECUTABLE CODE.
          //*
          //********************************************************************
          //********************************************************************
          //*
          //*  ASSEMBLE THE TTY DEMO PROGRAM
          //*
          //********************************************************************
          //STEP01 EXEC ASMFCL,PARM.ASM='OBJ,NODECK',PARM.LKED='XREF,LET,LIST'
          //ASM.SYSLIB DD DSN=HERC01.MAP3270.MACLIB,DISP=SHR,DCB=BLKSIZE=19040
          //           DD DSN=HERC01.MAP3270.ASM,DISP=SHR
          //           DD DSN=SYS1.MACLIB,DISP=SHR
          //           DD DSN=SYS2.MACLIB,DISP=SHR
          //ASM.SYSIN DD DSN=HERC01.CLE.DISTRO.SOURCE(TTYASM),DISP=SHR
          //LKED.SYSLMOD DD DSN=HERC01.MAP3270.LOADLIB(TTYASM),DISP=SHR
          //*
          //********************************************************************
          //*
          //*  COMPILE THE COBOL TTY DEMO PROGRAM
          ./ REPLACE SEQ1=32,SEQ2=46
          //COB.SYSIN DD DSN=HERC01.CLE.DISTRO.SOURCE(TTYCOB),DISP=SHR
          //COB.SYSPUNCH DD DUMMY
          ./ REPLACE SEQ1=53,SEQ2=69
          //*  COMPILE THE PL/1 TTY DEMO PROGRAM
          //*
          //********************************************************************
          //STEP03 EXEC PL1LFCL,REGION.PL1L=128K,
*** MEMBER MAP32702 HAS BEEN ADDED             46 RECORDS WRITTEN
       NEW MAP32702 ENTRY: TTR=00001E INDC=00

                                    <01>  //*  THE SOFTWARE RESIDES IN 6 DATASETS.  BY DEFAULT, THE DATASETS      00000007

                                    <01>  //*    .PANEL CONTAINS THE SOURCE CODE FOR THE PANEL. EDITED MANUALLY   00000010
                                    <01>  //*           AND USED AS INPUT TO THE PANEL COMPILER - MAP3270.        00000011
                                    <01>  //*    .MAP   CONTAINS THE BAL CODE GENERATED BY MAP3270 FOR            00000012
                                    <01>  //*           THE PANEL DEFINITION                                      00000013
                                    <01>  //*    .ASM   CONTAINS BAL DATA DEFINITIONS FOR PANELS FROM MAP3270.    00000014
